src: siza ukukhandela ilanga lokoma kere kweempompo more matshediso more matshediso umnyango weza manzi nokuhlwengisa nga manzi (idws) usebenzisana nomasipala wedorobha lekapa ukurarulula umraro wesomiso etjingalanga kapa; lesi sisomiso esimbi khulu itjingalanga kapa eyakhe yasibona etjhumini leminyaka edluli leko.
tgt: kha vha thuse u thivhela ḓuvha ḽine ha ḓo shaya na shotha zwaḽo more matshediso muhasho wa maḓi na vhuthathatshili (dws) u khou shu misana na ḓorobo ya kapa u thusa kha gomelelo ḽi re kapa vhukovhela, ḽihulusa kha miṅwaha ya fumi yo fhiraho.

src: idws ithi ukubalela khulu ngikho okubange lomraro, nga leyindlelake nomthamo wama damu nawo solo uya ngokwehla.
tgt: u ya nga dws, a hu athu na mvula yo linganaho nahone tshi kalo tsha maḓi madamuni tshi khou ḓi tsa tshi tshi ya.

src: lokhuke sekukatelele iimphathimandla ukuthi zithathe amagadango wokuriyadisa ilanga lokoma kere kweempompo, mhlazana iimpompo zalendawo zingaphela amanzi zome kere.
tgt: hezwi zwo kombetshedza mu vhuso u vhea maga a konḓaho u lengisa khonadzeo dza ḓuvha ḽine ha ḓo shaya na shotha zwaḽo, hune bommbi dza ḓo vha dzi si na maḓi.

src: idorobha lekapa selilinganisela izakhamuzi amanzi ezingawasebenzisa, ngesilinganiso esiyi6b.
tgt: ḓorobo ya kapa vhukovhela i khou thoma na nyiledzo dza 6b.

src: lokhuke kutjho ukuthi ngelanga linye umuntu ngamunye uvunyelwe ukusebenzisa ama50 wamalitha kwaphela namkha ngaphasi kwalokho; lesisilinganisoke sisebenza ekhaya, emsebenzini, esikolweni namkha nanyana kukuphi.
tgt: hezwi zwi amba uri hu na tshikalo tsha ḓuvha tsha ḽithara dza maḓi dza 50 u ya fhasi, hu nga vha hu hayani, mushumoni, tshikoloni kana huṅwe na huṅwe.

src: nanyana idorobheli liqalene nemizamo yoke yokukhandela ilanga lokoma kere kweempompo ukuthi lingafiki nje, kodwana lithi ngahlanye kufuze lilungele nokulawula amanzi wedoro bheli abambelele namkha ongeke bekuyokufika ubusika.
tgt: musi ḓorobo yo tou fombe kha u lwisa ḓuvha ḽine ha ḓo shaya na shotha zwaḽo, hu khou ambiwa uri ḓorobo i khou tea u ḓilugisela nyimele ine ya ḓo kona u dzhia ndango ya nḓisedzo ya maḓi a ḓorobo u itela uri nḓisedzo i swike na vhuria.

src: "amanzi sizowavala nakufumaniseka ukuthi umthamo wamanzi emadamini ehla abe ayokufika emaphesenteni ali13.5 selaphelele woke.
tgt: "ri ḓo vala nḓisedzo ya maḓi dzibommbini musi madamu ashu a tshi swika kha tshiimo tsha phe senthe dza 13.5. musi madamu a tshi swika kha tshiimo tsha phe senthe dza 13.5, vha ḓo thoma u vala nḓila dza dziphaiphi, nga nnḓa ha fhethu ha ndeme ha vhubindudzi na zwiimiswa zwi ngaho zwibadela," ḓorobo yo ralo kha tshitatamennde.

src: umthamo wamanzi emadamini ungafika emaphesenteni ali13.5, kuzakuthonywa ukuvalwa kwerherho lokudlulisa amanzi, ngaphandle kweendaweni eziqakatheke khulu, njengeendaweni zamabhizini si neembhedlela," kutjho isitati mende sedorobha lekapa.
tgt: musi izwi zwi tshi itea, vha dzulapo vha ḓo wana maḓi u bva kha zwiko zwine zwa ḓo vha zwo dzudzanywa u mona na ḓorobo.

src: nasele kwenzeke lokho, izakha muzi kuzakufanela ziyokuphaka amanzi eendaweni ezikhethiweko ezizakumenyezelwa, khona edorobheni.
tgt: mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe u ḓo ṋekedzwa maḓi a ḽithara dza 25 nga ḓuvha.

src: idorobha lekapa lihlome iziko lezehlekelele (idoc) kobanyana lizokusebenzisa ihlelo lezehlekelele yamanzi, elizakusebenza nange kungafika ilanga lokoma kere kweempompo.
tgt: magwedzho ḓorobo yo ima lurandala kha u lwisa u shumiswa ha magwedzho a nnḓa nahone i amba uri zwa u sheledza zwi ḓo tea u itwa lwa tshifhinga tshi sa fhiriho awara nthihi nga ḓuvha, nga ḽavhuvhili na mugivhela, phanḓa ha awara ya 9 nga matsheloni na nga murahu ha awara ya 6 nga madekwana.

src: imithombo namkha iimpetsiumasipala wedorobha lekapa uwukhalima ngamagama abukha li umukghwa wokusetjenziswa kwemithombo namkha iimpetsi, begodu uthi ukusetjenziswa kwemithombo namkha iimpetsi ukusezela ngekasa kuzakuvunyelwa isikhathi esingadluliko eaweni linye, ngabolesibili nangabomgqibelo, ngaphambi kweawa lethoba ekuseni nangemva kweawa lesithandathu ntambama.
tgt: "u shumiswa ha maḓi a gwedzho/tshisima zwi tea u vha na tshikalo nahone vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha a shumisa vha tea u ṅwala fhasi uri vha dzule vha na rekhodo u itela vhaṱoli," ḓorobo yo ralo.

src: "ukusetjenziswa kwemithombo namkha iimpetsi kufanele kulinganiswe ngamamithara alinganisa amanzi asetjenzisiweko, begodu boke abasebenzisi bawo kufanele babe nerekhodi elizakunande lihlolwa," kutjho umkhandlu wedorobha.
tgt: ḓorobo yo dovha hafhu ya ri vhadzulapo vha ḓo tea u wana thendelo kha dws arali vha khou ṱoḓa u renga kana u rengi sa maḓi a gwedzho/tshisima.

src: umkhandlu wedorobha ungezelela ngokuthi izakhamuzi ku fanele zithole imvumo kwadws nazifuna ukuthengisa namkha ukuthenga imithombo namkha iimpetsi.
tgt: sa tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dza muvhuso dza u langa maḓi, dws yo ri muvhuso u khou vhea maga a konḓaho vhuku ma u khwaṱhisedza uri nyiledzo ya u shumiswa ha maḓi i khou tevhedzwa.

src: njengengcenye yemizamo karhulumende yokulawula ukusetjenziswa kwamanzi, idws ithi iimphathimandla zibeka imibandela eqinileko yokulinganiselwa amanzi, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi sihlonitjhwa mbala isilinganiso samanzi esibekiweko.
tgt: ḓorobo i khou shumisana na tshigwada tsha vha shumaho na zwa mulayo khathihi na yuniti ya vhuṱoḓisisi ya tshipentshele u khwaṱhisedza u tevhedzwa ha maga.

src: idorobha lekapa lisebenzisana nanesiqhema eseluse ukuthotjelwa komthetho nanephiko elikhethekileko lezephenyo, kobanyana kuzokuqinisekiswa ukuthi imibandela yamanzi iyathotjelwa.
tgt: u dzhia maga kha vha pfukaho mulayo a si kale muhasho wo ḓidzheni sa kha fulo ḽo ṱanganelaho na ḓorobo, vho sedzesa kha u shu miswa ha maḓi lu siho mulayoni ngei mfuleni.

src: izephulamthetho zithathelwa amagadango umnyango wezamanzi noku hlwengisa ngamanzi mhlapha usandukuphuma ijima elihlanga nyelweko lokufuna nokukhalima umukghwa wokusetjenziswa kwamanzi ngokuphambene nomthetho emfuleni.
tgt: fulo ḽo ḓo sedza kha vhukhakhi hoṱhe ha kushumisele kwa maḓi zwa zwino na vhutevhedzi ha nyiledzo ya maḓi, zwihulwane fhethu hu ṱanzwiwaho dzigoloi hu si ha fomaḽa ho topoliwaho.

src: lelijima beliqothele ukuthola boke abephula imibandela yokusetjenziswa kwamanzi ebekiweko, khulukhulu iindawo zokuhlanzela iinkoloyi ezingakatloliswa.
tgt: "malugana na nyiledzo ya ḓorobo ya ḽevele ya 6b, maḓi ane a endedzwa nga masipala ha ngo tea u shumiswa u tan zwa goloi.

src: "ngokwemibandela 6b yokulinganiselwa ukusetjenziswa kwamanzi ebekwe lidorobha lekapa, amanzi kamasipalada aselwako akakwazi ukusetjenziselwa ukuhlanza iinkoloyi.
tgt: fhethu ha u tanzwa dzigoloi hu si ha fomaḽa hu shu misesa maḓi.

src: abanikazi beendawo zokuhlanzela iinkoloyi ezingakatloliswa basebenzisa amaphayiphu kilamabhizinisi wabo, kanti abanye basebenzisa amanzi aphuma epompini," kutjho umnyango.
tgt: "ri khou tama uri vhashumisi vha maḓi vhoṱhe vha farisane na tshigwada tsha kapa vhu kovhela," izwo zwo ambiwa nga mufarisa nḽ eḓorobo wa kapa vhukovhela vho ian neilson.

src: nanyana babanengi nje abazenda bezamanzi abasebenzela ukukukhandela ilanga lokoma kere kweempompo, kodwana idorobha lekapa lisakhombela izakhamuzi zalo ukuthi zibe nendima ebonakalako yokubabalela nokubulunga amanzi.
tgt: ngeletshedzo dza u vhulunga maḓi kha vha vale bommbi musi vha tshi ṱamba maṋo, u vheula kana u ḓola tshisibe zwanḓani.

src: "sikhombela boke abasebenzisi bamanzi ukuthi bahlanganyele emizameni yokongiwa kwamanzi yesiqhema sedorobha lekapa," kutjho isekela likameyara wedorobha lekapa uian neil son.
tgt: kha vha dzhie tshifhinga tshiṱuku shawarani kana vha shumise maḓi maṱuku bavuni.

src: iiyeleliso zokonga amanzi vala ipompo ingatlelezi amanzi isiphelani lokha nawusahlamba amazinyo, nawutjhefako namkhanawuhlikihla izandla zakho ngesibha .
tgt: goloi kha vha ṱanzwe goloi yavho nga bakete na tshipontshi fhedzi.

src: ungathathi isikhathi eside nawududa ngetjhawareni, begodu sebenzisa amanzi amancani nawududela ngebhadeni.
tgt: lufherani lwa u ṱambela kha vha shumise shawara madzuloni a bavu.

src: ikoloyi hlanza ikoloyakho ngethunga nesipontji kwaphela.
tgt: a vha shumise maḓi maṱuku bavuni.

src: ubuhlambelo nendlwana yangasese tjhawara kunokuthi ududele ngebhadeni sebenzisa amanzi amancani nawududela ngebhadeni dudisa abantwana abancani ndawonye dosa namkha flatjha ithoyilethi kwaphela nakuthoma ukuba nephunga faka isitina ngetankeni yamanzi wokuflatjha wenzelele ukuphungula umthamo wamanzi asetjenziswako.
tgt: kha vha ṱanzwe vhana nga tshifhinga tshithihi.

src: ubuhlambelo nendlwana yangasese tjhawara kunokuthi ududele ngebhadeni sebenzisa amanzi amancani nawududela ngebhadeni dudisa abantwana abancani ndawonye dosa namkha flatjha ithoyilethi kwaphela nakuthoma ukuba nephunga faka isitina ngetankeni yamanzi wokuflatjha wenzelele ukuphungulaumthamo wamanzi asetjenziswako.
tgt: kha vha dzhenise tshidina kha thannge ḽi faraho maḓi a u gwedzha bungani u itela u fhungudza u shumisesa maḓi.

src: ngekhwitjhini hlanza izitja zakho ngezinkini evaliweko, kunobanyana uzihlanze ngepompo etleleza amanzi.
tgt: kha vha shumise tshisibe tshiṱuku, u itela uri vha si ṱukise lunzhi.

src: nciphisa isibha sokuhlanza izitja osisebenzisako, kobanyana kungazokuba nesidingo sokusebenzisa amanzi amanengi ukuyakaza izitja zakho.
tgt: kha vha shumise zinki yo valwaho u ṱanzwa miroho madzuloni a u ṱanzwa nga maḓi ane a khou shuluwa bommbini.

src: hlanzela imirorho oyoyipheka ngezinkini evaliweko, kunokuthi uyihlanze ngamanzi wepompo etlelezako.
tgt: kha vha shumise maḓi e vha ṱanzwa ngao miroho na mitshelo u sheledza miri.

src: iintjalo nesivande sezela iintjalo ngesikhathi lapho ilanga selipholile namkha amathunzi selanabile sezela iintjalo ngamanzi ebewuhlanza ngawo iinthelo nemirorho esivandeni sebenzisa iimvundisi zemvelo ezinganamakhemikhali.
tgt: kha vha sheledze miri nga maḓi e vha shumisa khishini u ṱanzwa miroho na mitshelo.

src: umphakathi uyeleliswa nokobana usebenzise amamithara wawo wamanzi ukuhlola ukuthi kghani akukho la amanzi avuza khona angabonakali na.
tgt: kha vha shumise zwibveledzwa zwa ngadeni zwa mupo.

src: nayibe imithara yakho ayifani ngalezonkhathi ofunde ngazo, kuzabe kutjho ukuthi kukhona la kuvuza khona kungabonakali.
tgt: miraḓo ya tshitshavha vha khou humbelwa uri vha shumise mithara ya maḓi u vhona arali hu na maḓi ane a khou bvuḓa .

src: umphakathi uyeleliswa nokuthi ulungise iimpompo ezivuzako.
tgt: muhasho uri "kha vha vhale mithara wa maḓi phanḓa ha awara mbili na nga murahu ha awara mbili musi maḓi a sa khou shumiswa.

src: ipompo ethonta ithosi linye ngomzuzwana munye idla amanzi angafika emalitheni azii10 220 ngomnyaka.
tgt: arali mbalo dza mithara wa maḓi dzi sa fani, zwi amba uri hu na u bvuḓa".

src: buyisa amandlakho, bika imilandu yokukata adele schormann buyisa amandlakho ngokubikela iimphathimandla ezi faneleko izehlakalo zokukata nezokukhahlunyezwa ngezomseme.
tgt: kha vha dzhie maanḓa avho murahu, kha vha vhige zwiito zwa u tzhipa adele schormann uvha tshipondwa tshau tambudzwa lwa vhudzekani kana u tzhipiwa ndi iṅwe ya tshen zhemo khulu i ḓisaho mutsiko wa muhumbulo ine muthu a nga ṱangana nayo.

src: ukuba ngungazimbi wokukatwa namkha wokukhahlunyezwa ngezomseme ngenye yezinto ezisihluku khulu umuntu angakhe ahlangabezane nazo.
tgt: ndi ngazwo muhasho wa tshipholisa wa afrika tshipembe (saps) wo vhea maga u itela uri zwi leluwe na u vha wo tsireledzea musi muthu a tshi vhiga vhugevhenga uvhu.

src: kungakhoke nje amapholi sa webutho lesewula afrika (isaps) avule amahlelo neendlela ezizakwenza kube lula bekuphephe nokuphepha ukuthi abantu babike imilandu enje.
tgt: muambeli wa mapholisa a mpumalanga mukholonele vhomtsholi bhembe vho amba uri ndi zwa ndeme uri tshitshavha tshi shumisane na mapholisa nahone vha vhige vhugevhenga uvhu.

src: umkhulumeli wezama pholisa empumalanga ucolo nel mtsholi bhembe uthi kuqa kathekile ukuthi umphakathi usebenzisane namapholisa begodu ubike imilandu enje.
tgt: "sa mapholisa, ndi mushumo washu muhulwane u vhona uri vhatshinyi vha khou livhana na mulayo nahone vhapond wa vha zwanḓani zwavhuḓi.

src: "thina njengamapholisa kusibopho sethu ukwenza umsebenzi oqakathekileko wokuqinisekisa ukuthi izephulamthetho ziyabotjhwa, zigwetjwe, abongazimbi babe sezandleni eziphephileko.
tgt: ri kwengweledza vhadzulapo uri vha bvele khagala vha vhige milandu ya u tzhipa zwiṱitshini zwa mapholisa zwa tsini," vha ralo vhobhembe.

src: sikhuthaza umphakathi uku thi uvele uzokubika imilandu yokukata eenteyitjhini zamapholisa zangemakhabo, namkha eziseduze nawo," kutjho ubhembe.
tgt: vhapondwa vha tea u vhiga vhugevhenga ha zwa vhudze kani mapholisani hu sa athu fhela awara dza 72 u bva tshe vhugevhenga ha itea.

src: abongazimbi ababikele ama pholisa ngemilandu epha thelene nezomseme kungakapheli amaawa ama72 imilandu leyo yenzekile.
tgt: vhobhembe vho tsivhudza vhapondwa vha u tzhipiwa uri vha ṱoḓe thuso ya zwa muhumbulo ya maimo a nṱha nga mu rahu ha tshiwo.

src: ubhembe uyelelisa abongazimbi bokukatwa uku thi bafune nesizo lezazi zo kuthoba ukukhahlumezeka kwengqondo nomzimba nabakhe bavelelwa bubumbi bokukatwa.
tgt: "ni nga pfa uri ni na tshika nahone na ṱoḓa u ṱamba lunzhi lunzhi na vha na nyofho dza u bvela nnḓa.

src: "kungenzeka uzizwe usi laphazekile, ufune uku hlamba ngokubuyelelweko, uzizwe unevalo lokuphumela ngaphandle ube hlangana nabantu.
tgt: vhuḓipfi uvho ndi ho ḓoweleaho vhukuma.

src: koke lokhu zizinto ezijayelekileko nawukhe wavelelwa budisi bokukatwa.
tgt: ni tea u humbula zwauri hu na tshumelo dzi re hone dzo itelwaho u ni thusa," vho ralo.

src: igreater rape intervention project (igrip) ingelinye lamahlelo asiza abongazimbi bokukatwa ukuthi bazihlolisele ingogwana yentumbantonga nentumbantonga ngokwayo (ihiv/aids) nezinye izifo.
tgt: thandela ya u dzhenela hu hulwane kha u tzhipiwa (grip) ndi iṅwe ya madzangano ane a thusa vhapondwa vha u tzhipiwa uri vha ite ndingo dza hiv/aids na maṅwe malwadze.

src: usohlalakuhle wegrip uthandiwe maseko uthi ihlanganwabo le itjheja abongazimbi bokukatwa.
tgt: mushumela vhapo wa grip vhothandiwe maseko vha ri dzangano iḽi ḽi ṱhogomela zwipondwa zwa u tzhipiwa.

src: "sitjheja abongazimbi, sibahlalise endaweni ephephileko bekufike isikhathi la sebakghona khona ukukhuluma.
tgt: "ri ṋekedza ṱhogomelo na u tendela zwipondwa zwi tshi dzula nḓuni dzo tsireledzeaho u swikela vha tshi vhona uri vho lugela u amba.

src: sinabathobi bomkhumbulo nabayelelisi abaphambili, abanetjhejo elihle khulu, abahlala balindele ukusiza," kuhlathulula umaseko.
tgt: ri na vhakhuthadzi makone vha na lufuno vho ḓiimiselaho u thusa," vho ralo .

src: uwubika bunjani emapholiseni umlandu wokukatwa: ■ thoma ngokuya emtholapilo uyokuhlolwa bodorhodere namkha abahlengikazi.
tgt: kuvhigele kwa mulandu wa u tzhipa mapholisani: ■ tsha u thoma, iyani kiḽiniki u ṱolwa.

src: umbiko wokuhlolwa kwakho uzakuba yingcenye yobufakazi emlandwini ozawuvula emapholiseni, begodu umbiko loyo uzakusiza amapholisa ukuthi akwazi ukubopha iselelesi esikuleleseleko.
tgt: muvhigo u ḓo vha tshipiḓa tsha faila ya mulandu nahone zwi ḓo thusa mapholisa u fara mutshinyi.

src: ■ iya esitetjhini samapholisa sangekhenu namkha esiseduze nawe uyokuvula umlandu.
tgt: ■ u bva afho iyani kha tshiṱitshi tsha mapholisa tsha tsini u vula mulandu.

src: ipholisa elizakusiza esitetjhini samapholisa lizakubuza imibuzo ephathelene nobuwena, likubuze nangokuthi kwenzekeni, ngalokho ozokubika.
tgt: muofisiri vha ḓo ni humbela zwidodombedzwa zwa vhuṋe na u ṱoḓa u ḓivha zwo iteaho.

src: phendula imibuzo ngeqiniso, ulinge ukukhumbula yoke imininingwana ngokwenzekileko kilokho okukuveleleko.
tgt: fhindulani nga vhungoho nahone ni lingedze u humbula vhunzhi ha zwidodombedzwa u ya nga hune na nga kona.

src: kungenzeka kube yindlela ebudisi nebuhlungu le yokuvula umlandu, kodwana ekugcineni imininingwana ozayinikela amapholisa leyo ngiyo kanye ezakusiza ephenyweni lawo.
tgt: lu nga vha lwendo lu vhavhaho, fhedzi vhuṱanzi vhu ḓo thusa kha ṱhoḓisiso.

src: ukutloliswa kwabavowudi kuyokwenzeka ngontaka wee2018 more matshediso iiec yesewula afrika imemezele ipelaveke yokuthoma yokutloli selwa kwabavowudi amakhetho womnyaka wee2019.
tgt: vhuḓiṅwalisi ha vhakhethi hu thoma nga ṱhafamuhwe 2018 vho more matshediso iec ya afurika tshipembe yo ḓivhadza mafhelo a vhege a vhuḓiṅwalisi ha vhakhethi ha khetho dza 2019 ha u thoma, ya humbela vha khethi vho tendelwaho u mona na shango u dalela tshiṱitshi tshavho tsha u khethela hu nga vha u khwinisa zwidodombedzwa zwavho kha mutevhe wa vhakhethi kana u ḓiṅwalisela u khetha.

src: ikhombele boke abavowudi elizweni loke bona bavaka tjhele iinteyitjhi zokuvowude la bayokuhlola amabizwabo erhelweni labavowudi namkha bayokunikela ngemi niningwanabo yamvanje ukwenzelela ukuvowuda.
tgt: muofisiri muhulwane wa khomishini ya khetho vho sy mamabolo vho amba uri zwiṱitshi zwoṱhe zwa 22 612 zwi ḓo vula mafheloni a vhege ya ḽa 10 na 11 ṱhafamuhwe 2018, u bva nga 8 ya matsheloni u swika 5 nga mathabama, u itela u leludzela vhakhethi musi vha tshi khwinisa zwidodombedzwa zwavho zwa vhuḓiṅwalisi kana u ḓiṅwalisa.

src: isiphathiswa esikhulu seza makhetho usy mamabolo uveza bona iintetjhi zoku vowudela ezizii22 612 zizoku vulwa ngepelaveke yamhlana ali10 ukuya nakali11 kuntaka wee2018 kusukela ngeiri lobunane ekuseni ukufikela ntambamba ngeiri lesihlanu.
tgt: arali vho pfulutshela fhethu huswa u bva tshe vha guma u ḓiṅwalisela u khetha, vha tea u ḓiṅwalisa hafhu kha tshiṱiriki tshiswa tsha u khethela.

src: lokho kwenzelelwa bona kube lula kubavowudi ukuqalisisa imininingwanabo nokutlolisa.
tgt: vhadzulapo vha afurika tshipembe vha miṅwaha ya 16 na u fhira nahone vha na khadi kana ḽiṅwalo ḽa vhuṋe ḽa tshiofisi vha nga ḓiṅwalisela u khetha.

src: nayibe ufudukile endaweni ebewuhlala kiyo nawutlolisa kokuthoma erhelweni labavowudi, njenganje kufanele utlolise ngobutjha esiyingini salapho uyokuvowuda khona.
tgt: arali vha saathu ḓiṅwalisa, a vha nga tendelwi u khetha nga 2019. vhakhethi vho ḓiṅwalisaho, vhane zwidodombedzwa zwa ḓiresi zwavho zwa si vhe kha mutevhe wa vhakhethi, vha nga ṋetshedza zwithu zwoṱhe zwi no khou ṱoḓea kha tshiṱitshi tsha vhukhethelo tshavho nga tshifhinga tsha u ḓiṅwalisa.

src: amasewula afrika aneminyaka eli18 ukuya phezulu abasele banencwadi kamazisi nofana umazisi olikarada bangazi tlolisela ukuvowuda.
tgt: vho mamabolo vho amba uri: "ri khou ṱoḓa vhakhethi vha tshi ḓivhonadza vha shumise tshikhala itshi."

src: abazokutlolisela ukuvowuda ngelangelo kufanele baqale bonyana iimphande zabo zilungile erhelweni labavowudi kanti godu banikele ngelwazi elifaneleke ngesikhathi soku tloliswa.
tgt: vho dadzisa nga uri: "iec u swika zwino a i athu vha na ḓiresi dza vhakhethi vha henefha kha 2.8 miḽioni.

src: "sifuna abavowudi balisebe nzise ithubeli beze ngobunengi babo," kutjho umamabolo.
tgt: ri na dziṅwe ḓiresi dza 3.5 miḽioni dzine dza dzhi wa sa ‘dzi songo khunyelelaho’ kana dzo angaredzaho zwoṱhe’.

src: ubujamobu butlhoga ukuhlaziywa okungeneleleko khona kuzakuvela imininingwana ethlayelako le," ikomitjhini isebenzise imi thombo ehlukahlukeneko efa ka hlangana ukubuyekezwa kwamarekhodi, amafayela wakade ukuqalisisa nokufaka iimphande zabavowudi abazitlolisa eminyakeni ematjhu mi amabili edlulileko.
tgt: khomishini yo wana ḓiresi nga u shumisa vhurangeli ho fhambanaho, zwi tshi katela u sedzulusa hafhu dzirekhodo, dzifaela na dziakhaivi u ṱola na u dzhia ḓiresi dzo ṋetshedzwaho nga vhakhethi kha miṅwaha ya 20 yo fhiraho; u kuvhanganya ḓiresi nga tshifhinga tsha khetho dza masipala dza 2016; na u ita mushumo wa u shumela nnḓa phanḓa ha mafhelo a vhege dza u ḓiṅwalisa kha zwa khethokati.

src: ezinye iimphande bazifunyene erhe lweni labavowudi lamakhetho wabomasipala womnyaka wee2016 begodu nejimeni lokwenza umsebenzi woku tlolisa abavowudi ngokungena umuzi nomuzi ngaphambi kwesikhathi nangepelaveke yokutloliselwa kwabavowudi amakhetho wokukhibelela.
tgt: ho teaho, vhakhethi vho wanalaho vho ḓiṅwalisa kha zwiṱiriki zwa vhukhethelo zwo khakheaho vho pfuluswa, sa zwe zwa ṋetshedzwa nga khethekanyo 12 (1)(d) ya mulayo wa khetho.

src: lapha kukghonakalako, abavowudi abafunyenwe ba tloliswe eeyingini ezingasizo zabo batjhidiselwa kezifane leko ngokwesigaba12 (1)(d) somthetho wezamakhetho.
tgt: vho amba uri: "ro ṱanganedza na u shumisa, ho teaho, datha dza ḓiresi dzi bvaho kha zwiṅwe zwiko zwa muvhuso zwi ngaho sa tshumelo ya tshitatistiki ya afrika tshipembe, zhendedzi ḽa tsireledzo ya matshilisano afrika tshipembe, telkom, ofisi ya poswo ya afrika tshipembe na muhasho wa zwa muno. "

src: "semukele besasebenzisa ilwazimininingwana leempha nde lemithombo yezakhiwo zikarhulumende ezinjengeziko leembalobalo zesewula afrika (istatssa), iejensi yeembonelelo zesondlo nomhlalaphasi karhulumende yesewula afrika, itelkom, iofisi yemise benzi yeposo yesewula afrika nomnyango wezangekhaya," kutjho umamabolo.
tgt: kha vha ḓiṅwalise hu saathu swika ṱhafamuhwe 2018 nga tshimedzi 2017 khomishini ya khetho yo rwela ṱari webusaithi ya (www.

src: elections.
tgt: elections.

src: org.
tgt: org.

src: za ukwenzelela bona abavowudi abatlolisileko begodu nabangakwazi ukusebenzisa iinthanethi ukuhlola amabizwabo erhelweni labavowudi bebafake iimphande zabo.
tgt: za) ya vhakhethi vho ḓiṅwalisaho vhane vha swikela inthanethe u sedzulusa na/kana u ṋetshedza ḓiresi dzavho.

src: abavowudi bangadosela iziko lezamakhetho ku: 0800 11 8000, kusukela ngomvulo bekube ngelesihlanu ngeenkhathi zomsebenzi nangabe kunesizo abalitlhogako manqophana neendaba zokutlolisela ukuvowuda nokulungisa imininingwana.
tgt: vhakhethi vha nga founela senthara ya vhukwamani kha (0800 11 8000), u bva nga musumbuluwo u swika ḽavhuṱanu nga tshifhinga tsha awara dza ofisi, u thuswa malugana na fhethu ha tshiṱitshi tsha vhukhethelo tshavho na mbudziso dziṅwe na dziṅwe.

src: abavowudi bangathumela inomboro kamazisi ngesms enomborweni ethi: 32810 lapho bazokufumana isms ebuyisa ipendulo ngesiphande nesitetjhi sokuvowudela abatloliswe kiso.
tgt: vhakhethi vho ḓinwalisaho vha nga rumela (sms) nomboro dza vhuṋe kha 32810 u itela u ṱanganedza sms i re na ḓiresi ya tshiṱitshi tsha vhukhethelo tshavho (sms i ḓura (r1).

src: vikela abobhejani bekhethu more matshediso ungqongqotjhe we zebhoduluko ued na molewa, wethule umbiko wokuthoma werage lophambili womnyaka wee2018 namahlelo karhulumende wokuvikela ukubulawa kwabobhejani.
tgt: tshidzani tshugulu dzashu vho more matshediso minisṱa wa zwa mupo, vho edna molewa, vho bvisa muvhigo wa mvelaphanḓa wa 2018 wa u thoma wa maitele a ndaulo yo ṱanganywaho ya muvhuso ya u fhelisa u tswiwa ha tshugulu.

src: umbiko lo ufaka nekotara yokugcina yomnyaka wee2017 lapho uveza khona inengi lababotjhiweko, abasaphenywako nalabo ababekwe amacala wo kuzuma ngokungasi semthethweni bekubulawe abobhejani nabakhukhuthisa abobhejani nokwehla kwezinga lokubulawa kwabobhejani enarheni mazombe ngomnyaka wee2017 kubulewe abayi1028 nawumadanisa nangomnyaka wee2016 lapho kubulewe abayi1054.
tgt: muvhigo uyo, une wa katelavho na kotara ya u fhe dzisa ya 2017, u sumbedza mvelaphanḓa kha tshivhalo tsha u farwa, ṱhoḓisiso na u vhonwa mulandu ha vhatswi na vharengisi vha siho mula yoni vha tshugulu na u fhungudzea zwituku kha tshivhalo tsha tshigulu dzi no khou tswiwa u mona na shango nga 2017 (1028), zwi tshi vhambedzwa na zwa 2016 (1054).

src: ngomnyaka wee2017 babunane abafunyanwa bebemukwa iimpo ndo zabobhejani edoyelweni leemphaphamtjhini eor tambo international airport, abasolwa ekuzumeni abobhejani ngoku ngasi semthethweni bama502 kanti abali16 babanjelwa ukukhukhuthisa iimpondo.
tgt: nga 2017 ho vha na u dzhia nga khani maṋanga a tshugulu a malo ngei vhukavhamabupo a dzitshaka ha or tambo, ha farwa vhatswi vha tshugulu vha humbulelwaho vha 502 na vharengisi vha siho mulayoni vha humbulelwaho vha 16, zwa swikisa tshivhalo kha 518, u fhungudzea hazwo u bva kha 680 nga 2016. minisṱa vho molewa vho ri: "zwi vhaisaho, vhaofisiri vha 21 vha bvaho kha vhashumi vhashu vho farelwa zwiito zwi elanaho na vhutswaphukha nga 2017.

src: lokhu kwaletha isibalo sababanjiweko ema518 ekulizinga elehlileko ukusukela ema680 ngomnyaka wee2016.
tgt: "u fhelisa vhutswaphukha muvhuso na vhashumisani nawo wo vhea maga o fha mbanaho a u fhelisa u tswiwa ha tshugulu, zwi tshi katela mbekanyamushumo dza u ṱola kha vhugalaphukha ha lushaka na u shumisa thekhinoḽodzhi ya maitele a u shandukisa zwithu.

src: "okudanisako kukuthi ama21 wezelelesezi kwaba ziinsebenzi zomnyango lo ezibandakanyeke emilandwini yokubulawa nokukhukhuthiswa kweempo ndo zabobhejani ngomnyaka wee2017," kutjho ungqongqo tjhe umolewa.
tgt: vhukati ha phando na nyendavhusiku nga 2017, tshugulu dza 504 dzo tswiwa ngei vhugalaphukha ha lushaka ha kruger (knp), zwine zwa vha fhasi nga phesenthe dza 24 kha dza 662 nga 2016. minisiṱa vho khwaṱhisedza uri "nga kha maano ashu a lwisanaho na vhutswaphukha kha knp ri khou vhona u fhungudzea kha tshivhalo tsha zwiito zwa vhatswaphukha vhugalaphukha, nga kha zwo rekhodiwaho zwa 2662 nga 2017 hu tshi vhambedzwa na 2883 ya 2016. hezwi zwi sumbedza u fhungudzea ha phesenthedzhi ya phesenthe dza 7.6. zwo ralo, tshivhalo tsha tshugulu dzo tswiwaho ngei kwazulunatal, kapa devhula, mpumalanga, free state na devhula vhukovhela tsho aluwa.

src: ukukhandela ukubulawa kwabobhejaniurhulumende nababambisani bakhe bajamise izakhiwo ezithi leko azokusebenzisana nazo ekukhandeleni ukubulawa kwabobhejani.
tgt: mveledzo kha ikonomi vhutswaphukha ha tshugulu na u endedza zwi siho mulayoni zwipuka zwa ḓaka zwi kwama lu si lwavhuḓi mveledziso ya ikonomi ya shango na vhusika mishumo, zwi tshi katela mveledziso ya ikonomi ya bayodaivesithi ya shango ine ya ṱanganya sekithara ya vhuendelamashango.

src: lokho kufaka hlangana amahlelo wokwelusa eenqiwini zeenyamazana noku sebenzisa amahlelo wethekhnolo ji enarheni yoke.
tgt: kha tshiṱatamennde muhasho wa zwa mupo wo amba uri: "u xelelwa nga tshithihi tsha tshipuka tsha ḓaka tsho khe theaho tsha afurika tshipembe tshi ngaho tshugulu, ine ya vha iṅwe ya ‘ṱhanu khulwane’ zwi vha na u kwama lu si lwavhuḓi kha tshivhalo tsha vhae ndelamashango vha dalelaho afrika tshipembe.

src: phakathi kukatjhirhweni no nobayeni wee2017, abobhejani abama504 bazunywa ngokungasi semthethweni bebabulawa esi qiwini seenyamazana ikruger national park (knp), okwaletha imbalo ema24% phasi kunaleyo yabobhejani abama662 ababulawa ngomnyaka wee2016.
tgt: vhaendelamashango vhanzhi vha dalela afrika tshipembe vha tshi ḓa u vhona ṱhanu khulwane, dzine dza vha tshugulu, ndau, ṋari, nngwe na nḓou."

src: "lokho kwaba miphumela emi hle yeqhinga elitjha lokukhandela ukubulawa kwabobhejani eknp ngalokho kwabonakala ukwehla khulu kwesibalo sezenzo ezinje esiqiwini seenyamazana.
tgt: vhutswaphukha ha tshugulu zwi ḓivhiwa sa khombo ya tsireledzo kha shango, zwine zwa nga kwama tshivhalo tsha vhaendelamashango vha dalelaho shango, muvhuso wo zwi khwaṱhisa sa vhutshinyi ha ndemesa kha lushaka.

src: isibalo sezehlakalo zangomnyaka wee2017 sibe zii2 662 nakumadani swa nee2 883 zangomnyaka wee2016.
tgt: zwiito zwi si ho mulayoni zwi baḓekanywaho na vhu tswaphukha ha tshugulu na u endedzwa zwi si ho mulayoni maṋanga a tshugulu zwi vhuedza tshigwada tsha vhutshinyi tshiṱuku tsha vhaḽedzani.

src: imisa sisekelo sepumelelo yomplanimadorobha more matshediso ukukhulela ekhaya elalinganabuyo begodu liphethwe ngumma ombelethi otjheja abentwana ayedwa kwaku ngaqintelisa amathuba wetuthuko yomntwana kodwana lokho akhange kukhandele uvele mu khodiwa ekuphumeleliseni ibhudango lakhe lokuba mplanimadorobha.
tgt: misa ndi mutheo wa vhupulani ha ḓorobo vhune ha ḓisa mvelaphanḓa vho more matshedisou uaaluwa kha muṱa u shayaho wo rangw aho phanḓa nga mme fhedzi a sa shumiho zwi nga thivhela muthu uri a bvelele, fhedzi hezwi a zwo ngo ita uri vele mukhoḓiwa a litshe u tevhela muloro wawe wa u vha mupulani wa ḓorobo.

src: umukhodiwa, obuya esabelweni seluheni ngapha si komasipala wendawo ithulamela eselimpopo, wafumana iziqu zeurban and regional planning eyunivesithi yevenda ngomnya ka wee2016.
tgt: mukhoḓiwa, a bvaho muvhunduni wa luheni kha masi pala wapo wa thulamela kha vundu ḽa limpopo o wana digirii ya vhupulani ha ḓorobo na dzingu u bva yunivesithi ya venḓa nga 2016. ndi muṅwe wa vhavhuelwa vha mbekanyamushumo ya matshudeni a vhaswa vho fhedzaho ngudo dzavho dza pfunzo ya nṱha, ya zhendedzi ḽa thikhedzo ya themamveledziso ya masipala (misa).

src: ungomunye wabazu zi ehlelweni lokuseke lwa kwefundo yelutjha ngaphasi kwejensi esekela umthangalasisekelo kamasipala (imisa).
tgt: ndivho ndi u wanela mushumo na vhueletshedzi matshudeni vho fhedzaho ngudo dzavho dza pfunzo ya nṱha kha mabuḓo a thekiniki o teaho u itela uri vha ṅwaliswe sa dziphurofeshinala.

src: ihle lweli linqophe ukunikela abafundi abaneziqu ithuba lokufumana ilemuko lomsebenzi emikhakheni ebuthekhnikhali beba kghone ukutloliswa ee nhlanganweni zabasebenzi bamabizelo.
tgt: misa ndi tshipiḓa tsha muvhuso wa lushaka tshine tsha vha ngomu ha muhasho wa tshumisano ya mavhusele.

src: umkhakha lo wahlonywa ngomrhayili wee2012.
tgt: yo thomiwa nga ṅwedzi wa shundunthule 2012.

src: "ngemva kokuphasa umethrigi ngomnyaka wee2008, ngahlala umnyaka woke ngi cabanga bonyana ngizoku bhadela ngani iindle ko zeyunivesithi,"kwatjho umukhodiwa.
tgt: "nga murahu ha u phasa murole wa maṱiriki nga 2008, ndo ḓo ima ṅwaha muthihi ndi tshi khou humbula nga ha uri ndi ḓo badela hani mbadelo dza yunivesithi", o ralo mukhoḓiwa.

src: ngomnyaka wee2010, wa tlolisa eyunivesithi ye jwanasbhege, ngetjhudu elimbi ukutlhayela kweemali khange kumvumele uko bana aqede ngitjho nee mfundo zomnyaka wakhe wokuthoma, ngenca yalo kho walisa.
tgt: nga 2010 o ḓinwalisa yunivesithi ya johannesburg fhedzi masheleni a si mu tendele u khunyeledza ṅwaha wawe wa u thoma, a vho tea u litsha vhukati.

src: ngomnyaka olandelako, watlolisela iimfundo zeele ctrical engineering n3 e kholiji yangekhabo ko dwana wabona bonyana leziimfundo azikhambelani nebhudango lakhe.
tgt: mashudu mavhuya, yunivesithi ya venḓa ya ṱanganedza khumbelo yawe a kona u thoma digirii yawe ya zwa vhupulani ha ḓorobo na dzingu nga 2012.

src: wathoma phasi godu, wathumela iimbawo zokwa mukelwa emayunivesithi ngethemba lokufumana isizo leemali zokufunda.
tgt: "tshikimu tsha thuso ya zwa masheleni tsha matshudeni tsha lushaka (nsfas) tsha badela mbadelo dza ṅwaha wanga wa u thoma wa ngudo, misa ya kona u nṋea bazari musi ndi tshi khou ita ṅwaha wa vhuvhili nahone ya nthusa u swika ndi tshi ṱhaphudza ngudo dzanga nga 2016", u ralo.

src: ngetjhudu, iyunivesithi yevenda yamukela isibawo sakhe wabe wathoma ukufundela iziqu zeurban and regional planning ngomnyaka wee2012.
tgt: bazari yo mu badelela ṱhoḓea dza pfunzo, zwo katela mbadelo dza ngudo, dzibugu, vhudzu lo na zwiḽiwa.

src: wathi, "isikhwama seli zweloke sesizo leemali zokufunda (insfas) sa bhadela iindleko zokufu nda zomnyaka wami wo kuthoma, imisa yange na ngomfundalize nasele emnyakeni wesibili yangi sekela bengaqeda iimfu ndo zami ngomnyaka wee2016".
tgt: nga 2017 mukhoḓiwa a thoma ngudo dza mushumo ngei kha masipala wapo wa prince albert kha muhasho wa tshu melo dza tshitshavha na ma bindu.

src: umfundalize lo wabhadela zoke iindleko zakhe, ezifaka hlangana iimali zokufunda, ukuthengwa kweencwadi, i ndawo yokuhlala nokugoma.
tgt: ni tea u ita zwoṱhe nga nungo dzaṋu u shandula nyimele yaṋu na khwinisa nyimele ya matshilele", u ralo mukhoḓiwa.

src: ngomnyaka wee2017 umukhodiwa wathoma iba ndulolemuko lomsebe nzi kwamasipala wendawo iprince albert ngaphasi kwezemisebenzi yomnya ngo nezenzelwa zompha kathi.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ya matshudeni a vhaswa vho fhedza ho ngudo dza pfunzo ya nṱha ya misa zwa zwino i na vhaswa vha matshudeni vha swikaho 70, ho katelwa vhapulani vha ḓorobo na madzingu vha 31, vhainzhiniara vha muḓagasi vha 24, vhainzhiniara vha zwa u fhaṱa vha 12 na vhalanguli vha zwa khonthraka na thandela vhararu.

src: "lihlala likhona ithuba lokufikelela okufunako epi lweni, indabakulu kubekeze la.
tgt: vhoṱhe vha kha mimasipala u mona na mavundu oṱhe a ṱahe sa tshipiḓa tsha mbeka nyamushumo iyi.

src: kufanele wenze koke oku semandlenakho ukobana utjhugulule ubujamo ba kho bewuthuthukise ipilwa kho," kwatjho umukhodi wa.
tgt: ceo o tou farelaho wa misa vho ntandazo vimba vho ri ofisi yavho i a pfesesa ṱhoḓea dza ndeme dza zwa vhuinzhiniara na zwikili zwa zwa mupo kha ḽa afrika tshipembe.

src: umjaphethe womphathi oyihloko kwamisa untandazo vimba uthe iofisakhe izwisisa isidi ngo esiqakathekileko samakghonofundwa wa bosonjiniyera newezazi ke zokwakha esewula afrika.
tgt: "a ri ṱoḓi vhaswa vho phasaho kha mabuḓo aya fhedzi, fhedzi ri ṱoḓa u vhona uri vha na zwikili zwi dzhielwaho nṱha kha ḽifhasi nahone ndi dziphurofeshinaḽa dzo ṅwaliswaho", vha ralo vho vimba.

src: uvimba uthe, "asifuni kwaphela abantu abatjha abaneziqu kilemikhakha, kodwana kufanele siqinise kise bonyana baneba ndulo elamukelekako ngokwezinga leentjhaba tjhaba begodu batloli swe neenhlangano eze ngamele ibizelo labo".
tgt: "masipala yashu i khou ṱhoga vhomakone.

src: wangezelela ngokuthi, "abomasipala bethu batlho ga khulu abantu abafundele amakghono.
tgt: vhabebi vha ḓo vha tshipiḓa tsha sgb vhabebi vha na tshikhala tsha u ranga phanḓa kha kuvhusele kwa zwikolo zwa muvhuso vha na ndivho ya u khwinisa zwitandadi na u ita uri tshikolo tshi vhe fhethu ha khwine kha vhana vhavho.

src: sinomsebenzi omkhulu wokutjhugulula urhulumende weendawo zemakhaya ukuthi asebenze ngefanelo ngemizamo yethu yokuthuthukisa amakgho no".
tgt: khetho dzi ḓo vha hone kha zwikolo zwoṱhe zwa muvhuso u mona na shango.

src: amakhetho we mikhandlu e lawula iinkolo (amasgb) azokubanjwa ngontaka nonyaka, ka nti ababelethi bayakhu thazwa ukuzibandaka nya khona bazokufaka isandla ngokubonakala ko efundweni yabentaba bo.
tgt: minisṱa wa pfunzo dza fhasi vho angie motshekga vho ri haya ndi maitele a khetho khulusa kha shango nga nnḓa ha khetho dza mivhuso yapo na dza lushaka.

src: amakhetho azokuba njwa kizo zoke iinkolo zombuso elizweni mazombe.
tgt: "khetho dza sgb dzi shela mulenzhe kha u bveledza kupfesesele kwo khwaṱhaho kwa vhuṋe nga tshitshavha.

src: ungqongqotjhe weze fundo esisekelo uangie motshekga uthe ama khetho la angamakhu lu ngelizweni kunga sabalwa amakhetho waborhulumende bemakhaya newelizwe loke.
tgt: kushumele kwa zwikolo ku a khwinisea musi vhabebi vha tshi dzhenela nga nḓila yo khwaṱha ho na u vha na dzangalelo kha mafhungo a tshikolo.

src: "amakhetho wamasgb asiza ngokungezelela amazizo womphakathi ekubeni nelizwi ekulawulweni kweenkolo.
tgt: "vho ri sgb dzi na mushumo muhulu une dza tea u ita kha u anḓanya madzangalelo a vhoṱhe vha kwameaho u itela u tikedza ndivho ya u swikelela mvelelo dza pfunzo yavhuḓi dzine dza thusa kha ṱhoḓea dza tshitshavha na mveledziso ya ikonomi.

src: ukusebenza kweenkolo kuyathuthuka lokha ababelethi bafaka isandla ngokubonakalako ee ndabeni zesikolo."
tgt: dzi sgb dzi imela sekithara dzoṱhe dza tshitshavha tsha tshikolo, ho katelwa vhabebi, vhadededzi, vhashumi vha si vhadededzi na vhagudiswa.

src: isikhathi seofisi sokuphatha kwamalunga wesgb minyaka emithathu.
tgt: tshifhinga tshine khorombusi ya shuma tshone ndi miṅwaha miraru.

src: igunya lokulawula iinkolo umthetho olawula iinkolo wesewula afrika unikela amasgb amagu nya aneleko wokulawula iinkolo.
tgt: maanḓa a u langa zwikolo mulayo wa afrika tshipembe wa zwikolo u ṋea khorombusi dza zwikolo maanḓa manzhi a u langa zwikolo sa tshipiḓa tsha ndeme tsha zwiimiswa zwa ndeme zwa dimokirasi.

src: lokhu kukha mbisana nokuhloni tjhwa okuqakathekileko kwamaziko asekela inta ndo yenengi.
tgt: nga u ḓidzhenisa kha maitele a khetho, vhabebi vha vhona uri zwikolo zwi shumele madzangalelo a vhana vhavho.

src: ngokuzibandaka nya emakhethweni wa masgb, ababelethi baqinisekisa bonyana iindingo zabentababo eenkolweni ziyatjhejwa.
tgt: naho miraḓo ya khorombusi vha sa kombetshedzei u vha na ndalukano dza fomaḽa, vhabebi vhane vha vha na zwikili zwa bookkeeping, accounting na tshumelo dza milayo zwihulu avho vhane vha vha na dzangalelo na vhuḓiimiseli kha zwa pfunzo, vha ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha dzhenele sa vhonkhetheni khakhetho .

src: nanyana kungadingeki bonyana ababelethi abafu na ukuba malunga wesgb babe neziqu zefundo, ababelethi abanamakghono wokulondwa kwemi niningwana, ukuhlolwa kweencwadi zeemali ne lwazi lezomthetho abanekareko, begodu banetjisakalo ekuthuthukisweni kweze fundo, bayakhuthazwa ukobana bangenele ama khetho njengabongikhe thani.
tgt: vhathu vha kwameaho vha tevhelaho vha nga khethiwa kha sgb: vhabebi vha vhana vha tshikolo tshenetsho.

src: ababelani abalandelako bangakhethelwa iinkhundla kusgb: ababelethi babafundi esikolweneso.
tgt: vhashumi vha tshikolo tshenetsho vhane vha si vhe vhadededzi.

src: ingoma yesitjhaba, iflarha, abonongorwana belizweloke, itshwayo lombuso namanye amatshwayo zizinto ekugidingwa ngazo ukuhlukahlukana.
tgt: u pembelelela u sa fana nga luimbo, fuḽaga, pfufho, luswayo lwa lushaka na zwiga.

src: ivuk’uzenzele yakhe umkha nyo yaqala ukuqakatheka kwe langeli nokuthi litjho ukuthini kithi simasewula afrika.
tgt: vukuzenzele unnamed kha uno ṅwedzi, huna ḓuvha ḽine ḽo khethe lwa u pembelela mbo fholowo na vhuḓilangi na tswikelelo dza vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha afrika tshipe mbe kha u ḓi bvisa kha vengo, khethekano na ḓivha zwakale i vhavhaho u itela u fhata vhumatshelo nga u farisana.

src: mhlana ama27 kusihlaba ntakana we1994 isewula afrika yaba namakhetho wokuthoma wentando yenengi angabandlululi ngokombala.
tgt: vuk’uzenzele i sedza kha ndeme ya heḽi ḓuvha na zwine ḽa amba kha rine sa vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe.

src: urhulumende omutjha wakhethwa ngaphasi koburholi behloko leya umengameli unelson mandela.
tgt: nga ḽa 27 lambamai 1994 af rika tshipembe ḽo fara khetho dza u thoma dza mbofholowo dzi sa khethululi nga muvhala.

src: kunengi esele kufikelelweko eminyakeni edlulileko, kwaphela kusese kunengi ekusafuze kwenziwe ukwenzela bona kuthuthukiswe ilizwe lekhethu bekwenziwe ngcono amaphilo wamasewula afrika woke.
tgt: muvhuso muswa wa khethwa fhasi ha vhurangaphanḓa ha munna wa vhaṋe muphure sidende vhonelson mandela.

src: usihlabantakana lo akasiyi nyanga yokuqala kwaphela bona sibuya kude kangangani sililizwe, kodwana kusikhathi lapho isewula afrika igidinga khona iinkutana neenkutanakazi ngabonongorwna beli zweloke.
tgt: zwihulu zwo swikelelwa nga kha miṅwaha minzhi, fhedzi huna zwinzhi zwine zwa kha ḓi tea u itwa u khwiṋifhadza shango ḽashu na u shandukisa matshilo a vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe vhoṱhe.

src: laba bonongorwana bezinga eliphezulu lapho ili zwe, ngesandla sikamengameli, lithokoza izakhamuzi nabosaziwako bamanye amazwe.
tgt: lambamai a si wa u lavhelesa hune ra bva hone sa shango fhed zi, ndi tshifhinga tshine vhadzu lapo vha afrika tshipembe ra pembelela vhahali vhashu vha vhanna na vhafumakadzi nga kha pfufho dza lushaka.

src: umthethosisekelo wesewula afrika umthethosisekelo watlanywa ngokwesigaba sesi5 somthethosisekelo wesikhatjhana (umthetho nomboro 200 womnyaka we1993) bewamukelwa kokuthoma libandla lokutlanywa komthe thosisekelo mhlana abu8 ku mrhayili we1996.
tgt: hedzi ndi pfufho khulwanesa dzine shango, nga kha muphuresidende, ḽa ṱhonifha vhadzu lapo vhaḽo na vhabvannḓa vha ṱhonifheaho.

src: watlikitlwa bona ube mthetho mhlana ali10 kunobayeni we1996.
tgt: ndayotewa ya afrika tshipembe ndayotewa yo ṅwalwa zwi tshi ya nga ndima ya vhuṱanu ya ndayotewa ya tshifhinganyana (mulayo 200 wa 1993) nahone yo ṱanganedzwa lwa u thoma nga khuvhangano ya ndayotewa nga ḽa 8 shundunthule 1996. yo sainelwa u vha mulayo nga ḽa 10 nyendavhusiku 1996. zwiga zwashu zwa lushaka afrika tshipembe ḽo khethea nga nḓila ine ri kona u pembelela u sa fana hashu nga kha zwiga zwashu zwa lushaka na fuḽaga ya lushaka, luimbo lwa afrika tshipembe na luswayo lwa muvhuso.

src: yatlanywa ngufred brownell owayesebenzela istate herald yesewula afrika, begodu yathoma ukusetjenziswa mhlana ama27 kusihlabantakana we1994.
tgt: fuḽaga ya afrika tshipembe yo khethea.

src: imibala yeflarha ayinikeli ihlathululo ekhethekileko ngalokhoke akunalitho nanyana itshwayo ekumele lithathwe njengehlathululo yemibala yeflarha yelizwe lekhethu.
tgt: yo itwa nga we a avha a ṋendila wa muvhuso wa afrika tshipembe, vho fred brownell, ya thoma u shumiswa nga ḽa 27 lambamai 1994. mivhala ya fuḽaga a ina zwine ya amba zwo imaho nga uri, ngauralo ahuna tshiga tsho imelaho zwoṱhe tshine tsha tea u badekanywa na mivhala ya fuḽaga.

src: u ‘v’ eflarheni utshwaya ukuhla ngana kwabantu abahlukahlukene ko besewula afrika nokuthatha indlela eragela phambili sisoke sibumbene.
tgt: luswayo lwa ‘v’ kha fuḽaga lwo imeala u ṱangana u bva kha zwithu zwo fhambanaho ha afrika tshipembe na u ṱanga lwendo lwa u bvela phanḓa lwa vhuthihi.

src: ukuphatjhiswa kweflarhaiflarha nayijanyiswe thwi malu ngana neboda, umbala obomvu kufanele ube ngesinceleni somuntu oyiqalileko bese umphetho ekufakwa kiwo isigodo kufanele ube ngaphezulu.
tgt: u fhefheḓisa fuḽaga musi fuḽaga yo vheiwa yo tou ima na luvhondo, bannda ḽitswuku li tea u vha kha tshanda tsha monde tsha vho sedzaho, thambo kana tsho i faraho tshi nga nṱha.

src: nayibekwe yavundla, umphetho ekufakwa kiwo isigodo kufanele ube ngesinceleni somuntu oyiqalileko bese umbala obomvu uba ngaphezulu.
tgt: musi yo vhewa yo rambalala, tsho i faraho tshi tea u vha tshi kha tshanḓa tsha monde tsha vhalavhalesi nahone bannda ḽitswuku ḽi nga nṱha.

src: lokha iflarha ijanyiswe hlanu namkha ngemva kwesikhulumi emhlanganweni, kufanele ibe ngesigomeni sesikhulu mi.
tgt: musi fuḽaga yo vheiwa tsini kana nga murahu ha muambi muṱanganoni, i tea u vha i kha tshanḓa tsha uḽa tsha muambi.

src: nangabe ibekwe kenye indawo endaweni yomhlangano, kufanele ibe ngesigomeni sababukeli na mkha abalaleli bomhlangano.
tgt: musi yo vhewa huṅwevho muṱanganoni, i tea u vha i kha tshanḓa tsha uḽa tsha vhaṱaleli kana vhathetshelesi.

src: itshwayo lombuso lelizwe itshwayo lombuso lesewula afrika, elibuye laziwe ngokuthi litshwayo eliqakathekileko lelizwe lekhethu, lilitshwayo elikhulu nelingaphezulu kwawo woke elizweni.
tgt: luswayo lwa muvhuso luswayo lwa muvhuso, lune lwa ḓivhiwa hafhu sa tshiga tsha shango, ndi lwone luswayo lu vhonalesaho lwa shango.

src: umtlolo onomgadangiso wesitembu sombuso utjho igunya eliphezulu njengombana ungophasiswe ngumengameli wesewula afrika.
tgt: luswayo lwa muvhuso ndi tshipiḓa tshavhuḓi tsha luswayo lwa muvhuso.

src: itshwayo lombuso lesewula afrika lahlonywa ngelanga letjhaphuluko ngomnyaka wee2000.
tgt: liṅwalwa ḽine ḽa vha na khanḓiso ya luswayo lwa muvhuso khaḽo ḽi na maanḓa mahulu ngauri zwi amba uri ḽo the mendelwa nga muphuresidende wa afrika tshipembe.

src: amatshwayo wayo ahleleke ngendlela yokuthi aveza inzinzo, ukuhlonipha nokuqakatheka kwalo.
tgt: luswayo lwa muvhuso lwa afrika tshipembe lwo rwelwa ṱari nga ḓuvha ḽa mbofholowo nga 2000. zwidodombedzwa zwine zwa vha khalwo zwo vhekanywa nga nḓila ine zwa sumbedza vhudziki na vhundeme.

src: isiqubulo setshwayo lombuso sithi: "!
tgt: muano une wavha kha luswayo lwa muvhuso, "!

src: ke e: /xarra //ke" esitlolwe ngelimi lekhoisan, esitjho ukuthi abantu abahlukahlukeneko ababumbeneko.
tgt: ke e: /xarra //ke" zwine zwo ṅwalwa nga luambo lwa khoisan, zwi amba uri vhathu vho fhambanaho ṱanganani.

src: ukukhandelwa kwesomiso esikhulu vukuzenzele unnamed njengombana isomiso sesifikelele ezingeni lehlekelele enje etlha gwini kapa nepumalanga kapa lapho amazinga wama damu kamasipala wenelson mandela bay asema25%, kusi khathi sokobana amasewula afrika onge lesisisetjenziswa esiyindlala nesiligugu.
tgt: u lwa na gomelelo ḽihulu vukuzenzele unnamed musi gomelelo ḽo swika kha tshiimo tshi shushaho ngei kapa vhubvaḓuvha na kapa devhula, hune ḽeveḽe ya damu ngei kha masipala muhul wane wa nelson mandela bay ya vha kha phesenthe dza 25 fhedzi, ndi tshifhinga tsha uri vhathu vha afrika tshipembe vha farane u itela u tsireledza hetshi tshiko tshavhuḓi na hone tshi shaeaho.

src: isomiso sikhathi eside khulu sokungani kwezulu okubangela ukutlhayelelwa mamanzi.
tgt: u ya nga dokotela vho mathieu roualt, mushumisani na phrofesa kha muhasho wa oceanography yunivesithi ya cape town, zwivhangi zwihulu zwa gomelelo ndi mveledzwa nga el niño na tshanduko dza kilima.

src: wathi "iel niño sisehlakalo semvelo esibuyelela njalo ngem va kweminyaka emithathu uku ya kemihlanu godu ubujamobu bungathatha iminyaka emibili.
tgt: vho amba uri: "el niño ndi nzulele ya mupo ine ya bvele la nga murahu ha tshifhinga tsho pimeaho ine ya vhuya hafhu miṅwaha miraru u ya kha miṱanu miṅwe na miṅwe nahone i nga vha hone u swika miṅwaha mivhili.

src: bandisa umtjhiso emalwandle wepacific neindian, okunga bangela ubujamo besomiso".
tgt: i engedza themparetsha kha maḓadzhe a india na pacific, zwine zwa sia zwi tshi vhanga tshiimo tsha gomelelo.

src: roualt wahlathulula ngokuthi "isentjhuri edluli leko le iafrika engesewula itlhage khulu ngamatjhugu tjhuguluko wetlayimethi waqobe mnyakaokwabangela isomiso esirhageleko nokupha zamiseka kwepilo yeemila neentjalo zequlwanini nezema nzini nepilo yabantu ngo kwabo.
tgt: tshanduko ya kilima i ṱalutshe dzwa sa tshanduko kha phatheni dza kilima ya zwa dzingu na ḽifhasi nga vhuphara ye ya thoma vhukati u swika mafheloni a sentshari ya vhu20 nahone yo shela mulenzhe zwi hulusa kha nyengedzo ya ḽeveḽe dza gesepfuḓi ya dzingamufhe yo bveledzwaho nga tshumiso ya masalela a zwivhaswa.

src: amatjhuguluko la abanomthelela ebubulweni lezokulima, amadamu nem nothweni wezokuthiya nemno thweni ngokuphele leko.
tgt: dokotela vho roualt vho ṱalu tshedza uri: "kha sentshari yo fhiraho tshipembe ha afrika ho tambudzwa nga tshanduko dza ṅwaha nga ṅwaha dzi ma ngadzaho kha kilima, dzi livhisa ho kha gomelelo ḽo kalulaho na thithiso kha ikhosisiteme ya zwa shangoni na maḓadzheni.

src: godu amatjhuguluko la athikameza nokugeleza kwemi lanjana nezakhipilo zeentjalo ezitjhinga elwandle,".
tgt: tshanduko hedzi dzi kwama nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhulimi, tsireledzo ya maḓi na vhureakhovhe zwine zwa vha ikonomi yo ṱanḓavhuwaho.

src: ngenyanga kamhlolanja umn yango wezokubusa ngokuba mbisana nezendabuko (icogta) utjhugulule izinga lobujamo besomisa ukusuka ekubeni yihlekelele yesifunda ukuya ekubeni yihlekelele yeli zweloke.
tgt: zwi kwama hafhu na muelelo wa maḓi kha zwidambwana na kha zwimela na u kumbuludzwa ha pfushi dzi tshi ya lwanzheni.

src: mmaphaka tau, oyi hloko yeziko lokulawulwa kwehlekelele lelizweloke (ndmc) uthe "ngemva kokuhlahluba kabutjha ubu jamo oburhagalako besomiso eemfundeni eentathu, iim phathimandla zezehlekelele zibuyekeze ubujamo besomiso bamenyezelwa njengehlekelele yelizweloke".
tgt: masiandaitwa haya a pfeswa nga maanḓa nga afrika tshipembe ngauri shango ḽashu ḽi dzula ḽi na tshikalo tsha u shaea ha mvula nga ṅwaha tsha 450 mililitha (ml), hu tshi vhambedzwa na tshikalo tsha ḽifhasi nga vhuphara tsha 860 mililitha (ml).

src: nanyana kubudisi nje ukuli nganisa imithelela yesomiso kezomnotho, kodwana kube nomthelela omumbi omkhulu emkhakheni wezokulima.
tgt: masiandaitwa a gomelelo ndi afhio?

src: nge tjingalanga kapa, esebujameni besibili ngelizweni ngengeniso yomkhiqizo wangekhaya ophe leleko (igdp) kezokulima, ku lahleke imisebenzi epheze ibe zii21 000 ekoteni yesithathu nyakenye.
tgt: nga luhuhi, muhasho wa tshu misano ya mavhusele na zwa sialala (cogta) wo shandukisa tshiimo tsha tshiwo tsha gome lelo tsha vunḓu tsha vha tshiimo tsha tshiwo tsha gomelelo tsha lushaka.

src: umkhiqizo wekoroyi wehle ngama47% ngomnyaka wee2017 begodu kunekgho nakalo yokutlhayela kwewayini ngamalitha aziingidi ezima90 ezakuthunyelwa emazweni wangaphandle nethengiswa ngelizweni lekhethu.
tgt: ṱhoho ya senthara ya ndau lo ya zwiwo ya lushaka, dokotela vho mmaphaka tau vho amba uri: "nga murahu ha ela hafhu vhuhulu na tshi nyadzo ya gomelelo ḽine ḽa khou bvela phanḓa kha mavundu a swikaho mararu, vha ndaulo ya zwiwo vho shandukisa tshiimo tsha gomelelo tsha vha tshiwo tsha lushaka".

src: ukutlhayela kwamanzi ku zakuba nomthelela omumbi omkhulu nekukhanjisweni kwendle nanyana ekuhlwe ngiseni, emkhakheni wetjhejo lezamaphilo newezokuvaka tjha.
tgt: naho masiandaitwa a gomele lo kha ikonomi zwi tshi konḓa u a kala, ho vha na masiandaitwa a ofhisaho kha sekithara dza zwa vhulimi.

src: igauteng on the move izokuphelisa ukuzaza okubangelwa ziinthuthi zomphakathi ngombana inikela abakhweli ilwazi elinqophileko ngeenkhathi zokukhamba kweenthuthi nemali ebhadelwako yegautrain‚ imetrobus‚ ia re yeng‚ irea vaya‚ ime trorail‚ iimbhesi zegautrain‚ ijohannesburg city sight seeing bus (ekuyibhesi yokubukela iindawo), iimb hesi zetshwane nebubulo lamateksi.
tgt: app ya vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi ha gauteng vukuzenzele unnamed muhasho wa bada na vhuendi wa gaut eng wo rwela ṱari app, ya gauteng on the move, ya sisiteme yayo ya vhue ndi ha nnyi na nnyi ine ya tendela vhanameli vha tshi ṱumana na maitele o fhamba naho a vhuendi nga nḓila i leluwaho.

src: "urhulumende wesi funda segauteng unikele ngesikhathi, amano nee nsetjenziswa ekuthuthuki sweni kwalelihlelo elisiza abakhweli ukuhlela lula amakhambabo ngemihlobo yeenthuthi ehlukahlukeneko kilesisifunda.
tgt: gauteng on the move, i ḓo bvisa u shaya fulufhelo kha u shumisa vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi, saizwi i tshi ṋetshedza vhanameli mafhungo a tshi fhinga tsha vhukuma, shedulu ya vhuendi na mitengo ya gau train‚ metrobus‚ a re yeng‚ rea vaya‚ metrorail‚ tshume lo dza mabisi dza gautrain‚ johannesburg city sightseeing bus‚ tshumelo dza mabisi dza tshwane na tshumelo dza thekhisi.

src: ubeke wathi, "sibona amandla wamano wethekhnoloji akha kabu tjha iinthuthi zomphakathi.
tgt: musi vha tshi khou amba kha u rwelwa ṱari ha app ofisini ya mubveledzisi ngei midrand zwenezwino, mec wa vhuendi wa gauteng vho ismail vadi vho amba uri muhasho wo dzhiela nṱha ṱhoḓea ya thekhinolodzhi ya vhuṱali na sisiteme dza vhuendi dzo ṱali fhaho sa zwone zwithu zwi konisaho kha mveledziso ya sisiteme ya vhuendi.

src: asingabazi bonyana ama tjhuguluko wethekhnoloji ephasini atjhugulula umkha kha wezeenthuthi.
tgt: vho amba uri: "muvhuso wa vundu wa gauteng wo vhu lunga tshifhinga, maanḓa na zwiko kha mveledziso ya tshi dzudzanyi tsha lwendo itshi, tshine tsha konisa vhanameli u swikelela zwavhuḓi tshaka dza vhuendi vhuhulwane kha vundu.

src: kufuze sizijayeze amatjhuguluko la besikhambisane nawo".
tgt: "ro no thoma u vhona maanḓa a vhubveledzi vhu swa ha thekhinoḽodzhi vhune ha khou fhaṱulula nga huswa tshumelo dza vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi.

src: uvadi uqinisekise bo nyana isifunda sizakura ga nokusebenzisa amano wezerhubhululo netuthuko ngomnqopho wokwenza ngcono ukusebenza kuhle nokufikeleleka kweenthuthi.
tgt: a hu na u timatima uri tsha nduko dza zwa thekhinoḽodzhi ḽifhasi nga vhuphara dzi dzi kusa mvutshelano kha se kithara ya vhuendi, nga zwe nezwo ri tea u ṱanganedza na u ḓowela tshanduko hedzi."

src: nasele idawunilowudiwe iapp le izakusiza abase benzisi bayo ukuhlela amakhambabo ngokukhe tha umhlobo wesithuthi abasitlhogako, iinkhathi zokukhamba nokhunye aba kutlhogako njengekhambo elifitjhani nanyana elitjhi phileko.
tgt: vho vadi vho khwaṱhisa uri vundu ḽi ḓo isa phanḓa u shumisa vhubveledzi vhuswa, ṱhoḓisiso na mveledziso u bveledza vundu ḽavhuḓi u khwinisa vhukoni na tswikelo kha tshumelo dza vhuendi.

src: umfundi nomkhweli weenthuthi zomphakathi ejwanasbhege uglen dlamini uthe iapp le izo kwethula iinkulungwana ngeenkulungwana zaba khweli umthwalo.
tgt: musi yo daunolodiwa, app i konisa vhashumisi u dzudza nya lwendo lwavho nga u nanga maitele avho a vhuendi ane vha tama, zwifhinga zwa u enda na zwiṅwevho, zwine zwa nga lwendo lupfufhisa na lwendo lwa mutengo wa fhasisa.

src: ilutjha lithokoza amathuba womsebenzi wehlelo iyesu vukuzenzele unnamed umasego temane uthakasele ukufu mana ithuba lokufu nda umsebenzi okhambelana neemfundo zakhe zediploma yehuman resources manage ment, njengomuntu onesa ndla kuyouth employment se rvice (iyes).
tgt: vhaswa vho ṱanganedza mbekanyamushumo ya yes vukuzenzele unnamed masego temane u takalela u vha a tshi khou wana tshenzhemo, i elanaho na dipuloma yawe ya ndangulo ya vhashumi, sa mudzheneli wa tshumelo ya u tholwa ha vhaswa (yes).

src: iyes, evulwe mhlapha ngu mengameli ucyril ramapho sa, inqophe ukulungiselela abantu abatjha umsebenzi ibe ibahlomise nangamakghono fundwa wezechwephetjhe afunelwa ukuhlumisa u mnotho.
tgt: yes, ye ya rwelwa ṱari zwe nezwino nga muphureside nnde vho cyril rama phosa, yo sedza kha u dzudza nya vhaswa kha zwa mushumo na u vha ṋetshe dza vhukoni ha zwa the khiniki vhu ṱoḓeaho u tikedza mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo ya ikonomi kha shango.

src: utemane uhlathulula uku thi ngemva kokuthola kwakhe iziqu ngomnyaka wee2016, azange akghone ukwenza iimbawo zomsebenzi ngoba wayenganalo ilemuko eliphe le lifunwe emsebenzini.
tgt: temane o ṱalutshedza uri nga murahu ha musi o a mbara nga 2016 ha ngo ṱoḓa mishumo ngauri o vha a si na tshenzhemo i ṱoḓeaho.

src: "kwaba budisi khulu uku funa umsebenzi ngapha ndle kwelemuko lomsebenzi.
tgt: "zwo vha zwi khaedu nga maanḓa u ṱoḓa mushumo u si na tshenzhemo.

src: ngetjhuduke nokho ngahla ngana nelulaway recruit ment agency, esebenzisana neyes, bangipha ithuba loko bana ngifunde umsebenzi ngo kwenza, elaziwa ngeintern ship."
tgt: yes ndingedzo yo ṱanga nelaho ya muvhuso, vhashu mi na mabindu ṋetshedza tshenzhemo dza mushumo dzi badelaho kha vhaswa vha afrika tshipembe vha miḽioni nthihi kha miṅwaha miraru i no khou ḓa.

src: iyes iligadango elihlanga nyelwe ngurhulumende, u mkhakha wezabasebenzi kunye newamabhizinisi ngo mnqopho wokuvulela isigidi selutjha lesewula afrika ithu ba lokufundiswa umsebenzi libe lisebenza, elizakuthatha iminyaka emithathu ezako le.
tgt: ṱhoḓisiso yo itwaho nga vhakwameaho i sumbedza uri ṅwaha muthihi wa tshe nzhemo ya mushumo kha cv , na luṅwalo lwa ndaedzi, zwi engedza tshikhala tsha u wana mushumo tsha muswa kararu.

src: irhubhululo elenziwe babe lani litjengisa ukuthi ilemuko lomsebenzi lomnyaka munye kucv , eliphekelelwa yincwa di efakazela ilemuko lomse benzi, landisa ithuba lomuntu omutjha lokuthola umsebenzi ngokubuyelelwe kathathu.
tgt: musi hu tshi khou rwelwa ṱari yes vhaswa vha u thoma vha 100 vhane vha ḓo tholwa nga kha mbekanyamushumo iyi kha absa, investec, ne tcare, sasol na unilever vho ḓivhadzwa kha muphuresi dennde vho ramaphosa.

src: utemane ungezelela ngo kuthi uyawuthanda umse benzakhe, khulu khulu ngoba umenza ukuthi asize abanye abantu abatjha ukuthola u msebenzi, njengombana ase benza ezikweni lokuqatjha abantu abatjha abazokufunda umsebenzi babe barholarhola.
tgt: muphuresidenndevho ramaphosa vho ri: "ri vhona vhurangeli hovhu sa thikho ya vhuḓidini ha lushaka vhu angaredzaho zwoṱhe u sika zwikhala zwa vhaswa.

src: nakuvulwa ihlelo iyes, umengameli uramapho sa wethulwe esiqhemeni sokuthoma se100 lelutjha elizakuqatjhwa ngaphasi kwehlelweli ebhanga iabsa, iinvestec, inetcare, isasol kunye neunilever.
tgt: iṅwe thikho ya ndeme ndi u bve ledza zwikili zwo fanelaho na vhukoni ha vhaswa.

src: "igadangweli silibona njengalelo eliyisika ebanzi nepheleleko yomzamo weli zwe loke wokuvulela abantu abatjha amathuba.
tgt: "vho humbela vha mabindu maṱuku u ita tshipiḓa tshavho sa izwi vha na tshikhala tsha u thola nga huhulu, vha dovha vha ri mabindu mahulwane a nga si kone u thola vhaswa a oṱhe lu fushaho.

src: enye isika eqakathekileko kufundiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwama kghonofundwa wabantu abatjha," kutjho umengameli uramaphosa.
tgt: u ya nga vho tashmia i smailsaville ceo wa yes, vha ri kha vhathu vha 15.5 miḽioni afrika tshipembe vha vhukale ha vhukati ha 18 na 34, vha 5.8 miḽioni a vha shumi.

src: ukhombele amabhizinisi amancani ukuthi alime yawo indima njengoba anesisekelo esibanzi sokuqatjha nje, wabe wathi amabhizinisi amakhu lu awodwa angeze akghona ukuqatjha ilutjha ngokwane leko.
tgt: vho ismailsaville vho ri: "yes yo ḓiimisela u ṋetshedza tshipiḓa hetsho kha vhaswa vhashu, vhane vha a fhufhiwa nga maanḓa hu tshi shumi swa mimodeḽe ya kutholele ya zwino shangoni ḽashu, tshikha la tsha u thoma tsha ndeme ndi u wana tshezhemo ya mushumo u badelaho, na ndeme ya vhudzivha".

src: kunekghonakalo yokungezelelwa kwamalimi asemthethweni esewula afrika neo semono ilimi ikhelobedu linga ba lilimi le12 emalimini asemthethweni esewula afrika, ngokukhambisana nokubuyisa isithunzi sobu khosi babantu esewula afrika.
tgt: luambo luswa lu nḓilani afrika tshipembe neo semono khelobedu lu nga vha luambo lwa tshiofisi lwa vhu 12 kha vhathu vha afrika tshipembe zwi tshi elana na u vhuedzedza ha fhu tshirunzi tsha vharanga phanḓa vha sialala.

src: umengameli ucyril rama phosa wenze isimemezelwesi nabekugcotjwa ngokwesigi yani indlovukazi yaba lobedu ebaleni lezemidlalo imokwakwaila ebolobedu, gamodjadji, elimpopo.
tgt: muphuresidennde vho cyril ramaphosa vho ita nḓivhadzo heyi musi hu na vhuṱambo ha u vhea khosikadzi ya ba lobedu ngei tshiṱediamu tsha mokwakwaila, bolobedu, hamodjadji ngei limpopo.

src: ikhelobedu lilimi elikhu lunywa sitjhaba sabalobedu, esizakubuswa yindlovukazi yezulu yabalobedu ene minyaka eli13 njenganje, nayiqeda ukugcotjelwa le sisikhundla sokuba yindlo vukazi umodjadji vii nayi hlanganisa iminyaka eli18.
tgt: khelobedu ndi luambo lu ambiwaho nga lushaka lwa balobedu hune masalanabo modjadji khosikadzi muni samvula wa balobedu o na ngwaho, a ḓo dzhia vhuimo musi a tshi swikisa miṅwaha ya 18, nga murahu ha musi o vhewa sa khosikadzi modjadji vii.

src: lobu kuphela kobukhosi be ndlovukazi obukhona ese wula afrika neafrika jikele le," kutjho uramaphosa.
tgt: muphuresidennde vho ramaphosa vho ri: "hezwi i tou vha tswikelo ya ḓivha zwakale ya vhukuma ye mma vho winnie madikize lamandela vha vha vha tshi ḓo ḓihudza ngayo.

src: umengameli uramapho sa ukhulume waqinisele la ukuzibophelela kwaka rhulumende ekubuyiseni ukuhlonipheka nesithunzi sobukhosi babantu abanzima.
tgt: hovhu ndi vhukhosikadzi vhu hoṱhe nahone ha u tou thoma kha shango na kha dzhango.

src: ubukhosi babalobedu bubuyiswe ngokusemthe thweni ngenyanga kantaka wee2016, ngemva kwerhu bhululo elenziwa yikomi tjhini yombango wobukho si (ictldc) ngobujamo babalobedu, njengobana kwakunombango bekwafa kwa isibawo serhubhululo kiyo ictldc.
tgt: muphuresidennde vho ramaphosa vho khwaṱhisedza hafhu vhuḓikumedzeli ha mu vhuso kha mbuedzedzo ya u ṱhompha na tshirunzi tsha vhurangaphanḓa ha sialala.

src: "urhulumende uzibo phelele ukuyiphumele lisa nokuyipha amandla imibandela yesahluko se12 somthethosisekelo, khulu khulu ukubuyiswa kwesithunzi sobukhosi ba bantu ehlelweni lokubuswa ngentando yenengi," kutjho umengameli uramaphosa.
tgt: vhukhosikadzi ha balobedu ho ṱanganedzwa lwa tshiofi si nga ṱhafamuhwe 2016 nga murahu ha musi khomishini ya mbilo na phambano dza vhurangaphanḓa ha sialala (ctldc) yo ita ṱhoḓisiso nga ha tshiimo tsha balobedu, u ya nga mbilo dzo swikiswaho kha ctldc.

src: umengameli uramaphosa uthe ukuhlonitjhwa kobu khosi bendlovukazi namkha bomuntu omsikazi esewula afrika kutjengisa ukuzibo phelela ngekambisolawulo namandla wokulinganiswa kobulili, ukube ngahlanye kuhlonitjhwa nendima yoburholi elinywa babantu abasikazi kiwo woke ama koro wepilo.
tgt: muphuresidennde vho ramaphosa vho ri: "muvhu so wo ḓikumedzela kha u vho na khonadzeo kha mbetshelo ya ndima 12 ya ndayotewa, nga maanḓa mbuedzedzo ya tshirunzi tsha tshiimiswa tsha vhurangaphanḓa ha sialala kha dimokirasi yo ḓisendeka ho kha ndayotewa.

src: "amakhosi anomsebenzi oqakatheke khulu ekufuze awenze ekwakheni umpha kathi onganamtlhago, onga nakutlhogeka komsebe nzi nongatjhiyani ngendima yepilo.
tgt: vho ri u ṱanganedzwa ha vhukhosikadzi nga afrika tshipembe zwi sumbedza vhuḓikumedzeli kha maite le na vhuṱhogwa ha ndinga nyiso ya mbeu, kathihi na u ṱanganedza mushumo wa vhurangaphanḓa we vhafu makadzi vha u ita kha masia oṱhe a vhutshilo.

src: amakhosi wekhethu kufuze akhambe phambili emzabalazweni wokubuyisa ukuhlonitjhwa kwamalunge lo nesithunzi sabantu bekhe thu."
tgt: "vharangaphanḓa vha siala la vha na mushumo muhu lwane une vha u ita kha u fhaṱa lushaka lwo vhofholowaho kha vhushai, vhushayamu shumo na tshayandinganelo.

src: ubuye wagandelela nokuqa katheka kwendima elinywa makhosi ekubuyiseleni aba ntu iindawo namkha iinarha zabo.
tgt: vharangaphanḓa vhashu vha sialala vha tea u vha phanḓa kha nndwa ya u vhuedzedza pfanelo na tshirunzi tsha vhathu vhashu.

src: ungqongqotjhe upandor uthe kumsebenzi welizwe ukusekela imindeni etlhagako nedobha phasi.
tgt: afrika tshipembe ḽi na mushumo wa u funza vhaswa vho more matshediso minisṱa wa pfunzo ya nṱha na vhu pfumbudzi vho naledi pandor vha ri afrika tshipembe ḽi a kona u swikele la thikhedzo ya masheleni kha vhana vha miṱa i shayaho na ine ya hola masheleni maṱuku vhane vha khou dzhena yuni vesithi na kholidzhini dza mishumo ya zwanḓa (tvet) nga 2018. minisṱa vho pandor vho ri ndi mushumo wa shango u tikedza miṱa i shayaho na vhane vha sa kone u ḓiitela.

src: begade akhuluma emhla nganweni weembikiindaba lapho aveze khona ikambiso ezokulandelwa nakusatjalali swa ifundo ephakemeko yasimahla ngesewula afrika.
tgt: vho vha vha tshi khou amba kha mushumo wa u ḓivhadza vhoramafhungo he vha bvisela khagala maano a u ṋekedza pfunzo dza mahala kha zwii miswa zwa nṱha zwa pfunzo zwa afrika tshipembe.

src: ungqongqotjhe upandor umemezele bona urhulumende usise ngokungezelela ngamabhiliyoni alir7.166 ukusekela imifundalize ezakunikelwa abentwana abaphuma emindenini edobha phasi nenababelethi abangarholi kokuyaphi abathomako emayunivesithi nematvet kilomnyaka.
tgt: minisṱa vho pandor vho khwa ṱhisedza zwa uri muvhuso wo vhetshela thungo mashelelni nyengedzedzwa a r7.166 biḽioni u lambedza pfunzo ya vhana vha bvaho kha miṱa i shayaho na ine ya hola masheleni maṱuku vhane vha khou dzhena yunivesithi na kholidzhini dza mishumo ya zwanḓa (tvet) ṋaṅwaha.

src: ungqongqotjhe upandor uqinisekise bona amabhiliyoni amar4.581 abekelwe abafundi beyunivesithi abalungelweko namabhiliyoni amar2.585 wabafundi bemakholiji wetvet.
tgt: minisṱa vho pandor vho khwa ṱhisedza uri r4.581 biḽioni yo vhetshelwa thungo u itela matshudeni vha yunivesithi vhane vha swikelela ṱhoḓea nahone r2.585 biḽioni ndi ya matshudeni vha khoḽidzhi dza tvet.

src: ngomnyaka wee2017 urhulumende wamemezela bona ifundo ephakemeko izakuba ngeyasimahla ebafundini abadobha phasi nalabo ababuya emindenini leyo ingenisohla nganyela yayo yaqobe mnyaka iziir350 000. abafundi basekelwa ngaphasi kwehlelo lemifundalize elinatjisiweko, elijamiselela langaphambilini elalihla nganise ukubolekisa nokuni kela ngomfundalize onikelwa sikhwama selizweloke sesizo leemali zokufunda (insfas).
tgt: nga 2017 muvhuso wo ḓivhadza uri pfunzo dza nṱha dzi ḓo vha dza mahala kha matshudeni vha shayaho na vhane vha bva miṱani ine miholo ya ṅwaha yo ṱanganyiswa ya vha fhasi ha r350 000. matshudeni vha thusiwa nga kha tshikimu tsha bazari yo engedzedzwaho ine dzhena vhudzuloni ha tshikimu tsha bazari i sa badeliho zwoṱhe tshe tsha ṋekedzwa nga tshikimu tsha thikhedzo ya masheleni kha matshudeni tsha lushaka (nsfas).

src: "isabiwosisekelo sensfas sokusiza abafundi beyunivesithi nebematvet abado bha phasi nebemindeni enga rholi kokuyaphi sizokukhula ukusukela kumabhiliyoni alir9.849 ngomnyaka wee2017/18 ukufikela kumabhiliyoni amar35.321 ngomnyaka wee2020/21.
tgt: "mukovhe wa mutheo u yaho kha nsfas wa u tikedza matshudeni vha shayaho na vha bvaho kha miṱa i holaho masheleni maṱuku vhane vha vha yunivesithi na tvet u ḓo engedzwa u bva kha r9.849 biḽioni nga 2017/18 u ya kha r35.321 biḽioni nga 2020/21.

src: ungqongqotjhe uthe, "lokhu kubiza isidingo sokukhuphula izinga lokwenza izinto ngcono kwensfas.
tgt: "hezwi zwi amba uri hu na ṱhoḓea ya u khwiṋifhadza kushumele na mveledziso ya sisteme kha nsfas.

src: umnyango wezangekhaya ulwisana nemijeje emideamasewula afrika azokukghona ukufumana isizo elinqophileko nelamsinya emaofisini womnyango wezangekhaya.
tgt: muhasho wa zwa muno wo khwaṱhisedza u lwa na miduba vho more matshediso muhasho wa zwa muno u khou vhea maga a u khwaṱhisedza uri vhadzulapo a vha fhedzi tshi fhinga tshilapfu vha kha midu ba.

src: more matshediso umnyango wezange khaya uzokuhloma ihlelo elitjha lokwe nza umsebenzi elizokongela amasewula afrika isikhathi ngokuqeda imijeje emide.
tgt: u ya nga ha minisṱa wa muhasho wa zwa muno vho malusi gigaba, miduba milapfu yo vha i khou vhangwa nga u vha na vhathu vhanzhi vhane vha ṱoḓa thuso, tshi khala tshiṱuku tsha hune vhathu vha lindela u thuswa vhe hone, thaidzo dza vhurangaphanḓa na u vala ha ofisi nga migivhela.

src: ngokukangqongqotjhe wezangekhaya umalusi gi gaba imijeje emide ibangelwe bunengi babantu, ukutlhayela kwendawo yokulinda nge maofisini, iintjhijilo ngoburholi obungazikhandliko nokungase benzi kwamaofisi womnyango lo ngemigqibelo.
tgt: u tandulula thaidzo, muhasho u khou sengulusa tshikhala tsha hune zwifhaṱo zwavho zwa vha hone uri vha kone u vhona uri ndi ngafhi hune vha tea u khwiṋi fhadza tshumelo.

src: njengendlela yokulungisa umraro lo, umnyango uqalisisa ibalazwe ngomqopho wokuye lela ukusatjalaliswa kwamaofisi wawo khona kuzakutjhejwa iindawana ezitlhoga ukulungi swa kukhutjhulwe nezinga lokusebenza.
tgt: "ri ḓo thoma na ṱhoḓisiso ya u fushea ha vhathu, ri ite uri hune vhathusiwa vha founela hone hu vha hu tshi khou shuma zwavhuḓi, ri wane thandululo ya vhathu vhane vha swika vha songo lavhe lelwa khathihi na tshikhala tshine vhathu vha lindela u thuswa vhe hone, na khonadzeo ya sisteme ya u shuma nga dzishifithi, u lugisa sisteme i sa shumiho zwavhuḓi, u engedza madalo a songo ḓivha dzwaho a vhalanguli vhahulwane kha ofisi dzashu, ri khwiṋifhadze kushumele na nyambedzano na vhathusiwa," minisṱa vho khwa ṱhisedza.

src: ungqongqotjhe uqinisekise ngokuthi, "sizokuhloma ihlolomazizo lamakhastama, silungise iziko lezokuthintana namakhastama ukobana lise benze ngokuzeleko, sifumane ipengu ngamakhastama afika nanyana kunini, ukwelulwa kweendawo zokulinda emaofi sini, ukwethulwa kwekambiso yokusebenza ngamadlhego kwabasebenzi , ukutjheja irherho elingasebenzi ngefanelo, kukhuthazwe amavakatjho wa bhalakada wabaphathi abaphe zulu, kuthuthukiswe uku khamba komsebenzi ngefanelo nokwenza ngcono zokuthintana namakhastama".
tgt: nzudzanyo idzi dzi ḓo itwa sa – vhudzheneleli ha tshifhinga tshi pfufhi, tsha vhukati – tshilapfu.

src: lamahlelo wokusebenza azokusatjalaliswa njengeendle la zokungenelela zesikhatjhana, zesikhathi esiphakathi nezesikhathi eside.
tgt: minisṱa vho ṱalutshedza uri thaidzo idzi a dzi nga ḓo tandu lulwa nga u ṱavhanya nahone vha humbela vhadzulapo uri vha sa fheli mbilu musi muhasho u tshi khou shumana na ayo maga.

src: ungqongqotjhe uhlathulule wathi iintjhijilwezi angeze zara rululwa ngepengu yamsinyana, ngalokho wakhombela nompha kathi ukubekezela lokha umnya ngo nawusethula amahlelo la.
tgt: "ro ḓiimisela u ita nga hune ra nga kona u kunda kha nndwa ya u lwisana na miduba, naho hu na khaedu dza zwiimiswa na dziṅwe thaidzovho."

src: ungqongqotjhe ugigaba uthe, "sihlala sizibophelele ukwenza ngcono ekulwisaneni nemijeje nanyana kuneenqabo nezinye iintjhijilo nje".
tgt: phanḓa ha nḓivhadzo ya pulane ya maitele , muhasho wo thoma muvhigo wa u ṱoḓisisa u itela u ḓivha uri vha nga tandulula hani thaidzo dza miduba khathihi na u ḓisa tshumelo ya khwiṋe.

src: ngaphambi kokumenyezelwa kwemitlamo yokwenza, umnya ngo wethule umbiko wokuhlola ngomnqopho wokufuna indle la engcono yokulawula imijeje nokukhuphula izinga lokuse benza.
tgt: muvhigo wo amba nga ha sisteme dzi songo dzudzanyeaho, maitele a kushumele a sa tshi mbiliho zwavhuḓi na nḓila dza vhudavhidzani dzi songo dzudza nyeaho dzine dza sia vhathu vha no ṱoḓa thuso vha songo fushea na miduba milapfu.

src: umbiko lo ubale amarherho angakanzinzi, iindlela zoku sebenza ezingakalungi namaqhinga wezokuthintana angakalungelelaniswa ekuzi zinto ezibangele ukunganelise ki kwamakhastama nemijeje emide.
tgt: u ya nga minisṱa, zwiitisi zwi tevhelaho ndi zwone zwi ṋaṋisaho thaidzo: ■ vhulanguli vhu si havhuḓi kha dziṅwe dza dziofisi ■ vhashumi vha sa shumi zwavhuḓi ■ u shaea ha sisteme ya matholele ■ miduba i sa langulwi zwavhuḓi■ sisteme ine ya khou shumiswa ine ya langwa nga vhathu na ine ya tou ḓilanga.

src: ngokukangqongqotjhe, ama phuzu alandelako athuwelelise umraro: ■ ukubhalelwa kulawu la kwabaphathi kamanye amaofisi ■ ukunganikelwa kwabase benzi inani lemisebenzi ela nelisako ■ ukutlhayela kwehlelo lokwe nzela amakhastama isibeki selwano sesikhathi ■ ukungalawulwa kuhle kwemijeje ■ ukusetjenziswa kanyekanye kwamahlelo wokutlola phasi newemitjhiningqondo yesi manjemanje ukungasatjalaliswa kwa maofisi ngokutjheja iindingo izwangobatjho emamala yokupheliswa kwabomazisi abalihlaza abanebhakhowudi.
tgt: ■ khovhekanyo i sa linganiho ya dziofisi zwi tshi bva kha tshivhalo tsha vhathu vhuponi honoho ■ u sa ambedzana zwavhuḓi malugana na u imiswa ha basa dza kale.

src: ukutlhayela kwamatshwayo ayikomba emaofisini.
tgt: ■ tswayo dzi songo dzudzanyea ho ofisini.

src: usoplasi wengubo uvune ipumelelo nonkululeko mathebula ukusuka emtlhagweni omkhulu nekuhlekweni baba tu bona usebenza eplasini umahlatse matlakane oneminyaka ema20 njenganje sele angusopla si othabileko obhura nga magreen pepper .
tgt: rabulasi wa mufumakadzi u khou bvelela nga u lima nonkululeko mathebula ubva kha vhushai vhuhulu na u seiwa nga u shuma bulasini, mahlatse matlakane (20) zwa zwino ndi rabulasi wa phiriphiri dala a no khou bvelela vhukuma.

src: umahlatse wathoma wasebenza ngokuzinikela eplasini yamagreen pepper eseduze nekhabo ngeempelaveke nangama langa wokuphumula wesiko lo nakaneminyaka elitjhumi namihlanu (15) asiza unina obekangasebenzi nobekambelethi okhulisa abentwana ayedwa bona bakwa zi ukuziphilisa.
tgt: mahlatse o thoma u shuma a sa wani malamba kha bulasi yapo ya phiriphiri dala musi tshikolo tsho vala na mafhe loni a vhege a na miṅwaha ya 15 a tshi khou thusa mme awe vhe vha vha vha sa shu mi u itela uri hayani hu vhe na zwiḽiwa.

src: umatlakane uhlala gamoisimane, esebu chum ngaphandlanyana kwepolokwane, elimpopo.
tgt: matlakane u wanala gamoi simane ngei buchum hanefha nnḓa ha polokwane kha limpopo.

src: uthi nanyana athabela iinthe lo zomsebenzakhe, kodwana bekungasilula esikhathini esinengi.
tgt: o ri naho a tshi khou ḓifhelwa nga mitshelo ya mishu mo yawe fhedzi zwo vha zwi songo leluwa.

src: abangani bami bebangihleka nangithoma ukusebenza eplasini bathi umsebenzi weplasini ngewabantu abangakafundi.
tgt: thanga dzanga dzo vha dzi tshi dzulela u ntsea musi ndi tshi thoma u shuma bulasini vha tshi ri vhulimi ndi ha vhathu vha songo funzeaho.

src: "lokho bekungizwisa ubuhlungu kodwa na ngaqiniselela njengomba na bengifuna ukuthola ilwazi lokusebenza eplasini ukwenzela bona ngizokwazi uku lisebenzisa njengebizelo," ubeke watjho.
tgt: "hezwi zwo vhaisa vhuḓipfi hanga fhedzi ndo vha ndi tshi khou ṱoḓa nḓivho ya vhulimi uri ndi ḓo kona u bvela naho phanḓa sa buḓo ḽa mushu mo," o ralo.

src: umatlakane wathi anga kathola ilwazi wayokhulu misana nomphathi weplasi ebekasebenza kiyo ngokuzinikela ujohan nel mayela na nokutjala imbewu yakhe nokukhulisa amagreen pepper .
tgt: musi matlakane o wana tshenzhemovho o mbo ḓi kwama muṋe wa bulasi ya he a vha a tshi khou shuma a sa wani malamba vho johan nel u humbela u ṱavha mbeu dzawe na u lima phiriphiri.

src: unel wamnikela amahagere amabili wenarha eplasini yakhe.
tgt: vho nel vha mu ṋea hekithara mbili dza mavu kha bulasi yavho.

src: "ngamangazwa kubona bona imbewu encani inga phenduka iintjalo ezingakhiqiza amagreen pepper amakhulu kangaka.
tgt: matlakane o ri: "ndo mangadzwa nga u vhona mbeu ṱhukhu dzi tshi shanduka u vha zwimela zwine zwa anwa phiriphiri dala khulwane.

src: ukubona bona iintjalo ziyatjhejwa ngokusebenzisa iimvundisi zeentjalo ukwenzela bona zingabi neenunwana kwangezelela thando lami lokulima.
tgt: u vhona uri zwimela zwi khou farwa hani nga u shumisa manyoro na u langa zwikhokhonono zwo ita uri ndi fune vhulimi nga maanḓa.

src: lokhu kwenza bona ngazi khonokho bona lokhu ngikho engifu na ukukwenza," watjho njalo umatlakane.
tgt: ndo zwi ḓivha na zwenezwo uri he zwi ndi zwine nda funa u ita zwone."

src: ngemva kokuqeda ibanga le12 umatlakane wahlala umnyaka tomu angarageli phambi li ngeemfundo ije bekamukelwe eyunivesithi yejwanasbhege bona ayofundela iziqu ze zomthetho.
tgt: musi o khunyeledza maṱiriki, matlakane o dzhia ṅwaha a sa khou dzhena tshikolo naho o vha o ṱanganedzwa yunivesithi ya johannesburg u gudela zwa mulayo.

src: wabuyela emva kunel uku yobawa isizo elinye lelwazi lokulima, unel wamyeleli sa bona akakhulume nekosi yendawo yekhabo mayelana nokuthi kungakghonakala bona imuphe isiqetjhana senarha.
tgt: o vhuelela kha vho nel u dovha a vha humbela thuso ya vhulimi he vhone vha mu tsivhudza uri a ambe na vha musanda vha henefho nga ha khonadzeo dza u mu fha mavu.

src: ngemva kokubona ipumele lwakhe eplasini likanel ikosi yendawo yamnikela amahagere ama40 wenarha eplasini lababirwa ba tau ya tswala lapho khona njenganje arage la khona ibubulo lakhe.
tgt: nga murahu ha u vhona mve laphanḓa ine a khou ita kha bu lasi ya vho nel, vhamusanda vhapo vha mu fha hekithara dza mavu dza 40 kha bulasi ya babirwa ba tau ya tswala hune zwino a ita vhubindudzi hawe khayo.

src: abogadi bezemvelo bavikela abobhejani dale hes umtjheji wezebhoduluko uphakamani nyawo oneminyaka ema26, onzinze eumkhuze game reserve kwazuluna tala, ungomunye wabatjheji abayi1 659 abanikelwe amandla liziko leenqiwu zeli zweloke lesewula afrika (isanparks) bona batjheje amabhoduluko weenqiwu zombuso nezangeqadi ezingesewula afrika yoke.
tgt: vhathivhelatshinyadzo ya mupo vha tsireledza tshugulu dale hes mulavhelesi wa zwa mupo vho phakamani nyawo (26), vha no wanala vhugal aphukha ha umkhuze ngei kwazulunatal, ndi muṅwe wa vhalavhelesi vha 1 659 vhe vha hwedzwa mushumo nga vha vhugalaphukha ha lushaka ha afurika tshipem be (sanparks) u ṱhogomela mupo kha vhugalaphukha ha phuraivethe na ha nnyi na nnyi u mona na afurika tshipembe.

src: unyawo, oyingcenye ye hlelo lokutjheja ibhoduluko eliphethwe lihlelo elinatjisi weko lemisebenzi yesitjhaba (iepwp), ukholelwa bona kuqakathekile ukufundisa imiphakathi malungana no kutjheja ibhoduluko.
tgt: vho nyawo, vhane vha vha tshipiḓa tsha thandela ya u lavhelesa zwa mupo i no tshim bidzwa nga epwp, vho tenda uri ndi zwa ndeme u gudisa vhadzulapo nga ha u ṱhogome la mupo.

src: "kufuze sivakatjhele imi phakathi ngomnqopho wokuyifundisa ngokuqakatheka kokubulunga imvelo.
tgt: vho ri: "ri tea u bva ra ita uri vhadzulapo vha pfesese uri ndi ngani zwi zwa ndeme u tsire ledza mupo.

src: kuzoku ba kulaphoke umphakathi uzokuzwisisa indima yobukhona beenyamazana zommango," ubeke watjho.
tgt: ndi henefho hune vhadzulapo vha ḓo pfesesa mushumo wa phukha dza ḓaka.

src: ihlelweli elinikela ilutjha lesewula afrika amakghono ebawafu nako ukobana basebenze eenqiwini zeenyamazana ezi hlukahlukeneko nezemanzini nangeemila, liqinisekisa bona unyawo aziphilise bekondle nomndenakhe.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ine ya maanḓafhadza vhaswa vha afurika tshipembe nga vhukoni vhune vha tea u vha naho u itela uri vha shume kha tsireledzo ya mupo na bayodaivesithi, yo vho na uri vho nyawo vha a kona u ṱhogomela muṱa wavho.

src: ngiyathokoza ngokufumana ithubeli," utjho njalo.
tgt: vho ri: "nnḓu ya muṱa wanga i na ṱhanga khulwane zwa zwi no, i sa bvuḓi, hezwo ndi nga nṱhani ha mushumo wanga.

src: ungqongqotjhe wezebhoduluko udorh edna molewa uthiyelele abatjheji bona "bo gadi bezemvelo" ngombana babamba indima eqakathekileko ekulwisaneni nobulele si obukhinyabeza ibhoduluko, njengokuzunywa kwabobhe jani okungasisemthethweni.
tgt: "minisiṱa wa zwa mupo dokote la vho edna molewa vho dzhia vhalavhelesi sa ‘vhathivhelat shinyadzo ya mupo’ ngauri vha shuma mushumo muhulwane vhukuma kha u lwa na vhutshinyi ha zwa mupo, u fana na vhutswatshugulu.

src: "umnnyaka ophelileko abatjheji bebhoduluko abayi1 659 bathunyelwa eendaweni ezidlange ngokuzunywa kwabobhejani okungasi semthethweni ngomnqopho wokuyokukhandela ubulele sobu nokuvikela ibhoduluko.
tgt: vho ri: "mahoḽa vhalavhelesi vha zwa mupo vha 1 659 vho iswa u ri vha shume tshivhilelani tsha vhatswatshugulu u thusa nga tsireledzo ya zwa mupo.

src: bazokufundiswa bebanikelwe amandla wokuba bazenda bokuvikelwa kwebhoduluko kilomkhakha," ubeke watjho.
tgt: vhenevho vha ḓo maanḓafhad zwa uri vha vhe vhaambasada vha zwa tshugulu kha vhupo hovhu."

src: unyawo bekayingcenye yabasebenza esiqhemeni esabamba umzumi ongasisemthethweni eumkhuze game reserve, owathi ngemva kwalokho umzumi loyo wathweswa umlandu.
tgt: vho nyawo vho vha tshipiḓa tsha tshigwada tshe tsha fara mutswaphukha ngei vhugala phukha ha umkhuze, zwe zwa livhisa kha u vhonwa mulandu zwa ita uri a gwevhelwe vhutshinyi uvho.

src: ukuvutha komlilo kuvula amathuba wemisebenzi adele schormann ihlelo lokusebenza ngom lilo (iwof) lilawula amahlelo ahlangeneko wokulawulwa komlilo, lona eliqinisekisa bona kuqatjhwa ilutjha elivela emiphakathini egade idinywe amathuba.
tgt: u nyanyulea nga vhusika mushumo adele schormann u wana mafhungo manzhi nga ha mbekanyamushumo ya wof, kha vha kwame 021 418 2569 kana 082 508 0990 kana vha imeiḽe: news@wofire.co.za.

src: liletha ithemba elutjheni elinengi elingatholi imisebenzi belisebenza kuhle khulu ekukhandeleni nekulawuleni imililo, lehlisa nemithelela emi mbi elethwa mililo yommango.
tgt: adele schormannworking on fire (wof) i langa mbekanyamushu mo ya ndangulo ya mulilo yo ṱanganelaho ye ya vhona uri hu vhe na mishumo kha vhunzhi ha vhaswa vha bvaho zwitshavhani zwe zwa vha zwo sielwa nnḓa.

src: ihlelweli liqatjhe abantu abangaphezulu kwee5 000 abavela emiphakathini etlhagako belibabandule ngelwazi lokulawula imililo, ifundiso ngemililo, uku wukhandela nokuwuphelisa begodu namanye amakghono, afana nesizo lokuthoma, uku kapela, ukupheka, zamaphilo nokuphepha kunye nezokuthintana.
tgt: yo lambedzwa nga muhasho wa zwa mupo, mbekanyamushumo i wela fhasi ha mbeka nyamushumo ya mishumo ya nnyi na nnyi yo engedzwaho (epwp).

src: umsebenzi wezokuthintana wewof ulebogang mase ko uhlathulule bona ihlelweli liqale khulu ilutjha nokuqatjha abantu abakhubazekileko bona basebenze emaofisini wabo asemfundeni.
tgt: zwi ṋetshedza fhulufhelo kha vhaswa vhanzhi vhane a vha wani mishumo nahone vho swikela mvelaphanḓa i mangadzaho kha u thivhela na u langa mililo ya maḓakani, na u fhungudza tshinyalelo yayo.

src: ehlelweni lokuqa tjha, ama94% lilutjha, ama31% babantu bengubo kuthi amaphesende amathathu kube babantu abakhubazekileko," uqinisekise njalo.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo i thola vhathu vha fhiraho 5 000 vha bvaho kha zwitshavha zwe zwa vha zwo sielwa nnḓa,na hone yo vha pfumbudza nga ha tsivhudzo ya mulilo, pfunzo, u thivhela na u tsitsela fhasi, na zwiṅwe zwikili zwi ngaho sa thusedzothangeli, zwa u shuma nga mabulannga, u bika, tsire ledzo na mutakalo khathihi na vhudavhidzani.

src: ulorraine mokoena one minyaka ema31 wempuma langa ungomunye wabaqatjhiweko nozuzileko kilelihle lo.
tgt: muofisiri wa zwa vhudavhidza ni wa wof vho lebogang maseko vho ṱalutshedza uri mbekanyamushumo yo sedze sa kha vhaswa na u thola vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali uri vha shume kha mavundu aneo.

src: udadwabo wamtjela ngehlelo lewof.
tgt: kha vho dzhii waho kha mbekanyamushumo, phesenthe dza 94 ndi vhaswa, phesenthe dza 31 ndi vha tshi fumakadzini ngeno phesenthe tharu vha na vhuholefhali.

src: "ikambiso yokufaka isibawo somsebenzi lo yayibudisi.
tgt: "lorraine mokoena (31) a bva ho mpumalanga ndi muṅwe wa vho dzhiiwaho we a vhuelwa nga kha mbekanyamushumo.

src: isimo somzimba namkha isithombo kuyinto eqakatheke khulu kilomsebenzi begodu abantu abasandukuqatjhwa babekwa ngokuya ngokwesithombo namkha ngokuqina kwa bo.
tgt: o vha a tshi khou shuma kha wof lwa miṅwaha ya 11 yo fhiraho.

src: nawuqeda ukuphumele la ukuhlungwa kufuze godu uphumelele nokuhlolwa zam aphilo beseke ngemva kwalokho ukubandulelwa ukucima umli lo kuyathoma," ubeke watjho.
tgt: o ri: "maitele a khumbelo o vha a tshi konḓa.

src: umokoena uthome uku sebenza njengomcimimlilo osathomako, wasebenza wabe wakhutjhulewa esikhundleni sokuba mndosiphambili omkhu lu wesiqhema, adosa phambili isiqhema sabacimimlilo aba li18.
