tgt: muvhili wo takalaho ndi yone ṱhoḓea ya ndeme kha mushumo nahone vhaswa vho dzhiiwaho vha vhewa u ya nga luvhilo lwavho.

src: "umsebenzi lo utjhugulule ipilwami.
tgt: musi no phasa ndingo ni fanela u phasa mulingo wa zwa dzilafho ha ko naha u thoma vhugudisi ha zwa u dzima mulilo.

src: ngiyakwazi ukondla umndenami bengibhadele neendleko zesikolo zabentwana bami," uyatjho umokoena.
tgt: mokoena o thoma a mudzimamulilo wa vhuimo ha fhasi a shuma u swika a tshi swika nṱha kha tshiimo tsha murangaphanḓa wa tshigwada tsha vhahulwane, a tshi khou ranga phanḓa tshigwada tsha vhadzimamulilo vha 18. mokoena o ri: "mushumo hoyu wo shandukisa vhutshilo hanga.

src: uyavuma bona umkhakha wezokucima umlilo kanengi kumsebenzi wabobaba begodu uthi ufunde bona kufanele aqine, azijamele njengomma kilomkhakha.
tgt: ndi a kona u ṱunḓela muṱa wanga nda isa na vhana vhanga tshikoloni.

src: umokoena uzilungiselela bona abe mphathi wezemise benzi kilomkhakha eminyakeni emibili ezako.
tgt: "o tenda uri tshipiḓa tsha zwa u dzima mulilo tshi tou vha mushumo wa munna nga u angaredza nahone o guda u vha muhaga sa izwi e mufumakadzi kha sia iḽo.

src: lokhu kuzomenza umphathi weenqhema za mawof zoke ezinzinze empu malanga.
tgt: mokoena o ḓitiela u vha mu languli wa mishumo ya fhasi mavuni kha miṅwaha mivhili i ḓaho.

src: njengombana isikhathi semili lo sitjhidele nje, umokoena unikele ngeeyeleliso ezilandelako zokuvikela imililo yemmango: ungatiki namkha unga kghwari umlilo emmangweni nangabe angekhe ukwazi ukuwulawula.
tgt: hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri a vhe na vhuḓifhinduleli ha tshig wada tsha wof tshoṱhe tshi re mpumalanga.

src: qiniseka bona unesizo ela neleko kunye neentlabagelo zokujamelana nobunye ubu jamo obugalethwa mlilo.
tgt: sa izwi khalaṅwaha ya muli lo yo swika, mokoena o ṋetshedza tsivhudzo dzi tevhelaho u thivhela mililo ya maḓakani: vha songo funga mililo fhethu hu re khagala arali vha sa nga koni u u langa.

src: ukutjhugulula ubujamo bezefundo ephakemeko amukelani chauke ubujamo bezefundo ephakemeko ese wula afrika buya tjhuguluka ngokufikeleleka kwayo begodu ilungelela niswe neendingo zomkha kha lo.
tgt: u shandukisa pfunzo dza nṱha amukelani chauke tshiimo tsha pfunzo dza nṱha tsha afri ka tshipembe tshi khou shanduka, musi pfu nzo dza nṱha dzi si khou tou swikelelea fhedzi, fhedzi dzi khou dovha dza vheka nywa uri dzi kone u swike lela ṱhoḓea dza nḓowe tshumo.

src: amatjhuguluko la ayatlhogeka njengombana ilizwe lilungiselela ilutjha umsebenzi nokufaka kwalo isandla kezomnotho.
tgt: tshanduko dzo tea sa izwi shango ḽi tshi khou shuma u ya kha u lugisela vhaswa kha shango ḽa zwa mishumo na u shela mule nzhe kha ikonomi.

src: njengombana ilizwe li gidinga inyanga yelutjha, ivuk’uzenzele iqalisisa uku vulelwa kwelutjha amathuba wepumelelo ngamano wo mnyango wezefundo ephakemeko nokubandula.
tgt: musi shango ḽi tshi khou elelwa ṅwedzi wa vhaswa, vuk’uzenzele i lavhelesa uri vhaswa vha ḽino shango vha khou ṋewa zwikhala hani uri vha bvelele nga kha mu hasho wa pfunzo dza nṱha na vhupfumbudzi.

src: ukusukela ekuqatjhweni kwakhe ngomhlolanja nje ngongqongqotjhe wezefu ndo ephakemeko nokuba ndula, unaledi pandor uni kelwe umsebenzi wokwethu la ngokweengaba ifundo yasimahla kabatlhagako nabafundi "abamaphakathi ngokwengeniso ekuthiwa mamissing middle ".
tgt: vho naledi pandor vhane vho vhewa sa minisṱa wa pfunzo dza nṱha na vhu pfumbudzi nga ṅwedzi wa luhuhi, vho hweswa vhuḓifhinduleli ha u vhona uri zwa pfunzo ya mahala zwi khou thoma u shuma kha vhagudi vha shayaho na "vhasala vhukati".

src: ngemva kwemitjhaga lo eyarhatjheka nelizwe loke neyadosa isikhathi eside ngaphasi kommo ngo we#feesmustfall , kwamenyezelwa ngono bayeni bonyana ilutjha eli buya emindenini lapho ingeniso yayo ingaphasi kwee350 000 wamaranda ngomnyaka lizakufumana ifundo ephakemeko neba ndulo simahla.
tgt: "nga murahu ha migwalabo mihulu ya shango ḽoṱhe nga fhasi ha kupfesesele kwa uri #feesmustfall , zwo vho ḓo ḓivhadziwa nga ṅwedzi wa nyendavhusiku uri vha swa vhane miṱa yavho ya vha na miholo i re fhasi ha r350 000 nga ṅwaha vha ḓo wana pfunzo na vhupfumbudzi nga maha la.

src: sekuthonyi we nokwethulwa kwehle lweli elizokufakwa ngee ngatjana esikhathini esi minyaka emihlanu.
tgt: tshikimu tsha bazari minisṱa vho pandor vho khwaṱhi sedza uri u thomiwa ha tshi kimu itshi zwi khou tshimbila zwavhuḓi.

src: isikhwama somfundalizeungqongqo tjhe upandor uqiniseki sile bonyana ukwethulwa kwesikhwama so mfundalize esitjha kukhamba kuhle.
tgt: "tshikimu tshiswa tsha ba zari ndi u ṱhaḓula ha ndeme nga muvhuso wa afrika tshipembe, na uri, ndi vhathu vha afrika tshipembe ngauri ndi mithelo yavho ine ya khou badelela hezwi," vho ralo.

src: isikhwama somfundalizesi sisiza abafundi abathomako eyunivesithi abalungelweko ngokobujamo beemali nalabo bemakholiji wefundo yama kghono nebandulo lethekni khali (amatvet), kiyo yoke iminyaka yokufunda kwabo.
tgt: bazari i khou ṋekedzwa vhagudi vhane vha swikelela ṱhoḓea vhane vha khou dzhe na yunivesithi kha ṅwaha wa u thoma na kha magudedzi a pfunzo ya thekiniki ya mishu mo ya zwanḓa na vhupfumbu dzi (tvet), miṅwaha yavho yoṱhe vha tshi khou guda.

src: njengendlela yokusekela umfundalize lo ngeemali, kungezelelwe isabelo seemali sikarhulumende ngamabhili yoni ali7.166 wamaranda ngomnyaka wee2018 – kanti amabhiliyoni ama4.581 wamaranda abekelwe abafundi beyunivesithi abalungelweko namabhiliyoni ama2.585 wamaranda abekelwe abafundi bemakholiji wetvet.
tgt: u itela u lambedza tshi kimu itshi, nyengedzedzo ya ndambedzo ya muvhuso ya biḽioni dza r7.166 yo avhelwa kha ṅwaha wa 2018 hune r4.581 ya dzibiḽioni yo vhetshelwa thungo u thusa vhagudi vha yunivesithi vha swikelelaho ṱhoḓea na r2.585 ya dzibiḽioni yo vhetshelwaho vhagudi vha magudedzi a tvet.

src: ungqongqotjhe upandor uthe amakholiji anqophene neemfundo ezikhethekileko angaba maziko wepumelelo ekungiwo azokukhiqiza ama kghonofundwa aveleleko emikhakheni ethileko.
tgt: minisṱa vho pandor vho ri magudedzi ane o lavhelesana na mabuḓo a tshipentshele a nga vha senthara dza vhukoni dzine dza fana na u bveledza zwikili zwa maimo kha buḓo ḽe a randelwa ḽone.

src: isibonelo, wahlathulula ngokuthi ikholiji yinye inga nqophana kwaphela neemfu ndo zobunjiniyere imechanical engineering enye iqalane ne zeemphaphamtjhini ekuyiaviation .
tgt: tsumbo, gudedzi ḽithihi ḽi nga lavhelesana na zwa vhui nzhiniara ha zwa vhukhanikhe ngeno ḽiṅwe ḽi tshi nga tou ri fombe kha zwa vhufhufhi, vho ralo vha tshi ṱalutshedza.

src: wangezelela ngokuthi, "ngiyathemba ikusasa lama kholiji lizokweyama khulu eemfundweni ezikhethekileko.
tgt: "ndi a tenda uri u vha vhontende ndi vhumatshelo ha magude dzi," vho ralo vha tshi ḓadzisa.

src: "sifuna ukuhlukanahlukana.
tgt: "ri ṱoḓa zwo fhambanaho.

src: asifuni woke amakholiji wethu anikele iimfundo ezifanako."
tgt: a ri ṱoḓi magudedzi a tshi ita zwithu zwi no fana."

src: umtjhayeli weenkepe wenza imikariromraro allison cooper ulindile mdletshe (oneminyaka ema30), omtjhayeli weenkepe, usebenza ngee nkepe ezinamandla ezi setjenziselwa ukusiki nya nokutjhidisela iinkepe ezibukweni ledurban.
tgt: mutsindo wa mulangatshikepe u khou pfala allison cooper sa mulangazwikepe wa transnet lindile mdletshe (30) u la nga zwikepe zwa maanḓa zwine zwa thusa matshi mbilele a zwikepe zwihu lwane vhuimangalavha ha durban.

src: umdletshe wabelethelwa bewakhulela eport she pstone bese wafunda est faiths.
tgt: mdletshe o bebelwa port shepstone a dzhena tshikolo st faiths .

src: "umdletshe waphasa ume thrigi ngomnyaka wee2006 ngaphambi kokudlulela edurban university of technology ukuyokufunde la idiploma yeemfundo zelwandle inational diplo ma in maritime studies ngo mnyaka wee2007 ngemva kokuqeda ii mfundo zakhe zes1 ngo mnyaka wee2007 nezes2 ngomnyaka wee2008, wathoma ibandulo lemi nyaka emithathu elwandle ngaphasi kwekhamphani isafmarine shipping co mpany.
tgt: ho vha hu si na nyofho, hu sa ngi ano maḓuvha, nahone ṅwana o vha a tshi aluswa nga tshi tshavha."

src: lapha wafunda amakghono wokulawula isikepe esilayitjha ipahla nokujama emadoyelweni ahlukahlukeneko, leyuro bhu, weafrika neasia lapho gade abandulelwa ukutjhejwa kwemithwalo nezokuphepha.
tgt: mdletshe o phasa maṱiriki nga 2006, phanḓa ha musi a tshi ya yunivesithi ya durban ya thekinoḽodzhi u gudela dipuḽoma ya zwa ngudo dza zwa maḓini nga 2007. nga murahu ha musi o no fhedza s1 yawe nga 2007 na s2 nga 2008 o thoma na u pfumbudziwa hawe lwa miṅwaha miraru lwanzheni, na khamphani ya safmarine shipping .

src: wafumana idigri yakhe yokuthoma aneminyaka ema25, kanti ngakelinye i hlangothi bekaqedelela imaster’s kuport opera tions .
tgt: hafha ndi hone he a thoma u tshimbidza tshikepe tsha mihwalo kha maḓanzhe mahulwane he a vha a tshi ima kha vhuima ngalavha vhuhulwane ho fhambanaho kha ḽa yuropa, afrika na asia kha zwa u tshimbidza mihwalo na zwa savei dza tsireledzo.

src: idigri yesibili le yamenza waba yingorho mtjhayeli weenkepe ophe leleko.
tgt: o wana digirii yawe ya u thoma a na miṅwaha ya 25, he nga tshenetsho tshifhinga tshithihi o vha a tshi khou fhedzisa digirii ya masiṱa si ya port operations .

src: "lokhu kwaba yise lele ekulu ngombana ukuba mtjhayeliinkepe akutlhogi bonyana umuntu abe nedi gri, kufuneka kwaphela ii mfundo zes1, zes2 neba ndulo lelwandle.
tgt: heyo digirii ya vhuvhili yo ḓo mu tendela u kona u vha mulangazwikepe.

src: kunge mva kwalokho lapho abantu bazitlolisela khona ukuba batjhayeli beenkepe.
tgt: "heyi yo vha khaedu khulwane sa ngauri u vha mulanga zwikepe zwiṱuku a zwi ṱoḓi uri muthu a vhe na digirii, zwi ṱoḓa fhedzi s1, s2 na u pfumbudziwa lwanzheni.

src: wathi, "nangitjhayisako bengiya esikolweni ngifunde egade kwenziwa emini, ngalokho ngenza kokubili kanyeka nye", wabeka watjho.
tgt: nga murahu ha zwenezwo, muthu u a kona u ḓiṅwalise la u vha mulangazwikepe.

src: umdletshe uthanda khulu ukuba ngemanzini.
tgt: ndo ita zwoṱhe nga tshifhi nga tshithihi.

src: "amanzi akutjela okunengi ngobuja mo belanga.
tgt: ndi tshi tshai sa, ndo vha ndi tshi ya tshi koloni nda ita zwe vhaṅwe vha guda ḽeneḽo ḓuvha," o ralo.

src: iinkepe nazo zakhiwe ngokwe hlukana ngobujamo godu zithwala ipahla engafani ko begodu kufuze zilawu lwe ngendlela ehlukileko," kwatjho umdletshe, othabe la ukusebenza nabasebenzi besikepeni beentjhabatjhaba ngokwamazwe ahlukileko.
tgt: "maḓi a nga vha vhudza zwinzhi nga uri duvha ḽo vha farela mini.

src: umsebenzi oneseleleukuba mumuntu wengubo emkhakheni wezemalwa ndle "kubujamo obuyiselele" kwatjho umdletshe, ohlathu lula ukudlanga kweendaba ezikhambisana nokukhethu lulwa ngokobulili njengo mbana ubunengi babasebenzi kubabantu bembaji.
tgt: maṅwe maḓuvha hu a dzika ngeno maṅwe a tshi konḓa na uri tshiṅwe tshifhinga hu vha na magabelo, zwene zwo, ḽi tou vha ḽiṅwe ḽifhasi ḽi akhamadzaho!

src: wathi, "nanyana abomma balinga ukuzibumba ngo mnqopho wokuveza ikghono labo, kodwana kubudisi.
tgt: zwikepe zwi na zwivhumbeo zwo fha mbanaho nahone zwi hwa la mihwalo yo fhambanaho, zwine zwa amba uri zwi tshimbidza nga nḓila dzo fhambanaho," o ralo mdle tshe, ane a ḓiphina nga u shuma na vhathu vha mve lele dzo fhambanaho, u bva kha mashango o fhambana ho.

src: ngaphumelela ekuninweni ngokuvala phetjheya, ngaba nommoya wokuzimisela no kusebenzisana ngalokho ba gcina sele bangihlonipha nge nca yomsebenzami.
tgt: ḽifhasi ḽa khaedu u vha mufumakadzi kha mushumo uyu wa nḓowetshu mo ya zwa maḓini ndi "ḽifhasi ḽa khaedu" o ralo mdletshe, ane o amba zwithu zwo fha mbanaho zwo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu sa tshiṅwe tsha khaedu khulwanesa sa izwi mushumo uyu u tshi kha ḓi dzhiiwa sa wa vhanna.

src: nawuzi miseleko godu unommoya wokusebenza ngamandla, ungazisusa iinqabo endlela nakho".
tgt: "naho vhafumakadzi vha tshi lingedza u shumesa vho ḓifunga uri vha sumbedzise uri kuhumbulele kwa vhathu a si kwone, a zwo ngo leluwa na hone zwi fhedza maanḓa.

src: ipumelelo kamdletshe ekususeni iinqabo zomsebenzakhe ibonakele ngokutlonyeli swa kwakhe unongorwana wokuba mjaphethe wompha thi wezemisebenzi okha mba phambili.
tgt: ndo kunda idzi khaedu nga u dzi ka, u vha na mbonelaphanḓa mbuya na u shumisana na vhathu uri ndi wane ṱho mpho.

src: "ngafumana unongorwana ngokuphuma phambili esikhathini esifitjha ni ngombana ngaphasa uku hlolwa ngeveke yokuthoma ngimjaphethe."
tgt: "ndo wana pfufho ya u vha muthu o swikelelaho zwinzhi nga kha tshifhinga tshiṱuku nga uri ndo phasa odithi kha vhege ya u thoma kha vhuimo uvhu."

src: ngosewula wee2017 wafu mana unongorwana wokuba ‘mtjhayeli weenkepe oyiku tani’ ngokuphulukisa iinkepe esiwuruwurwini esikhulu esakhe sabonwa edurban.
tgt: o dovha hafhu a wana pfufho ya u vha "muhali" nga ṅwedzi wa tshimedzi 2017, nga u phulusa zwikepe kha ḓumbu ḽihulu ḽe ḽa vha ḽi sa athu vhuya ḽa vho nwa durban.

src: wathi, "ukuba mtjhayeli weenkepe kesinye isikhathi kutjho bonyana kufanele ufoye ube nesibindi".
tgt: "u vha mulangazwikepe zwi amba uri tshiṅwe tshifhinga u tea u luma mbilu wa ḓivhofha mbilu sa musadzi," o ralo.

src: "ukufumana kwami idigri kwenza bona abasebenzisani bami abaduna bangihloniphe.
tgt: "u wana digirii yanga zwi khwaṱhisedza uri ndi wane ṱhompho kha vhashumisani vha vhanna.

src: bayangibuza qobe lilanga bonyana ngimajadu ngani ngombana sibabili kwaphela abakhambe bebafikelela kile libanga begodu ngingewo kuthoma owaqeda iimfundo zemaritime diploma edoye lweni ledurban.
tgt: vha mmbudzisa ḓuvha na ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe uri ndi khou ita mini ngauri ri tou vha vhavhili fhedzi vho swika ho hafha nahone ndo vha wa u thoma u wana dipuḽoma ya zwa maḓini kha vhuimanga lavha ha durban.

src: lokhu kuko dwa kwangenza ngabonakala" wakutjho lokhu ngahlanye ahlathulula bonyana iimfundo ngezelwandle zibudisi.
tgt: hezwi zwi zwoṱhe zwo ita uri ndi vhe o khetheaho," o ralo, a tshi khou sumbedza uri ngudo dza zwa maḓini a dzo ngo leluwa.

src: kufuze aqinisekise bonyana iinsetjenziswa zokuphepha nezokuvikela nokucima umli lo zisebujameni obulungileko, enze ukuhlolwa kwesikepe kezokuphepha kwaqobe mnyaka, aqinisekise bonyana abasebenzi bafumana iba ndulo elifaneleko bebatlikitle neencwadi zabo zebandulo, ahlole ukubuyekezwa komse benzi asize nabasebenzi bazi tlamele ihlelo lokuzithuthukisa elikhambisana nebizelo labo, asebenzise imithethomgomo yekhamphani alawule iindawo zokubeka ipahla nokuoda iinsetjenziswa.
tgt: mushumo wa mulangazwikepemdletshe o ṱalutshedza uri mulangazwikepe u langa zwikepe zwoṱhe zwine zwa vha ngalavhani.

src: wathi, "umsebenzi welanga uthoma ngerhelo leenkepe eziphumako nezingenako, ekufuze lilunge nakubetha isikhathi sokutjhayisa.
tgt: u tea u vhona uri tsireledzo na tshomedzo dza zwa mulilo zwi ngonani nahone kha tshii mo tsho fanelaho, u ita savei ya tsireledzo ya zwikepe ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha, u khwa ṱhisedza u ri vhashumi vha pfumbudziwa zwavhuḓi na uri vha saine bugu dza u pfumbudziwa, u ita ṱholo dza vhupima vhukoni na u thu sa vhashumi vhawe uri vha dzudzanye mbekanyamu shumo ya mveledziso zwi tshi elana na nyaluwo yavho kha buḓo iḽi, u khwaṱhisedza uri mbekanyamaitele dza khamphani dzi ngonani na u langa hune zwishumiswa zwa vhewa hone khathihi na u ita oda dza tshomedzo.

src: "sitho ma ngomsebenzi weenkepe ngeiri le06h00 siqede ngeiri le17h50.
tgt: ḓuvha ḽa nga misi ḽa mdle tshe ḽa mushumo ḽi thoma nga mutevhe wa kutshimbilele kwa zwikepe, zwine zwoṱhe zwi tea u vha zwo fhela vha tshi tshaisa.

src: abatjhayeli beenkepe basebenza ngababili, amunye wenza imisebenzi engaba bunane.
tgt: "ri thoma nga ha zwikepe nga iri ya 06:00 ra guma nga 17:50. vhala ngazwikepe vhavhili vha shuma vhoṱhe, na uri muthihi u fhedza mishumo ya hane fha kha ya malo.

src: umphakathi ugidinga ukubuyise lwa inarha ebiza amar21 weengidi siya miti umphakathi wepu malanga kapa uhlele ukuthatha igadango lokuzibandakanya emkhakheni weenyamazana ngemva kokusekelwa ngeemali bebahloma isiqiwu seenyamazana esizaku ba ngesomphakathi.
tgt: vhadzulapo vha pembelela r21miḽioni ya nyanḓano ya mavu vho siya miti vhadzulapo vha kapa vhubvaḓuvha vha khou lavhelelwa u sedzana na zwa maḓaka nga murahu ha musi vho ṱanga nedza ndambedzo ya muvhu so ya u tshimbidza mbekanya mushumo ya ndangulo ya zwa maḓaka i langwaho nga vha dzulapo.

src: umphakathi wedouble drift eduze nerhini unabantu abayi1 500 abangebemindeni ema264.
tgt: vhadzulapo vha double drift tsini na grahamstown vha li ngana 1 500 nga tshivhalo u bva kha miṱa ya 264. vho bviswa kha mavu avho nga muvhuso wa ciskei nga 1991, hu tshi khou itelwa vhugalaphukha vhu langwaho nga vhatshena.

src: umphakathi usandukwe mukela ubunikazi benarha (amatitle deeds), ebuyise lwe kibo ngaphasi kwehlelo lokubuyiselwa inarha.
tgt: u ya nga mulangavunḓu wa kapa vhubvaḓuvha vho phumulo masualle, vho sumbedza uri r21 miḽioni yo kumedzelwa kha nyanḓano ya mbuyedzedzo ya mavu nahone i khou ṋetshedzwa nga zwipiḓa.

src: ngokukandunakulu wepumalanga kapa uphumulo masualle, ama21 weengidi zamaranda sezibekelwe ngeqadi ngomnqopho wokulungisa indaba yenarha nokudlulise lwa kwayo ebanikazini bayo ngokweengaba zakhona.
tgt: vho masualle vho amba uri: "hezwi zwi tou vha ḽiga ḽa vhuṱhogwa malugana na tshanduko na ndondolo ya mupo.

src: "leli ligadango eliqakatheke khulu emizamweni yokulonda iimvelo nokuletha amatjhuguluko.
tgt: vhupo vhu khou bveledzwa uri vhu vhambedzwe tshoṱhe na vhuṅwe vhugalaphukha nahone muvhuso u khou tikedza vhadzulapo nga kha ndambedzo, ṋet shedzo ya phukha na vhugudisi".

src: umsebenzi wenziwe ngefanele ukobana isiqiwu lesi seenyamazana sibe sezingeni lokuphalisana nezinye iinqiwu ngahlanye norhulumende usekela ngeemali zokubandula umphakathi,’’ kutjho umasualle.
tgt: vhadzulapo, vhane vha langa vhugalaphukha na vha zhendedzi ḽa vhuendelamashango na vhugalaphu kha ḽa kapa vhubvaḓuvha (ecpta) nga fhasi ha ndango ya likhayalethu communal property association (lcpa), vho ṱanganedza r6 miḽioni i bvaho kha muhasho wa zwa mupo u itela u bveledza thandela ya ikonomi ya zwa maḓaka kha bulasi ya phukha ya hekithara dza 1 400 ye vha rengelwa nga muhasho wa mveledziso ya mahayani na mbuyedzedzo ya mavu.

src: umphakathi ngokusizana nabeenqiwu zeenyamazana ieastern cape parks and tourism agency (iecpta) ngaphasi kwelikhayalethu communal property association (ilcpa) bemukele iingidi ezisithandathu zamaranda emnyangweni weze bhoduluko ukuthi bakghone ukusungula ibhizinisi kilo mkhakha weenyamazana esi qiwini esimahagere ayi1400 abasithengelwe mnyango wokuthuthukisa iindawo zemakhaya nokubuyekezwa kwenarha.
tgt: mudzulatshidulo wa lcpa, vho mxolisi ngesi, vho amba uri vhadzulapo vho dzhenisa mbilo yavho nga 1998. nga 2012, miraḓo ya vhadzulapo vha ṋewa hekithara dza 23 500 dze u bva tshetsho dza engedzwa nga dziṅwe hekithara dza 1400 dza vhugalaphukha.

src: ngomyaka wee2012, amalunga womphakathi anikelwa amahagere azii23 500 ngaphezulu kwalokho banikelwa isiqiwu seenyamazana esimahagere ayi1400.
tgt: "ro takala nga mannḓa ngauri ro fhedza ro wana zwoṱhe zwe ra vha ri tshi khou ṱoḓa.

src: "sithabe khulu kwamanikelela ngombana ekugcineni sithole koke ebesikufuna.
tgt: muvhuso wo ri fha ndambedzo ya thema mveledziso.

src: abosomabubulo abanzima bamakhe mikhali befreyistata bavula amathu ba wemisebenzi more matshediso i kampani esendaweni yeharrismith ngesi fundeni sefreyistata isiza epini yokulwa nokutlho geka kwemisebenzi ngoku vula amathuba wemisebenzi enzinzileko ema70.
tgt: vhoranḓowetshumo vha zwa khemikhala vha vharema vha free state vha sika mishumo vho more matshediso khamphani ya vhubve ledzi ha khemikhala yapo i khou thusa u lwa na vhushayamishumo nga u sika mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu ya henefha kha 70 ngei harrismith kha ḽa free state.

src: ikevali chemicals iyikampani yokuthoma ephethwe babantu abanzima efreyistata ekhiqiza amakhemikhali.
tgt: kevali chemicals ndi vhubvele dzi ha khemikhala vhu langwaho nga vharema kha ḽa free state ha u tou thoma, vhu na mutevhe wa khemikhala dzi kunakisaho maḓi, tsiravhulwadze na thasululo dza vhuthathazwitshili zwi tshi katela na zwo nambatedza.

src: ikhiqiza ama khemikhali ahlukahlukene ko wokuhlwengisa amanzi, wokuhlanzekisa ngemakhaya nangeendlwaneni zangasese begodu nedlhu yokunamathi sela.
tgt: khamphani yo tumbulwa nga 2004 nga khonani ṱhanu dzi re na vhukoni kha zwa khemikhala, zwirengwa zwi tshimbilaho nga u ṱavhanya, mveledziso ya zwibveledzwa, na nḓowetshumo dza zwo nambatedza.

src: ikampani le yasungulwa ngomnyaka wee2014 babantu abahlanu ababangani abane lwazi ngezamakhemikhali, ngezepahla ethingiseka msinyana, ngezokusungulwa kom khiqizo omutjha nokukhiqiza idlhu yokunamathisela.
tgt: mulanguli muhulwane wa keva li chemicals vho funeka khumalo vho amba uri tshikimu tsha ranḓowetshumo tsha vharema tsho tikedza khamphani yavho u wana zwishumiswa zwa u thoma masia a vhubveledzi na u bveledza vhukunakisi ha maḓi, vhukunakisi na zwa u thivhela tshika khathihi na zwa u nambatedza.

src: umnqophisi ophetheko wa kwakevali chemicals, ufune ka khumalo uveza bona iblack industrialist scheme isekele ikampanakhe ngokuyithengela imitjhini amathulusi neense tjenziswa zokusebenza.
tgt: vho amba uri: "mathomoni ro dzhenisa masheleni uri mushumo u takuwe fhedzi mafhedziseloni ra wana ndambedzo kha vha muhasho wa mbambadzo na nḓowetshumo (dti) nga kha tshikimu tsha ranḓowetshumo tsha vharema (bis) zwi tshi katela na koporasi ya mveledziso ya zwa nḓowetshumo.

src: ibis lihlelo lesikhwama seemali somthethokambiso wabosomabubulo abanzima elenzelwe ukuvulela abosoma bubulo abanzima besewula afrika amathuba emnothweni ngokubanikela isekelo ngeemali namkha ngokubathengela iinse tjenziswa elihleleke ngendlela ezabazuzisa ngefanelo.
tgt: tshikimu tsha ranḓowetshumo tsha vharema tsho tikedza kevali chemicals u wana zwishumiswa zwa u thoma masia a maswa a vhubveledzi na u bveledza vhukunakisi ha maḓi, na zwa u thivhela tshika khathihi na zwa u nambatedza.

src: ukhumalo uveza bona ukuthoma irhwebo kudle pheze iingidi ezili18 zamaranda begodu kuthethe iinyanga ezili11 ukobana ikampani yenze inzuzo.
tgt: tshikimu itshi ndi mbekanyamushumo ya ndambedzo ya mbekanyamaitele ya vhoranḓowetshumo vha vharema yo ḓiimiselaho u bvisela khagala vhukoni ha vhoranḓowetshumo vha vharema vha shumaho kha ikonomi ya afurika tshipembe nga kha vhuḓidzhenisi ha zwi si zwa masheleni na zwa masheleni zwo dzudzanaho, zwo pikwaho na u ṱalutshedzwa zwavhuḓi.

src: ikampani isabalalise imikhi qizwayo esewula afrika ma zombe neenarheni ezinjeuga nda, namibia netanzania.
tgt: vho khumalo vho amba uri zwo dzhia r18 miḽioni uri mushumo u takuwe na miṅwedzi ya 11 uri hu thome u wanwa mbuelo.

src: ukhumalo uhlathulula bona umthelela omuhle wekampani le emaphilweni wabahlali bekhethwepha mkhulu uku dlula ukuvula kwayo amathuba wemisebenzi.
tgt: khamphani i phaḓaladza zwibveledzwa zwayo u mona na afurika tshipembe zwi tshi katela na uganda, namibia, na tanzania.

src: "ngaphezu kokuvulela izakhamuzi amathuba wemisebenzi, sinamahlelo wokwenyula umphakathi emirarweni yezehlalakuhle nangokusekela abantu bengubo bemalokitjhini nebeendaweni zemakhaya abahlela ukuvula amarhwebo amancani ngamakghono abanawo wokukhiqiza ama khemikhali wokuhlwengisa ngemakhaya nangeendlwaneni zangasese", ubeke watjho.
tgt: vho khumalo vho amba uri mutsindo une khamphani ya vha nawo kha matshilo a vhadzulapo ndi muhulwane u fhira vhusika mushumo.

src: sivulela ilutjha lekzn amathuba wemisebenzi hlengiwe ngobese ilutjha elibalelwa ema20 lakwazulunata la libekelwe ukuzuza ekwakhiweni kwefemu etjatja yakwamahindra ngaphandlenyana kwedur ban, ebize iingidi ezima95 zamaranda ezokukhiqiza umhlobo omutjha weemve ni ezinamabadi amane (amadouble cab) ezizokuthiywa bona mapik up.
tgt: u sika mishumo ya vhaswa vha kzn vho hlengiwe ngobese vhaswa vha fhira ho 20 vha kwazu lunatal vha khou ḓo vhuelwa nga ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽa mahindra ḽi ḓura ho r95 miḽioni ḽine ḽa ḓo bveledza mutevhe muswa wa baki dza davhulu khebe dzi no pfi pik up ḽine ḽa ḓo vha ḽi nnḓa ha ḓorobo ya durban.

src: abantu abatjha abama25 bakwazulunatala bafunyene ibandulo bebathola imisebenzi ngoku vulwa kwebubulo elitjha lakwamahindra.
tgt: vhaswa vha 25 ngei kwazulunatal vho ṱanganedza vhugudisi vha vhuelwa nga mushumo nga u vulwa ha ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽa mahindra.

src: abasebenzi babandulwe ngokwecwephetjhe lamazwe ngamazwe yimahin dra group isebenzisana neaih logistics.
tgt: vhashumi vho ṱanganedza vhugudisi nga kha nzudzanyo dza aih na tshigwada tsha mahindra na mahi ndra i re kha shango nga vhuphara nahone vha ḓo rumelwa india u wana vhuṅwe vhugudisi hune ha ṱoḓea.

src: nakunesidingo bazokuthunyelwa eindia khona bazakufu nyana ibandulo elidepha dephileko.
tgt: ndingo dza zwibveledzwa zwa tshiimiswa itshi dzi kati, hu tshi khou pulaniwa u bveledza mimoḓoro i anga nyelwaho kha 2000 ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe, hune mafheloni, nga ṅwaha, mimoḓoro ya 4000 ya ḓo pfuka zwanḓani zwa vhashumi na mitshini.

src: umsebenzi wokukhiqiza sewuthomile nanyana usalingelelwa nje begodu kubekwe isilinganiso sokukhiqiza iinkoloyi ezizii2000 ngomnyaka, ngokukhamba kwesikhathi inani leenkoloyi ezikhiqizwako lizakuba zii4000 ngomnyaka.
tgt: mec wa mveledziso ya ikonomi, vhuendelama shango na zwa mupo vho zikalala musi hu tshi khou rwelwa ṱari vho amba uri: "vhubindudzi ndi havhuḓi kha vhuḓifhulufheli ha bindu.

src: lokho kuthumela umlayezo kilabo abanganathemba kilesisifunda ukobana bazi bonyana idurban yindawo engasetjenziswa kezamasiso,’’ kwatjho usomkhandlu wezokuthuthukiswa komnotho, zokuvakatjha neze bhoduluko usihle zikalala lokha nakuvulwa ifemu le.
tgt: zwi ya phanḓa na u sumbedza uri fhano kwazulunatal ri fhethu havhuḓi ha vhabindu dzi.

src: uveza bona amathuba womsebenzi abawuthomi leko erhwebeni azokuletha ukukhula kezamakghono esifundeni.
tgt: zwi dovha hafhu zwa rumela mulaedza kha havho vhane vha timatima uri duban ndi fhethu hune wa nga hu humbula musi zwi tshi ḓa kha vhubindudzi".

src: omunye wabasebenzi ongusonjiniyera ngokwe ziqu zakhe, ngusthembiso mthembu othi uthabe khulu ngokufunyana umsebenzi lo.
tgt: vho amba uri zwikhala zwa mushumo zwo bvaho kha vhubindudzi uvhu zwi ḓo shela mulenzhe kha nyaluwo ya zwikili kha vundu.

src: ‘’bengihlezi ekhaya pheze umnyaka woke ngingatho li umsebenzi.
tgt: muṅwe wa vhashumi ndi mutshudeni o khunyeledzaho pfunzo dza nṱha dza inzhi nia sthembiso mthembu we a amba uri o takala nga maanḓa nga u wana mu shumo.

src: ithubeli lingisize khulu bonyana ngikghone ukuzondla nebomndenami.
tgt: o amba uri: "ndo vha ndo dzula hayani lwa ṅwaha woṱhe ndi sa khou wana mushumo.

src: ipilo nayikuvulela amathuba, asebenzise amukelani chauke umnyango we zokulima wetji ngalanga kapa ula wula ihlelo elisiza abalimi abasakhasako nesele babo makekere ngamano ukusu kela ngelanga lokuthoma ukuba balimi – nabatlhoga isizo leemali – ukufikela lapho bakghona ukuzijamela ngokwabo.
tgt: musi vhutshilo vhu tshi vha posa tshikavhavhe, kha vha tshi lime.

src: ihlelo lokusekela noku thuthukisa abalimi lisize ilutjha elifana nowayne mansfield (oneminyaka ema33) odabuka epaarl, ogade athengisela uso nghwanakhe emarageni wekapa ngamalanga laya asafunda isikolo wazoku ba mlimi okhiqiza abosuru enarheni ayiqatjhileko abese ubathumela emazweni wa ngaphetjheya.
tgt: amukelani chauke muhasho wa zwa vhulimi wa kapa vhukovhela u tshimbidza mbekanyamu shumo ine ya thusa vhalimi vhaswa na vho no bvelelaho nga u vha ṋea thikhedzo u bva ḓuvha ḽa u tou thoma – musi vha tshi ṱoḓa thuso ya ndambedzo ya masheleni u swikela vha tshi kona u ḓii misa nga vhone vhaṋe.

src: eminyakeni elitjhumi eya dlulako, umansfield nagade amrhwebi osakhasako one minyaka ema23, waziphu ndisa ngethuba lokusebe nza eplasini lapho beka funyana namkha beka thenga khona abosuru azobathengisa.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ya mveledziso na thikhedzo ya vhalimi yo thusa vhaswa vha fanaho na wayne mansfi eld (33) u bva paarl, we a bva kha u vha murengisi wa nḓilani musi a tshi khou shumela malume awe ngei makete wa ḓoroboni ya kapa tshifhingani tsha musi a kha ḓi dzhena tshikolo u ya kha u vha muvhambadze la mashango a nnḓa zwika vhavhe zwawe zwine a zwi lima kha tshipiḓa tsha mavu tshe a hira.

src: unobange la walokhu kukobana waye gade azibona asesemncani begodu anganakareko ke zokulima.
tgt: miṅwaha ya fumi yo fhira ho, a tshi kha ḓi vha rama bindu muṱuku wa miṅwaha ya 23, mansfield o hana tshi khala tsha u shuma kha bula si ye a vha a tshi renga hone zwikavhavhe zwa u rengisa.

src: ngemva kwemi nyakana watjhugulula u mkhumbulwakhe nakabona isidingo esikhulako sabosu ru.
tgt: tshifhinga tshoṱhe hetshi, o vha a si na dzangalelo ḽa vhulimifhedziha, zwenezwi miṅwaha i tshi khou ḓi ya, o ḓo shandukisa muhumbu lo musi a tshi vhona nyalu wo ya ṱhoḓea ya makete wa zwikavhavhe.

src: ngaye lela bona ngokukhamba kwesikhathi thina esithengi sa endleleni asizukufumana litho".
tgt: "ndo dovha nda zwi vho na uri vhorabulasi vho vha vha tshi khou ita zwe riṋe vharengisi vha nḓilani ra vha ri tshi khou ita zwone – vho vha vha tshi khou paka zwiṱoko zwavho vha zwi rengisa makete wa ḓorobo ni ya kapa.

src: ngeminyaka yee2013, umlimi wendawo wanza isivumelwano sokuthwasi sa umansfield kezokulima, wamqatjhisela amahekthara ali12 wenarha.
tgt: nga 2013, rabulasi wapo o ḓo tenda u gudisa mansfield na u mu tendela u hira heki thara dza 12 dza mavu.

src: ngomnyaka wee2015, wakghona ukuthumela ama thani wabosuru ama31, kwathi ngomnyaka wee2016 isibalwesi sakhula khulu ukufikela kumathani ali168.
tgt: nga 2015, o ḓo kona u rengisela mashango a nnḓa thani dzi swikaho 31 dza zwikavhavhe nahone nga 2016 tshivhalo itshi tsho ḓo engedzea zwihulwane u swika kha thani dza 168 dza zwikavhavhe.

src: koke lokhu kwaba yipume lelo ngenca yokuthwasiswa nesizo alifumana ehlelweni lokusekela nokuthuthuki sa abalimi lapho afumana isibonelelo sehlelo elihla nganyelweko sesekelo le zokulima (icasp) ngo mnyaka wee2015 ngalo kho wakghona ukunzi nzisa ibubulo lakhe bewa phumelela njengomlimi.
tgt: ndivhuwo kha vhugudi si na thuso ye a i wana kha mbekanyamushumo ya mveledziso na thikhedzo ya vhalimi zwe zwa ḓo ita uri a wane gavhelo ḽa mbeka nyamushumo ya thikhe dzo ya zwa vhulimi yo katelaho zwoṱhe (casp) nga 2015, o kona u ṱoka midzi yo khwaṱhaho na u aluwa sa mulimi.

src: litjheja abalimi abasakhasako, abaziphilisa ngokulima, bamasimu amancani nabalima umthamo omkhulu ngomnqopho wokuthengisa eemarageni.
tgt: u fhaṱa vhukoni kha vhalimi mbekanyamushumo ya mveledziso na thikhedzo ya vhalimi yo ḓiimisela u fhaṱa vhukoni kha zwitshavha na vhathu vhone vhaṋe vhe vha vha vhe na vhushai u bva kale, zwihulwane, vhavhuelwa kha mbuedzedzo ya mavu.

src: umlawuli wephrojekthi yeziko lokuthuthukiswa kwezokulima emnyangweni wezokulima etjingalanga kapa, ushaheed martin wathi lelihlelo lisize abalimi bakghona ukuziphilisa.
tgt: i thusa vhalimi vha khou bve lelaho,vhalimela u ḽa, vhalimi vhaṱuku na vhalimela u rengisa.

src: inhi iligadango elinqophe ukuthuthukisa zamaphilo vukuzenzele unnamed ungqongqotjhe we zamaphilo udorh.
tgt: vho motsoaledi vho vha vha tshi khou amba zwenezwino kha muṱangano wa u amba na vhoramafhungo he vha vha vha tshi khou tibula mula yotibe wa khwiniso ya nhi na mulayotibe wa khwiniso ya zwikimu zwa dzilafho.

src: umotsoaledi gade akhulu ma mhlapha emhlanganweni weembikiindaba lapho ethule isikhibelelo somthethomli ngwa wenhi nesikhibele lo somthethomlingwa wee nkimu zezokwelapha.
tgt: mulayotibe ndi mvetomve to ya khanḓiso ya mulayo.

src: imithethomlingwa le izoku hlahla indlela yokufikelela zokwelapha lula ngaphasi kwehlelo lenhi.
tgt: mulayotibe u fanela u ṱanganedzwa nga khabinethe phanḓa ha musi u tshi rumelwa phalamenndeni.

src: umthethomlingwa litlha tlha lomthetho ohlongo zwako.
tgt: u ḓivhadzwa ha milayotibe iyi mivhili zwi amba uri afri ka tshipembe ḽi tsini na u swikelela ndondolamutakalo wa vhathu vhoṱhe zwine zwa amba uri nhi hu si kale i ḓo vha mulayo.

src: imithethomlingwa eminengi itlanywa minya ngo karhulumende ngelayelo likangqongqotjhe womnya ngo loyo.
tgt: nhi ndi sisiṱeme ya ndambedzo ya masheleni ine ya ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha af rika tshipembe vha khou ṋe tshedzwa ndondolamutakalo ya mutheo, hu sa sedzwi vhu imo ha mushumo wavho na vhukoni ha u badela mashele ni thwii kha tshikwama.

src: kufuze umthetho mlingwa uphasiswe yikhabi nethi ngaphambi kokobana uthunyelwe epalamende.
tgt: vho motsoaledi vho amba uri muvhuso u pfa vhuṱungu u ḓivha uri vhaṅwe vhathu vha kholwa uri phanḓa ha musi hu tshi ambiwa nga ha nhi, sisiṱeme ya ndondola mutakalo ine ya khou swogo la i tea u thoma ya vhuedza.

src: ukwethulwa kwemithetho mlingwa emibili le kutjho iragelophambili lesewula afrika ekufikeleleni isizo lezamaphilo labo boke aba ntu okutjho bona inhi izoku ba mthetho msinyana.
tgt: vho amba uri muvhuso u kati na u sedzana na thaidzo dza tshumelo i si yavhuḓi na u shaea ha kushumele nga vhu koni kha sisiṱeme ya ndondo lamutakalo wa tshitshavha.

src: motsoaledi uthe urhulumende uyelele bona abanye abantu bajame kelo kuthi kufuze kulungiswe qangi ihlelo lezamaphilo lo mphakathi ngaphambi koku thi bekukhulunywe ngenhi.
tgt: kha pulane ya mveledziso ya lushaka, vho motsoa ledi vho ri, yo i sumbedzisa zwavhuḓi na uri u thoma u shuma ha nhi, tshumelo dzi si dzavhuḓi kha ndondola mutakalo na mbadelo dza nṱhesa dzine dza vha hone kha ndondolamutakalo ya phuraivethe zwi khou tea u sedzeswa.

src: uthe urhulumende uyazazi iintjhijilo zezinga elibogabo gako nokungasebenzi nge fanelo kwehlelo lezamaphilo womphakathi.
tgt: musi khanedzano dza khwi niso ya milayotibe dzi kati, muhasho u ḓo thoma thandela nṋa fhedzi dza nhi dzine dza ḓo katela mutakalo zwikolo ni, mutakalo wa muhumbulo, vhafumakadzi vha vhaimana vhane vha vha na thaidzo dzi konḓaho musi vho ḓihwala kha zwibadela zwa 22 zwi kwameaho vhukuma na o nkhoḽodzhi, thuso yo khethe aho i tshi khou livhiswa gau teng na kwazulunatal, ngeno hu sa khou thudzelwa thungo maṅwe mavundu.

src: icentral application clearing house (cach) yomnyaka wee2018 vukuzenzele unnamed iyini i central application clearing house?
tgt: central application clearing house (cach) ya 2018 vukuzenzele unnamed central application clearing house ndi mini?

src: central application clearing house (icach) lihlelo lesikhatjhana elahlonywa mnyango wezefundo ephakemeko nokubandula ngomnqopho wokusiza ilutjha elilungele ukuyokufunda emazikweni wefundo ephakemeko ngaphasi kwerherho lefundo nokubandulwa kwezinga eliphakemeko (ipset), kodwana baqalene nobujamo obuthileko obungaba kukuthi: bafaka iimbawo kusese nesikhathi emazikweni akhethwe ngibo kodwana iimbawo zabo akhange zamukelwe begodu sekungemva kwesikhathi sokufaka iimbawo kezinye iindawo.
tgt: central application clearing house (cach) ndi maitele a tshifhinganyana o vhumbiwaho nga vha muhasho wa pfunzo dza nṱha na vhugudisi u thusa matshudeni vhane vha khou ṱoḓa u dzhena kha sisteme ya pfunzo dza nṱha na vhugudisi fhedzi vha vha vha tshi khou ṱangana na nyimele dzine: matshudeni vho lavhelelwaho vhe vha ita khumbelo nga tshifhinga kha tshiimiswa tshe vha tou khetha fhedzi khumbelo dzavho dza haniwa, hune zwa zwino vha vha vho no lenga uri vha ite khumbelo huṅwe.

src: akhange bafake iimbawo ngombana bebangaﬁkeleli iimfuneko ezibekiweko zokungena ngokuya kwemiphumela yabo yegreyidi ye11) kodwana imiphumela yabo yegreyidi ye12) mihle begodu iﬁkelela iimfuneko ezibekiweko zokungena ezikwenelo.
tgt: a vho ngo ita khumbelo ngauri vha songo swikela ṱhoḓea dza u ṱanganedzwa zwo bva kha mvelelo dzavho dza gireidi 11 fhedzi vha wana uri mvelelo dzavho dza gireidi 12 dzi a swikela ṱhoḓea dza u ṱanganedzwa.

src: akhange bafake iimbawo kusese nesikhathi ngonobangela othileko namkha akhange bafake iimbawo nakanye.
tgt: a vha ngo ita khumbelo nga tshifhinga nga tshiitisi tshithihi kana tshiṅwevho kana a vha ngo ita khumbelo na luthihi.

src: umfundi bekanganalwazi lokobana uzokufundelani ngemva kokuqeda igreyidi ye12.
tgt: vho vha vha si na luvhonela lwa zwine vha tea u guda nga murahu ha u fhedza maṱiriki.

src: umfundi bekazi bona ufuna ukufundela liphi ibizelo kodwana anganasiqiniseko sokuthi ukhethe ibizelo elisemkhakheni omlungeleko.
tgt: vha na muhumbulo wa zwine vha ṱoḓa u guda zwone fhedzi a vha khou tou fhulufhela uri zwe vha khetha u guda ndi buḓo ḽa mushumo ḽo teaho.

src: imisebenzi eyenziwa yicach ifaka hlangana uku: siza ngokufakwa kweembawo zokufunda emazikweni wamapset (emayunivesithi, emayunivesithi wethekhnoloji, emakholiji wechwephetjhe newokufundela imisebenzi (ama tvet) nemazikweni alawulwa mkhandlu wefundo namandla wokuthwasisa.
tgt: tshumelo dzine dza ṋetshedzwa nga cach khumbelo dza zwikhala zwa u guda kha pset (yunivesithi, yunivesithi dza thekhinolodzhi, khoḽedzhi dza zwa thekhinikhala na pfunzo na vhugudisi ha mushumo wa zwanḓa na sekithara dza zwa vhulaedzwa ha vhugudisi na pfunzo.

src: nikela ngelwazi malungana nesizo leemali (ilwazi nge nsfas).
tgt: mafhungo a thikhedzo ya zwa masheleni (mafhungo a nsfas).

src: nikela umsebenzi wokuthuthukisa ibizelo lomsebenzi (ngokweluleka, ngelwazi, ngokubonisa, ukuhlela nokunikela ilwazi lebizelo lomsebenzi malungana nokusizwa ngeemali nangezinye iindlela zokuthola isekelomali).
tgt: tshumelo dza mveledziso ya mushumo (nyendedzi, mafhungo, vhupulani/ mafhungo a mushumo na tsivhudzo nga ha masia a vhalambedzi na ndambedzo).

src: isekelo lomsebenzi wezandla (iziko elithuthukisa ukusekelwa komsebenzi wezandla lelizweloke).
tgt: thikhedzo ya mutsila (senthara ya thikhedzo ya mveledziso ya mutsila ya lushaka) tshumelo ya cach i thoma nga ḽa 3 phando 2018, tsini na musi mvelelo dza mulingo wa nsc dzi tshi bviswa nahone dzi ḓo shuma u swika mafheloni a luhuhi 2018. cach i shuma hani?

src: umsebenzi wecach uthoma mhlana ama3 kutjhirhweni wee2018, phambidlana nje kokukhutjhwa kwemiphumela yegreyidi ye12 begodu uzokuraga bekube sekupheleni kukamhlolanja wee2018.
tgt: luṱa 1: matshudeni vha songo wanaho tshikhala kha zwiimiswa zwe vha ita khumbelo khazwo, kana vhane vha khou ṱoḓa zwikhala zwa u guda kha pset, vha nga kwama cach nga kha nomboro ya mahala: 0800 356 635, webusaithi: www.

src: isigaba sesi2: abasebenzeli bazokwenza ilandelela ngokudosela simahla abafundi abaphumelele kuhle, ukusuka ezikweni lokuthintana begodu bebatlolise yoke imininingwana efunekako kudathabheyizi yecach, baveze umkhakha webizelo lefundo elikhethwe mfundi begodu nesifunda aﬁsa ukuyofunda kiso.
tgt: luṱa 2: mazhendedzi a ḓo founela matshudeni vhane vha khou lavhelelwa hu si na mbadelo, u bva kha senthara ya vhukwamani vha ṅwalisa zwidodombedzwa zwoṱhe zwine zwa khou ṱoḓea kha databeisi ya cach, ho sumbedzwa buḓo ḽa ngudo ḽe mugudiswa a khetha na vundu ḽine a tama u guda khaḽo.

src: isigaba sesi3: imininingwana yomfundi ofake isibawo kunye nemiphumela yegreyidi ye12 izokuhlolisiswa kuthi ngemva kwalokho idluliselwe emazikweni wezefundo ephezulu bona nakukghonakalako bamukelwe bayokufunda kilawo maziko.
tgt: luṱa 3: zwidodombedzwa zwa vhuṋe zwa muhumbeli na mvelelo dza maṱiriki zwi ḓo khwaṱhisedzwa zwa mboḓi fhiriselwa nga luthihi kha zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo dza nṱha uri vha ṱanganedzwe.

src: isigaba sesi4: umsebenzi wecach uzokuba kuhlolisisa iminini ngwana yomfundi begodu uyidlulisele phambili emazikweni asese neenkhala.
tgt: luṱa 4: tshumelo ya cach i ḓo khwaṱhisedza zwidodombedzwa zwa mugudiswa ya zwi rumela kha zwiimiswa zwine zwa ḓo vha zwi na zwikhala.

src: nangabe isikhala sikhona begodu umfundi ofake isibawo unazo zoke iimfuneko ezifunekako, amaziko wona ngokwawo azokuthintana nomfundi ofake isibawo.
tgt: hune zwikhala zwa vha hone nahone muhumbeli a vha a tshi khou swikela ṱhoḓea, zwiimiswa zwi ḓo kwama muhumbeli thwii.

src: amaphuzu ekufuze atjhejwe icach angeze yaqinisekisa ubukhona besikhala sokufunda emfundini ofake isibawo .
tgt: zwithu zwi no tea u dzhielwa nṱha cach a i fhulufhedzisi muhumbeli tshikhala tsha u guda.

src: icach angeze yatjho bona amaziko azomthinta nini umfundi ofake isibawo sokufunda malungana nekghonakalo yokumamukela.
tgt: cach a i koni u ḓivha uri zwiimiswa zwi ḓo kwama lini muhumbeli u mu ṋetshedza tshikhala tshi re hone.

src: icach ibasiza bunjani abafundi abafake iimbawo kwaphela kodwana bangazi bona bafuna ukufundela liphi ibizelo namkha labo abanganazo iimfuneko ezifunekako zokungena ehlelweni lepset?
tgt: cach i thusa hani vhahumbeli vhane vha sa vhe na vhuṱanzi ha uri vha nga guda mini kana avho vha songo swikelaho ṱhoḓea dza u dzhena kha sisteme ya pset?

src: kunikela ngelwazi elimalungana nokubuyelelwa kweenhlahlubo.

src: amathumbu asuthiko aveza imiphumela emihle more matshediso abafundi besewula afrika abangaphe zulu kweengid i ezilithoba abafunda ee nkolweni zombuso ezingeli zweni loke bayakwazi uku qalana nomsebenzi wabo wesikolo wangamalanga.
tgt: muhasho wa pfunzo ya mutheo, nga kha mbeka nyamushumo ya muvhu so ya u phakhela zwiḽi wa zwikoloni, wo fhirisa tshipikwa tshawo tsha u ṋetshedza zwiḽiwa kha phe senthe dza henefha kha 75 dza vhagudiswa vha ḽino shango.

src: lokhu kuphumelele nge nca yesizo lehlelo likarhu lumende eliqinisekisa bona amathumbu wabo ahlala asuthi ukugoma okunepilo.
tgt: mulanguli wa nsnp kha muhasho, vho neo rakwe na, vho ri zwikolo zwa 20 619 zwi dzudzanya na u phakhela zwiḽiwa vhagu diswa vha henefha kha 9 032 622 u mona na shango ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.

src: um nyango wezefundo esisekelo (idbe), ngehle lo lelizweloke lokondliwa eenkolweni (insnp), ufike lele bewadlula umnqopho wawo wokunikela ngokugo ma ebafundini abama75% ngelizweni.
tgt: vho ri zwikolo zwi songo dzheniswaho kha mbeka nyamushumo iyi zwi tea u kwama ofisi dza tshiṱiriki arali zwi tshi khou ṱoḓa u dzhenela.

src: umlawuli wensnp emnyangweni wezefun do esisekelo, uneo rak wena, uthe iinkolo ezizii 20 619 zipheka beziphakele abafundi abangaba ziingidi ezili9 032 622 elizweni loke qobe ngelanga.
tgt: kha ṅwaha wa muvhale lano wa 2015/16, biḽioni dza henefha kha r5 703 dzo ṋe tshedzwa mbekanyamushu mo iyi.

src: uthe iinkolo ezingakafakwa ehlelweneli kufuze zithintane namaofisi wo mnyango weeyingi nangange zifuna ukungeniswa ehle lweni.
tgt: vho rakwena vho ri ṱhanga nyelo ya tshelede yo shumi swaho kha mbekanyamu shumo iyi i a khwiniswa ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe u tsireledza inflesheni na hone mugaganyagwama wa 2017/18 u henefha kha biḽioni dza r6.4.

src: urakwena uthe imali ese tjenziswa ehlelweneli ikhu tjhulwa qobe ngomnyaka ukwenzela bona ikhambi sane nentengotjhuguluko yezinto ebizwa ngeinfle yitjhini, begodu isabelo seemali somnyaka wee 2017/18 sibalelwa eengidi gidini ezisi6.4 zamaranda.
tgt: m bekanyamushumo i fhungudza nḓala ya tshifhi nga tshipfufhi na u shela mulenzhe kha mutakalo wa vhagudiswa.

src: ihlelweli liphelisa indlala yesikhathi esifitjhani be godu linomthelela omuhle kezehlalakuhle yabafundi. "
tgt: vho ri: "vhana vhanzhi vha bva kha miṱa i shayaho ine ya kakarika uri hu vhe na zwiḽiwa, nahone kha vhaṅwe vhagudiswa, zwiḽi wa zwi phakhiwaho tshi koloni ndi zwone zwiḽiwa zwi zwoṱhe zwine vha zwi wana kha ḓuvha.

src: abantwana abanengi babuya emakhaya atlhaga ko angakghoni ukondla kuhle abentwana, begodu kabanye abafundi, ukugo ma kwesikolweni ngikho kwaphela ukugoma aba nakho ngelanga.
tgt: zwiḽiwa zwi phakhiwaho tshikolo ni zwi shela mulenzhe kha khonadzeo ya u guda, u nweledza na u dzhenela kha ngudo kiḽasini".

src: ukondliwa kwabentwana kwesikolweni kunomthelela omuhle e kghonweni lokufunda, eku laleleni nokuzwisiswa ii mfundo ezethulwako be godu nekuzibandakanyeni emisebenzini yangetlasini," utjhwe njalo urakwena.
tgt: zwenezwino, khabinethe yo tendela nyanḓadzo ya muvhigo wa tsedzuluso ya nsnp wo dzudzanywaho nga muhasho wa vhupu lani, tsedzuluso na ndau lo.

src: izinga lokuzitlolisa be godu nelokuza kwabafu ndi esikolweni likhuphukile ngokukhuthazwa lihlelo lensnp.

src: mvanje, ikhabi nethi iphasise ukukhutjhwa kombiko omalungana no kuh l u n gw a kw e ns n p okwenziwe mnyango we zokuhlela, ukutjheja noku hlunga (idpme).
tgt: mulanguli wa tsedzulu so kha dpme, vho jabu mathe, vho ri ndivho khu lwane ya u sedzulusa ho vha u ṱhaṱhuvha arali nsnp i tshi khou tshimbidzwa nga nḓila ine ya bveledza mbue lo dza pfunzo na mutakalo wavhuḓi kha vhagudiswa.

src: umbiko lo uveza ipumelelo namaga dango angathathwa ngo mnqopho wokuthuthukisa ihlelweli.
tgt: vho amba hafhu uri ndivho i angaredzaho zwoṱhe ya mbekanyamushumo ndi u khwinisa tshiimo tsha zwa pfushi na mutakalo zwa vhagudiswa vha shayesaho afrika tshipembe.

src: umlawuli wezokuhlunga kwadpme, ujabu mathe, uthe umnqopho omkhulu wokuhlunga bekukuhloli sisa bona insnp yethulwa ngendlela ezokuletha imi phumela emihle nenqotjhi weko efundweni nezama philo wabafundi.
tgt: mbeka nyamushumo yo sedza vhagudiswa vhoṱhe vha re kha zwikolo zwa nnyi na nnyi zwa quintile 13, zwine zwa lingana na phe senthe dza 60 ya zwiko lo zwi shayesaho afri ka tshipembe.

src: ubuyelele waveza ukuthi umnqopho omkhulu wehle lweli kukwenza ngcono ubu jamo bamaphilo nebokwa khela kwemizimba yabafun di besewula afrika abavela emakhaya adosa emhlweni.

src: ihlelo liqale khulu abafundi boke abasezingeni elibizwa ngequintile 13 eenkolweni zombuso, ezibalelwa ema 60% weenkolo ezitlhagako zesewula afrika.
tgt: vho mathe vho ri: "tsedzu luso yo wana uri nsnp i ṋetshedza zwikhala kha vhaṋetshedzi vha zwiḽiwa vha sa shumeli malamba vha fhiraho 50 000 ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe uri vha bikele vhagudiswa, vha hola malamba a r960 nga ṅwe dzi".

src: ihlelweli libuya godu lisiza nangokuphelisa umtlhago emiphakathini ngokuvula amathuba wemisebenzi. "

src: uyolisa ubengomunye wabakhiqizi bezobukghwari abasakhasako kabama20 ukukhethwa ngumasipala wendawo wedrakenstein nedrakenstein local tourism association (idlta), ukobana bakhambela ifundobandulo lamalanga amane elihlelwe liziko lemikhiqizo ekhandi weko neyobukghwari eyaziwa ngecraft and design institute (icdi).
tgt: vho fuma vho mbo ḓi ḓigudisa u lunzhedza malungu, he vha vho pfulutshela mbekweni ngei paarl u ḓiṱoḓela zwa khwine.

src: ngithokoza khulu ngalelithuba, njengombana sengizokukghona ukukhulisa ibhizinisami".

src: imikhiqizo yakhe yomncamo nelukiweko sele ithengwe makhastama weendawo ezikude ezinjengegermany nesweden.

src: "gade kubudisi kezinye iinkhathi, kodwana ngesekelo lecdi nomasipala, ngikgho nile ukuthumbukela ngale kweenqabo njenganje ngize nzela imali begodu sengikgho na nokondla abentabami abane.

src: uyolisa wathatha isiqunto sokudlulisela ilwazi nama kghonwakhe kibomma bendawo abangasebenziko kobana bathome ukuzenzela ingenisomali abayitlhogako ngalokho bakghone ukondla imindenabo.

src: "njenganje ngibabandulela kwami abomma abathathu abangasebenziko.

src: amano kantombifikile webhizinisi ephumelelako hlengiwe ngobese okha untombifikile ngaleka nakathoma ukutjala imirorho esivandeni sakhe begade angazi bonyana lange linye uzokuba nebhizini si yemikhiqizo elinywe ko esabalalisela abaninii ntolo neenkolo eziphekela abentwana.
tgt: tshioro tsha vho ngaleka u ita uri bindu ḽi bvelele vho hlengiwe ngobese musi vho ntombifikile ngaleka vha tshi thoma u lima miroho muḓini wavho, vho vha vha sa vhuyi vha humbu la uri ḽiṅwe ḓuvha vha ḓo vhuya vha vha na bindu ḽa vhulimi ḽine ḽa ḓo vha ḽi tshi khou rengisela mavhengele na zwikimu zwa zwiḽiwa zwapo.

src: utjala isipinitjhi, ikhabitjhi, umhlaza, iintamati, ieyiye, iimbhontjisi namabhanana.

src: ibhizinisakhe yathumba unongorwana womkhiqizo ophuma phambili ngomnya ka wee2016 kibonongo rwana babosomabhizinisi ababomma bomnyango wezokulima wakwazu lunatala.
tgt: bindu ḽavho ḽo thuba tshi phuga tsha u vha mubve ledzi wa nṱhesa wa zwibve ledzwa zwi sa nyoriwi nga manyoro a tshikhuwa nga 2016 nga tshifhinga tsha zwiphuga zwa vhorama bindu vha vhafumakadzi nga muhasho wa vhulimi wa kwazulunatal.

src: umma ungaleka wathi na kathoma ukutjala imirorho gade afuna ukusiza umnde nakhe ukobana ufumane imi rorho emihle kodwana itha ndo lakhe lokulima lamfaka ebhizinisini.
tgt: vho ngaleka vho ri vha tshi thoma u lima miroho, vho vha vha tshi khou ṱoḓa uri muṱa wavho u wane zwiḽiwa zwitete, fhedzi dzangalelo ḽavho ḽo vha dzhenisa kha zwa bindu.

src: wathi, "njenganje ngitjala iintjalo zami enarheni ema hagere amabili kodwana ayikaneli.
tgt: vhathu vha ṱoḓa miroho yanga ngauri a thi shumisi manyoro a tshikhu wa, ndi shumisa mupfudze wa kholomo u bva mada ngani," vho ralo.

src: abantu bathanda imirorho engiyikhiqizileko ngombana angisebenzisi umanyoro onamakhemikha li, ngisebenzisa umsucwa weenkomo".

src: umma ungaleka ogade angutitjhere ngaphambilini uthi waba nethando lokuli ma asesengutitjhere egcilima primary.

src: "bengithi ngingatjhayisa esikolweni ngiye emasimini.
tgt: musi tshifhinga tshanga tsha u awela u shu ma tshi tshi swika, zwe nda vha ndi tshi tama u ita musi ndi si na mushumo ho vha hu u lima fhedzi".

src: bengikuthanda ukugoma okunepilo.
tgt: "ndo thoma nga tshipina tshi, khavhishi na biṱiruṱu zwe nda vha ndi tshi zwi rengisela kiḽiniki yapo.ḓu vha ḽiṅwe ḽiṅwe ndo vha ndi tshi vhuya ndo renge lwa zwoṱhe.

src: ngazitjela ukuthi nakufika isikhathi somhla laphasi engikufunako kulima kwaphela njengombana ngi zabe ngikwenza ngesikhathi sami, ngizigedlile.
tgt: hezwi zwo nṱuṱuwedza uri ndi lime zwinzhi," vho ralo.

src: lokhu kwangikhuthaza ukobana ngitjale khudlwana."
tgt: vho ngaleka vha ṱalutshe dza uri u lima miroho hu na khaedu dzaho.

src: umma ungaleka uhlathulula bona ukutjala imirorho nakho kuneentjhijilo.
tgt: "miroho a yo ngo tou ḓowe lea u limiwa nga vhalimi vhanzhi ngauri i ṱoḓa mu tsho wo teaho.

src: iimvakatjhibukeli zangaphetjheya aziwu vali umlomo ngokugoma kwekhethwapha dale hes izakhamuzi zamalokitjhi akhele umasipala wegeorge osetjingalanga kapa zizokwenzela iimvaka tjhibukeli zamazwe wanga phandle ubusuku engeze za bukhohlwa ngokuzilungisela iimbiliboqo zesidlo santa mbama ngaphasi komzamo sisungulo wabo othi dine with locals, okutjho bona thabela isidlo sabapheki be khethwapha.
tgt: vho dale hes vhadzulapo vha ḓoro bo ṱhukhu vha masi pala wa george ngei kapa vhukovhela vha ḓo ṋe tshedza vhaendelamashango vha bvaho seli ha lwanzhe vhusiku vhune vha ḓo vhu elelwa nga kha vhurangeli ha "dine with locals".

src: umzamosisu ngulo lo uyingcenye yamahle lo wokugidinga inyanga yezevakatjhobukelo, lapha umasipala akhethe khona ii nqhema ezisithandathu ezive la elokitjhini lethembalethu nelepacaltsdorp ukobana bazokusingatha iimvaka tjhibukeli zangaphetjheya ba ziphekele iimbiliboqo zesidlo santambama bebazithabise ngokunandisa okuhluka hlukeneko.
tgt: vhurangeli ndi tshipiḓa tsha u pembelela ṅwedzi wa vhuendelamashango he ma sipala a nanga zwigwada zwa rathi ḓoroboni ṱhukhu dza thembalethu na pacaltsdo rp u vha ṋemuṱa wa vhae ndelamashango vha bva ho seli ha lwanzhe vhane vha ḓo ṋetshedzwa vhu mvumvusi na zwiḽiwa zwo fhelelaho.

src: njengendlela yokuzilungi selela ukuthwala umnyanya, iinqhema zikhambele iimfu ndobandulo ezifundisa ngezevakatjhobukelo ne zokupheka.
tgt: kha ndugiselo dza u vha ṋemuṱa, zwigwada zwo dzhenela zwipiḓa zwa vhu gudisi zwi elanaho na zwa vhuendelamashango na zwa u ṋetshedza zwiḽiwa.

src: uno mzamo entile (oneminya ka ema31) ulilunga lesinye seenqhema ezisithandathu nomdosiphambili weexplore our hood, esethembalethu.
tgt: vho nomzamo entile (31) vhane vha vha tshipiḓa tsha zwigwada zwa rathi, vha ranga phanḓa tshigwada tsha explore our hood, ngei thembalethu.

src: unomzamo wasungula i explore our hood ngomnqo pho wokwakha umoya wobu nye esiphandeni segeorge.
tgt: vho entile vho thoma explore our hood vha tshi itela u alusa muya wa vhuthihi ngei george.

src: "salimuka bona kunoku ngasebenzisani nokwahluka na phakathi kwemiphakathi yesiphande segeorge.
tgt: "ro wana uri hu na u fha ndekana vhukati ha zwi tshavha zwo fhambanaho zwa george.

src: sine sifiso sokobana inga abantu bangeza emalokitjhini wethu bazokubona ubuhle obunga ka besiko lamaxhosa eliza balethela ilwazi abalitlhoga ko," kwalathisa unomzamo.
tgt: ri tama uri vhathu vha ḓe doroboni ṱhukhu u ri vha vhone uri ri na mvelele yo khwaṱhaho ya tshixhosa na uri vha ḓe vha tou tshe nzhema nga vhone vhaṋe, vho ralo vho entile.

src: njengesakhelelo senya nga yezevakatjhobukelo, isiqhemesi sesiqede iingaba zokuthoma zokulingelela, zisingatha amalunga aziimva katjhibukeli kilomkhakha.
tgt: ro livha kha ṅwedzi wa vhuendelamashango, tshi gwada tsho no fhedza ndingo mbili nga nḓila kwao, vha tshi khou vha ṋemuṱa wa miraḓo i dalaho ya nḓowetshumo ya vhuendelamashango.

src: ukutjhelela phezu kwamagagasi (isurfing) kususa abentwana ekuyemayemeyi endleleni vuyo ndlovu isurfing namkha uku tjhelela phezu kwa magagasi welwandle akusimdlalo wokuzithabu lula nokuzithabisa kwaphe la ebantwini abasesebatjha abahlala ekabeni yedoro bha ledurban kodwana kubuye kube siqedasizu ngu sokubalekela imikghwa emimbi.
tgt: vho vuyo ndlovu usuvha nṱha ha maḓi a u tou vha muta mbo fhedzi kana tshithu tsha u ḓimvumvusa kha vhaswa vhane vha dzula tshivhindini tsha ḓorobo ya durban ngei kwazulunatal, fhedzi zwi dovha zwa vha u tinya u ita zwiito zwo bvaho.

src: isurfers not street chi ldren yihlangano enikela ngeemfundo zokutjhelela phezu kwamagagasi zasi mahla ebantwaneni abahla la eendleleni nelutjha eladi nywa amathuba namkha elitlhogako elihlala ekabeni yedorobha.
tgt: "surfers not street chi ldren" ndi dzangano ḽine ḽa ṋetshedza ngudo dza mu tambo wa u enda nga maga belo nga fhedzi kha vhana vha dzulaho zwiṱaraṱani na vhaswa vho thudzelwaho thungo vha wanalaho vhuka ti ha ḓorobo.

src: ihlangano le yenza bunqo pha umsebenzi wokupheli swa kwabentwana abanga namakhaya begodu iqinise kisa bona ilutjha lenza izinto ezithetjha ngepilo yalo.
tgt: dzangano ḽi tou vha phin dulo thwii ya u lwisana na zwa u shaya mahaya ha vha na na u vhona uri vhaswa vha ite zwiṅwe zwithu zwavhuḓi nga matshilo avho.

src: umasipala wethekwini mhlaphanje usekele ihlanga no le ngokuyinikela ama bhodi ali10 wokutjhelela phezu kwamagagasi.
tgt: masipala wa ethekwini zwenezwino wo tikedza dzangano iḽi nga u lambedza mabodo a fumi a mutambo wa u enda nga magabelo.

src: amabhodi la akhiwe ngo mnqopho wokuthuthukisa begodu akhiwe ngematheri yali ewanzinzisako ukwe nzela bona kusizeke abatjhe leli phezu kwamagagasi abasafundako bona bahlale ngaphezulu kwesilinganiso esithileko samanzi.
tgt: mabodo o itwa hu na ndivho ya mveledziso na hone o itwa nga bontshi ḽine ḽa thusa vhatambi vha u enda nga magabelo vhane vha kha ḓi tou guda uri vha dzule vho papamala.

src: umphathi kamasipa la womnyango wezoku thuthukiswa kwemidla lo nokuzithabisa uteddi adams uthe amabhodi la azokusiza abatjheleli phezu kwamagagasi abanetjisakalo kilomkhakha.
tgt: mulanguli wa muhasho wa mveledziso ya vhumvumvu si na mitambo kha masipala vho teddi adams vho ri ma bodo a ḓo thusa kha vha re na dzangalelo ḽa u guda muta mbo wa u enda nga maga belo.

src: "umnikelo uyingcenye yamaqhinga kamasipala wokuthuthukisa imidlalo nokuqinisekisa bona ilutjha loke, ngaphandle kokuqa la umbala nezinga lepilo yomuntu, liyazifinyelela izakhiwo ezizobasiza bona bathuthuke emidlalweni yabo abayikhethileko."
tgt: "ndambedzo ndi tshipiḓa tsha nzudzanyo ya masipala tsha u bveledza mitambo na u vhona uri vhaswa vhoṱhe, zwi sa yi nga murafho na maimo, vha a kona u swike la zwishumiswa zwine zwa ḓo vha thusa u bvelela kha khoudu dza mitambo dze vha ḓinangela.

src: ulangelihle nkosi (one minyaka eli16) omtjhe leli phezu kwamagagasi uthokoze umasipala ngomni kelo abawufunyeneko.
tgt: "langelihle nkosi (16) ane a vha mutambi wa u enda nga magabelo o livhuwa masipa la kha ndambedzo.

src: "ngiyakuthabela ukuza eemfundweni zokutjhelela phezu kwamagagasi ngo mbana ziyangisiza bona ngi hlale ngiphilile bengakhe kile ngokomzimba begodu ngiyakuthabela ukutjhelela phezu kwamagagasi."
tgt: "ndi ḓifhelwa nga u ḓa kha ngudo dza mutambo wa u enda nga magabelo ngauri dzi a nthusa uri ndi dzule ndo linganela nahone ndi ḓi fhelwa nga u namela maga belo."

src: unko si ukhuthaze abanye aba tjheleli phezu kwamagagasi abasafundako bona beze be godu bazibandakanye be bafunde ngokuzimisela.
tgt: nkosi o ṱuṱuwedza vhaṅwe vha re na dzangalelo ḽa u guda mutambo wa u enda nga magabelo uri vha ḓe vha dzhenele nahone vha gude zwinzhi nga ha mutambo wa u enda nga magabelo.

src: umnyango wezamaphilo elimpopo ubeka ukumunyisa ezingeni eliphezulu kanego lewele nomore matshediso ukumunyisa kuqa katheke khulu eku thuthukiseni ipilo yomntwana nekunikeleni izakhamzimba emasaneni, kodwana abomma abanengi abasebenzako bahlangabeza na nobudisi bokuragela pha mbili nokumunyisa ngemva kokobana babuyele emse benzini kungaphela isikhathi samalanga wobudzwedzi.
tgt: vha mutakalo vha limpopo vha vhea u mamisa kha vhuṅwe vhuimo ha nṱha vho kanego lewele na vho more matshediso umamisa ndi zwa ndeme kha mve ledziso ya mutaka lo wa ṅwana na pfushi kha vhushie, fhedzi vhomme vhanzhi vha wana zwi tshi vha konḓela u isa phanḓa na maitele aya musi vha tshi vhuya u bva maḓuvhani a u dzedzefhala.

src: lokhu kubangelwa kukoba na eendaweni ezinengi zoku sebenzela azikho iindawo ezihlelelwe abomma koba nyana bangakwazi uku yokukghama namkha ba munyise abentwana babo ngesikhathi basemsebe nzini.
tgt: hezwi zwi itwa ngau ri a huna fhethu havhuḓi mishumoni minzhi ha uri vhadzadze vha kone u ha mulela mikando kana u mamisa vhana vhavho nga tshifhinga tsha mushumo, vha swika hune vha kulea nungo u isa phanḓa na u mamisa ngauri vha fhedza tshifhinga tshinzhi vha mushumoni vha si na vha na vhavho.

src: ngalokho baphelelwa mamandla wokuragela pha mbili nokumunyisa ngomba na baqeda isikhathi esinengi basemsebenzini bangasi se makhaya nabentwababo.
tgt: kha ndingedzo ya u amba nga ha khaedu iyi, muhasho wa mutakalo wa limpopo wo rwela ṱari lufhera lwa u tou thoma lwa u hamule la mikando na u mamisa ngomu ofisini dzavho.

src: emzamweni wokulungi sa isitjhijilwesi, umnyango wezamaphilo elimpopo uhlome emaofisini wawo iziko engakhenge khelaba khona lokumunyisela noku kghama.
tgt: lufhera lwa u mamise la lwo rwelwa ṱari nga mec dokotela vho phophi ramathuba.

src: izikweli lokumunyisela lahlonywa ngusomkhandlu udorh.
tgt: lwo irwa dzina ḽa mma vho albertina sisulu vhane miṅwaha yavho ya ḓana na yone ya khou pembelelwa ṋaṅwaha.

src: kunqotjhwe ngezikweli bona kungasizeki kwaphela abomma abasebenzako, ko dwana kukhuthazeke ne minye iminyango yembu sweni bona isekele abomma abamunyisako ibe basemse benzini.
tgt: hu na fulufhelo ḽa uri lufhera ulwo a lu nga tou tikedza vhomme vha mami saho vhane vha shuma fhe dzi, hu dovha hafhu ha ṱuṱu wedzwa miṅwe mihasho u tikedza vhomme vha mami saho vha re mushumoni.

src: abasebenzi emnyangweni lo njenganje bavunyelwa bona abantu ababagade la namkha ababatjhejela abentwana bona banga balethela bona emsebenzi ni ngesikhathi samadina bona bazobamunyisa.
tgt: vhashumi muhashoni vha a kona u ita uri vhaleli vha ḓise vhana vhavho mushu moni nga tshifhinga tsha tshiswiṱulo uri vha mamisi we.

src: izi kweli lizokusetjenziswa godu bomma abafuna ukukgha ma ngesikhathi somsebenzi.
tgt: lufhera lu ḓo shumi swa nga vhomme vhane vha ṱoḓa u hamulela mikando nga tshifhinga tsha mushu mo.

src: omunye wabasebenzi e mnyangweni lo umpho ku tumela ongumma wamawele aneenyanga ezili11, umsa na nomntazana, ukuthabele khulu ukuhlonywa kwezi kweli.
tgt: muṅwe wa vhashumi vha muhasho vho mpho kutu mela, mme wa mafhaṱa a miṅwedzi ya 11, mutukana na musidzana, vho takalela tshishumiswa itsho.

src: "izikweli lokumunyisela lizokuba lisizo kithi sibo mma ngombana lizosini kela ithuba lokukghama u mkghado sitjhaphulukile sisendaweni ekhethekileko," kwatjho umma ukutumela.
tgt: "lufhera lwa u mamisela lu ḓo ri shumela sa vhomme ngauri lu ḓo ri ṋetshedza vho tshikhala tsha u ham ulela mikando yashu ro vho fholowa fhethu havhuḓi", vho ralo.

src: abomma abavakatjhela u mnyango baphethe amasana bo ngabonobangela abathi leko bazokuvunyelwa uku lisebenzisa izikweli, ba munyisele ngakilo.
tgt: vhomme vhane vha dale la muhasho vha na vhana vhavho vho ḓela zwiṅwev ho vha ḓo tendelwavho u shumisa lufhera u mamisa vhana vhavho.

src: usomkhandlu uramathu ba uthe izikweli lokumunyi sela, ialbertina sisulu linge nye yezinto ezihle ezenziwe sifundesi.
tgt: mec vho ramathuba vho amba uri lufhera lwa u mamisela lwa albertina si sulu ndi luṅwe lwa lushaka lwalwo lu lwoṱhe kha vun du.

src: usomkhandlu unethemba lokobana ukuhlonywa kwe hlelweli kuzokuba nomthe lela omuhle emizamweni yokukhuthaza nokuvike la isiko lokumunyisa ibele ngomnqopho wokufinyelela ekuthuthukisweni kwepilo yomntwana ibe sezingeni elihle.
tgt: vho mec vha fulufhela uri vhurangeli uvhu vhu ḓo thusedza kha nyaluso na tsireledzo ya maitele kwao a u mamisa hu na ndivho ya u swikela mveledziso ya mu takalo wa ṅwana ya khwi ṋesa.

src: "ibisi lebele linezakhamzi mba ezipheleleko ezitlhogwa lisana begodu angeze zakhi qizwa ngebisi lokwenziwa," kwatjho usomkhandlu.
tgt: "mafhi a kha ḓamu a na pfushi dzoṱhe dzine dza ṱoḓiwa nga vhushie nahone a dzi koni u bveledzwa nga u tou itwa, vho ralo vho mec.

src: usomkhandlu wezamaphilo esifundeni selimpopo udorh.
tgt: mec wa mutakalo wa limpopo dokotela vho phophi ramathuba vho tangwa nga vhomme vha khou mamisaho vhe vha ḓa hu tshi rwelwa ṱari.

src: ukutlolisa umtjhado wesintu kuvikela imindeni dale hes esewula afrika, imitjha do yesintu iyemukeleka njengengcenye yamasiko namagugu.
tgt: u ṅwalisa mbingano ya mvelele zwi tsireledza miṱa dale hes mbingano dza sialala ndi tshi piḓa tshi ṱa nganedzwaho tsha mvelele na vhufa afrika tshipembe.

src: nokho kuqakathekile ukuyelela bonyana imitjhado le kufuze yenzi we ngefanelo nangokomthetho kobana kuvikeleke amalungelo wendoda newomfazi abatjhadileko.
tgt: fhedziha, ndi zwa ndeme u dzhiela nṱha uri mbinga no idzi dzi tea u itwa nga nḓila i pfadzaho nahone i re mulayoni u itela uri pfanelo dza munna na mufumaka dzi dzi vhe dzo tsireledzea.

src: umnqophisi kezomthetho kukomitjhini yezokulinga na ngokobulili umarissa van niekerk uhlathulula ngemitjhado yesintu nangamaphuzu aqakathekileko ekufuze ayele lwe babantu.
tgt: mulanguli muhulwane wa zwa mulayo kha khomishini ya ndinganelo ya zwa mbeu, vho marissa van niekerk vha ṱalutshedza nga ha mbingano ya sialala na dziṅwe mbuno dza ndeme dzine dza tea u dzhielwa nṱha.

src: vuk: iyini imitjhado yesintu?
tgt: vuk: mbingano dza sialala ndi mini?

src: mvn: imitjhado yesintu ngileyo eyenziwa ngokulandela ikambiso namasiko ahlonitjhwa masewula afrika.
tgt: mvn: mbingano dza sialala dzi itwa zwi tshi elana na mulayo na maitele a sialala a tevhedzwaho vhukati ha maafrika tshipembe.

src: vuk: ngimiphi imithetho ekufuze ilandelwe nakuragwa imitjhado le?
tgt: vuk: ndi ifhio milayo ine mbingano idzi dza i tevhedza?

src: mvn: imitjhado yesintu ilawulwa mthetho wokuhlonitjhwa kwemitjhado yesintu, (umthetho nomboro 120 womnyaka we1998).
tgt: mvn: mbingano dza sialala dzi laulwa nga mulayo wa recognition of customary marriages , 120 wa 1998. ṱhoḓea dzi tevhelaho dzi tea u swikelwa: ■ avho vhavhili vha tea u tendelana u malana.

src: kunemibandela elandelako ekufuze ilandelwe: ■ kufuze abatjhadi bavume lane ngokuthathana.
tgt: ■ avho vhavhili vha tea u vha vha na miṅwaha i fhiraho 18, nga nnḓa ha musi vhabebi kana vhaunḓi vho tendelwaho nga mulayo vho tenda arali munwe kana vhoṱhe vha vhaṱuku.

src: ■ kufuze abatjhadi babe neminyaka engaphezu lu kwe18, ngaphandle kwalokha nayibe ababelethi nanyana abatlhogomeli bangokomthetho banikele abatjhadako imvumo lokho omunye wabatjhadako ane minyaka engaphasi keli18.
tgt: ■ mbingano i tea u ṅwa liswa kha muhasho wa muno miṅwedzi i swikaho miraru avho vhavhili vho malana u itela u tsireledza pfanelo dzavho, vhana na miraḓo ya muṱa arali ha vha na ṱhalano na lufu.

src: ■ kufuze umtjhado loyo utloliswe emnyangweni wezangekhaya zingakapheli iinyanga ezintathu ukuze kuvikelwe iinzuzo ezifanele indoda, umfazi, abentwana namalunga womndeni na kungahlukanwa nanyana kube khona ohlongakalako.
tgt: ■ musi hu tshi ṅwaliswa mbingano, avho vha malanaho vha tea u vha vho fara basa na thendelano ya u malana (arali i hone).

src: okungasenani ufakazi munye ovela emi ndenini yomibili kufuze abe khona.
tgt: hu tea u vha na ṱhanzi nthihi nthihi u bva kha miṱa ya avho vhavhili vha mala naho.

src: ■ indoda efuna ukuthatha umfazi wesibili ngekambiso yomtjhado wesintu kufuze yenze isibawo ekhotho.
tgt: ■ munna ane a ṱoḓa u mala muṅwe mufumakadzi wa vhuvhili nga maitele a mbingano ya sialala u tea u ita khumbelo khothe.

src: ■ abantu abatjhade isikhuwa ngokomthetho abakavume leki ukungena ekambisweni yomtjhado wesintu.
tgt: ■ vhathu vho malanaho nga nḓila ya tshikhuwa a vha koni u malana nga nḓila ya sialala.

src: umthetho wokuhlonitjhwa kwemitjhado yesintu uthi bobabili abathetheneko banamalungelo alinganako njengendoda nomfazi.
tgt: i sumbedza uri avho vhavhili vho malanaho vha na pfanelo dzi linganaho sa munna na mufumakadzi.

src: vuk: ngiyiphi imiraro ngemitjha do yesintu?
tgt: vuk: ndi dzifhio thaidzo dzine dza vha hone kha mbingano ya sialala?

src: mvn: ukungatlolisi umtjhado kuneenkinga ezimaphorodlha.
tgt: mvn: arali mbingano idzi dza sa ṅwaliswa, dzi a vhanga thaidzo khulu vhukuma.

src: ukutlolisa umtjhado kubufaka zi bokobana abantu batjhadile, ukuveza ubufakazi bomtjhado ongakatloliswa kubudisi.
tgt: u dzi ṅwalisa zwi ṋea vhuṱanzi ha uri avho vhathu vho malana.

src: ukungakatlolisi umtjhado kuzakwenza kube budisi bonyana ikhotho ikghone ukuvikela amalungelo namkha iimfanelo zabatjhadi nakungahlukanwa, nakwabiwa ilifa likamufi namalungelo wabentwana newamalunga womndeni.
tgt: u bvisela khagala vhuṱanzi ha uri mbingano i songo ṅwaliswaho ndi yone zwi a konḓa.

src: okhunye okumraro kukoba na abantu abatjhada isintu abahlukanisi hlangana kokwahlukana nokunghalelana.
tgt: izwi zwi kundisela khothe maanḓa a u tsireledza pfanelo dza avho vho malanaho, ndaka ya mufu na pfanelo dza vhana na muṱa.

src: ukutlolisa umtjhado wesintu kuvikela imindeni dale hes njengombana iimfu neko zepilo sezibiza kangaka, urhulu mende usebenza ngamandla ukwehlisa ubudisi bezeemali emahlombe wamasewula afrika ngokuphelisa intela keminye imikhiqizo yokugoma kwangamalanga.
tgt: muvhuso u khou ḓo ṋetshedza thikhedzo miṱani dale hes musi zwithu zwi tshi khou ḓura zwi tshi ya, muvhuso u khou shuma nga maanḓa u fhungudza vhuleme ho hwedzwaho maafrika tshipembe zwao nga u bvisa muthe lo kha zwiṅwe zwa zwirengwa nga vhurengi.

src: ukupheliswa kwentela kunqotjhwe ngakho ukwehlisa ubudisi emindenini enengenisomali ephasi ephelela phezu kweensetjenziswa zangekhaya.
tgt: zwa u bviswa ha mithelo zwo thomiwa u itela u ṱhaḓu la miṱa ine ya hola masheleni maṱuku, ine ya shumisa mashele ni manzhi kha zwishumiswa zwa hayani.

src: ukugoma okungabhadeliswa intela akunamthelontengo (ivat) wokugoma okuli15%.
tgt: zwirengwa zwi si na muthelo a zwi ingiwi muthelo wa 15% ya vat.

src: lokhu kunqotjhwe ngakho ukusiza amasewula afrika bona onge imali.
tgt: izwi zwo ite lwa u thusa maa frika tshipembe uri vha vhulunge masheleni.

src: kunemihlobo yokugoma oku sisekelo namkha kwangamalanga eli19 engakafakelwa ivat, lokhu kufaka hlangana ipu phu, istampa, ireyisi, uburotho obunzotho, iinthelo, imirorho, iimfesi zebhlege namaqanda.
tgt: hu na zwiḽi wa zwa 19 zwa ndeme zwine zwa si ingiwe vat zwine zwa kate la: mavhe le, tshi ḓammba, raisi, vhurotho ha buraweni, mitshelo, miro ho, khovhe na makumba.

src: ngaphezulu kwalokho, iinsetjenziswa ezifana nedi zili, ipetroli nepharafeni nezinye iinsizakusetjenziswa ezifaka hlangana amahlalo aqatjhiswako, iin thuthi ezikhamba endleleni neentimela, iindingo zezefundo nazo azizokubhadeliswa ivat.
tgt: nga nṱha ha izwo, zwi bveledzwa zwi fanaho na dizili, piṱiro lo na pharafeni, khathihi na dziṅwe tshumelo dzi fanaho na vhudzulo ha u rennda, vhuendi ha tshiporoni na ha badani na tshumelo dza pfunzo na zwone a zwi i ngiwi vat.

src: ngomhlolanja urhulu mende wamemezela bonyana uzokukhuphula ivat ukusu kela ku14% ukufikela ku15%.
tgt: nga ṅwedzi wa luhuhi muvhuso wo ita nḓivhadzo ya uri u ḓo engedza vat u bva kha phesenthe dza 14 u swika kha 15 phesenthe.

src: urhulumende utjhejile bonya na imindeni etlhagako izokuba ngaphasi kwelikhulu igandelelo lezeemali.
tgt: mu vhuso wa dovha wa dzhiela nṱha uri miṱa i shayaho i ḓo vha i fhasi ha mutsiko mu hulu wa masheleni.

src: njengeqhinga lokwehlisa iimfuneko zepilo ezibiza kanga ka, ungqongqotjhe wezeema li unhlanhla nene ujamise iphaneli ethwese umsebenzi wokwethula iintjhukumiso ngeensetjenziswa zangekhaya ekufuze zingabhadeliswa ivat.
tgt: u fhungudza mutsiko uyu wa zwa masheleni, minista wa gwama vho nhlahla nene vho ta tshi gwada tshine tsha ḓo ita themendelo dza uri ndi zwifhio zwiṅwe zwishumiswa zwa miṱani zwine zwa sa ḓo badeliswa muthelo.

src: ngemva kwerhubhululo elinabileko nemikhulumiswano nomphakathi, iphaneli le itjhu kumise bonyana kungezelelwe ngezinye iinsetjenziswa erhelweni.
tgt: nga murahu ha ṱhoḓisiso yo fhelelaho na vhukwamani na tshitshavha, tshigwada tsho themendela zwibveledzwa zwine zwa tea u engedzwa kha mutevhe wa zwibveledzwa zwi sa bedeliswi muthelo.

src: usithibe uphila kamnandi ije anobuswephe (ialbinism) galoome shopane ulerato sithibe ungumma ono buswephe.
tgt: sithibe u khou tshila zwavhuḓi na vhuaḽibino.

src: uphila ngokuzikhakhazisa ije anombala omhlophe angavumeli ukuninwa bona kumenze lokho abantu abambiza ngakho.
tgt: galoome shopane lerato sithibe ndi mu fumakadzi ane a khou tshila na vhuaḽibino.

src: usithibe (oneminyaka ema28) obuya ekroonstad esefreyistata uthi ubujamo bakhe bulifuzo lapho umuntu aneketjezi elincani lemelanin ekungi yo enikela umba la wesikhumba, iinhluthu namkha/kunye namehlo.
tgt: sithibe (28) u bva kroonstad kha ḽa free state , u ṱalutshedza uri nyimele yawe i pfukiselwa nga dzidzhini, hune muthu a vha na melanini ya muvhala ṱhukhu yo vhumbeaho ngomu kha lukanda, mavhudzi na/kana maṱo.

src: "asisiso isihlahla nofana abantu belinye iphasi njengalokha badlumbana bonyana sinjalo.
tgt: "a ri tshioro kana tshithu tshi bvaho kha ḽiṅwe ḽifhasi sa zwine vhathu vha ri dzhiisa zwone.

src: ungunomhlekhabo osebenzisa ifetjheni ukuyeleli sa ngabantu bebala begodu umtjhotjhozeli wamajima ayelelisa ngabantu abakhubazekileko befreyistata.
tgt: ndi ralunako ane a shumisa fesheni u ita tsivhudzo nga ha vhuaḽibi no, a dovha a vha muimeleli wa vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali ngei free state .

src: uthi wakhulela emndenini onethando ongakhange umnine namkha umenze azizwe ahlukile kabanye nanyana angathandwa ngenca yokuba nobuswephe.
tgt: uri o aluwa kha muṱa wa lu funo we wa si ite uri a pfe o fhambana kana u sa funwa nga nṱhani ha vhuaḽibino hawe.

src: "gade ngingazwisisi bona kubayini umbala wesikhumba sami uhlukile kewabanye abantu, qobe nangiphumela ngaphandle abantu gade bangibiza ngamaga nyana bangihlahlele amehlo inga ngiliphandle.
tgt: "ndo vha ndi sa ḓivhi uri ndi ngani muvhala wa lukanda lwanga wo fhambana na wa vhaṅwe vhathu na uri ndi ngani musi ndi tshi bvela nnḓa vhathu vha tshi mmbidza nga madzina o fhambanaho, vha ntsedza sa mutsinda".

src: "ukuninwa okukhambisana nobuswephe kwenza usithibe athokoze umndenakhe, ababuke bekazikhakhazise ngabo ngoku menza umma onesimilo nozithembako namhlanjesi.
tgt: samba ḽi kwamanywaho na vhuaḽibino ḽi ita uri sethibe a ṋaṋe u ḓihudza nga muṱa wa hawe, u sumbedza uri ndi vhone vho itaho uri a vhe mufumakadzi ane a vha na fulufhelo ḽine a vha naḽo namusi.

src: hlangana nezinto ezinengi usithibe aphumelele kizo nazikhakhazisa ngazo kufaka hlangana ukuthumba kwakhe iphaliswano likanomhlekhabo wefreyistata imiss free state albinism 2018 nokukhethelwa ukuba mphalisani emzombeni wokugcina weface of free state fashion week 2018. njengombana ukhukhula mungu ayinyanga yokuyeleli sa ngobuswephe usithibe uthi uzokuthaba khulu ukubona abantu abanengi abanobuswephe baphumela tjhatjhalazi benze izinto ezikulu ebubulweni labonomhlek habo nakeminye imikhakha.
tgt: zwiṅwe zwe sithibe a zwi swikela zwi katela u wina tshi phuga tsha u vha " miss free state albinism 2018" na u nangi wa sa muṅwe wa vho swikela ho kha luṱa lwa u fhedzisela kha muṱatisano wa u vha " face of free state fashion week 2018".

src: koke otlhoga ukukwazi ngokusungula ibhizinisi yeb&b dale hes ingabe ufuna ukuzenzela ingenisomali ngokuqa tjhisela iimvakatjhi amalalo, ubanikele indawo ehle abangahlala kiyo naba vakatjhele indawo yekhenu?
tgt: zwoṱhe zwine vha tea u zwi ḓivha nga u thoma b&b dale hes vha ṱoḓa u wana masheleni nga u ṋetshedza vhudzu lo vhaendelamashango, vha vha ṋea vhudzulo ha mai mo a nṱha musi vho dalela vhupo ha havho?

src: iindawo zebed and break fast (amab&b) zingezinye eziletha inzuzo ekubeni ngusomabubulo emkhakheni wezamavakatjhobukelo.
tgt: zwiimiswa zwa vhueḓelo na vhuragane (b&b) ndi zwiṅwe zwa nḓila dzine dza vhuedza vhuku ma arali vha tshi ṱoḓa u vha mubindudzi kha nḓowetshu mo ya vhuendelamashango.

src: na khu ekufanele ukwazi ngoku zisungulela ib&b.
tgt: zwoṱhe zwine vha tea u zwi ḓivha nga u thoma b&b yavho khezwi.

src: iyini ib&b?
tgt: b&b ndi mini?

src: ngokomkhandlu wezamazinga kezevakatjho we sewula afrika (itourism grading council of south africa), amab&b asiza nga malalo ajayelekileko aneensiza ezingafaki uburhiyarhiya ezinikelwa ekhaya langeqadi.
tgt: u ya nga tourism grading council of south africa, b&b dzi ṋea vhudzulo vhunzhi hu si ha fomaḽa vhune ha vha na tshumelo ṱhukhu ine ya netshedzwa muḓini wa muthu.

src: ikamura ngayinye kufuze ibe nendawo yokuhlambela nendlwana, kufakwe neendle ko zesidlo sekuseni emalini ebhadelwako.
tgt: kamara iṅwe na iṅwe i tea u vha na zwishumiswa zwayo zwa u ṱambela, nahone vhuragane vhu tea u katelwa kha mitengo ya vhulalo.

src: amab&b afanele okungasenani abe namakamura wokulala amathathu.
tgt: b&b i nga vha na kamara dza vhueḓelo dza vhaeni dza tshivhalo tshi swikaho tharu.

src: nawadlula kilesi sibalo indawakho kufuze ifakwe emkhakheni weguest house .
tgt: arali ya vha na kamara dza vhaeni dzi fhiraho idzi, tshiimiswa tshavho tshi tea u ṱaluswa sa nnḓu ya vhaeni vha badelaho.

src: ngiyiphi ikambiso efanele uyilande le nawuzisungulela ib&b?
tgt: ndi afhio maga ane vha tea u a tevhedza uri vha thome b&b yavho?ḽiga ḽa u thoma ndi u dalela masipala wapo wa havho u itela u ṅwalisela u wana then delo ya u shumisa nnḓu yavho sa tshiimiswa tsha vhubindu dzi ha vhueḓelo.

src: kungenzeka utlhoge imvumo yabomakhelwana bakho, nokwazisa umphakathi ngemikhangiso, nayibe baneqhinga lokunghonghoyila.
tgt: vha nga ṱoḓa thendelo kha vhaṋe vha nnḓu dza tsini, na u anḓadza nḓivhadzo u itela u ḓivhadza tshitshavha, u itela arali vha tshi nga ita khanedzo.

src: ngemva kokufumana imvumo kamasipala kuza fanela wanelise iindingo ze zomthetho ezithileko.
tgt: musi vho wana thendelo ha masipala, vha ḓo lavhalelwa u swikela dziṅwe ṱhoḓea dza mulayo.

src: izinto eziqakathekileko ofanele uzitjhejeindawo – indawo ozokuhloma kiyo ib&b yakho iqakatheke khulu.
tgt: zwa ndeme zwine vha tea u zwi dzhiela nṱhafhethuvhupo – fhethuvhupo ha b&b yavho ndi ha ndeme vhukuma.

src: nawuhlala endaweni engadosi iimvakatjhi, kuzoku ba budisi ukuphumelelisa ibubulo lakho.
tgt: arali vha tshi dzula vhuponi vhu sa kungi vhaendelamashango, zwi nga konḓa u ita vhubindudzi vhu vhuedzaho.

src: amadoda avulelana isifu ba: yiba yindoda msanami vukuzenzele unnamed lokhuya u*tshepo mo fokeng nakanetjhumi leminyaka, wadlula ebudisini bokubona isehlaka lo sokukatwa kwakadadwabo owayeneminyaka eli17.
tgt: nyambedzano vhukati ha vhanna: ivhani mun na mutukana wanga vukuzenzele unnamed musi *tshepo mo fokeng a na miṅwaha ya 10, o tou zwi vhona nga maṱo musi khaladzi awe muhulwane wa miṅwaha ha 17 a tshi khou tzhipiwa.

src: nanyana umkati kada dwabo owayehlomile atje la umsanyana lo ukuthi abhambalale angaqali okwe nzekako, kodwana usa wuzwa umkhosi kadadwabo nanamhlanjesi.
tgt: musi mupondi o ḓiṱamaho o vhudza kutukana uri ku lale fhasi ku sa lavhelese zwine a khou ita, ku kha ḓi pfa mukosi wa khaladzi yakwo na zwino.

src: ngemva kokukata, umuntu loyo wabalayela ukuthi bagi jime bangaqali emva.
tgt: nga murahu ha u vha ṱasela, munna o ḓo vha ṋea ndaela vhuvhili havho uri vha gidime vha sa sedzi murahu.

src: bathi basakhamba kabuhlungu njalo basiya ekhaya, udadwa bo wambawa ukuthi amthe mbise ukuthi angeze atjela muntu ngokukatwa kwakhe.
tgt: musi vhe nḓilani ya u ya hayani vha tshi khou pfa vhuṱungu, khaladzi awe o ḓo mu anisa uri a songo vhuya a vuwa o vhudza muthu nga ha u tzhipiwa.

src: utshepo wasigcina isithe mbiso sakhe, kodwana ifihlo leyo yamhlalisa kabuhlungu kumbi.
tgt: mofokeng o ḓo ima kha ipfi ḽawe ḽa u sa vhudza muthu nga zwo bvele laho fhedzi tshiphiri tsho ḓo mu ita uri a vhe na vengo.

src: "nangikhulako ngangiphele ngimbone ekatlehong umkati owakata udadwethu; lokhoke bekwenza ihliziywami ibe nzi ma khulu.
tgt: "musi ndi tshi khou aluwa, ndo vha ndi tshi mu vhona mutzhipi henefha katlehong zwe zwa tou ṋaṋisa mbiti dzanga.

src: azange ngikghone ukwamukela ukuthi angase aphunyurhe njalo emlandwini awenzako."
tgt: ndo vha ndi tshi kundelwa u ṱanganedza uri ha ngo gwe vhelwa zwiito zwawe.

src: wathi angakhula, selamu muntu omutjha onamandla, utshepo azange asakghona ukubamba ukusilingeka kwakhe, ngalokhoke wayethi qho nakahlangana nomkati kada dwabo lo, ambethe.
tgt: "musi o no aluwa, o no vha muṱhanngana are na maanḓa, mofokeng o swika he a vha a si tsha kona u kutela vengo ḽawe, a fhedza a tshi vho rwa mupondi we a tzhipa khaladzi yawe musi a tshi ṱangana nae.

src: wathi kanti ngemvelwakhe wayemntwana owayephila ngokuthula, wa gcina selamumuntu omutjha ohlala anegwebu.
tgt: a shanduka u bva kha u vha ṅwana o lugaho are na mulalo a vho vha muswa o sinyuwaho.

src: kokuthoma, wayebusiswe ngoyise nomna kwabo ababesazi ukuthi intu rhu ayisipendulo, begodu nanyana babengazi ukuthi utshepo wenziwa yini abe nenturhu ngendlela ayenga kho, kodwana baphumelela ukumbuyisela endleleni elu ngileko.
tgt: zwithu zwivhili zwe zwa phu lusa mofokeng kha nḓila dzawe dza khakhathi.

src: kwesibili kwaba kulamula kwepholisa lesiporweni ela mbona mhlazana abetha umka ti kadadwabo kokugcina.
tgt: tshavhuvhili ho vha thusedzo ya pholisa ḽa raliwei we a vhona ṱhaselo ya u fhedzisela nga mofokeng a tshi khou rwa mutzhipi wa khaladzi awe a mu vunḓa mulenzhe.

src: umkati loyo wasala ephuke umlenze, kodwana utshepo wathi nakahlathululela ama pholisa ukuthi umuntu loyo wenzani ngemva kweminyaka leyo yoke, abona ukuthi akamlise, amyelelisa nje kwaphela.
tgt: fhedzi musi mofokeng a tshi ṱalutshedza pholisa ḽa raliwei zwe munna uyu a ita miṅwahani yo fhiraho yoṱhe, vho ḓo dzhia tsheo ya u sa fara muṱhanngana vha tou mu kaidza na u litsha a ṱuwa.

src: umkati wasiwa esibhedlela, kodwana azange avule umla ndu wokulinyazwa.
tgt: mutzhipi o ḓo hwalelwa siba dela fhedzi a si vhige mulandu.

src: wathi ngesikhathi amfundi epretoria technikon, wafaka isandla sokusungula isiqhema sokulimukisa nokuphandlulu la abantu abaduna ngendima ekufuze bayilime emphakathi ni, kwabe kwathi ngomnyaka wee2004, watlolisa ihlangano, isouth african men’s action group (isamag), yaba yihla ngano engasiyombuso ne ngenzi inzuzo.
tgt: ṱhaselo kha vhafumakadzi dzi kha ḓi vha zwithu zwo ḓowele aho, fhedzi, mofokeng zwo vha zwi tshi mu vhilaedza vhuku ma.

src: namhlanje isamag ine tjhumi labasebenzi abasebenza kiyo ngokupheleleko, kantike isebenza egauteng, efreyista ta, etlhagwini tjingalanga, elimpopo nempumalanga.
tgt: musi e mutshudeni wa pre toria technikon, o ḓo thusa kha u thoma kiḽabu ya u tsivhudza vhanna nga ha vhuḓifhinduleli havho tshitshavhani nahone nga 2004, o ḓo ṅwalisa tshi gwada tsha south african men's action group (samag) sa dza ngano ḽi si ḽa muvhuso.

src: "igama lesingisi elithi real nalitlharululwako ngokwa maledere lihlathulula lokhu: responsible (yiba nokuziphe ndulela), enlightened (phucuki leko), archetypal (yiba sibone lo), loving (yiba nethando)" kutjho utshepo.
tgt: ṋamusi, samag tshi na vhashumi vha tshoṱhe vha 10 na u vha na madavhi ngei gauteng, free state, devhula vhukovhe la, limpopo na mpumalanga.

src: babebethwa nababa ntwana, ngalokhoke ababoni ukuthi kubayini bangaka faneli bakhulise abentwaba bo ngendlela abakhuliswe ngayo nabo.
tgt: tsho ḓiimisela u ṱuṱuwedza tshanduko ya matshilisano.

src: ngokwamasiko amanengi kubusa amado da, kanti abantu abasikazi bona bathathwa ukuthi bayafana bebayalingana nabentwana, ngalokho kulu ngile ukuthi bakhalinywe nge ndlela efanako nekukhali nywa ngayo abenwana," kutjho utshepo.
tgt: mulaedza watsho muhulwane ndi ‘vhanna vha vhukuma a vha tambudzi vhafumakadzi’.
