src: woke umuntu unendima eku fuze ayilime ekutjhugululeni iinkolelo nengqondo eyakhe lelwa ebantwini, kuhlathulula utshepo.
tgt: "vhukuma’ zwi amba u vha na vhuḓifhinduleli, u vha na nḓivho, u vha tsumbo yavhuḓi na u vha na lufuno, "o ralo mofokeng.

src: ukholwa ukuthi abantwana kufuze bakhuliswe ngapha ndle kokubafaka ummoya wokuthi abantwana ababe ntazana kufuze balandele ikambiso nendlela ethileko yepilo kuthi nabesana bala ndele ikambiso nendlela yokuphila ebekelwe bona bodwa.
tgt: "vhunzhi ha vhanna vho ṱuṱuwedzwa nga mvelele ya uri vhathu vha tshinna ndi vhone vharangaphanḓa na u vha na maanḓa u fhira vhathu vha tshi fumakadzi.'

src: kufanele baphathwe njengabantwana, hayi ngo kuthi babentazana namkha babesana begodu abobaba ku fanele bazijayeze ukubamba indima ekukhulisweni nepi lweni yabentwababo.
tgt: vho rwiwa vha tshe vhana nahone a vha vhoni uri ndi ngani vha sa tei u alusa vha na vhavho nga maitele aneo a fa naho.

src: umtlhatlhana ojayelekileko utjhugululwe waba yindawo yokuphulula umzimba yomnono, ispa nonkululeko mathebula u thaini masakane uzenzele igama ngokutjhugulula umtlhatlhanakhe waba yindawo yokuphululela umzimba (ispa) .
tgt: mukhukhu zwawo wo shandu kiswa wa vha spa tsha maimo a nṱha vho nonkululeko mathebula thaini masakane o ḓiitela dzina nga u shandukisa mu khukhu wa vha spa tsha lu nako.

src: ibhizinisi kathaini, ivictory body and nail studio , esebo tshabelo efreyistata, ikhula nga mandla begodu idosa abantu abavela mibundu yoke abeza bazokutetenyiswa kilendawo yokuphululwa umzimba.
tgt: u bva botshabelo ngei free state nga vhudzulo, bindu ḽawe ḽine ḽa pfi, victory body and nail studio , ḽi khou aluwa nga luvhilo luhulu nahone ḽi khou kunga vhathu u bva kha masia oṱhe vhane vha ḓa u ne tuluswa na u nakiswa mi vhilini yavho.

src: wathoma ukuthengisa izitja zetupperware asese neminya ka eli19; njenganje, njengoba selaneminyaka ema28 nje, uthi kade aba netjisakalo yokuba nebhizinisi engeyakhe, njeke uthokoze khulu ukuthoma lelikhambo lebhizinisi alitho mileko.
tgt: u rengisa tupperware hawe a na miṅwaha ya 19, mufuma kadzi wa miṅwaha ya 28 o ri o vha a tshi dzulela u vha na vhudugambilu ha u vha na bindu ḽawe ene muṋe nahone o takala uri o dzhena kha lwendo ulu.

src: "ngathoma ngokusebenzela umuntu kilebhizinisi; kuku laphoke lapho ngathola khona ilimuko lokwenza umsebenzi lo," utjho ahlathulula, angeze lele ngokuthi wafunda iimfu ndo zecosmetology , emotheo tvet college esebloemfontein.
tgt: "ndo thoma nga u shumela muṅwe muthu kha nḓowe tshumo iyi, ndi hone he nda kona u wana tshenzhemo," a amba ngauralo, a ḓadzisa nga uri o gudela u vha cosmetolo gist kha motheo tvet college ngei bloemfontein.

src: ugcine selakulungele uku phuma azijamele yedwa, begodu solo kwalokho azange asaqala emva.
tgt: mafheleloni o ḓo vhona zwo tea uri a yo thoma ḽawe bindu nahone u bva zwenezwo ha ngo tsha dovha a sedza murahu.

src: ibhizinisi yakhe le ivala isikhala esikho na emakethe yebotshabelo, begodu amakhastamakhe amsekela ngokuthembeka aya ngokwanda.
tgt: bindu ḽawe ḽi vala tshikhala tsha makete ngei bo tshabelo nahone tshivhalo tsha khasitama dzi mu tikedzaho misi yoṱhe tshi khou aluwa.

src: ulungisa abantu iinzipho zemino (manicure) nezeenzwani (pedicure) abe aziphoritjhe, abathobe umzi mba ngokubaphulula, abahla mbise ubuso abe abezese nangezezeso zebusweni.
tgt: u ṋetshedza tshumelo dza u nakisa ṋala dza zwanḓani (manicures), u nakisa ṋala dza zwikunwe ( pedicures), u tsiḓu lula misipha ( massages), u bvisa mahaha a sa ṱoḓeiho ( waxing) na u kunakisa na u nakisa tshifhaṱuwo ( facials).

src: iinthombe zakhe zamhlapha azifode asespa sakhe somtlha tlhana azithumele eenkundleni zokuthintana zirhatjheke kizo zoke iinkundla zokuthintana.
tgt: zwifanyiso zwine a posa kha midia wa matshilisano zwa spa tsha u naka mukhukhuni zwo ḓo phaḓaladzwa zwenezwino u mona hoṱhe, vhathu vha tshi khou khoḓa vhutumbuli ha masakane na uri u tou vha tshiṱuṱuwedzi kha vhananya na vha ḽokhesheni.

src: abantu bayabuka, bababaza amandlakhe wokusungula, bathi usibonelo esihle esisikhu thazo ebantazaneni bemaloki tjhini.
tgt: kha mukhukhu wo fhaṱi waho nga mazennge maswa a penyaho u vhonalaho sa mukhukhu zwawo nga nnḓa, spa nga ngomu ndi tsha maimo a nṱha o lugelaho u netulusa na u nakisa vhathu.

src: abosonjiniyere abatjha bafumana ibandulo eliphathekako ngokwakhiwa kweendlela vukuzenzele unnamed akunandawo yoku fundela engcono emntwini othwa siselwa ubunjiniyere ku nokuba sebhudwini lapho kwakhiwa khona eline mitjhini nabogandaganda abarasako, amadoda nabafa zi abehla ingurumela bapha si phezulu ngomsebenzi.
tgt: vhainzhiniara vhaswa vha wana vhupfumbu dzi ha u tou shuma kha zwa vhuphulabada vukuzenzele unnamed a hu na kilasiru mu ya khwine ya muinzhinieramu gudi u fhira fhethu ha zwa u fhaṱa hu na mabuse na hu konḓaho ho ḓalaho mitshi ni i bvumaho na vhanna na vhafumakadzi vho shishaho mabiko vha tshi khou shuma vhukuma.

src: uthabiso dladla nosumay maharaj babasizi abajamele abosonjiniyere [amaares] abasathwasiswako, bamunya ilwazeli kibomakekere aba balingani babo endaweni yokuthuthukiswa kwendle la in2 hlangana nemthu nzini esempangeni egwini elingetlhagwini yakwazu lunatala.
tgt: thabiso dladla na sumay maharaj ndi vhainzhinieravha thusi kha thandela ine ya khou itwa[dziare] vha gudaho maitele u bva kha vhashu misani vha na tshenzhemo khulwane vhuponi hune ha khou khwiniswa bada ya n2 vhukati ha mthunzini na e mpangeni kha phendelashango ya devhula ha kwazulunatal.

src: siyahlola, si hlahlube iindleko zephro jekthi, senze imisebenzi enqophene nabasizi, uku hlolwa kwamacabazi be godu siphendule imibuzo yezobunjiniyera engabuzwa bosokontraka," kwatjho u dladla.
tgt: ri ita vhuṱoli, vhulinganyi, u thusa nga u ṋetshedza ndaela, u ṋea ndaela dza kushumele kha vhafhaṱi vha re henefho na u dovha ra fhindula mbudziso dziṅwe na dziṅwe dza zwa inzhiniere dzine ra dzi wana kha vhafhaṱi".

src: umaharaj othome nge phrojekthi le ngorhoboyi wee2016 gade afunda ngo kusinda nokutlama ijiyome thri esanral centre of excellence esebhayi, wathi ufunde iimfundo ezinengi eziqakathekileko solo afudu kela ngetlhagwini.
tgt: maharaj we a thoma thandela nga ṱhangule 2016, na uri o vha a tshi khou ita dizaini ya zwa dzhomeṱiri na phevimennde ngei port elizabeth kha se nthara ya vhukoni ya sa nral, o amba uri o no guda ngudo dza ndeme nnzhi u bva tshe a ḓa devhula.

src: "ngifundile ngecwephe tjhe yezobunjiniyera bez okwakha nokobana zihla nganiswa bunjani izinto kobana zisebenze ngepu melelelo.
tgt: o ri: "ndo guda sia ḽi konḓa ho ḽa civil engineering na zwauri zwithu zwi ṱangana hani uri zwi kone u shuma.

src: udladla wathoma ukusebenza nge phrojekthi ethileko ngemva kweenyanga ezilitjhumi kwaphela ngemva koku joyina ihlelobandulo la kwasanral.
tgt: zwi kwama zwivhumbeo, zwa mielela na dzhomeṱiri.

src: wathi, "ngisebenze ngoku hlola nokusiza abosoko ntraka nabatlhoga ihlathu lulo ngemigwalo yeplani.
tgt: "dladla o dzhenela kha tha ndela henefha kha miṅwedzi ya fumi nga murahu musi o dzhenela mbekanyamushumo ya mugudi ya sanral.

src: mayelana nokwemba iindle la, sihlola iinsetjenziswa ekuzaliswa ngazo namazi nga wazo.
tgt: o takadzwa nga u shuma kha thandela i ṋeaho khaedu ine a i ṱalutshedza sa yo ṱanḓavhuwa ho vhukuma i katelaho buroho dzo vhalaho na tserabada.

src: mhlapha sithome ukusinda ngamatje asilwe ko weasfalthi sifaka ibtb besihlole umsebenzi woke owenziwe ngusokontraka".
tgt: o ri: "ndo shuma kha vhuṱo li na u thusa vhorakhonṱhiraka musi vha tshi ṱoḓa u bviselwa khagala nga ha miolo.

src: abafundi beenkolweni ezise makhaya bafumana isizo more matshediso umnyango weze fundo esisekelo uhlome ihleloba ndulo elizokusiza inengi labafundi emiphakathini yemakhaya abadinywa ama thuba wezefundo.
tgt: vhagudi vha zwikoloni zwa mahayani vha wana thuso more matshediso muhasho wa pfu nzo ya mutheo wo rwela ṱari mbeka nyamushumo ine ya ḓo vhuedza vhunzhi ha vhagu diswa kha vhadzulapo vha mahayani vhane vha shae dzwa kha zwa pfunzo.

src: iphrojekthi yesizo leze fundo yemakhaya (ireap) lihlelobandulo leminyaka emithathu elizokusetje nziswa ukuthoma ngo mnyaka wee2018 ukufike la kewee2021 ekusigaba sokulinga, begodu lizoku siza iinkolo ezipheze zibe li188 ngesewula afrika ngalesisikhathi.
tgt: thandela ya thusedzo ya pfunzo ya mahayani (reap) ndi mbekanyamushumo ya miṅwaha miraru ine ya ḓo thoma u shuma nga 2018 u swika 2021 lwa tshifhi nganyana tshetsho, nahone yo vhetshelwa u vhuedza zwikolo zwi swikaho 188 zwa afrika tshipembe nga tshi fhinga hetshi.

src: umnyango unerhuluphe lo yokobana lelihlelo lizoku siza ekukhuphuleni ikhwa lithi yezefundo nokufu ndisa ehlelweni lefundo yeendaweni zemakhaya.
tgt: muhasho u fhulufhela uri hezwi zwi ḓo shela mule nzhe kha u khwinisa khwaḽithi ya u funza na u guda kha si siteme ya pfunzo ya mutheo mahayani.

src: lezo zifaka hlangana ialfred nzo east neeyingi ezimagega neligu zeor tambo esepumalanga kapa, ilembe neeyingi zeumzi nyathi kwazulunatala, nesekhukhune neeyingi zemopani eselimpopo.
tgt: hezwi zwi katela vhubvaḓuvha ha alfred nzo na zwiṱiriki zwi re kha phendelashango zwa or tambo ngei kapa vhubvaḓuvha, ilembe na zwiṱiriki zwa umzinyathi ngei kwazulunatal, na se khukhune na zwiṱiriki zwa mopani ngei limpopo.

src: umnqophisi oyihloko wokusetjenziswa noku nzinziswa kwekharikhyu lamu emnyangweni weze fundo esisekelo useliki tlhabane, uthe umnyango uqatjhe ilutjha elima750 esele liphase umethrigi ko bana libe basizi bezefundo eenkolweni zeendaweni zemakhaya (amarea).
tgt: mulangi muhulwane wa khwiniso na tshumiso ya kharikhulamu kha mu hasho wa pfunzo ya mutheo vho seliki tlhabane, vho amba uri muhasho wo tho la vhaswa vha 750 vha re na maṱiriki u vha vhathusedzi kha zwa pfunzo ya mahayani zwikoloni.

src: uhlathulule wathi, "bafu mene ibandulo elisisekelo elizabalola bakghone ukwe nza imisebenzi abanike lwe yona.
tgt: vho ṱalutshedza vha ri: "vho wana vhupfumbudzi ha mutheo vhune ha ḓo vha shomedza kha u ita mishumo ye vha ṋetshedzwa.

src: bazokusebe nza emkhakheni wefundo eseengabeni ezisisekelo neziphakathi, ezifaka hla ngana igreyidi yoku1 uku fikela keyesi4".
tgt: vha ḓo iswa kha pfunzo ya vhukati na kha ya mutheo, zwine zwa katela gireidi 1 u swika 4.

src: amarea alindeleke ukusiza ngemisebenzi yekharikhyulamu, khu lukhulu ukukhuphula izi nga leembalo, amakghono wokutlola nokufunda.
tgt: "vhathusedzi kha zwa pfu nzo ya mahayani vha khou lavhelelwa u thusa nga mishumo ya kharikhuḽamu yo fhambanaho, nga maanḓa u khwinisa vhukoni ha u vha la na u ṅwala na zwa mbalo.

src: "le yindlela yokunike la yokuthuthukisa ilutjha leendaweni ezifadalalelwe mnotho ngokuthuthukisa amakghono nelemuko lo msebenzi", kwatjho utlha bane.
tgt: vho tlhabane vho amba uri: "heyi na yone i tou vha nḓila ya u manḓafhadza vhaswa vha re kha vhupo ho tsikeledzeaho kha zwa ikonomi nga kha mveledzi so ya vhukoni na tshenzhemo ya mushumo.

src: ihloko yesikolo unto mbikayise mkhize weozwa thini primary school kwa nodwengu esiyingini seile mbe uthemba kobana ihle lweli lizakusiza inengi la bafundi bakhe ababhale lwa kufunda nokuzwisisa iimbalo.
tgt: "vho amba uri vhathusedzi kha zwa pfunzo ya mahayani vha lavhelelwa u fhungudza muhwalo wa vhagudisi vha re kha zwikolo zwa mahayani nga u thusa nga mishumo i shumisanaho na kharikhuḽamu u fana na u tshimbidza kilaba dza tshuṅwahaya, kilaba dza zwa mbalo, kilaba dza u vhala, kilaba dza vhutsila ha u sika na thandela dza zwa vhulimi.

src: isikolo sakhe sinabafundi ababalelwa ema387 sele baboke ukusukela kugre yidi r ukufikela keye7 abatlolisiweko nonyaka.
tgt: ṱhoho ya tshikolo vho ntombikayise mkhize vha tshikolo tsha phuraimari tsha ozwathini ngei kha vhupo ha nodwengu kha tshiṱiriki tsha ilembe vha fhulufhela uri mbekanyamushumo i ḓo thusa vhunzhi ha vhagudi swa vhavho vha konḓelwaho nga u vhala na nga zwa mbalo.

src: wahlathulula ngokuthi, "inengi labafundi bethu bavela emakhaya atjhe jwa bentwana kanti abanye batlhogonyelwa bogogwabo nabobamkhulwabo.
tgt: tshikolo tshavho tshi na vhagudiswa vha henefha kha 387 u bva kha gireidi r u swika 7 vho ḓiṅwalisaho ṋaṅwaha.

src: batlho ga abantu ababasiza ngo msebenzi wesikolo wekhaya nanyana ababakhuthaza ngokufunda begodu lokhu kuba nomthelela omum bi ekwenzeni umsebenzi wangetlasini".
tgt: vho ṱalutshedza uri: "vhu nzhi ha vhagudiswa vhashu vha bva kha mahaya o rangi waho phanḓa nga vhana ngeno vhaṅwe vha fhasi ha ṱhogomelo ya vhomakhulu.

src: "omunye umraro kukoba na abafundi bethu besigaba esisisekelo bafundiswa zoke iimfundo zabo ngesizulu kuthi nabadlulela esigabeni esiphakathi batjhugulukele ekufundeni ngesingisi, lokho kuba mraro omkhulu obenza babe nobudisi boku jayela itjhuguluko."
tgt: a vha na vhathu vhane vha nga vha thusa nga tshuṅwa haya kana u vha ṱuṱuwedza u vhala, hezwi zwi kwama vhukoni havho kiḽasini.

src: ngesikhathi sokulinga, sizakuhlahluba umthele la nepumelelo ngokwenza ukuhlola nokutjheja ihlelo lereap .
tgt: "iṅwe thaidzo ndi ya uri vhagudiswa vha re kha pfu nzo dza mutheo vha funzwa thero dzoṱhe nga luambo lwa tshizulu, musi vha tshi fhire la kha pfunzo dza vhukati vha tea u tshintsha vha ita thero nnzhi nga luisimane, nga u ralo zwi vha khaedu khulu khavho uri vha ḓo wele."

src: sikhombele isizo labantu abaphothule iziqu zabo abangasebenziko aba sithandathu abazokuba ba lungelelanisi bephrojekthi.
tgt: nga tshifhinga tsha mbeka nyamushumo ya tshifhinga nyana, ri ḓo ela ṱhuṱhuwedzo na mvelelo nga u ita vhuṱo li na vhupimi ha mbeka nyamushumo ya reap .

src: idriving ambition isiza abantu abakhubazekileko ukuthi bakghone ukuzitjhayelela vukuzenzele unnamed kuvame ukuba budisi ebantwini abakhu bazekileko ukuthola amathuba alinganako newabantu abaphile kuhle emzimbeni.
tgt: vukuzenzele unnamed vhathu vhane vha vha na ṱhoḓea dzo khetheaho vha a konḓelwa tshifhinga tshinzhi u swike lela zwikhala zwine vhathu vha si na vhuholefhali vha zwi swike lela.

src: "abantu abakhubazekileko bavamise ukuhlangabezana nobudisi obukhulu ekwenzeni izinto, khulu khulu ngoba abakghoni ukusebenzisa inengi leenthuthi zomphakathi.
tgt: tshiṅwe tshazwo ndi u guda u reila tshiendedzi.

src: be sifuna ukurarulula umraro lo; okuqakatheke khulu khu luke lapha kukwenza abantu bakwazi ukuqatjheka," kutjho isikhulu esiphetheko (iceo) iqasa, uari seir lis, naye oqhwale imilenze.
tgt: fhedzi mbekanyamushumo i sa ngi dziṅwe ya dzangano ḽa quadpara ḽa afrika tshipembe (qasa) ḽo gudisa vhathu vha 120 vhane vha khou tshila na vhuholefhali u reila zwiendedzi zwo itelwaho vhaholefhali thwii, hune vha 80 khavho vho kona u wana ḽaisentse dza u reila.

src: ngikho khonokhuke okukhuthaze ukuvulwa kwe hlelo idriving ambitions, esungulwe ngomnyaka wee2013.
tgt: "vhathu vhane vha khou tshila na vhuholefhali vha livhana na khaedu khulu tshifhinga tshinzhi kha u tshimbi la, zwihulu ngauri a vha koni u shumisa vhunzhi ha tshumelo dza zwiendedzi zwa nnyi na nnyi.

src: iqasa yakhulumisana nekhamphani eqatjhisa ngeenkoloyi iavis babonisana ngokufundisa abantu abakhubazekileko ukutjhayela iinkoloyi ezitjhugululelwe uku qalelela iindingo zabo.
tgt: ro vha ri tshi khou tama u tandulula thaidzo hei, zwihuluhulu u itela uri vhathu vha tholee," vho ralo ceo wa qasa vho ari seirlis vhane na vhone vho holefhala milen zheni.

src: "iavis yasizwisisa isidingo sa bantu abakhubazekileko, yabe yabona nokuthi bangasizeka kangangani abakhubazekile ko nange bangaba neenkoloyi ezilungiselelwe ukutjhayelwa ngibo, njengoba baqatjhisa iinkoloyi ezilawulwa ngezandla kwaphela nje.
tgt: heyi yo vha yone ṱhuṱhu wedzo ya mbekanyamushu mo ya driving ambitions, ine yo thomiwa nga 2013. qasa yo ṱangana na khamphani ya u hadzimisa zwiendedzi ya avis u amba nga ha u gudisa vhathu vha vhaholefhali uri vha reila hani zwiendedzi zwo itwaho u ya nga ha ṱhoḓea dzavho.

src: bavuma ukunike la ngekoloyi yethu yokuthoma eyasetjenziselwa ukufundisa abantu abakhubazekileko uku tjhayela," kutjho useirlis.
tgt: "avis yo pfesesa ṱhodea, ya dovha hafhu ya vhona ndeme khayo, sa izwi i tshi hadzimisa zwiendedzi zwine zwa langulwa nga zwanḓa.

src: abantu abaqhwale imikhono nemilenze kunye nabaqhwale idini nomgogodlha esele bane layisense yabatjhayeli abasafundako banethuba lokuthi bangenza iimbawo zokungena kilelihlelo lokufundiselwa uku tjhayela kwabantu abakhubaze kileko.
tgt: vho tenda u lambedza nga goloi yashu ya u tou thoma uri i shumiswe u ita nḓowenḓowe ngayo," vho ralo vho seirlis.

src: "baphekelelwa sisazi sokusiza abantu ukuvuselela ikgho no lokusebenzisa imizimba bo, ioccupational therapist , bayokuhlolwa ukuthi ba zakukghona na ukutjhayela iinkoloyi ezitjhugululiweko, ngaphandle kwengozi.
tgt: khumbelo dza mbekanyamushumo iyi dzo vulea kha vhaholefhali vha zwoṱhe zwanḓa na milenzhe na vho holefhalaho milenzhe fhedzi vhane vho no vha na ḽenasi.

src: abantu abasehlelwene li banerherho elipheleleko lokufunda ukutjhaye la, bebalungele ukuhlolwa.
tgt: "vha ya u ṱhaṱhuvhiwa nga mushumi wa zwa nyonyoloso u khwaṱhisedza uri vha a kona u ḓitshimbidza naa na uri vha na vhukoni ha u endedza hu si na khombo naa.

src: omunye osibonelo sepume lelo yeqasa ngucarol khoza, owalimalela engozini yekoloyi eminyakeni emibili edlulileko.
tgt: hu itwa ndingo dza u itela u vhona uri ane a shela mulenzhe a nga kona u ḓibadelela vhugai kha hei mbekanyamushumo, yo salaho ya lambedzwa," vho seirlis vho ṱalutshedza.

src: ekulimaleni kwakhe wakhu bazeka imikhono nemilenze.
tgt: vhane vha khou shela mu lenzhe vha wana nḓowenḓowe dzo fhelelaho dza u guda u reila, u swikela vha tshi lugela u lingiwa.

src: "iinthuthi ezikhambisa umphakathi zaba yinto embi kumbi kimi.
tgt: ḽiṅwe ḽa mafhungo a gundo a qasa ndi ḽa nga vho car ol khoza, vhane vho wana khombo ya tshiendisi miṅwa ha mivhili yo fhiraho.

src: ngikhumbu la ngelinye ilanga ngingena eteksini, bangisiza ukungena, batjhiya isitulomavili sami ngaphandle nabasazalise lela iteksi ngabakhweli," kwatjho ukhoza arhawula.
tgt: vho sala milenzhe yavho i sa shumi.

src: umasipaladi wendawo yegeorge ubeka izinga elitjha elisibonelo sokuthi amahlelo weenthuthi ezikhambisa umphakathi angabasiza nja ni abantu abakhubazekileko.
tgt: go george i phanḓa kha u manḓafhadza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.

src: ngokusekelwa ngeemali mnyango wezokuthutha elizweniloke, igo george elihlelo leembhesi ezirhabako (ibrt), njenganje lineembhesi ezincani ezima35, neembhesi ezikulu ezima36 kunye nezobukhulu obu phakathi ezima33.
tgt: vukuzenzele unnamed uswikelela vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi ndi khaedu kha vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali sa izwi vhunzhi ha dzibisi na zwibisana dzi si na tshomedzo dzi ṱoḓeaho kha u endedza vhaṋameli vha re na vhuholefhali.

src: zoke le ziimbhesi zikhandwe ngendlela yokuthi zikghone ukukhweza neentulomavili.
tgt: mimasipala shango nga vhuphara i khou dzhenelela kha u tandulula thaidzo iyi.

src: iimbhesi ezikulu nezobukhu lu obuphakathi zineendawo ezimikhuphukelana neme hlelwana ebuelekthronikhi, neendawo zokuhlala ezikhe thekileko kunye nezinye iinse tjenziswa ezijayelekileko.
tgt: masipala wapo wa george u khou bva phanḓa kha u sumbedza uri vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi vhu nga thusa khwiṋe vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.

src: kutjhejwe khulu khulu iimbhesi ezincani, zona ekuthe naku thonywa ihlelweli ngomnyaka wee2015 kwaba ngizo zoku thoma esewula afri ka ezifakelwe ihlelo lokuguga abakhweli abakhamba ngeentulomavili.
tgt: zwo badelwa nga gavhelo ḽa muhasho wa zwa vhuendi wa lushaka, tshumelo ya tshandukiso ya vhuendi ha mabisi ya go george (brt) zwazwi no i na zwibisana zwa 35, bisi dzo ḓoweleaho dza 36 na bisi dza vhukati dza 33. zwiendisi zwoṱhe izwi zwi na tshomedzo dza u endedza vhathu vha shumisaho dziwilitshee.

src: zinaneendawana ezenzelwe ukubeka iintulomavili kunye neminyango esebenza ngethekhnoloji esebenzisa itlelezi (ihydraulics), ngaleyindlelake abantu abakhubazekileko bangene lula ngebhesini.
tgt: bisi dzo ḓoweleaho na bisi dza vhukati dzi re na muratho wa elekiṱhironiki wa u tshimbila wiḽitshee, zwidulo zwo khetheaho na tshomedzo dzo ḓoweleaho.

src: "leziimbhesi kuphela komhlobo weembhesi esewula afrika ezikghona ukukhwelwa mumuntu woke ngokuphele leko, kutjho umphathi wego george, ujames robb.
tgt: ho vha ho lavheleswa zwihulu kha zwibisana, zwine, nga tshifhinga tsha u bviswa hazwo nga 2015, zwo vha zwi zwone zwa u thoma afrika tshipembe zwine zwa vha na tshomedzo dza u takula vhaṋameli vha re na wiḽitshee.

src: kuqakathekile ukuthi omunye nomunye umuntu egeorge akghone ukusebenzisa iinthuthi zomphakathi, kobanyana woke umuntu azokukghona ukuthola amathuba womsebenzi, newokuya eento lo, newokuyokukhonza lapho akhonza khona, newemidla lo nokuzigedla kunye nesizo lokuqalelelwa kwepilo.
tgt: dzi na luṱa lwa dziwiḽitshee na miṋango ine ya shuma nga haiḓiroḽiki, zwine zwa leludzela vhaṋameli vha re na vhuholefhali u ṋamela bisi.

src: ""abakhweli abakhubazekile ko bayathokoza ngokuqalelelwa kweendingo zabo nokuqa lelelwa komtlhago wabo wokuzikhambela baye kezinye iindawo, kunye nokuzijamela okukhambisana nokuzikhambe la ngokwabo, babodwa.
tgt: "heyi ndi yone tshumelo ya dzibisi i yoṱhe afrika tshipembe ine ya swikelelea tshoṱhe," hu amba mulanguli wa go george vho james robb.

src: "urodrique felix, ongo munye wabantu abakhamba ngebhesi, walimala engozini yesithuthuthu eenyangeni ezili18 ezidlulileko.
tgt: "heyi ndi iṅwe ya thiko dza ndeme kha tshumelo ya go george.

src: njenganje selakhamba ngesituloma vili, kodwana uthi ukukhamba kwakhe ngebhesi kulenze laba lula ikhambo lakhe lokunande aya esibhedlela.
tgt: ndi zwa ndeme uri muthu muṅwe na muṅwe hafha george a kone u swikelela vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi u itela uri vha kone u swika mishumoni, mavhengeleni, fhethu ha vhurereli, fhethu ha vhuḓimvumvusi, na fhethu ha tshumelo dzi nga ho dza ha ndondolamutakalo.

src: "eqinisweni, loke idorobha legeorge liyindawo la kulu la khona ukusebenzisa isitu lomavili, okuyinto enobuhle obunengi," kutjho urodrique.
tgt: "vhaṋameli vha re na ṱhoḓea dzo khetheaho vha a livhuwa u dzhielwa nṱha ha ṱhoḓea dzavho na vhuleme havho ha ḓuvha na ḓuvha u ya fhethu hu re kule na mahayani avho, na mbofholowo ine ya ḓa na u ḓitshimbidza nga vhone vhaṋe."

src: yazi imihlobo ehlukahlukeneko yokutlhoriswa vukuzenzele unnamed nangabe uthandana nomuntu okutlho risako namkha umntwana omtjhejako uya tlhoriswa, ungathatha amaga dango wokuzivikela na mkha wokuvikela umntwa na ngokuya emakhotho na mkha ubike indaba leyo ebuthweni lamapholisa wesewula afrika (bakwa saps).
tgt: kha vha ḓivhe tshaka dzo fhambanaho dza u tambudzwa vukuzenzele unnamed arali vha kha vhusha ka vhune vha tambu dzwa kana ṅwana ane vha khou muṱhogomela a tshi khou tambudzwa, vha nga dzhia ḽiga vha tsireledza vhone vhaṋe kana ṅwana nga u kwamana na vha khothe kana vha vhiga mafhungo kha vha tshumelo ya maph olisa vha afrika tshimembe.

src: umthetho wezemiguru guru yangekhaya unikela abongazimbi bomgurugu ru wangekhaya ivikeleko elikhulu umthetho onga kwazi ukunikela ngalo.
tgt: mulayo wa khakhathi dza muṱani u ṋetshedza zwipo ndwa tsireledzo yo fhelelaho ine mulayo wa nga i swikela.

src: ukutlhoriswa kwenzeka ngeendlela ezinengi begodu kuqakatheke khulu bona abomma bayazi imihlobo ehlukahlukeneko yoku tlhoriswa ukwenzela bona bazivikele.
tgt: u tambudzwa hu bvelela nga nḓila dzo fhambanaho nahone ndi zwa ndeme uri vhafumakadzi vha pfesese tshaka dza u tambudzwa uri vha kone u ḓitsireledza.

src: umguruguru wangekhaya wenzeka lokha umuntu na kangaphasi kobujamobu:ukutlhoriswa ngokubetjhwa: isibonelo, lokha nawube tjhwako namkha uthuselwa ngomguruguru.
tgt: khakhathi dza muṱani dzi bvelela musi muthu a nga fhasi ha:u tambudzwa muvhili: sa tsumbo, musi vha tshi rwi wa kana u shushedzwa nga dzikhakhathi.

src: ukutlhoriswa ngokomseme: kwenzeka lokha ungazimbi nakakatwako namkha akate lelwa ukwenza namkha uku bukela izenzo ezihlubayezako zomseme.
tgt: u tambudzwa lwa vhudzeka ni: musi tshipondwa tshi tshi tshipiwa kana u kombetshed zwa u ita kana u vhona zwiito zwa vhudzekani zwi shonisahou tambudzwa lwa muhumbulo, u amba, kana zwipfi: izwi zwi bvelela musi muthu e fhasi ha u dzulela u semiwa, u kolelwa kana u vhidzwa nga madzina a si avhuḓi.

src: ukutlhoriswa ngokommoya, ngamagama, nangokomkhu mbulo: lokhu kwenzeka lokha umuntu nakaphila ngaphasi kokuthukwa mihla namalanga, namkha abizwe ngamagama amthunazako.
tgt: u tambudzwa lwa ikonomi: izwi zwi bvelela musi tshipond wa tshi tshi thivhelwa u wana malamba.

src: ukutlhoriswa ngokomnotho: lokhu kwenzeka nangabe umuntu uyakhandelwa bona azingenisele imali namkha asebenze.
tgt: tshutshedzo: tsumbo ya u shushedzwa ndi musi tshipo ndwa tshi tshi ṱanganedza mi laedza kana sms dzi no ofhisa.

src: ukuthuselwa: isibonelo soku thuselwa kulokha ungazimbi nakafumana imilayezo emthu selako namkha emesabisako.
tgt: u tovhola: sa tsumbo hu nga vha nga nḓila ya u wana luṱin go tshifhinga tshoṱhe kana vha tshi dzulela u salwa murahu izwi zwa ita uri vha pfe vha na nyofho.

src: ukukhahlumeza: isibo nelo, kungenzeka ngendle la yokuthola umrhala ngo kuphindaphindiweko na mkha ngokuhlala ugadiwe la uya khona okubangela uhlale wethukiwe.
tgt: u sala muthu murahu: izwi zwi bvelela musi mutambudzi wavho a tshi sokou dzulela u vha sala murahu kana a kombetshedza u amba na vhone nga nnḓa ha thendelo yavho.

src: ukulandela umuntu ngemva: kwenzeka lokha umuntu oku tlhorisako ahlala akulandela namkha afune ukukhuluma nawe ngaphandle kwemvumo yakho.
tgt: tshinyadzo ya thundu: sa tsu mbo, musi mutambudzi wavho a tshi tshinyadza thundu yavho o tou ḓiimisela hu songo vha na thendelo yavho.

src: ukukhulumisana kuqakatheke khulu ekwazini umntwanakho vukuzenzele unnamed akusilula ukukhulisa umntwana, kwaphela isizo elincani elivela kibosolwazi lingenza kukhu lu ekuqinisekiseni bona umbe lethi wenza okuhle ngendlela angakghona ngayo.
tgt: vhudavhidzani ndi ha ndeme kha u ḓivha ṅwana wavho vukuzenzele unnamed a zwo ngo leluwa u alusa ṅwana, fhedzi thuso nyana i bva ho kha vhaḓivhi i a thusa vhukuma u vhona uri vhone vha ite zwa khwiṋe zwine vha nga kona.

src: ngokuya kweziko lechildline south africa, ekuyihla ngano engasebenzeli inzu zo nevikela abentwana kiyo yoke imihlobo yomguruguru nekhuthaza ukuhlonitjhwa kwamalungelo wabentwana esewula afrika, ithi ababele thi kufuze bakhulume kuhle nabentwababo begodu na ngendlela ebakhako.
tgt: u ya nga vha childline south africa, dzangano ḽi sa shumeli malamba ḽine ḽa tsireledza vhana kha ma sia oṱhe a dzikhakhathi ḽa dovha ḽa bveledza mvelele dza pfanelo dza vhana afri ka tshipembe, vhabebi vha tea u davhidzana zwavhuḓi na vhana.

src: ningabaphakamiseli ilizwi; khulumani nabo ngehlonipho; yenzani bona bazikhethele lokho abakwenyulako; ba bandakanyeni nakuthathwa iinqunto; bafundise bona ba kwazi ukuhlukanisa okuhle kokumbi; begodu nibakhuthaze bona baveze tjhatjhala zi imizwa yabo ngesimo namkha ngendaba ethileko.
tgt: vha songo vha halifhela; kha vha ambe navho nga ṱhonifho; kha vha ite uri vha kone u nanga zwine vha zwi funa; kha vha vha dzhenise kha maitele a u dzhia tsheo; kha vha vha funze uri zwavhuḓi ndi zwifhio na zwauri zwi si zwavhuḓi ndi zwifhio; vha vha ṱuṱuwedze u bvisela vhuḓipfi havho khagala.

src: ungakwenza lokhu ngokubamba imihlanga no yaqobe yomndeni, lapho khona omunye nomunye anethuba lokukhuluma beka lalele imibono yabanye.
tgt: u amba ndi nḓila yavhuḓi ya u funza vhana nahone vha nga ṱuṱuwedza maitele mavhuya nga u tou ṱalutshedza zwavhuḓi zwithu khavho.

src: uku khuluma kuligadango elihle lokufundisa abentwana be godu ngahlanye uzabe ukhu thaza nokuziphatha kuhle nawubahlathululela izinto.
tgt: vha childli ne vha tsivhudza vhabebi uri vha thetshelese zwavhu ḓi na u sa fhela mbilu, sa i zwi vhana vha si nga si kone u ḓivha uri vha amba hani zwine vha zwi humbula kana zwine vha zwi pfa.

src: iziko lechildline south africa liyelelisa ababelethi bona ba lalele ngokuqophelela begodu babe nesineke, ngombana abentwana kesinye isikhathi abazi bona bangakutjho njani lokhu ebakucabangako na mkha abakuzwa ngaphakathi kwabo.
tgt: vhana vha tea u ḓivha uri zwine zwa ṱanganedzea ndi zwifhio na zwi sa ṱanganedzei ndi zwifhiokha vha vhone uri vha a ḓivha uri ndi ngani milayo i tshi ṱoḓea na zwauri hu a vha na masiandaitwa arali ya vunḓiwa.

src: kuyafuneka bona abentwana bazi bona khuyini okuvumelekileko nokungakavumeleki qinisekisa bona bayezwisisa bona kubayini kubekwa imi thetho begodu nokuthi kuba nemiphumela emimbi nangabe ayilandelwa ngefanelo.
tgt: kha vha dzule vho fara na u ombedzela mai sandaitwa haya.

src: hlala ujame egameni linye begodu uje zise nakutlhogekako.
tgt: musi vhana vha tshi khou aluwa, kha vha vha ṱuṱuwedze u amba nga ha milayo heyi nahone vha ite uri vha thuse u wanulusa masiandaitwa.

src: njengoba abentwana bakhula, bakhuthaze bona bakhulume ngemithetho leyo begodu bacoce bebavume lane ngaleziindlela zokujezisa.
tgt: kha vha dzulele u khoḓa vhana musi vha na vhuḓifari havhuḓi nga u vha vhudza uri vha zwi funa hani zwithu zwavhuḓi zwine vha ita, zwiito zwi si zwavhuḓi zwi nga ngalan gala.

src: bakwakwazele abentwana qobe nabaziphethe kuhle ngokuthi ubatjele bona uzitha nda kangangani izinto ezihle aba zenzako, izenzo zokuziphatha kumbi kwabo ziya nokuphela.
tgt: musi vhabebi vhanzhi vha tshi pfufha vha na nga zwitambiswa kana zwimuṋemuṋe, pfufho ya khwiṋe ndi u kuvhatedza, u mwemwela na u sumbedza u vha takalela.

src: ukungezelela kilokho, banikele umtlomelo nabenze umsebenzi omuhle kunokuthi kuphume phambili igadango lokubaje zisa nabonileko.
tgt: u fhaṱa vhuḓifhulufhelindi zwa ndeme u thusa ṅwa na wavho u fhaṱa vhuḓifari hawe.

src: kanengi aba belethi abanengi batlomelisa abentwana ngokubathengela izinto zokudlala namaswidi, umtlomelo omuhle kungaba kubasingatha, uhleke namkha umomotheke/ubobothe ke nabo begodu ubabonise bona uyakuthabela abakwenzako.
tgt: vha nga thusa vhana vhavho nga u vha khoḓa nge vha lingedza u thusa na u shumisa vhukoni havho, vhuṱali na u tambatamba; u vha ṱuṱuwedza u amba; u vha ita uri vha pfe vhe vha tshipentshela; na uri vha a fhulufhedzea, uri vha kone u ḓitika nga vhone.

src: umashinini uthi zoma22 932 iinteyitjhi zokuvowudela zizokuvulwa ngeiri lobu08:00 beziyokuvalwa ngelesi17:00 ngepelaveke yokutlolisela ukuvowuda.
tgt: tshikhala tsha u fhedzisela tsha u ḓiṅwalisela u khetha vukuzenzele unnamed mafhelo a vhege a u ḓiṅwalisela u khetha a ḓo vha nga mugivhela wa ḽa 26 na sondaha ya ḽa 27 phando 2019, u ya nga mudzulatshidulo wa khomishini ya zwa khetho (iec), vho glen mashinini.

src: "leli lithuba labavowudi abathomako ukuthi ba zitlolise, nelabavowudi ebebavele bakhona ukuthi balungise bavuselele imininingwanabo."
tgt: vho mashinini vha ri zwiṱitshi zwoṱhe zwa 22 932 zwi ḓo vha zwo vula u bva nga 08h00 u swika 17h00 nga vhege iyo ya u ḓiṅwalisela u khetha.

src: umashinini uthi njenga nje baziingidi ezima26.1 abavowudi esele bakhona erhelweni labavowudi lelizwe loke.
tgt: "izwi ndi u itela vhakhethi vhaswa uri vha ḓiṅwalise na vha kale uri vha sedzuluse zwidodombedzwa zwavho."

src: umashinini uthi ihlelo lo kutlolisela ukuvowuda li zokufikiswa nemajele eli zweni lokeli, kobanyana iimbotjhwa nazo zizokuthola ithuba lokusebenzisa ilungelo lazo lokuvowuda.
tgt: vho mashinini vha ri hu na vhakhethi vho ḓiṅwalisaho kha mutevhe wa vhakhethi wa lushaka vha swikaho miḽioni dza 26.1. iec i tama u engedza miḽioni nthihi ya vhakhethi vhaswa kha mutevhe wa vhakhethi phanḓa ha khetho dza 2019. vho mashinini vha ri u ḓiṅwalisa uhu hu ḓo itwa na kha senthara dza ndulamiso u mona na shango u itela uri vhafariwa vha shumise pfanelo dzavho dza u khetha.

src: ukutlolisela ukuvowuda iiec inethemba lokuthi abavowudi, esele bakhona e rhelweni labavowudi njenga nje, bazakusebenzisa ithubeli ukuyokuhlola eenteyitjhini zabo zokuvowuda bayokuvuselela imininingwanabo yeemphande.
tgt: "malugana na u khetha, vhafariwa vha dzhiwa vho ḓiṅwalisela u khetha kha tshiṱiriki tsha u khethela tshine dzhele ine vha vha khayo ya vha khatsho.

src: nakhu ofanele ukwazi: zoke izakhamuzi zesewula afrika ezineminyaka eli16 nengaphezulu ezinabomazisi abasemthethweni zinelungelo lokuzitlolisa njenga bavowudi (nanyana nje kubabantu abazabe seba hlanganise iminyaka eli18 ubuncani bakhona ngela nga lokuvowuda kwaphela, abazakuvunyelwa ukuvowuda).
tgt: "miṱa ya avho vho valelwaho kha zwiimiswa zwa ndulamiso vha humbelwa u isa maṅwalo a vhuṋe a vhafariwa phanḓa ha fulo ḽa u ḓiṅwalisa," vha ralo vho mashinini.

src: abavowudi kufanele bakhambe nabomazisi babo abanebhakhowudi, na mkha umazisi olikarada, na mkha isitifikethi sakamazisi wesikhatjhana nabayozi tlolisa esiyingini sokuvowuda lapho bahlala khona na mkha lapho bavame ukuhlala khona.
tgt: u ḓiṅwalisa ha mukhethiiec i na fulufhelo ḽa uri vhakhethi, vho no ḓiṅwalisaho, vha ḓo dzhia tshikhala itshi vha ya kha vhupo ha u khetha ha havho u sedza zwidodombedzwa zwavho, zwihulusa u khwaṱhisedza na u ita tshanduko arali zwo tea kha zwidodombedzwa zwa ḓiresi dzavho.

src: nabazitlolisela ukuvowuda, abavowudi kuzakufuneka batjho isiphande lapho bahla la khona namkha bahlathulule ukuthi bahlala kuphi, kobanyana iiec izokwazi ukubafaka esigabeni esifaneleko serhelo labavowudi.
tgt: zwine vha tea u zwi ḓivha ndi hezwi: vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe vhoṱhe vhane vha vha na miṅwaha ya 16 na u fhira, vhane vha vha na basa ya tshiofisi, vha nga ḓiṅwalisa sa vhakhethi (naho hu avho vhane vha ḓo vha vhe na miṅwaha ya 18 nga ḓuvha ḽa u khetha vhane vha ḓo tendelwa u khetha).

src: akunasidingo sobufakazi bokuthi umuntu uhlala ku phi.
tgt: vhakhethi vha tea u dzhia ḽiṅwalo ḽavho ḽa vhuṋe ḽine ḽa vha na barcode, basa ya smart card kana tshitifikheithi tsha vhuṋe tsha tshifhinganyana musi vha tshi ya u ḓiṅwalisa kha zwiṱitshi zwa u vouthela zwa hune vha dzula hone.

src: iiyeleliso ezizakuphephisa kilamaholideyi kakresmusi dale hes amaholideyi ka kresmusi asikha thi sethabo.
tgt: tsivhudzo dza uri vha dzule vho tsireledzea nga maḓuvha aya a vhuawelo dale hes maḓuvha a vhuawelo ndi maḓuvha a u ḓiphiṋa.

src: ko dwana anjalo nje andisa namathuba wezehlakalo ezinjengeengozi zendlela, ukweba nobunye ubule lesi.
tgt: fhedzi a a dovha a ḓisa nyimele dzi fanaho na khombo dza moḓoro, vhuvhava na vhuṅwe vhugevhenga.

src: landela iiyeleliso ezi landelako nanzi ukwe nza isiqiniseko sokobana uhlala uphephile bewutha bile nalabo obathandako.
tgt: kha vha tevhedze tsivhudzo idzi uri vha vhe na maḓuvha a madakalo o tsireledzeaho na vhafunwa vhavho.

src: hlala uphephile eendleleniiingozi zendlela zanda okurarako ngamaholide yi kakresmusi, zibulale amakhulukhulu wabantu.
tgt: kha vha dzule vho tsireledzea dzibadanikhombo dza badani dzi a engedzea vhukuma nga maḓuvha a vhuawelo, dza dovha dza dzhia maḓana a vhutshilo.

src: ukuze uhlale uphephile, yenza isiqiniseko sokobana: ikoloyakho uthoma ngokuyihlola ntanzi ngaphambi kobana uthathe ikhambo, kobanyana uzokuba nesiqiniseko sokuthi ise bujameni obulungileko; wena nabantu oba khwezileko nihlala ni wabophile amabhande; unande uphumula ngemva kwamaawa amabili nayibe ukha mba ibanga elide ngeko loyi; ungathomi utjhayele uselile namkha usele ibe uyatjhayela ngahlanye; khamba ngebelo elivunyelweko kwaphela, nemithetho yendlela uyihloniphe yoke; tjheja uyelele ezinye iinkoloyi nabakhambi ngeenyawo; musa ukusebenzisa iselifoni ibe uyatjhayela.
tgt: kha vha dzule vho tsireledzea nga u vhona uri: vha sedzuluse moḓoro wavho musi vha sa athu u fara lwendo u itela uri moḓoro wavho u vhe u kha nyimele yavhuḓi.

src: ukuphepha kwabantwana iindawo zamaholideyi ezi nengi zinabantu abanengi abazivakatjhelako; lokhoke kutjho ukuthi umntwana kho angadurha hlangana newoma labantu abazabe balapho.
tgt: vhone na vhanameli vhavho vha tea u dzula vho vhofha bannda ḽa tsireledzo.

src: kuqakathekile nokuthi uhlale ubeke ilihlo ebantwa neni bakho nabazithabisa ngezinto ezenziwa lapho, njengalokhuya nabaduda elwandle namkha lokhuya nabadlala eenkundleni zokudlalela.
tgt: vha tea u awela nga murahu ha awara mbili dziṅwe na dziṅwe musi vha tshi khou fara lwendo lulapfu.

src: nanzi ezinye iiyeleliso ongaphephisa ngazo abantwabakho: yenza isiqiniseko sokobana abantwana aba ncani bahlala beluswe mumuntu omkhulu othembekileko nanyana owazisako; ngekoloyini, yenza isiqiniseko sokuthi aba ntwana bawabophile amabhande; fundisa abantwana a bakhudlwana inombo ro yakho yeselifoni, wenzelele ukuthi ba kghone ukukufowu nela nayibe kukhona okwenza ukuthi ufuneke ngokurhabekileko; yenza isiqiniseko soku thi abantwana abanga kwazi kuhle ukududa bathola iinsiza zokududa ezibasiza ukuthi ba ngacwili nabadudako; fundisa abantwabakho ukuthi bangathomi bangene ekoloyini yomuntu otjhili nanyana abangamaziko begodu bangathomi bakhulume nabantu abatjhili nanyana abangabaziko.
tgt: vha tea u litsha u nwa musi vha tshi khou reila.

src: umntwanakho mba mbe ngesandla na niseendaweni eziphi thizelako nalokhuya naneqa indlela.
tgt: vha reile nga luvhilo lwo kaliwaho nahone vha tevhedze milayo yoṱhe ya badani.

src: funda isizo lokuthoma kobanyana uzokukghona ukusiza nakube ku funeka isizo lokwelapha elirhabako.
tgt: vha ṱhogomele miṅwe mimoḓoro khathihi na vhaendangaṋayo.

src: ubulelesibuyanda ubulelesi boku gqekeza emizini nebo kweba ngamaholideyi ka kresmusi.
tgt: vha songo shumisa luṱi ngo lwavho musi vha tshi khou reila.

src: hlala utjhejile uyelele ngaso soke isikhathi, uthathe nananzi iiyeleliso zokuphepha: yelela ukuthi woke amafesidere neminya ngo yendlu kukhiyelwe nawukhambako usiya emaholideyini.
tgt: tsireledzo ya vhanavhupo vhunzhi ha mada kalo vhu dzula vhu tshi tou vha mupfufhi u si mphire, zwine zwa amba uri hu na khonadzeo ya uri ṅwana wavho a nga xela vhukati ha gogo ḽa vhathu.

src: sebenzisa imali ngokuyelela allison cooper amaholideyi ka kresmusi akukafa neli ukuthi aku tjhiye usegebhegebheni ye sikwelede esithuwelelako.
tgt: kha vha shumise masheleni nga nḓila ya vhuṱali allison cooper maḓuvha a vhuawe lo a songo vha sia vha na tshikolodo tshihulwane. "

src: "ubumnandi bokuthe nga ngenyanga kasinyikha ba nekanobayeni kuphela msinyana khulu, abathengi bathome ukuzwa ubuhlungu bezenzo zabo zokuthengela butjhwileni ekupheleni kwakatjhirhweni wee2019.
tgt: u shumisa masheleni lwo kalulaho zwi fana na u vha na thongwana dza tshikolodo dzi vha dinaho, "tshiendani tshavho tsha masheleni" ndi zwavhuḓi u sa shumisesa masheleni nga hei khushumusi ngauri zwi nga vha na masiandaitwa a si avhuḓi kha masheleni na mugaganya gwama wavho lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu," vha ralo vho ma tthys potgieter, mulangi wa zwa mimaraga na thengiso kha debtsafe.

src: musa ukusebenzisa imali o nganayo namkha musa uku thenga ngemali onganayo," kungezelela upotgieter.
tgt: "hovhu vhuḓipfi havhuḓi ha u shumisesa masheleni nga lara na nyendavhusiku ndi ha tshifhinga tshipfufhi nahone vharengi vha ḓo pfa u vhavha nga tsheo dzavho dza u sa londa mafheloni a ṅwedzi wa phando nga 2019. vha songo shumisa masheleni ane vha si vhe nao , " vha ralo vha tshi engedza vho potgietervho mellony ramalho vha african bank vha ri vhashumi vha anzela u holelwa u ṱavhanya nga ṅwedzi wa nyendavhusiku, zwa ita uri vha lindele tshifhinga tshilapfu vha sa athu u hola nga ṅwedzi wa phando.

src: umphathi weafrican bank umellony ramalho uthi abasebenzi bavamise ukurhola msinyana nanyana ngaphambi kwesikhathi ngenyanga kanobayeni; lokhoke kwenza ukuthi u mrholwabo katjhirhweni ufike ngelikade khulu.
tgt: "phando ndi ṅwedzi u konḓaho kha vhathu vhanzhi, zwi ita uri vhaṅwe vha nange u shumisa garaṱa dza zwikolodo kana u ita tshikolodo.

src: kuqakathe kile ukuthi uhlale ulimuka, utjheje ukuthi uyisebenzisa kangangani imali.
tgt: ndi zwa ndeme u dzula u tshi ḓivha zwine wa ḓo ita nga masheleni.

src: kungaba ngcono khulu ukuthi imala kho uyihlelele, uyihluka nise ngokuyaba ngaphambi kobana uthome ukuyisebenzisa, nawuzakubalekela ukusebenzisa imali ngokweqileko," kutjho uramalho.
tgt: ndi khwiṋe u ita mugaganyagwama u itela uri u sa shumisese masheleni," vha ralo vho ramalho.

src: upotgieter ulimukisa abathengi ukuthi bathome kusese nesikhathi ukuthengela ukresmusi, begodu babe benze nesiqiniseko so kuthi indawabo yokubeka ukudla namafriji wabo azele ukugoma okuhlala isikhathi eside, ukwenzelela ukuthi imali abanayo ihlale ilawuleka, nokubalekela ukuthenga kwamarhabarhaba nokudla imali enengi.
tgt: vho potgieter vha tsivhudza vharengi uri vha renge zwishumiswa zwa khushumusi u ṱavhanya na u vhona uri dziraga na zwixwatudzi zwavho zwo ḓadzwa nga zwishumiswa zwi sa ṱavhanyi u sina, u itela u dzudza mugaganyagwama wavho nga fhasi ha ndaulo na u thivhela u renga u lenga musi zwithu zwi tshi vho ḓura.

src: upotgieter uyelelisa abathengi ngeendlela zokungasebenzisi imali ngokweqileko: thenga ukugoma ngo bunengi bewuthenge imi hlobo ekghona ukuhlala isikhathi eside.
tgt: zwine vho potgieter vha eletshedza vharengi nga hazwo nga ha uri vha nga dzudza hani mugaganyagwama wavho nga fhasi ha ndaulo: kha vha ḓadze zwixwatu dzi na dziraga dzavho nga zwishumiswa zwi sa ṱavha nyi u sina kha vha humbule u shu misa moḓoro muthihi na vhaṅwe vhathu vha shumaho navho kana vha tshi ya fhethu huthihi.

src: isehlukaniso sibudisi begodu siyagandelela ngokomkhumbulo emndenini begodu nekambiso yezomthetho iyindendende ehlangahlanganisa umkhumbulo.
tgt: u fhelisa mbingano nga maitele a mulayo dale hes musi vho lingedza zwoṱhe u ita uri mbingano yavho i shume, ṱhalano i nga vha yone nḓila ya khwinesa kha vhone na mufarisi wavho.

src: isehlukaniso yikambiso yalokha umtjhado upheliswa ngokomthetho ekhotho yezomthetho.
tgt: ṱhalano i a konḓa na u vhanga mutsiko miṱani nahone maitele a mulayo a nga vha kanganyisa.

src: kunemihlobo emibili yezehlukaniso: isehlukaniso esingaphikiswako – lapho abathetheneko bavumelana ngokuthi isehlukaniso kumele senzeke; nesehlukaniso esiphikiswako – lapho khona abathetheneko bangavumelani ngegadango lesehlukaniso namkha ngemibandela yaso.
tgt: ṱhalano ndi musi mbingano i tshi fhela lwa tshiofisi kha khothe ya mulayo.

src: ujosephine peta, osikhulu esilawula zomthetho eofisini legcwetha eliqalene nezemindeni emnyangweni wezobulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa komthethosisekelo, uhlathulula bona ikambiso yesehlukaniso ithoma nasekukhutjhwe incwadi ekubizela ekhotho.
tgt: hu na tshaka mbili dza ṱhalano: i si na u pikisana – hune masia mavhili a tendelana uri vha khou ṱalana, na ine ya vha na u pikisana – hune masia mavhili a sa tendelane kha ṱhalano kana milayo yayo.

src: "umuntu ofuna bona umtjhadwakhe nomkakhe/nendodakhe utjhatjalaliswe angathola incwadi ebabizela ekhotho yese hlukaniso, ekhotho ephakamileko namkha yesigodi, namkha bangaya egcwetheni bona libasize ngekambiso yokuphelisa umtjhado.
tgt: vho josephine peta, muofisiri muhulwane wa ndaulo ya zwa mulayo kha muhasho wa vhulamukanyi na mveledziso ya ndayotewa kha ofisi ya muambeli wa muṱa, vha ṱalutshedza uri maitele a mbingano a thoma musi ho ḓiswa nḓivhadzamulandu (samoni).

src: umlingani othome iinkambiso zesehlukaniso ubizwa bona mmangali bese lo omunye umlingani abizwe bona mmangalelwa, kutjho upeta.
tgt: "muthu ane a kha u ṱoḓa mbingano i tshi fheliswa a nga wana samoni dza ṱhalano khothe ya dzingu kana khothe khulwane, kana vha nga kwama ramulayo u vha thusa nga maitele.

src: upeta uhlathulule bonaincwadi ekubizela ethotho yesehlukaniso kufuze: itjho bona alisekho ithemba lokobana ungalungiseka umtjhado lo, yenze indinyana yokwabiwa kwepahla namkha ikatelele uku sebenza kwemibandela ekwavunyelwana ngayo nakwenziwa isivumelwano sokulawula ipahla phakathi kwabalingani bobabili esatlikitlwa ngaphambi kokuthoma komtjhado, begodu ibeke kuhle bona ngiwaphi amalungiselelo azokwe nziwa ebantwaneni babalingani, njengokuthi ngubani ozokuhlala nabantwana "incwadi ekubizela ekhotho/idarhifara kufuze itjho bona ummangalelwa unamalanga ali10 – nangabe uhlala endaweni yinye nommangali, namkha amalanga ama20 nangabe ababili laba bahla eemfundeni ezihlukeneko, ukuphendula incwadi embizela ekhotho," utjho wangezelela upeta.
tgt: mufarisi o thomaho maitele a ṱhalano u vhidzwa u pfi muhweleli nahone muṅwe mufarisi u vhidzwa u pfi muhwelelwa," vho ralo vho peta.

src: nasele icala livuliwe, iincwadi zibuyiselwa kummangali, nekufuze athumele imitlolo emibili yeencwadezo esisebenzini sekhotho esisendaweni lapho ummangalelwa asebenza namkha ahlala khona.
tgt: vho peta vho ṱalutshedza uri samoni dza ṱhalano dzi fanela: u sumbedza uri a hu na tshikhala na tshithihi tshi pfadzaho tsha uri vhushaka vhu nga dovha ha vusuludzwa, u ita mbetshelwa ya khethekanyo ya thundu yo ṱanganelaho kana vhukombetshedzi ha milayo yo tendelanwaho kha thendelano ya khonṱhiraka ya mbingano ye ya sainwa mathomoni a mbingano, na u sumbedzisa uri ndi nzudzanyo dzifhio dzine dza ḓo itwa malugana na vhana vha vhafarisani, u fana na uri vhana vha ḓo dzula na nnyi.

src: "isisebenzi sekhothoke sona ngokwaso sizokhambisa iincwadezo sizise kummangalelwa besikhuphe nencwadi ekufuze itlikitlwe mmangalelwa njengetshwayo lokuqinisekisa bonauzitholileko iincwadezo.
tgt: "samoni dzi fanela u sumbedza uri muhwelelwa u na maḓuvha a 10 – kha nyimele ine a vha a tshi dzula kha vhupo vhuthihi na muhweleli kana maḓuvha a 20 a u fhindula samoni – arali masia mavhili vha tshi dzula kha mavundu o fhambanaho," vho peta vho ḓadzisa nga u ralo.

src: nangabe kunabentwana hlangana, iofisi lokuyelelisa ngezemindeni kufuze laziswe," ubeka njalo upeta.
tgt: mulandu wa vhuya wa vuliwa, maṅwalo a humiselwa murahu kha muhweleli, ane a fanela u ṋetshedza sethe mbili dza maṅwalo aya kha sherifu kha vhupo vhune muhwelelwa a shuma kana u dzula hone.

src: esahlukanisweni esiphikiswako, ummangalelwa kufuze aphendule incwadi embizele ekhotho ngokufuna ukwazisa bona ufuna ukukhandela ukuraga kwesehlukaniso.
tgt: "sherifu u ḓo isa maṅwalo nga ene muṋe kha muhwelelwa na u ṋetshedza ḽiṅwalo ḽa u sumbedza uri maṅwalo o iswa na u ṱanganedzwa.

src: "nasele kwenziwe lokho, ummangalelwa kufuze afake isibawo sokuzibilayeza ngaphasi kwesikhathi esithileko.
tgt: kha nyimele ine vhathu vha khou ṱalanaho vha vha vha na vhana, ofisi ya muambeli wa muṱa i fanela u ḓivhadzwa," vho peta vho sumbedzisa nga u ralo.

src: ukuzibilayeza sitatimende lapho khona ummangalelwa aphendula iinsolo ezisencwadini embizele ekhotho.
tgt: nga murahu ha maḓuvha a 10 kana a 20, muhweleli a nga ridzhisiṱara ṱhalano kha rekhodo ya khothe.

src: ngemva kokufakwa kwesibilayezo, ummangali angaphendula esibilayezweni sommangalelwa namkha afake isaziso sokubekelwa ngeqadi kwesibilayezo.
tgt: kha ṱhalano dzine dza vha na u pikisana, muhwelelwa u fanela u fhindula samoni nga nḓivhadzo ya u ḓiimisela u imelela mafhungo.

src: "indaba le ngemva kwalokho ikhulunywa ekhotho ukwenzela bona kukhutjhwe isigwebo," ubeke njalo upeta nakaphetha indaba le.
tgt: "izwo zwa vhuya zwa itwa, u ḓo fanela u faila aphiḽi hu sa athu fhira tshifhinga tsho tiwaho.

src: ukuzithwala umntwana ongakahlali ngesibelethweni yindaba yezabesizo elirhabako kezokwelapha allison cooper abomma abakhe ba zithwala abantwa na abangakahlali ngendlela ejayelekileko es ibelethweni balimuka kuhle ukuthi lobubujamo obunje buyingozi engangani epilweni yomuntu, ngenca yomhlambuluko neengazi ezitjengisa ukungakaphili kuhle nazihlolwako.
tgt: vhuimana ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelo vhu ṱoḓa dzilafho ḽa tshihaḓu allison cooper vhafumakadzi vho tshenzhemaho vhuima na ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelo vha ya ḓivha vhuṱungu vhune ha vhanga, zwo vhangwa nga mvelelo dza phosethivi dza vhuimana kha ndingo dza murundo na dza malofha.

src: bushy mhlari, oyisenior registrar ectopic obstetrics and gynaecology esibhedlela idr george mukhariacademic , ohlathulula ukuthi umntwana ongakahlali ngendlela ejayelekileko esibelethweni usuke anga kahlali ngesibelethweni, la umntwana avamise ukuhlala khona ngesibelethweni.
tgt: hezwi ndi u ya nga vho dokotela bushy mhlari, dokotela muhulwane are kha vhupfumbudzi ha u vha makone kha ectopic obstet rics na gynaecology kha sibadela tsha akhademiki tsha dr george mukhari, vhe vha ṱalutshedza uri vhuimana ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelo a vhu dzuli nga ngomu ha bako ḽa mbumbelo, hune kanzhi vhuimana ha dzula hone.

src: uthi kuvamise ukuthi ngemva kokumithiswa kweqanda – okwenzeka ngaphakathi kwetjhubha na elidlulisa iqanda lomuntu omsikazi, iqanda elimithisiweko likhamba ngetjhubhanelo liyokufika emlonyeni wesibeletho ono thileko la lifike linamathele khona engutjeni yesibeletho bese umntwana uyakhula.
tgt: vha ri kanzhi, nga murahu ha u ṱangana ha kumba ḽa musadzi na vhunna/tshipeme – zwine zwa bvelela kha tshubu ya u bva kha kumba u ya kha mbumbelo, kumba ḽo ṱanganaho na vhunna/tshipeme ḽi tshimbila nga kha tshubu u ya kha bako ḽa mbumbelo ḽo pfumaho hune ḽa ṱumana na mudzedze wa endometrial ha kona u vha na u bveledzwa ha ṅwana.

src: "ekuzithwaleni la umntwana angakahlali khona ngendlela ejayelekileko, iqanda elimithisiweko linzinza emzimbeni.
tgt: "kha vhuimana ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelo, kumba ḽo ṱanganaho na vhunna/tshipeme a ḽi dzuli nga ngomu ha mbumbelo ḽi dzula kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa muvhili.

src: ezehlakalweni ezima98%, umntwana ongakahlali ngendlela ejayelekileko utholakala ahlezi ngematjhubhaneni adlulisa amaqanda (amafallopian tubes).
tgt: kha nyimele dzi linganaho phesenthe dza 98, vhuimana ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelo vhu dzula kha tshubu dza u bva kha kumba u ya kha mbumbelo.

src: ezinye iindawo ezingakavami umntwana akhe ahlale ngakizo kukumaovari, entanyeni yesibeletho kunye nemsipheni omkhulu," kutjho udorh.
tgt: fhethu hu songo ḓoweleaho hu katela ovari, nga ngomu thumbuni, mulomoni wa mbumbelo na mukala wa nga nnḓa ha mbumbelo ," vho ralo vho dokotela mhlari.

src: nakwenzekako lokhu, umbungu awukwazi ukudluliselwa laphokhunye ngalokhoke ukurhululwa kombungu kuphela kwento umma ozithweleko angayenza.
tgt: musi izwi zwi tshi bvelela, tshitumbuki tshi nga si sudzuluswe tsha iswa nga ngomu ha mbumbelo na uri tsho salaho fhedzi kha mufumakadzi hu vha u fhelisa vhuimana.

src: mhlari uthi umuntu omsikazi unamathuba amanengi wokuzithwala umntwana ongeze ahlala ngendlela ejayelekileko, lokhuya: nakanamatjhubhana wesibeletho alimeleko namkha angakajayeleki, njengokuthi nje nakube akhe aba nokugula okuthathelanwa emsemeni namkha nakube amatjhubhanakhe akhe ahlinzwa; nakube wakhe wazithwala umntwana ongakahlali ngendlela ejayelekileko; nakube akanambeleko; nakube wabelana umseme namadoda amanengi; nakube uyabhema.
tgt: "vhuimana ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelo ho baleaho ndi nyimelo i isaho lufuni na uri ndi tshivhangi tshihulwane tsha mpfu dzi elanaho na vhuimana ha miṅwedzi miraru ya u thoma.

src: "ukuzirhulukela kombungu ongakahlali ngendlela ejayelekileko nefaneleko kubeka ipilo yomuntu ozithweleko phakathi kokufa nokuphila begodu kungunobangela ophambili wokuthathwa yimbeleko ebantwini abasikazi abaneenyanga ezintathu zokuthoma bazithwele.
tgt: khombo ya vhuimana ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelo i ṱoḓa u lingana na phesenthe mbili ya vhathu nga u angaredza," vho ralo vho dokotela mhlari.

src: ukuzithwala ngendlela yokuthi umntwana ahlale ngendlela engakajayeleki nefaneleko kuyathontela, kulinganiselwa emaphesenteni amabili esitjhabeni soke siphelele," kutjho udorh.
tgt: zwiga/tsumbo zwiga/tsumbo dza vhuimana ho dza vhuimana ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelombumbelou ya nga vho dokotela mhlari, tsumbadzwadze dzi vhonala mathomoni a vhuimana.

src: "iinkomba zokuthi umuntu uzithwele isisu esingakahlali ngendlela efanelekongokutjho kukadorh.
tgt: "fhedziha, kha vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi a hu vhonali tsumbadwadze u swika tshubu dza u bva kha kumba u ya kha mbumbelo dzi tshi balea.

src: mhlari, leziinkomba zibonakala umuntu asandukuzithwala.
tgt: musi izwi zwi tshi bvelela, mufumakadzi a nga pfa vhuṱungu vhuhulu na uri vhaṅwe vha ya swikelela hune vha bva malofha nga fhasi.

src: kesinye isikhathi, ngitjho ngaphambi kobana umuntu azi naye ngokwakhe ukuthi uzithwele.
tgt: hezwi zwi tevhelwa nga dzungu, u tsela fhasi ha mutsiko wa malofha, u dzidzivhala, mutshuwo na u lovha arali dzilafho ḽa lengelelwa," vho ralo.

src: iinkomba ezivamileko zibala hlangana ezilandelako: iinhlabi ezizwakala engcenyeni yamathumbu engenzasi; ukweqiwa sikhathi senyanga; ukopha okungakajayeleki esithweni sobufazi;"nokhoke, abanye abomma ababi nazo iinkomba, bekube mhlazana kudabuka itjhubhana lesibeletho.
tgt: u tumbula vhuimana ho vhumbeaho nnḓa ha mbumbelo, hu itwa ndingo ya murundo kana ya malofha u itela u khwaṱhisedza uri mufumakadzi o ḓihwala.

src: ukwakha isitjhaba esitjheja abentwana vukuzenzele unnamed kunesaga esijayele kileko eentjhabeni ezinengi zeafrika esithi umntwana ukhuliswa sitjhaba.
tgt: u fhaṱa lushaka lu ṱhogomelaho vhana u fhaṱa lushaka lu ṱhogomelaho vhana vukuzenzele unnamed hu na murero wo ḓoweleaho kha mvelele nnzhi dza vhathu vha afrika une wa ri zwi dzhia muvhu ndu woṱhe u alusa ṅwana.

src: ngetjhudwelimbi, akusin guenock kwaphela umntwa na olahlekelwe yipilwakhe ngabonobangela egade bangakhandelwa, kwaphela nagade abantu abakhulu bathatha igadango elifaneleko lokubatjheja begodu baba nokuziphendulela.
tgt: muhumbulo uyu – wa uri vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha u bveledzisa, vhuvha na tsire ledzo ya ṅwana muṅwe na muṅwe – murero uyu u a ḓa musi ndi tshi humbula nga ha ḽikhaulambilu na lufu lu vhaisaho zwihulu lwa enock mpianzi wa vhukale ha miṅwaha ya 13 lwo iteaho zwezwino khempheni ya tshikolo.

src: emkhumbulwenami kufika nabantwana abanengi, abanjengonathlia pienaar – oneminyaka esi6ababulawa nakudumuzana amagenge ecape flats.
tgt: zwi vhaisaho ndi zwauri, enock a si ene ṅwana e eṱhe we a xelelwa nga vhutshilo nga zwiitisi zwine zwa vhukuma zwa nga thivhelea, arali vhathu vhahulwane vho vha vho ṋe tshedza ndondolo na vhuḓifhi nduleli.

src: besingakafaneli ukula hlekelwa maphilo wabantu abasesebancani kangaka, namaphilo wabanye abanengi abangakabalwa.
tgt: muthu u a dovha a humbula hafhu nga ha vhana vhanzhi, sa nathlia pienaar wa vhukale ha miṅwaha ya 6, vhane vha khou vhulawa kha nndwa dza magevhenga ngei fuletheni dza kapa.

src: zoke iingozezi gade zingakhandelwa nange bekuthethwe amagadango afane leko wokuvikela abantwanaba.
tgt: ri humbula hafhu mpfu dzi khaulaho mbilu dza michael komape na lumka mkethwa, vhuvhili havho vho lovha musi vho wela kha mabunga a dindi.

src: kubonakala ingasuthi thina simphakathi siliselela abentabethu.
tgt: matshilo oṱhe ayo a vhathu vhaṱuku, na matshilo a vhaṅwe vhanzhi, o vha a tshi ḓo vha a songo ṱuwa.

src: abentwana abanengi bazifumana basengozini, engaba sike jana sokuzenzela esikhanjiswa ngemlanjeni nofana batjhiywe babodwa ngemkhukhwini onekesi yepharafeni.
tgt: makhaula mbilu haya oṱhe o vha a tshi ḓo vha o thivhelea arali ho vha na maga o dzhiwaho a u tsireledza vhana kha fhethu hu huvhadzaho.

src: lokha abosokontraka nabatjhiya imigodi ingakavaleki nofana imithangalasisekelo yeenkolo ingatjhejwa nofana iinthuthi zabafundi zilayitjhe ngokudluleleko, amaphilo wabentwana abasengozini.
tgt: zwi ntsumbedza uri, sa lushaka, ri khou laṱedza vhana vhashu.

src: kodwanake kunezenzo ezinye ezingaphezu kokunga tjheji nokungenzi umseben zi ngefanelo.
tgt: vhana vhanzhi vha ḓiwana vhe kha nyimele dzi ofhisaho, kana tshikhwekhwethe tsha tshifhinganyana mulamboni kana u vha sia vha vhoṱhe mukhukhuni hu na lammba ḽa pharafeni.

src: abentwana abanengi basahlelwa ziinlelesi ezibagagadlhelako, amagenge nabathengisi beendakamizwa ngombana abanabuyo.
tgt: musi vhorakhonhṱiraka vha tshi sia mitshini i songo tsireledzea kana themamvele dziso dza tshikolo dzi sa khou londotwa kana tshiendedzi tsha u ya tshikoloni tsho ḓala lu kalulaho, matshilo a vhana a vha o vhewa kha khombo.

src: si mphakathi sitlhoga ukuzimisela nokulima indima ekuvikeleni abentabethu eengozinezi.
tgt: fhedzi hu na zwinzhi u fhirisa u sa vha na ndavha na u sokou litshedzela mushumo.

src: simphakathi kudingeka bona sitjale isiko lokuziphendulela.
tgt: vhana vhanzhi ndi zwipondwa zwa vhabtzipi, magevhenga na vharengisi vha zwidzidzivhadzi nga maanḓa ngauri a vha koni u ḓitsireledza.

src: kufuze siziphendulele kithi ngokwethu, senzele abentabethu nabanye.
tgt: sa lushaka, ri tea u vha na vhuronwane na u ṱalifha vhukuma kha zwa u tsireledza vhana vhashu kha khombo idzi na dziṅwe.

src: nje ngalokha sitlhoga ukuqinise kisa bonyana abentwana ba kghona ukukhulela endaweni ephephileko, ethokomeleko nekhuthazako, kufuze nathi sizizwele umsebenzi wokuvikela nokunakekela boke labo esibaziko nesinetjhebiswano nabo.
tgt: ri tea u vha na vhuḓifhinduleli kha riṋe vhaṋe, kha vhana vhashu na kha vhaṅwe.

src: nanyana sikwamukela ukwehla kwesibalo sabahlongakalele eengozini zendlela kilesisikhathi sokuphumula, iqiniso lendaba kukobana bangaphezulu kwe1,600 abahlongakalele eendleleni zethu esikhathini esingaba yinyanga nesiquntu.
tgt: musi ri tshi ṱoḓa u vhona uri vhana vha khou kona u aluwa kha vhupo vhu na ṱhuṱhuwedzo, ndondolo na tsireledzo, zwo ralo ri tea u pfa zwi mushumo washu u tsireledza na u londota vhoṱhe vhane ra vha ḓivha na vhane ra tshilisana navho.

src: isikopilo lokuziphendulela libiza bonyana kufuze soke sitjhayele ngokuphepha nangokuhlonipha amalungelo wabakhamba ngeenyawo nabanye abasebenzisi beendlela.
tgt: musi ri tshi khou ṱanganedza phungudzeo kha khombo dza badani kha tshifhinga tsha madakalo, ngoho i shushaho ndi ya uri vhathu vha fhiraho 1,600 vho lovha dzibadani dzashu kha tshifhinga tsha ṅwedzi na hafu.

src: isikopilo lokuziphendulela litjho bonyana kufuze abobaba babe yingcenye ekulu epi lweni yabentababo.
tgt: zwi a kula nungo zwauri vhareili vha fhiraho 9,000 vho farelwa vhutshinyi vhu katelaho u reila vho kambiwa, luvhilo, u reila nga u sa londa.

src: abomma abanengi baqalene nomsebenzi wokukhulisa abentwana babodwa, lokhu kuletha ukwehla kwethemba lokuphe pha nelokhunye kibo nebe ntwaneni babo.
tgt: mvelele ya vhuḓifhinduleli zwi amba uri roṱhe ri tea u reila nga vhuronwane na u ṱhonifha pfanelo dza vhaendangaṋayo na vhaṅwe vhashumisi vha bada.

src: umukghwa wokuziphe ndulela utjho bonyana kufuze siye emsemeni ngendlela ephephileko singazibizeli ihiv .
tgt: mvelele ya vhuḓifhinduleli zwi amba uri vhokhotsi vha tea u vha hone kha matshilo a vhana vhavho.

src: singaseli utjwala khulu nofana sisebenzise iindakamizwa.
tgt: vhafumakadzi vhanzhi vha alusa vhana vhe vhoṱhe, zwine zwa anzela u fhungudza khonadzeo dzavho dza u bvelela na dza vhana vhavho.

src: kufuze siphile ipilo ephephileko sikhandele amalwele anokuvikeleka sikwazi ukuphila isikhathi eside.
tgt: mvelele ya vhuḓifhinduleli zwi dovha hafhu zwa amba uri ri tea u ḓigudisa vhudzekani ho tsireledzeaho na u sa ḓiwedza kana u wedza vhaṅwe kha hiv .

src: isikopilo le kufuze ikhuthazwe ngilabo abaseenkhundleni zokuphatha emphakathini, kungaba barholi bezekolo nofana abasopolotiki, abarholi bendabuko nabosaziwako.
tgt: mvelele iyi i tea u kutelwa nga maanḓa nga havho vhane kha lushaka vha fara maimo a maanḓalanga na vhuṱuṱuwedzi, kana vharangaphanḓa vha zwa vhurereli kana vhorapoḽotiki, vharangaphanḓa vha zwa mvelele kana vhaḓivhalea.

src: ngeenkulumo nezenzo zabo, kufuze banqophe ukwakha umphakathi ongcono lapho woke umuntu athokoziswa khona ngokuhle akwenzileko begodu atjhejwa khona.
tgt: nga kha maipfi kana nyito dzavho, vha tea u lusa u fhaṱa lushaka lwa khwine lune vhoṱhe vha dzhielwa nṱha na u londotwa.

src: iimphathimandla ezikhethiweko nabasebenzi bombuso bathweswe umsebenzi wokuqinisekisa ukuphepha nokuqa lelela zehlalakuhle yezakha muzi.
tgt: vhaofisiri vho khethwaho na vhashumeli vha muvhuso vho fhulufhelwa nga vhuḓifhinduleli ha u vhona tsireledzo na vhuvha ha vhadzulapo.

src: kufuze baqinisekise bonyana kunomthangalasisekelo owaneleko nophephileko eenkolweni.
tgt: vha tea u vhona uri hu na themamveledziso dzo teaho zwikoloni.

src: kufuze beqe msi nyana nakuphazamiseka ukuni kelwa kwamanzi emphakathini nofana nakubikwa bona iimbani zestradeni azikhanyi.
tgt: vha tea u dzhia maga nga u ṱavhanya musi hu na khakhathi ya nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha vhadzulapo kana musi mavhone a zwiṱaraṱani o tshi nyalaho o vhigiwa.

src: kufuze baqinisekise bonyana imithetho yezamaphilo nokuphepha iyalandelwa begodu nokuthi umthetho uyahlonitjhwa bewuthotjelwe.
tgt: vha tea u vhona uri milayo ya vhutsirele dzi na mutakalo i khou tevhed zwa na uri mulayo u khou tevhedzwa.

src: phezu komsebenzi karhu lumende oragako, kiyo yoke imikhakha ngomnqopho wokuphumelelisa umsebenzi lo, sizifumene sikateleleka ukuthatha amagadango angakajayeleki.
tgt: ho sedzwa mushumo u no khou itwa kha muvhuso, kha masia oṱhe, u ita uri vhuḓifhi nduleli uhu vhu vhonale, tshiṅwe tshifhinga ri tea u dzhia maga mahulwane.

src: ukuziphe ndulela ngokuhlongakala kwabentwana neengozi ezi bangelwa kuwela kwabe ntwana eendlwaneni zoku zithumela zemigodi, sihlome ijima lokuphepha ukurhabisa ukunikela ngeendlwana ezifaneleko kizo zoke iinkolo ngelizweni.
tgt: u fhindula kha dzimpfu na mafuvhalo o vhangwaho musi vhana vha tshi wela kha mabunga a di ndi, ro rwela ṱari vhurangeli ha safe u tshimbidza ṋetshedzo ya mabunga o teaho kha zwikolo zwoṱhe kha shango.

src: sithumele ibutho lamajoni wesewula afrika (isandf) eendaweni ezithile zekapa ngehloso yokusekela amapholisa emzamweni wawo wokwehlisa inturhu yamagenge.
tgt: ro rumela mmbi ya vhupileli ya lushaka ya afrika tshipembe kha zwipiḓa zwa ḓorobo ya kapa u tikedza mapholisa kha ndingedzo dzavho dza u fhu ngudza khakhathi dzi itwaho nga magevhenga.

src: mhlapha nje, ngokubambisana no mphakathi, sihlome iqhinga eli rhabako lokuphelisa inturhu eqothele abomma nabentwana.
tgt: zwenezwino, ro ṱangana na vhashumeli vha muvhuso, ro ḓidzhenisa kha pulane ya u fhindula zwa shishi u itela u fhelisa khakhathi dzi ite lwaho vhafumakadzi na vhana.

src: sibuka imisebenzi yezakhamuzi neenhlangano ezizinikele emsebenzini wokutjheja ihlalakuhle yabanye.
tgt: naho zwo ralo, hu vhonala hu na zwinzhi zwine ra tea u ita, sa muvhuso nahone sa lushaka.

src: sikhuluma ngabantu abafana noralph bouwers nomark nicholson, abahlela imidlalo yokuzithabisa elavender hill esekapa ngomnqopho wokukhandela ilutjha bona lingangeneleli ezenzweni zamagenge.
tgt: ri fhululedza madzangano na vhathu avho vhe vha vhea mahaḓani avho vhuḓifhinduleli ha vhuvha ha vhaṅwe vhathu.

src: kunabomma, abodade namadodakazi ababafundi nabazinikeleko ehlanga nweni yeoperation bobbi bear, ekuyihlangano yeamanzi mtoti kwazulunatala enikela abentwana abahlukunyeziweko indawo yokufihla ihloko.
tgt: hu na vhathu vha ngaho sa vho ralph bouwers na vho mark nicholson, vhe vha dzudzanya mishumo ya vhuḓimvumvusi ha vhaswa ngei lavender hill kha ḽa ḓorobo ya kapa u vha tsireledza kha u shandukela kha zwa vhugevhenga.

src: kuneenqhema zezekolo ezinengi ezinjengesouthern african catholic bishops’ conference, engihlangene nazo mhlapha bangitjela ngomsebenzi abawenzako ukutjhejana neendingo zabatlhagako, ukusekela imindeni kobana itjheje nokusiza ilutjha ekuqalaneni neentjhijilo ezibembetheko.
tgt: hu na vhomme, dzikhaladzi na vhasidzanyana vhane vha shuma sa matshudeni vha sa shumeli malamba kha operation bobbi bear, dzangano ḽi re amanzimtoti ngei kwazulunatal ḽine ḽa ṋetshedza haya kha vhana vhaṱuku vhe vha tambudzwa.

src: ummongo nomthelela weadhd neadd silusapho nyanda likhona isizo labentwana abatshwenywa bulwele bamadlharuma nokungabi nendlebe.
tgt: mafhungo nga vhuḓalo nga ha adhd na add silusapho nyanda hu na thuso ine ya vha hone kha vhana vhane vha konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi, u vha na mafufulu o kalulaho na u sa dzulisea arali ṅwana ane a vha na thaidzo ya u konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi, u sa dzulisea na u vha na mafulufulu o kalulaho (adhd) kana u a konḓelwa u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi na u sa dzulisea (add) a sa ilafhiwa, nyimele idzo dzi nga vha na masiandaitwa a tshifhinga tshilapfu kha mutakalo wawe.

src: lokha umntwana na kanobulwele bama dlharuma noku ngabi nendlebe (iadhd) nofana bokutlhayelelwa kulalela (iadd), bungelatjhwa ubujamobu njengombana bungaba nemithelela engasimihle kwasafuthi emaphilweni wabo.
tgt: hezwi ndi u ya nga dokotela vho khatija jhazbhay, vhane vha rangaphanḓa yuniti ya zwa muhumbulo ya vhaswa na vhana ngei sibadela tsha townhill pietermaritzburg, ngei kwazulunatal.

src: lokhu kumbono kadorh.
tgt: vho ṱalutshedza uri vho no aluwa, vhana avha vha nga vha kha khombo khulwane ya dziṅwe nyimele dza muhu mbulo, dzi nga ho sa mbilaelo na mutsiko, nahone vha nga shumisa zwikambi lu si lwavhudi.

src: ukhatija jhazbhay, oyihloko yeyunithi yabentwana nokululeka ngomkhumbulo etownhill hospital, esemgungundlovu, kwazulunatala.
tgt: adhd na add vhu kwama mvelaphanḓa dza pfunzo dza vhana nahone maitele avho a nga kwatisa vhaṅwe.

src: wahlathulula bonyana njengabantu abadala, abentwanaba nasele bakhulile bangaba sengozini yasafuthi yamalwele womkhubulo, njengokwethukwa nokugandeleleka komkhumbulo, kanti bangasebenzisa imitjhoga butjhwileni.
tgt: vhana na vhone vha nga nyaliwa, vha dzhena khakhathini na u welwa nga dzikhombo.

src: iadhd neadd ziqintelisa abentwana ukuragela phambili kezefundo kanti nokuziphatha kwabo kungatlhoriya abanye abentwana.
tgt: dokotela vho jhazbhay vho amba uri: "nyimele dza ṅwana muṅwe na muṅwe dzi a aluwa nahone a dzi fani, zwo ralo ndi zwa ndeme u ita ṱhaṱhuvho ya kiḽinikhaḽa yo ṱanḓavhuwaho u vhona zwiṅwe zwithu zwine zwa nga vha zwi tshi kwama mveledziso dzavho, khathihi na zwa ndeme zwine zwa nga itwa u vha thusa u swikela hune vha tea u swikela vhukoni havho ho fhelelaho.

src: abentwanaba bangahloywa, bahlale basemrarweni godu kulula nokulimala kibo.
tgt: "vho ṱalutshedza uri adhd na add ndi thithiso ya nyaluwo ya maluvhi ine ya sumbedziswa nga vhuḓifari vhu si havhuḓi, zwi ngaho sa u sa kona u dzu lisea na u thetshelesa zwavhuḓi.

src: "ubujamo bomntwana ngamunye buhlukile godu buyatjhuguluka, ngalokhoke kuqakathekile ukuhlolisisa kubonwe abanye abonobangela abangaba nomthelela ekukhuleni kwabo, kunye namandla wabo angakhelela ukubasiza ukusebenzisa amakghonwabo ngokuzeleko," kwatjho udorh.
tgt: izwi zwi vhonala nga: u ita vhukhakhi vhu sa tei u itwa u sa fhedza mishumo u xedza zwithu u khakhisea na u hangwa nga u ṱavhanyatsumbo dza u sa dzulisea na u vha na mafulufulu o kalulaho kana u sa langea zwi katela: mazhuluzhulu u tambisa zwanḓa kana milenzhe u swenda swenda kha tshidulo u sokou fhindula u songo thoma wa humbula na u sokou takuwa wa ima u tshi khou lavhelelwa u dzula.

src: umjaphethe wom phathi wesitetjhi sakwaeskom imatimba power station uobakeng mabotja wathi ukutlhayela kwamandla aneleko ngesewula afrika kunomthelela emaphilweni wabantu ngombana imisebenzi yangemihla ayenzeki nakucinywacinywa igezi.
tgt: funga u tsime silusapho nyanda hu na zwithu zwinzhi zwine vhathu vha afrika tshipembe vha nga ita u vhulunga muḓagasi na u thivhela phungudzo ya muḓagasi.

src: umabotja wahlathulula bonyana ukucinywacinywa kwegezi kwenzeka lokha ieskom nayibhalelwa kuphehla igezi eyaneleko ukuhlangabezana neendingo zelizwe.
tgt: mulanguli wa tshiṱitshi o tou farelaho kha tshiṱitshi tsha muḓagasi tsha matimba tsha eskom vho obakeng mabotja vho amba uri ṱhahalelo ya muḓagasi wo teaho kha ḽa afrika tshipembe zwi kwama matshilo a vhathu ngauri mishumo ino dzulela u itwa musi hu na phungudzo ya muḓagasi.

src: ngalokhoke kuqakathekile bonyana woke amasewula afrika afake isandla emizameni yokonga igezi.
tgt: vho mabotja vho ṱalutshedza uri phungudzo ya muḓagasi i bvelela musi eskom i tshi balelwa u bveledza muḓagasi wo linganaho u swikela ṱhoḓea dza shango.

src: iinluleko zeeskom ngokonga igezi: cima ilampa nakunganamuntu ngekamureni sebenzisa amadlhobhu weled cima iinsetjenziswa nazingasebenziko sebenzisa amanzi aqandako kwaphela, ngaphandle kwalokho nakunesidingo, sebenzisa ingubo yegizara ebamba umtjhiso.
tgt: ngauralo ndi zwa ndeme, uri vhathu vhoṱhe vha afrika tshipembe vha ite zwine vha nga kona u shumisa muḓagasi muṱuku.

src: kunabonobangela abangakhandela ukuphehlwa kwegezi, kufaka hlangana ukulungisa, ukucinywa kwegezi okungakahlelwa, nobujamo bezulu.
tgt: zwiitisi zwinzhi zwi nga thivhela mveledzo ya muḓagasi, zwi tshi katela ndondolo, u tsima hu songo lavhelelwaho na, tsha ndemesa, mutsho.

src: umabotja wathi isitetjhi esingaphasi kwelawulo lakhe, ngokukhethekileko, sitshwenywa mazinga womtjhiso aphakemeko.
tgt: vho amba uri: "nga maḓuvha o no fhisesa, tshiṱitshi a tshi koni u bveledza muḓagasi nga nḓila yo teaho.

src: "ngamalanga adlangelwe mtjhiso, isitetjhi sibhalelwa kuphehla igezi ngokupheleleko,".
tgt: "tshiṱitshi tsha muḓagasi tsha matimba tshi shumisa malasha u bveledza muḓagasi, nahone tsho itwa nga nḓila ine tsha bveledza mega watsi (mw) dza 3990.

src: imatimba power station isebenzisa amalahle ukuphehla igezi begodu yakhelwe ukuphehla amamegawathi azii3990 mw.
tgt: "muḓagasi u kovhekanywa nga kha tshiṱitshi tshiṱuku tsha khovhekanyo.

src: abantu abatjha balingomuso lelizwe lekhethu vukuzenzele unnamed ukucocisana nabantu abatjha kuhlala ku ngitjhiya ngivuse lelekile.
tgt: vhaswa ndi vhone vhumatshelo ha shango ḽashu vukuzenzele unnamed u ambedzana na vha swa zwi anzela u ntsia ndi na mafulufulu.

src: kuyathabisa uku zwisisa imizabalazo yabo nokunqoba kwabo kunye nenembombono yabo malu ngana nokuthi kungenziwani ukwenza ilizwe lekhethu libe ngcono.
tgt: a zwi hanedzwi uri vhaswa ndi vhuhone ha ndeme kha muya na muhanga wa lushaka.

src: yinto engeze yaphikiswa ukuthi ukuba khona kwelutjha kuqakatheke khulu emmoyeni nangesakheko sobunjalo besi tjhaba sekhethu.
tgt: kule na kuhumbulele kwa uri vha ṱoḓa u ḓitakadza fhedzi, u sa ḓidzhenisa kha zwa poḽotiki kana u humbulela vhone vhaṋe, ngudo dzapo na dza dzitshaka dzi anzela u khwaṱhisedza uri vhaswa u mona na ḽifhasi vha anzela u vha na fulufhelo nga ha ndavhelelo dzavho.

src: nanyana kunekolelo ekhuthako ethi abantu abatjha bazibona balungile ngakho koke abangikho, abanandaba neendaba zepolitiki namkha into abayaziko kukuzibekelela nje kwaphela, irhubhululo lalapha ekhethu nelemazweni ngamazwe soke isikhathi lifakazela ukuthi abantu abatjha ephasini zombelele bahlala banommoya nethemba elihle ngamathubabo wepumelelo.
tgt: u ya nga mawanwa a ipsos pulse a khetho dza vhathu o bviswaho nga phando, 61% ya maafrika tshipembe vha miṅwaha u bva kha 15 u ya kha 17 vha pfa vha na fulufhelo nga ha 2020. a thi timatimi uri hovhu ndi vhuḓipfi ha vhaswa nga u anga redza nga maanḓa avho vho bebiwaho nga tshifhinga tshi fanaho tsha musi miḽeniamu i tshi khou shanduka vhane zwa zwino vha khou thoma vhutshilo ha vhaaluwa, vhane vhaswa vha vha vhidza ama2000.

src: ngokutjho kwehlolombono yakwaipsos ebizwa ngokuthi yipulse of the people emenyezelwe ngenyanga kanobayeni, ama61% wamasewula afrika weminyaka yobudala ehlangana kwe15 ne17 ahlalele ethembeni ngo mnyaka wee2020.
tgt: ndi vharwa na vhananyana vho bebwaho nga murahu ha dimokirasi.

src: anginakuzaza ngokuthi lo mbono wabantu abatjha abanengi, khulu khulu isizukulwani esibelethwe ekupheleni komnyakakulungwana esikiwo lo abakhona bangena esigabeni sabantu abakhulu njenganje, laba ilutjha elibabiza ngokuthi ma2000.
tgt: musi vha songo ṱangana na tshenzhemo thwii ya tshiṱuhu tsha muvhuso wa tshiṱalula, vha bvela phanḓa na u tshila na vhufa hawo ha tshayandingano ya muvhala, u sa dzula hu fanaho na vhushai.

src: godu bamadodana nabe ntazana ababelethwe ngemva kokufika kombuso wentando yenengi.
tgt: vhaswa avha vha na fulufhelo, vhuḓifulufheli na u fhufhuma lutamo lwa u bvelela.

src: nanyana banga khange bacatjhazelwe bu nqopha lilunya lombuso we bandlululo (iapartheid) nje, kodwana solo baphila nomsalela webandlululo lokutjhiyana ngendima, lokuhlukaniselwa iindawo zokuhlala ngendlela engakalungi kunye newobuchaka.
tgt: vha a ḓivha pfanelo dzavho nahone a vha shavhi u dzi ṱoḓa.

src: abantu abatjhaba bayazithemba, baneqiniso ngezinto abazenzako, baphuphuma itjisakalo yepumelelo.
tgt: vhaswa vha shango vha imela mafulufulu, fulufhelo, vhuḓi mvumvusi, vhukoni, vhuma tshelo na mbofholowo.

src: bayawazi amalungelwabo begodu abesabi ukugandelela isidingo sokobana kufanele banikelwe wona.
tgt: vho bebwa nga tshifhinga tsha thekhinoḽodzhi ya didzhithala na u kona zwavhuḓi kushumisele kwa thekhinoḽodzhi dza tshizwinozwino na u ṱoḓa u dzhena kha mabuḓo e a vha a siho na luthi hi nga tshifhinga tsha vhabebi vhavho.

src: ilutjha lekhethu lijamele amajadu, ithemba, ithabo, amandla wokwenza, ingomuso nekululeko.
tgt: nga madekwana a ḓuvha ḽa phanḓa ha vhuṱambo ha mulaedza wa lushaka ndo vha na mashudu a u ambedzana na tshigwada tsha vhaswa vha mafulufulu kha nyambedzano dza mirafho yo vhalaho yo rambi waho nga zhendedzi ḽa mvele dziso ya vhaswa ḽa lushaka.

src: ngaphambi kwelanga lokwe thula ikulumo yobujamo beli zwe (isona), ngaba nethuba elikhethekileko lokucocisana nesiqhenyana sabantu abatjha abamajadu ekulumiswaneni evange iinzukulwani ngeenga ba ezitjhiyanako eyayibizwe yiejensi yezokuthuthukiswa kwelutjha yelizweloke – (inyda).
tgt: ro amba nga ha zwithu zwine zwa vha zwa vhuṱhogwa vhukuma kha vhaswa na u ṱola nḓila dzine ri nga livhanya kuhu mbulele na nyito dzashu.

src: veleke, imikhulumiswano yethu beyande khulu ngokutholakala kwemisebenzi namathuba wemisebenzi.
tgt: kha vhaswa vha 1.2 miḽioni vhane vha khou dzhena kha makete wa vhashumi ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe, vhane vha ṱoḓa u lingana mbili tsha tshararu vha vha vha vha sa khou shuma kana u guda tshikoloni.

src: ebantwini abatjha abayi1.2 yeengidi abasathoma uku sebenza qobe mnyaka, pheze babili kabathathu babo bagcina bangasebenzi, bangafundi nokufunda.
tgt: vhadzheneli kha nyambedzano vho ṱanganedza zwa uri fhungo ḽa mushumo wa vhaswa ḽi khou sedzeswa khaḽo kha ḽevele dza nṱhesa dza muvhuso.

src: abebakhulumisana ekulumiswaneni le bathokozela ukuthi indaba yomsebenzi ebantwini abatjha itjhejwa ezingeni eliphezulu likarhulumende.
tgt: fhedzi mbuelelo ndi i ḓivheaho: vho ḓiimisela na u ḓo u shela mule nzhe kha ikonomi nga nḓila dzo fhambanaho, hu tshi katelwa na vhoramabindu, fhedzi sisiṱeme ya ndaulo i konḓesaho na u sa vha hone ha ndambedzo ya masheleni zwi vha thivhela u ita nga u ralo.

src: kodwana seyindaba ejayelekileko nakilelihlandla: bakulungele bebanekghono lokufaka isandla emnothweni ngeendlela ezihlukahlukileko, ekubalwa hlangana nazo nokuba bosomabhizinisi, kodwana uburhiyarhiya bemibandela yekambiso kunye nokutlhogeka kweemali zokusekela kuya baliya ukwenza lokho esele balungele ukukwenza.
tgt: sa zwe bright hlongwane u bva kha vhaswa vha re kha mabindu afrika tshipembe a mmbudza zwone, hu fanela u vha na ndambedzo ya masheleni ma nzhi a ṋetshedzwaho vhorama bindu vha vhaswa.

src: njengoba ubright hlongwa ne weyouth in business south africa akhe atjho kimi, kufuze kwandiswe imali ekusekelwa ngayo abosomabhizinisi aba tjha.
tgt: vha tama u vhona tshaka dzo fhambanaho dza zwiimiswa zwa masheleni, zwiimiswa zwa masheleni a mveledziso, vhabindudzi vha phuraivethe, dzifeme dza miko vhe dza phuraivethe khathihi na dzibannga dza zwa mabindu vha tshi ṋetshedza tshikolodo na u betsha kha vhoramabindu vha vhaswa.

src: bangathanda ukubona imihlobohlobo yeenjamiso zeemali, iinhlangano zeemali eziqalelela ituthuko, abasisi abanomusa, amafemu wangeqadi wokulinganiseka komsebenzi kunye nama bhanka akweledisako nasiza abosomabhizinisi abatjha.
tgt: uri shango ḽashu ḽi bvelele ri fanela u lingedza nga nḓila dzoṱhe u khwaṱhisedza uri vhaswa vha khou kona u dzhenela kha ikonomi yashu nga nḓila i pfadzaho, hu nga vha nga nḓila ya mushumo wa fomaḽa kana nga u tou ḓishuma.

src: ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu liphumelele kufuze senze koke esikghona ukukwenza ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu aba tjha bakghona ukungena emno thweni wekhethu ngendlela ebonakalako, nanyana bangena ngendlela ehlelekileko nanyana bangena ngokuzisebenza.
tgt: zwenezwo zwo vha zwo tea uri ndi nga shumisa luvhanḓe ulu u rwela ṱari vhudzheneleli kha zwa mishumo ya vhaswa ya ofisi ya muphuresidennde, ine ya vha bono ḽa maano a vhuṱali ḽa lushaka ḽine ḽa vhekanya nyito ya ndemesa ya u lwa na vhushayamushumo kha vhaswa.

src: laphake kubalwa ithungelelwano lendlela yezokuphatha elizweni loke elithomanisa abantu abafuna umsebenzi namathuba womsebenzi obafaneleko.
tgt: hezwi zwi katela netiweke ya ndangulo ya gondo ḽa lushaka ine ya tshimbilelana na vhaṱoḓi vha mushumo na zwikhala zwa mushumo.

src: lokhuke kuzakwe nza abantu abatjha bakghone ukuthola amathuba njengoba phela abanye babo banganawo nje amathungelelwano enza kube lula ukuthola amathuba.
tgt: hezwi zwi ḓo konisa vhaswa u swikela zwikhala sa i zwi vhaṅwe vhavho vha si na netiweke dzine dza nga leludza uri zwi konadzee u swikela zwikhala.

src: kwanje sekuzavulwa amathuba wokuthola iimfundo ezikhethekileko ezithatha isikhatjhana esifitjhani zifundisa amakghonofundwa afunwa baqatjhi.
tgt: khoso pfufhi dzo khetheaho dzo tou sedzesaho kha mushumo dza zwikili zwine vhatholi vha zwi ṱoḓa zwino dzi ḓo dzudzanywa.

src: lokhuke kunqophe ukulungisa imiraro yokungathomani hlangana kwamahlelo wanje wezefundo, wokufundela umsebenzi newokuthuthukisa kunye neendingo zomnotho.
tgt: hezwi zwi khou itela u tandulula thaidzo ya u sa tshimbilelana vhukati ha mbekanyamushumo dza mveledziso na vhupfumbudzi na pfunzo dzine dza vha hone zwino zwi tshi vhambe dzwa na ṱhoḓea dza ikonomi.

src: siyawuthokozela umsebenzi esele vele usenzeka kilekoro, njengalelihlelo lanje elenziwa ngomnyango wezokulima, zokwabiwa ngobutjha kwenarha nezokuthuthukiswa kweendawo nomnyango wezombusohlanganyela nezendabuko lokuthwasisa ikulungwana yabantu abatjha efreyistata kezokulima nakamanye amakghonofundwa.
tgt: ri ṱanganedza mushumo wo no itwaho kha sia iḽi, u fana na mbekanyamushumo ine ya vha kati zwino nga kha mihasho ya zwa vhulimi, vhuvhusi ha tshumisano na zwa sialala, mveledziso ya mahayani na mvusuludzo ya mavu ya u pfumbudza matshudeni a vha swa a 1,000 ngei free state kha zwa vhulimi na zwiṅwe zwikili.

src: batlhoge amakghonofundwa wecwephetjhe angabenza bakghone ukuzivulela amabhizinisi wabo.
tgt: vhunzhi ha vhaswa vha ṱoḓa u thoma mabindu a vhone vhaṋe.

src: leligadango lizakusekela ukuhluma kwabosomabhizinisi abasese batjha.
tgt: vha shaya zwikili zwa thekhi nikhala zwine zwa nga vha thu sa u thoma mabindu a vhone vhaṋe.

src: leligadangoke lenzelelwe ukwenza itjhuguluko lizwakalise negalelo lalo ezingeni eliphakemeko, hayi njengamahlelo amikghe dlha abe negalelo elingakhange lizwakale kangako.
tgt: ngoho ndi ya uri u ita zwa mabindu a si thandululo ya thaidzo dzoṱhe, fhedzi ndi a tenda tshoṱhe uri ndi iṅwe ya nḓila dzo lingwaho dzi shumaho u ambedzana nga vhuṋe na ndivho, ndeme ya u vha tshipi ḓa, na fulufhelo ḽa vhumatshelo ha vhaswa.

src: kusona ngibuye ngamemezela nokuthi sizakubekela ngeqadi isamba semali esiliphesende linye lesabelo seemali ezakusetjenziselwa ukusiza ngamathuba wokuvulela aba ntu abatjha umsebenzi.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ya tshumelo ya vhaswa ya ofisi ya muphuresidennde i ṋetshedza zwikhala vhaswa uri vha shumele zwitshavha zwa havho.

src: amba dlwana amahlelo namaphro jekthi akhiwako njenganje ukulungisa lomraro welizwe.
tgt: vhurangeli uhu ho dzudzanywa u ḓisa tshanduko na u vha na mvelelo dzi vhonalaho vhukuma, musi zwi tshi vhambedzwa na mbekanyamushumo dzi songo ṱumanaho dze dza vha na mvelelo ṱhukhu.

src: ilutjha lelizwe lekhethu kuyazikhanyela ukuthi libona lokhu njengelizwe lamathuba neenthembiso, ngitjho nanyana bahlangabezana neenqabo nje.
tgt: ndo dovha nda ḓivhadza kha mulaedza wa lushaka uri ri ḓo vhetshela thungo 1% ya mugaganyagwama wa lushaka ine ya ḓo shuma kha vhurangeli ha mishumo ya vhaswa.

src: evekeni ephelako le ngikhulumisene nelutjha elimasewula afrika elingenze ngakhambela phezulu nangibona ukuthi sibuya kude kangangani nokuthi sesiphumelele kangangani.
tgt: tshivhalo tsha mbekanyamushumo na thandela zwi khou dzudza nywa u ḓo sedzana na khaedu dza lushaka.

src: kunabadlali abatjha abanje ngomdlali wegalufu usim ‘tiger’ tshabalala obutha abo nongorwana begalufu bama zwe ngamazwe aseseneminya ka ebunane nje kwaphela.
tgt: vhaswa vha shango ḽashu zwi tou vha khagala uri vha vhona izwi sa shango ḽine ḽa vha na tshikhala na u ṋea fulufhelo , naho hu na zwikhakhisi zwine vha ṱangana nazwo.

src: unge wekhomba ephasini loke esi gabeni seminyaka yakhe kanti selathumbe iphaliswano legalufu ius kids golf tournament lapho selathumbe khona kwabe kwaba kabili.
