tgt: tshiṅwe tshishumiswa tsha ndeme tsha zwa vhusevhi ha zwa masheleni ndi vhuṱoli ha matshilele hu u itela u thivhela zwiito zwa tshanḓanguvhoni zwo itwaho nga vha tshumelo ya mbuelo afrika tshipembe (sars).

src: kuyakhanyake ukuthi liyabonakala beliyezwakala igalelo lamagadango esi wathetheko thina simbuso walelihlandla ukubuyisa amandla, ikghono noku thembeka kweenjamiso ezinesandla epini yokulwa nobukhohlakali.
tgt: mahoḽa, vha sars vho fhedza tsedzuluso dza vhuṱoli ha matshilele dza 25 hu u itela u thivhela zwiito zwa tshanḓanguvhoni dza ndeme i re nṱha ha r450 miḽioni vho sedza kha u tandulula phambano kha mbuelo yo bulwaho na kutshilele kwa muthu ene muṋe.

src: umsebenzi olungele lweko wabo boke aba thobelisimthetho unemba izelelesi lapho kubuhlungu khona khulu: eenkhwa meni zazo.
tgt: zwi khagala uri maga e ra a dzhia sa vhalanguli u vhuedza ndeme, vhukoni na vhufhulufhedzei ha zwiimiswa zwi kwameaho kha u lwa na zwiito zwa tshanḓanguvhoni zwi khou vha na masiandoitwa a sumbeaho.

src: iimali zombuso abantu abaziphakisa zona ngomtjhotjhaphasi ziya buyiswa, kantike labo abenza lokhu amakhotho welizwe lekhethu ayaba tjhutjhisa.
tgt: mishumo yoṱhe ya ṱhanganelano ya mazhe ndedzi oṱhe a vhatevhedza mulayo i khou kwama zwigevhenga kha findi: kha zwikwama zwavho.

src: ukuqinisa umzamo wethu ukuya phambili ukujikisa izinto kuci thwe ubukhohlakali, ngimemezela amabizo weemphathimandla eziqatjhelwe umkhandlu oyelelisa ngobukhohlakali elizweniloke.
tgt: masheleni a muvhuso o hombokwaho na u pambu swa a khou wanuluswa murahu nahone, avho vha ṱumanywaho na zwiito izwo vha khou haṱulwa nga khothe dzashu.

src: ikankere nayibonakele msinyana beyelatjhwa, kwanda amathuba wokuthi umuntu emphetheko aphole ngokupheleleko.
tgt: "tsumbadwadze na zwiṅwe zwino rangela kha vhulwa dze uvhu zwi a konḓa u zwi topola kha mapundu o ḓoweleaho, tsitsinyeo, tshi fhinga tsha nyaluwo khathihi na tshanduko ya mamudi.

src: umlungeleli wezoku thintana ehlanganweni yezekankere yabantwa na ichildhood cancer foundation south africa (ichoc), utaryn seegers uthi ngokwazi amatshayo avamileko wekankere ebantwini abatjha, ungasiza ekuhlengeni ipilo.
tgt: zwo ralo, u zwi wanulusa nga u ṱavhanya ndi zwone zwa ndemesa," vha ralo vha tshi amba.

src: "amatshayo neentjengiso kungaba budisi uku zihlukanisa esikhakheni, emathuthuveni, emikghu bukweni, emafeni kunye nekupherhukapherhukeni kwemizwa yomuntu okujayelekileko.
tgt: u ya nga vha dzangano ḽa zwa khentsa ḽa afrika tshipembe (cansa), vhana vhaṱuku vha afrika tshipembe vha vhukati ha 800 u swika 1000 vha khou wanala vha na khentsa ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe.

src: nokhoke kuqakathekile ukuthi itho lakale msinyana ingakakheli ikankere," kutjho useegers.
tgt: zwo ralo, dzangano ḽo anganya zwauri hafu ya vhana vha re na khentsa kha ḽa afrika tshipembe a vhaathu ṱaluswa.

src: ukusiza ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ikankere ibonakala msinyana ngokungakgho nakalako, ichoc inehlelo lokuphandlulula epha ndlulula ngalo ababelethi nabantwana emphakathini ngamatshayo wokuthoma ayelelisako ekumele aqalwe.
tgt: u thusa u vhona uri khentsa i vhonale nga u ṱavhanya, vha tshiimiswa tsha choc vha tshimbidza mbekanya mushumo dza u tsivhudza zwitshavhani, u itela u ḓivhadza vhabebi na vhana vhaṱuku nga ha tsumbadzwa dze dzine vha tea u dzi thanyela.

src: ihlangano le isekela aba ntwana nelutjha elineka nkere namkha elinokugula kweengazi okungabulala, ibuye isekele nemindenabo.
tgt: tshiimiswa itshi tshi tikedza vhana vhaṱuku na vhaswa vhane vha vha na khentsa kana u sa dzudzanyea ha malofha hu shushaho vhutshilo khathihi na miṱa ya havho.

src: "sinqophe ukwenza ubungcono bokuthi ku tholakale msinyana ukuthi umuntu unekankere, bese utholelwa indlela yokwe latjhwa okulisizo.
tgt: "tshipikwa tshashu ndi u khwinisa ṱhaluso ya vhulwadze nga u ṱavhanya khathihi na u ṋetshedza dzilafho ḽo teaho.

src: ichoc ingaba nabantwana nelutjha elingaphezulu kwe1 500 elitjhejako, ngasikhathi sinye, ukube ngahlanye isekela imindeni engaphe zulu kwe1 500 ngesizo lokuthoba ingqondo na ngeendingo zomphakathi," kuhlathulula useegers.
tgt: kha ṅwaha wa muvhale lano wo fhiraho, vho seegers vho amba uri vha choc vho kona u shumela vhana vhaṱuku vha 1 724, vhaswa vha 553 na vhaaluwa vha 2 232 nga kha mbekanyamu shumo dzavho dza ndeme.

src: emnyakeni weemali osa ndukuphela lo, useegers uthi ichoc ikghone uku siza abantwana abayi1 724, nabantu abatjha abama553, nabantu abakhulu abazii 2 232 ngamahlelo wayo angaqakatheke khulu.
tgt: "tshumelo dzashu dzi katela thikhedzo ya vhuḓipfi nga kha lwendo lwavho lwa u lwala khentsa, u kuvha tedza, u ṋetshedza ndondolo ya musi vha tsini na u lovha khathihi na thikhedzo nga tshifhinga tsha malilo," vha ralo vho seegers.

src: ukuvuselelwa kwen3 kuzuzisa amasewula owen mngadi umduduzi jijana umnikazi wehlangano ethuthukisa abantu abakhubazekileko, engenye yamakhampani azuzako sikhuluma nje ngemali emabhiliyoni amar26 ngokuvuselelwa kukathelawalisa wendlela in3 ehlangana nepietermaritzburg nedurban ekwazulunatala.
tgt: u khwiniswa ha bada khulwane ya n3 zwi khou maanḓafhadza maafrika tshipembe vho owen mngadi vho mduduzi jijana ndi muṋe wa disability empowerment movement, ine ya vha iṅwe ya dzikhamphani dzine dza khou vhuelwa kha masheleni a swikaho r26 biḽioni a thandela ya u khwinisa bada khulwane ya n3 i re vhukati ha pietermaritzburg na durban kha ḽa kwazulunatal.

src: iphrojekthi le, eyenganyelwe yiejensi yokwakhiwa kweendlela yelizweloke (isanral soc limited), iqinisekisa ukuthi abosomabhizinisi abanjengojijana abazuzi kwaphela kodwana bavulela nabanye amathuba wemisebenzi.
tgt: thandela, ine ya khou rangwa p hanḓa nga vha south african road agency soc limited (sanral), vha khou ita uri vhoramabindu vha ngaho sa vho jijana vha sa sedze mbuelo khavho fhedzi vha sikele na vhaṅwe vhathu mishumo.

src: ujijana, onokukhubazeka, uthi ikhampani yakhe ifakela amatshwayo weendlela phakathi kwehilton nepietermaritzburg.
tgt: vho jijana, vhane vha vha muholefhali, vho amba uri khamphani ya vho i shuma u panga tswayo dza badani u bva fhaḽa hilton u swika pietermaritzburg.

src: uqatjhe abantu abali13 godu uthi iphrojekthi le itjhugulule namaphilo wabo.
tgt: vho thola vhashumi vha swikaho 13 nahone vho amba uri thandela iyi yo shandukisa matshilo avho zwihulu.

src: "njengabantu abanokukhubazeka, sitjengisile ukuthi siyakghona.
tgt: "riṋe sa vhathu vhane vha khou tshila na vhuholefhali, ro zwi sumbedza uri na riṋe ri na vhukoni, a ri tsha thembela kha masheleni a mundende.

src: senza umsebenzi wamambala," kwatjho ujijana.
tgt: ri ita mushumo wo lavhelelwaho,’’ vha ralo vho jijana.

src: umphathi wehlelo isanral n3 utsepo matekane uthi ikhampani yakhe iqinisekise ukuthi ama30% womsebenzi wabelwe amakhampani wendawo anekghono lokwenza imisebenzi ethileko.
tgt: vho matekane tsepo vhane vha vha mulanguli wa mbekanyamushumo ya sanral ya bada ya n3 vho amba uri khamphani yavho yo vhona zwo fanela uri 30% ya mushumo i ṋewe kha mphani dzapo dzine dza vha na vhukoni ha mishumo yo fhambanaho.

src: lokhu kwavulela amabhizinisi amancani welutjha amathuba amanengi, newabantu abadinywa amathuba ngaphambilini newabomma.
tgt: hezwi zwo bveledza zwikhala zwa mishumo kha mabindu maṱuku a vhaswa, vhafumakadzi na vhaṅwe vhathu vhe vha vha vho khethululwa murahuni.

src: "kunamabhizinisi ali108 angamancani, aphakathi namakhulu asebenzako njenganje kumaphrojekthi ahlukahlukeneko," ngokutjho kwakhe.
tgt: "hu na 108 ya mabindunyaluwi na mabindu maṱuku ane a khou shuma zwazwino kha thandela dzo fhamba naho,'' vha ralo vha tshiamba.

src: unokuthula zondi weingqalabutho yamalinda multipurpose trading wanikelwa ikontraka yokuletha iqulwani nokufakela amapha yiphi wamanzi.
tgt: vho nokuthula zondi vha khamphani ya ingqalabutho yamalinda multipurpose trading vho avhelwa thandela ya nḓisedzo ya mavu khathihi na u panga dziphaiphi dza maḓi.

src: uthi ikhampani yakhe yaqatjha abasebenzi abane kghono ababunane, ekubalwa hlangana nabo abatjhayeli.
tgt: vho amba uri khamphani yavho yo thola vhashumi vhagudeli vha swikaho malo, zwi tshi katela na maḓiraiva.

src: uzondi ungezelele ngokuthi abomma banekghono njengamadoda godu ikhampani yakhe izenzele igama emsebenzini lo.
tgt: vho zondi vho dovha hafhu vha ambedzela zwa uri na vhafumakadzi vha na vhukoni sa vhathu vhatshinnani na khamphani yavho i na rekhodo yavhuḓi ya zwa nḓisedzo ya tshu melo.

src: wangezelela ngokuthi, "sizwisisa ukuqakatheka kwesikhathi ngakho siyaphumelela ukuqeda umsebenzi ngeenkhathi esibekelwe zona ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iphrojekthi ikhamba ngefanelo.
tgt: "ri a pfesesa vhudeme ha tshifhinga khathihi na u kona u swikela zwipikwa zwashu u itela u vhona uri thandela i khou tshimbila nga ngona.

src: sithabela ithubeli godu sithemba ukuthi kusazokuvela amanye ukuze ikhampani yethu ikhule ukuya ngokwamazinga wezokwakha".
tgt: ri khou livhuwa tshoṱhe u ṋewa tshikhala itshi nahone ri fulufhela uri hu tshe na zwinzhi zwi re phanḓa u itela uri khamphani yashu i aluwe nga ngona kha ḽeveḽe dza zwa u fhaṱa,'' vha ralo vha tshi ambedzela.

src: amaphrojekthi karhulumende aqakathekileko welizweloke umatekane uthi ukuthuthukiswa kwedurbanfree stategauteng logistics and industrial corridor kubekelwe isabelomali esilinganiselwa kumabhiliyoni amar26 begodu ingenye yamaphrojekthi karhulumende aqakathekileko welizweloke nahlanganisiweko.
tgt: thandela dza ndeme dza muvhuso wa lushaka vho matekane vho amba uri vha durbanfree stategauteng logistics na vha mveledziso ya mukwita wa ṋdowetshumo vha na mugaganyagwama u anganyelwaho kha r26 biḽioni na zwa uri ndi iṅwe ya thandela dzo dzudzanywaho dza nḓila dza vhuṱali dza muvhuso wa lushaka.

src: ekupheleni kwayo iphrojekthi le, in3 izakube seyibanzi, inemizila emine namkha emihlanu ngehlangothini linye, godu neempambanandlela ezikulu zizokutjhugululwa ukwenza ngcono ukutjhelela komjeje weenkoloyi.
tgt: thandela iyi i ḓo ṱandavhudza bada ya n3 nga ḽaini dzo vhalaho kha lurumbu lwo livhaho fhethu huthihi, na maṅwe mafhande mahulwane a ḓo shandukiswa u itela u khwinifhadza kutshimbilele kwa vhuendi.

src: isigaba sen3 esithintekako besolo eminyakeni edlulileko sinesiminyaminya seenkoloyi, khulukhulu ngeenkhathi zesiminyaminya ngombana inengi lamatrogo athwala ipahla asuka edoyelweni leenkepe ledurban lisebenzi sa indlela enguthelawalisa ukuya egauteng nakezinye iimfunda ezimaphakathi nelizwe.
tgt: tshipiḓa tsha bada ya n3 tshe tsha vha tsho vhaisala tsho vhanga u tsitsikana ha vhuendi lwa miṅwaha yo vhalaho, kanzhisa nga zwifhinga zwine vhuendi ha vha ho ḓalesa magondoni zworalo vhunzhi ha maḽori a u endedza thundu a ne a takuwa vhuimangalavha ha durban a tshimbila kha bada ya n3 o livha gauteng na kha maṅwe mavunḓu a wanalaho vhukati ha shango.

src: sele kube neengo zi ezinengi ezibangelwa batjhayeli bamatrogo wemithwalo ngokungatjheji kwabo emajikeni anobungozi.
tgt: ho no ḓivha na khombo dza badani dzo vhalaho dzo vhangwa nga vhareili vha maḽori a u endedza thundu nga u sa ṱhogomela zwavhuḓi midzengani yo khonakhonesaho kha iyo bada.

src: "ngaphandle kokufumana ipengu yesiminya minya esithuwelelekwesi ngokwenza ubulula boku khamba kweenkoloyi lokha nakungezelelwa imizila, ukwenziwa ngcono kwen3 kuzokuletha ukuphepha.
tgt: "nga nnḓa ha u tandulula thaidzo ya u ongolowa ha vhuendi nga kha u ita bada khulwane nga thandela ya u engedza dziṅwe ḽaini dza bada, u khwinifhadzwa ha bada ya n3 zwi ḓo ṱuṱuwedza tsirakhombo.

src: iimpambanandlela ezingakaphephi zizokuhlelwa kabutjha", kwalathisa umatekane.
tgt: mafhande a songo tsireledzeaho a ḓo fhaṱululwa nga huswa,’’ vha ralo vho matekane.

src: isanral inikele amakontra ka amathathu ekoteni yokugcina yomnyaka wee2021, umsebenzi wokwakha wathoma hlangana kukatjhirhweni nosihla bantangana.
tgt: vha sanral vho avhela thandela tharu kha kotara ya u fhedzisela ya ṅwaha wa 2021, nahone mushumo wa u fhaṱiwa wo thoma vhukati ha ṅwedzi wa phando na wa lambamai.

src: iingaba ezilungiswako njenganje libanga lamakhilomitha ali19 ukusuka ecato ridge ukuya edardanelles, edume ngokuthi yiumlaas road; isigaba samakhilomitha ama26.6 ukusuka epambanandlela yedardanelles interchange ukufika elynnfield park; nebanga elimakhilomitha ama30 elisuka elynnfield park ukuya epambanandlela iashburton interchange.
tgt: zwipiḓa zwine zwa zwino zwono khwinifhadzwa ndi khiḽomithara (km) dza 19 ya u bva cato ridge u swika dardanells, hune ha ḓivheswa nga ḽa uri umlaas road; tshipiḓa tshi no lingana 26.6 km tsha u bva mafhandeni a dardanelles u swika lynnfield park; khathihi na 30 km ya u bva lynnfield park u swika mafhandeni a ashburton.

src: umatekane uhlathulule ngokuthi isip2 izokuqinisa umzila weenthuthi hlangana namabubulo amakhulu wesewula afrika, kuthuthuke ukungena emazikweni wedurban wokuthumela newokungenisa ipahla nokwenza kusebenzeke ngcono khulu kilomzila.
tgt: vho matekane vho ṱalutshedza zwa uri sip2 i ḓo khwaṱhisa vhupuḽani na vhuendedzi ha thundu kha thihi na mukwita wa vhuendi vhukati ha nḓowetshumo khulwane dza vhuimangala vha ha ḽa afrika tshipembe, u khwinifhadza tswikelo kha vhuvhambadzelannḓa na vhuṱunḓi kha zwiimiswa zwa durban khathihi na u alusa tshumelo kha mukwita uyo.

src: ungezelele ngokuthi iphrojekthi le iyingcenye yomtlamo wokuthuthukiswa kwelizweloke (indp) wee2030 neqhinga elikhulu lokulawula iinthuthi lelizweloke lomnyaka wee2050 elisekela ihlelo lokwakha kabutjha nokuvuselela umnotho (ierrp).
tgt: vho ambedzela zwa uri thandela iyi ndi tshipiḓa tsha pulane ya mveledziso ya lushaka ya u swika nga ṅwaha wa 2030 na pulane khulwane ya vhuendi ha lushaka ya u swika nga ṅwaha wa 2050 khathihi na u tikedza muvhuso kha pulane ya u vhuedzedza na mvusuludzo ya ikonomi.

src: utjwala bungatsirimeza ipilo yomntanakho ongakabukubelethwa vukuzenzele unnamed abomma abasebantwini banesibopho sokungaseli ngombana utjwala bungabangela ubulwele obukhandela ukukhula komntwana.
tgt: zwikambi zwi a vhaisa mutakalo wa ṅwana we vha ḓihwala ngae vukuzenzele unnamed vhafumakadzi vha vhaimane vha fanela u vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha u sa nwa nga uri zwikambi zwi vhanga tshiimo tshine tsha thithisa mveledzo ya kusikelwe kwa ṅwana.

src: ikulumo le idenjwe lisekela likangqongqotjhe wezokuthuthukiswa kwehlalakuhle yomphakathi, uhendrietta bogopanezulu, ohlome mhlapha ijima lokuyelelisa ngokulimala kombungu okubangelwa butjwala i999 foetal alcohol spectrum disorder (ifasd).
tgt: izwi zwo ambiwa nga mufarisaminisṱa vha muhasho wa zwa matshi lisano, vho hendrietta bogopenezulu, vhe zwenezwino vha thoma mbekanyamushumo ya 999 foetal spectrum disorder (fasd).

src: umnqopho wejimeli kukhuthaza imiphakathi ukusiza ngokuvikela abentwana abangakabukubelethwa ngokufundisa abantu, khulukhulu abomma abaseseminyakeni yokubeletha, mayelana nengozi yokusela utjwala lokha nabasidisi namkha nabamunyisako.
tgt: tshipikwa tshuhulwane tsha vhurangeli uvhu ndi u ṱuṱuwedza zwitshavha kha u tsireledza vhana vhane a vhathu bebiwa nga kha u pfumbudza vhathu, nga maanḓa vhafumakadzi vho ḓihwalaho, nga ha khombo ya u nwa zwikambi musi vha vhaimane kana vha tshi khou mamisa.

src: "kuqakathekile kibo boke abomma abasebantwini nalabo abafuna ukubeletha abentwana abaphile kuhle ukuthi bazile utjwala.
tgt: "ndi zwa ndeme vhukuma kha vhafumakadzi vho ḓihwalaho na avho vhane vha tama u beba vhana vha re na mutakalo wavhuḓi uri vha si nwe zwikambi.

src: ingozi ebangelwa yifasd ingeyasafuthi okutjho bona ayilungiseki begodu abentwana ababelethwa nobujamobu baba nemiraro ngokwesakhiwo nemkhumbulweni wabo," kwatjho isekela likangqongqotjhe ubogopanezulu nagade kuhlonywa ijimeli.
tgt: tshinyalo ine ya vhangwa nga fasd ndi ya vhutshilo hoṱhe nahone a i na phodzo, na uri vhana vhane vha bebiwa na nyimele iyi vha vha na thaidzo dza muvhili na muhumbulo,’’ vho ralo mufarisaminisṱa vho bogopanezulu kha mushumo wavho wa u thoma.

src: isekela likangqongqotjhe ubogopanezulu mhlapha bekavakatjhele iindawo ezihlukahlukeneko ngelizweni, ayokufundisa abomma ngengozi yokusela utjwala lokha nabasebantwini njengengcenye yejima i999 fasd.
tgt: vho dovha hafhu vha ambedzela zwauri shango ḽa afrika tshipembe ḽi ḓivhelwa u vha na thaidzo ya u nweswa ha zwikambi, hu ne ḽa vha kha tshiimo tsha nṱhesa sa maṅwe mashango a no ḓivhelwa zwa u nweswa ha zwikambi ḽifhasini ḽothe.

src: nagade aseboitekong erustenburg esetlhagwini tjingalanga, utjele abahlali ukuthi amazinga wokusela utjwala butjhwileni elokitjhinela ayathusa.
tgt: mufarisaminisṱa vho bogopanezulu zwenezwino vho dalela zwipiḓa zwo fhambanaho zwa shango, vha tshi khou pfumbudza vhafumakadzi nga ha khombo dzine dza vhangwa nga u nwa zwikambi arali u muimane sa tshipiḓa tsha fulo ḽa 999 fasd.

src: umuntu wengubo oneenyanga ezine asebantwini nosisakhamuzi seboitekong, ubasetsana tlalang (oneminyaka ema28), ogade akhona kelinye lamajima la, uthe walisa ukusela utjwala nakezwa ukuthi usebantwini godu wathi ufumana itjhejo labantu abasebantwini godu ufumana nokwelulekwa emtholapilo.
tgt: musi vha ngei boitekong vhu poni ha rustenburg vunḓuni ḽa devhula vhukovhela, vho ṱalutshedza vhadzulapo zwa uri ḽeveḽe dza u tambudzwa ha zwikambi tshikolobulasi itsho zwo kalulesa.

src: ukhuthaze abanye abomma abasebantwini bona balise utjwala ngaphandle kokuriyada, balise nokukhokha iindakamizwa.
tgt: mufumakadzi o ḓihwalaho lwa miṅwedzi miṋa nahone ane a vha mudzulapo wa boitekong, basetsana tla lang (28), we a vha tshipiḓa tsha mafulo ayo, o amba uri o litsha u nwa zwikambi nga murahu ha musi a tshi wanulusa uri o ḓihwala na uri u kati na maitele a u ṱoliwa na u wana mafhungo nga ha vhuimane hawe hanefho kiḽiniki ya tsini.

src: unqongqotjhe uyelelise ngokuthi asikho isihlahla sokwelapha amalwele abangelwe butjwala – indlela engcono yokuwakhandela kuzila utjwala lokha umuntu nakasebantwini.
tgt: o humbela vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi vho ḓihwalaho uri vha litshe zwa u nwa zwikambi na u shu misa zwidzidzivhadzi.

src: umzabalazo wokubuyisa ubuntu esewula afrika vukuzenzele unnamed mhla ali12 ku khukhulamungu ngomnyaka we1977, usteven bantu biko wahlongakalela ezandle ni zamapholisa epretoria central prison.
tgt: nndwa ya u ṋetshedza afrika tshipembe tshifhaṱuwo tshiswa tsha muthu vukuzenzele unnamed nga ḽa 12 khubvu medzi 1977, vho stephen bantu biko vho lovhela tshiṱokisini vhe dzhele fhaḽa dzhele ya vhu kati ya piṱori.

src: wadinywa isithunzi sobuntu, ekumgomo onzinze ekutjhotjhozeleni kwakhe ukuzikhakhazisa kwabanzima ngombalabo.
tgt: tshirunzi tsha muthu, mutheo we wavha u vhudzivhani ha mbilu yavho ya u lwela mvusuludzo ya vharema, vho dzimiwa tshone.

src: ngokutjho kwegcwetha lomndeni, usir sydney kentridge, "ukuhlongakala kwakhe kwaba ngokomuntu olahliweko nonganabani arabhalele emedzeni nefluru yamatje ngemaseleni".
tgt: uya nga maipfi a ramilayo wa muṱa vho sydney kentridge, "lufu lwavho lwo vha lu ṱungufhadzaho nahone vhe vhoṱhe vho eḓela kha thovho nṱha ha tombo nga ngomu dzhele."

src: kuhlala kungunoba ngela wamatlhuwo nalokha sekuminyaka kwenzeka, nasicabanga ukuthi usteve biko bekaneminyaka ema30 kwaphela nakahlongakalako.
tgt: hezwi zwi kha ḓivha tshiko tsha masinḓambilu nga murahu ha miṅwaha minzhisa yo fhiraho, u humbula uri vho steve biko vho vha vha tshi tou vha na miṅwaha ya 30 fhedzi musi vha tshi lovha.

src: ipilwakhe yaqinteliswa msinynana lokha nakathoma ukuba sesiqongolweni sayo, ipheliswa ngilabo ababesaba amandla nomthelela wemikhumbulo yakhe mayelana nokuzitjhaphulula kunye nemizamo yakhe yokutjala ukuzikhakhazisa nokuba nesithunzi kibobaba nabomma abanzima.
tgt: vho vhulawa nga tshifhinga tsha musi vhe maṱhakheni a vhutshilo havho nga avho vhe vha ofha maanḓa na mihumbulo yavho ya u ḓivhofholola khathihi na nungo dza u vusuludza vhuvha na tshirunzi zwa vhanna na vhafumakadzi vha vharema.

src: akhange aphile bekabone lokho abekakubiza ‘ngonongorwana orhanya zelako’, ukufikelelwa kobuntu bamambala.
tgt: vhutshiloni havho hoṱhe a vho ngo vhuya vha vhona zwe vha vha vha tshi zwi vhidza ‘muṅeṋe u penyaho’, muḽoro wa vhukuma wa vhuthu.

src: nakatlola ngomkhumbu lwakhe, wakhuluma amezwi abanendumela nakathi: "ngesikhathi esifaneleko sizakuba sebujameni boku thwesa isewula afrika isipho esikhulu khulu – ubuso obubonakalako.
tgt: musi vha tshi ṅwala nga ha kuhumbulele ukwu, vho amba uri: "nga murahu ha tshifhinga ri ḓo swika kha tshiimo tshine ḽa afrika tshipembe ḽa ḓo ṋetshedzwa mpho khulwanesa – ya tshifhaṱuwo tsha muthu."

src: "lokha nasithumba ikululeko yethu ngomnyaka we1994, sazwisisa ukuthi ilungelo lokukhetha laliyi ngcenye yomzabalazo wethu wesithunzi sabantu.
tgt: musi ri tshi wana mbofholowo yashu nga 1994, ro pfesesa uri pfanelo ya u khetha yo vha itshi tou vha iṅwe ya nndwa yashu ya u lwela tshirunzi tsha muthu.

src: eminyakeni ematjhumi amabili yentando yenengi yethu, sisaqalene neense lele ezifana nomtlhago, ukutlhayela kwemisebenzi nokungalingani ngokomnotho.
tgt: nga murahu ha miṅwaha ya fumbili malo ri kha mbofholowo, ri kha ḓi livhana na khaedu nnzhisa, u fana na vhushai, u shaea ha mishumo khathihi na u savha ha ndinganyelo.

src: ngaleso sizathu vane silibale ibanga esilikhambileko ekuphumeleliseni imigomo esisekelo somthethosisekelo welizwe lekhethu ekungiwo oyisika yemikhumbulo neemfundiso zikasteve biko.
tgt: nga nṱhani ha zwenezwo, ri dzulela u kundelwa u vhona lwendo lwe ra tshimbila lwone kha u ṋetshedza mutheo wa ndayotewa yashu zwe zwavha zwi zwone zwo hwalaho mihumbulo na pfunzo dza vho steve biko.

src: ngomnyaka we1977, umbuso welunya wabulala omunye wabarholi abaveleleko nabathembisako ngelizweni ngokumdima ukugoma, amanzi nokwela tjhwa abekakutlhoga khulu ngemva kokudendebulwa mapholisa wombuso weba ndlululo.
tgt: nga ṅwaha wa 1977, muvhuso wa tshiṱuhu wo vhulaha murangaphanḓa washu we avha atshi sumbedza uvha na vhu matshelo nga u mu dzima zwiḽiwa, maḓi khathihi na mishonga zwe avha a khou zwi ṱoḓesa nga nṱhani ha u rwiwa lwa tshiṱuhu nga mapholisa a tshiṱalula.

src: ngemva kweminyaka ema tjhumi amabili, esahlulelweni somnyaka we1997, ikhotho yomthethosisekelo yathi ukuzaliselela amalungelo asisekelo wazo zoke izakhamuzi nokulwela ukufikelela amalungelo wezehlalakuhle newomnotho kulitshwayo eliqakathekileko lomphakathi wentando yenengi lokha nakubuyiswa isithunzi esilahlekileko.
tgt: nga murahu ha miṅwaha ya fumbili, kha khaṱhulo ya 1977, khothe ya ndayotewa yo amba zwa uri u swikelela ndavhelelo dza pfanelo dza mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe khathihi na u swikelela pfanelo dza zwa matshilisano na ikonomi zwi tou khwaṱhisedza lushaka lwa demokirasi lu no khou lwela u vhulunga tshirunzi tsho lozweaho.

src: namhlanjesi esewula afrika, siyaraga nokusebenzela ukuphumelelisa amalungelo asisekelo wamasewula afrika woke ukuze baphile ipilo enganamalwele, enganandlala nokudinywa amathuba.
tgt: kha ḽa afrika tshipembe ṋamusi, ri khou isa phanḓa na u shuma u lwela pfanelo dza mudzulapo wa afrika tshipembe muṅwe na muṅwe uri vha kone u tshila vhutshilo ha khwiṋe vhu si na malwadze, nḓala na u dzimiwa zwithu.

src: imibuso yentando yenengi esele ibuse amahlandla alandelanako yethule imithethomgomo yokuvuselela isithunzi senengi esalahlekako ngelizweni ngokuletha ifundo, isizo lezepilo ehle, iinkumba nezenzelwa ezisisekelo.
tgt: mivhuso nga u tevhekana hayo ya demokirasi yo tevhedzela milayo ya u tsireledza tshirunzi tsho lozweaho tsha vhathu vhashu vhanzhi nga u ṋetshedza pfunzo, ndondolo ya mutakalo, dzinnḓu kha thihi na tshumelo dza ndeme.

src: ngesewula afrika namhla njesi, ifundo enetlha ililunge lo elisisekelo.
tgt: kha ḽa afrika tshipembe ṋamusi, pfunzo ya khwiṋe ndi pfanelo ya ndeme.

src: umbuso usisa khulu efundweni yabasathomako ekusekeleni imiphumela yefundo yezakhamuzi zethu ezisakhulako ukuze zifikelele imiphumela emihle ngokukghonakalako.
tgt: muvhuso wo tou fombe kha mveledziso ya vhana vhaṱuku, nga u tikedza mvelelo dza ngudo dza vhana vhashu vhaṱuku, wa dovha wa ṋetshedza magavhelo nga kha mbekanyamushumo ya u ṋetshedza zwiḽiwa zwikoloni u vhona uri vhagudiswa vhaswa vha swikelele zwa khwiṋe khavho.

src: ngesizo lesikhwama sesizo leemali kubafundi selizweloke (insfas) nezinye iindlela ezihlukileko zesekelo lombuso, iinkulungwana zelutjha lamasewula afrika, zibuya emindenini enganabuyo, ziphumelele ukuba bodorhodere, amagcwetha, abotitjhere, abososayensi, bemisebenzi yamakghono nabosomabhizinisi.
tgt: nga kha tshikimu tsha lushaka tsha masheleni a u thusa matshudeni na dziṅwe thikedzo dza muvhuso, vhaswa vha zwigidi vha afrika tshipembe ubva miṱani yo fhambanaho vho kona uvha madokotela, vhoramilayo, vhadededzi, vhorasaintsi, dziathizene na vhabindudzi.

src: urhulumende usekela izakhamuzi ezitlhagako nezinganabuyo ngehlelo leembonelelo zezehlalakuhle nokuvula amathuba wemisebenzi ngamahlelo wombuso aqatjha imiphakathi.
tgt: muvhuso u tikedza vhashai khathihi na vhadzulapo vho dziedzeaho nga kha tsireledzo ya matshilisano yo khwaṱhaho na u ṋetshedza tshikhala zwa mushumo nga kha mbekanyamushumo dza tshitshavha dza u sika mishumo.

src: kileyasewula afrika usteve biko ahlongakalela kiyo, ukukhuluma ngoku tjhaphuluka bekumphambo begodu namajima wezepolotiki bekangunobangela wokubotjhwa namkha oku ngaphezulu kwalokho.
tgt: kha ḽa afrika tshipembe musi uḽa wa tshiṱalula ḽe vho steve biko vha lovha khaḽo, pfanelo dza u amba dzo vha dzi siho nahone u ḓidzhenisa kha zwa poḽotiki zwo vha zwi tshi ita uri vhathu vha farwe kana vha ṱangana na zwi no vhavhesa.

src: esewula afrika namhla njesi, abantu abatjha abalingana nosteve biko nabangaphasi ngeminyaka bakhamba phambili ngamajima wokutjhotjhozela abakholelwa kikho begodu bayakghona ukuhloma iinhlangano ngaphandle kokutshwenywa ngemithetho yokuvalwa umlomo.
tgt: kha ḽa afrika tshipembe ṋamusi, vhaswa vhane vha lingana na zwe vho steve biko vha vha vhe zwone kale na vhaṱuku khavho vha vhudzivhani ha u lwela zwithu zwi re tsini navho, nahone vha a kona u dzudzanya usa tambudzwa kana u pandelwa.

src: ikululeko yokukhuluma nokuhlanganyela, ilungelo lokutjhagala nelokulingana phambi komthetho lingelomuntu woke.
tgt: u amba wo vhofholowa na u ḓisendedza tsini na zwine wa funa, pfanelo ya u gwalaba khathihi na pfanelo ya ndinganyelo phanḓa ha mulayo ndi dza roṱhe.

src: njengelizwe, sesikhambe ibanga elide ekufikeleleni isithunzi sobuntu, okumgomo usteve biko egade awu thanda nanyana sisese nebanga elide ekumele silikhambe.
tgt: sa shango, ri bva kulesa kha u swikelela tshirunzi tsha muthu, mutheo we vhosteve biko vha u pembelela.

src: ngaphandle komsebenzi, ngaphandle kweenkumba, igezi namanzi, ngaphandle kwenarha, ngaphandle kwamakghono namkha amathuba, iingidigidi zamasewula afrika zisadinywe ubujamo bepilo eziyifisako nefaneleko.
tgt: honeha, hutshe na zwinzhi zwine ra kha ḓi tea u zwi ita.

src: kungebangelo urhulumende asebenzisana nababambisani ukwakha umnotho ohlanga nyelweko, ukuvula imi sebenzi, ukukghonakalisa amabhizinisi ukuthi aphumelele nokulwa nomtlhago nendlala.
tgt: musi ri sina mishumo, ri sina dzinnḓu, muḓagasi kana maḓi, ri sina mavu, ri sina zwikili kana zwikhala, vhadzulapo vha dzimiḽioni vha ḽa afrika tshipembe vha tshe vha kha ḓi kundelwa u wana vhutshilo vhune vha khou vhu ṱoḓa na u vha tea.

src: nakutjhejwa ukukhambe lana kwepilo kasteve biko nelifa alitjhiyako, sikhumbula isibawo sakhe esinamandla ebantwini ukuthi babe batlami bekululeko yabo.
tgt: ndi ngazwo muvhuso utshi khou shuma na vhashumisani kha zwa matshilisano u fhaṱa ikonomi ya ṱhanganelano, u sika mishumo, u konisa mabindu uri a aluwe na u lwa na vhushai khathihi na nḓala.

src: ihlelo lokuhlomisa abongazimbi libuyisa ithemba owen mngadi i hlelo lokuhlomisa abongazimbi lethohoyandou (itvep) linqophe ukubuyisa ithemba nokuthembeka ehlelweni lezomthethobulungiswa ngamagadango walo atjhubileko anqophe ukusiza abakhe bakhahlunyezwa yinturhu eqothele bobulili obuthileko (igbv) neyokukatwa ngokubalethela isizo eliphathelene nokuthotjwa kwengqondo neendaba zomphakathi.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ya u maanḓafhadza mupondwa i vhuisa fulufhelo vho owen mngadi mbekanyamushumo ya u maanḓafhadza mupondwa ya ṱhohoyanḓou (tvep) i lwela u vhuedzedza fulufhelo na vhufulufhelo kha sisiṱeme ya vhulamukanyi nga kha fulo ḽihulwane ḽa vhurangeli ho livhiswaho kha u thusa vhaponyi vha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu (gbv) na u tzhipiwa nga u vha ṋetshedza tshumelo malugana na vhushaka vhukati ha kuhumbulele kwa muthu na kutshilele kwa tshitshavha.

src: itvep , eyasungulelwa elimpopo ematjhumini amabili weminyaka edlulileko, isebenzela esibhedlela itshilidzini nesibhedlela idonald fraser, ngaphasi kwethulamela local municipality.
tgt: tvep , yo tumbulwa ngei limpopo miṅwahani i fhiraho 20, i shumela sibadela tsha tshilidzini na tsha donald fraser nga fhasi ha masipala wapo wa thulamela.

src: umjaphethe womnqophisi ufhatuwani manthada uthi ihlelweli linqophe ukuwuqeda nya umukghwa wokukhahlunyezwa ngokomseme, liqede negbv kunye nokukhahlunyezwa kwabantwana ezakhamuzini zethohoyandou, njengoba imilandu enje kuyinto evamileko kilendawo.
tgt: mulangi o farelaho, vho fhatuwani manthada, vha ri mbekanyamushumo yo livhiswa kha u dzhenisa kuhumbulele kwa u sa konḓelela na luthihi zwa u tambudzwa lwa vhudzekani, gbv na u tambudzwa ha vhana vhukati ha vhadzuli vha ṱhohoyanḓou, zwi tshi khou bva kha uri milandu iyi i khou itea vhuponi uvhu.

src: uthi ngeenkhathi ezidlulileko iimbalobalo bezitjengisa ukuthi minengi imilandu yokukata ethohoyandou, kodwanake itvep seyenze litho likhulu ukuphandlulula abantu nekuthobeni abantu ekukhahlumezekeni kwengqondo kobanyana kuzokuqedwa lomukghwa olikhwekhwe.
tgt: vha ri tshifhinga tsho fhiraho, mbalombalo dza zwiito zwa vhugevhenga dzo vha dzi tshi sumbedza uri hu na milandu minzhi ya u tzhipa vhuponi ha ṱhohoyanḓou, fhedzi tvep yo ita mvelaphanḓa khulwane kha u ita tsivhudzo khathihi na u ṋetshedza tshumelo dza khuthadzo ya ṱhiroma hu u itela u lwa na samba iḽo.

src: njengoba iphasi lizabe litjheje amalanga ali16 wokulwa nenturhu eqothele abantu abasikazi nabantwana ukusukela ngomhla wama25 kusinyikhaba ukuyokufika kumhla we10 kunobayeni, umanthada uthi ihlelo labeli liyaneliseka ngendima esele yenziwe ngokukhuthazwa kwezakhamuzi ukuthi zilemuke amalungelo wazo bezibike imilandu eyenzekako.
tgt: musi ḽifhasi ḽi tshi ḓo vha ḽi kha fulo ḽa maḓuvha a 16 a u lwa na khakhathi dzi itelwaho vhafumakadzi na vhana u bva nga ḽa 25 ḽara u swika 10 nye ndavhusiku, vho manthada vha ri mbekanyamushumo yo fushea nga mvelaphanḓa yo itwaho kha u ṱuṱuwedza vhadzuli u pfesesa pfanelo dzavho na u vhiga zwiito zwa vhugevhenga.

src: "itvep yemukela iinlilo ezihlangana nama80 ne100 zabongazimbi benturhu yomkhaya qobe yinyanga, ukube kanti imilandu yokukata ebikwa qobe yinyanga ihlangana kwama45 nama50," kutjho umanthada.
tgt: "tvep i ṱanganedza tshivhalo tsha vhukati ha 80 na 100 tsha vhapondwa vha khakhathi dza miṱani ṅwedzi muṅwe na muṅwe, ngeno milandu ya u tzhipa ya tshivhalo tsha vhukati ha 45 na 50 i tshi vhigwa ṅwedzi muṅwe na muṅwe," vha ralo vho manthada.

src: emaziko walelihlelo lapho kutholakala khona koke okufunekako kukhona imihlobohlobo yesizo ekusizwa ngalo abongazimbi, ekubalwa hlangana nalo nesizo lezomthetho, ukuvikelwa kwabongazimbi ebakhahlumezini babo, ukulandelelwa kwemilandu esekhotho, ukuthotjwa kwengqondo nokuhlonyiswa ngamakghonofundwa, ngaleyindlela abongazimbi bathole ithuba lokuthoma phasi.
tgt: senthara dza mbekanyamushumo dzi re na zwoṱhe dzi ṋea tshaka nnzhi dza tshumelo, hu tshi katelwa na tswikelelo kha thusedzo ya zwa mulayo, tsireledzo ya vhapondwa kha vhaiti vha vhugevhenga, u vhea iṱo milandu i re khothe, u khuthadza na u maanḓafhadza nga kha mveledziso ya zwikili, ngauralo hu u itela u thusa vhapondwa uri vha kone u fhaṱa nga huswa matshilo avho.

src: umanthada uthi itvep isebenza ngokubambisana namapholisa wakwasaps, nomnyango wezepilo kunye nomnyango wezokuthuthukiswa komphakathi ukukhandela abongazimbi ukuthi bangakhahlumezeki kwesibili nabavula umlandu wokukhahlunyezwa.
tgt: vho manthada vha ri tvep i shumisana na vha tshumelo ya mapholisa ya afrika tshipembe, muhasho wa mutakalo na muhasho wa mveledziso ya matshilisano u itela u thivhela u dovha u tambudzwa na u shushedzwa ha vhapondwa musi vha kha maitele a u vula milandu.

src: "emilandwini yokukata, abasebenzi abaqalelela zepilo namapholisa baya emaziko wetvep bayokusiza abongazimbi ukuvulela abakhahlumezi babo imilandu, bebabathobe nemikhumbulo," utjho ahlathulula.
tgt: "kha milandu ya u tzhipa, vhashumeli vha mutakalo na mapholisa vha ya ḓa sentharani dza tvep u thusa vhapondwa malugana na u vulela milandu ya zwiito zwa vhugevhenga vhaiti vha milandu na u dovha hafhu vha vha ṋetshedza tshumelo dza khuthadzo," vha ralo.

src: itvep ikwazi ukugcina abongazimbi bekube malanga ali14; kodwanake isikhathesi singangezelelwa emilandwini lapho kuthinteka khona umndeni woke namkha abantwana.
tgt: tvep i ṋea vhapondwa vhu dzulo lwa maḓuvha a swikaho 14, honeha, nzudzanyo dzi nga shandukiswa kha nyimele dzi kwamaho muṱa woṱhe kana vhana ha kona u engedzwa maṅwe maḓuvha.

src: "sinesiqhenyana sokuhlomisa esikhamba sikhulumisana nomphakathi sifundise nabantu ngamalungelwabo.
tgt: "ri na yuniti ya u maanḓafhadza ine ya tshimbi dzo nyambedzano dza tshi tshavha na u funza vhathu nga ha pfanelo dzavho.

src: sisebenzela izakhamuzi ezingaphezulu kwesigidi ethohoyandou namaphethelo.
tgt: ri thusa vhadzuli vha fhiraho miḽioni nthihi u bva ṱhohoyanḓou na vhuponi ha tsini.

src: siphumelele ukubuyisa ithemba kangangokuthi kwanje abantu sebanethemba ekambisweni yezomthethobulungiswa wezobulelesi nemapholiseni," kuhlathulula umanthada."
tgt: ro kona u vhuedzedza fulufhelo nahone vhathu vha vho fhulufhela vhulamukanyi ha vhugevhenga nga kha vhushaka vhukati hashu na mapholisa," vha ralo.

src: itvep ibuye yavulela nabantu abama44 imisebenzi, abasebenza eminyangweni ngokwahlukahluka, njengemnyangweni wezeemali, wezabasebenzi kunye newezokuhlungwa.
tgt: tvep yo dovha hafhu ya sikela mushumo vhathu vha swikaho 44 vhane vha shuma nga fhasi ha mihasho i tevhelaho, wa zwa masheleni, zwa vhashumi na zwa u ela.

src: nanyana beyisolo ithola imali eziir90 000 qobe kota emnyangweni wezokuthuthukiswa komphakathi elimpopo, itvep icatjhazelwe yicovid19 njengoba phela abasekeli ngeemali abanengi babuyele emva, ngaleyindlela kwaliyeka amahlelo wokusebenza wehlangano le.
tgt: naho ri tshi dzulela u wana ndambedzo ya masheleni a linganaho r90 000 kotara iṅwe na iṅwe u bva kha muhasho wa mveledziso ya matshilisano wa limpopo, tvep yo kwamea vhukuma nga covid19 musi vhalambedzi vhanzhi vha si tsha kona u ri thusa, ngauralo zwi sia maitele a kushumele kwa dzangano a tshi khou kwamea nga nḓila i si yavhuḓi.

src: itvep ibe hlangana neenhlangano zokuthoma ezilwa negbvf ukusekelwa ngeemali.
tgt: honeha, tshikwama tsha thuso kha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu (gbvf) na mabulayo a vha tshisadzini, tshe tsha rwelwa ṱari nga phresidennde vho cyril ramaphosa, khathihi na vha foramu ya vhafumakadzi ya dzitshaka ya afrika tshipembe na vhashumisani na muvhuso nga ṅwedzi wa luhuhi ṅwaha uno, vho ḓo thusa mbekanyamushumo iyi.

src: ngemali elir128 leengidi ebuthelelwe ngeminikelo yekoro yangeqadi, nesikhwama samakoro ngamakoro, isikhwama segbvf sizakusiza besisekele ukuphunyeleliswa komtlamo wehlelo lamaqhinga welizwe ngegbvf.
tgt: tvep yo vha vhukati ha tshigwada tsha u thoma tsha madzangano ane a lwa na gbvf e a wana ndambedzo ya masheleni.

src: itvep yabelwe imali emar250 000 kilomnyaka weemali ophezulu, kantike izakuthola enye imali ngomnyaka wee2023.
tgt: nga tshelede i linganaho r128 miḽioni ye vha kuvhanganywa nga kha lweṱolweṱo u bva kha sekhi thara dza phuraivethe, tshikwama tsha sekhithara nnzhi, tshikwama tsha gbvf tshi ḓo thusa na u tikedza u thoma u shama ha pulane ya tshiṱirathedzhi ya lushaka nga ha gbvf.

src: umanthada uthi imali le yenze ukuthi itvep ikghone ukwandisa abongazimbi ekghona ukufika kibo ibe ikghone nokuthi ihlale isebenza ihlangano le.
tgt: tvep yo kovhelwa masheleni a linganaho r250 000 a ṅwaha uno nahone i ḓo wana iṅwe ndambedzo ya ṅwaha wa 2023. vho manthada vha ri masheleni o konisa tvep u swikelela vhapondwa vhanzhi na u ita uri mushumo wa mbekanya mushumo u bvele phanḓa.

src: umurendeni vhengani (oneminyaka ema26) wahlengwa yitvep ezandle ni zokukhahlunyezwa mumuntu akhe ezwana naye.
tgt: murendeni vhengani (26) ndi muponyi we a phuluswa nga vha tvep kha mufunwa wawe wa kale we a vha a tshi mu tambudza.

src: uhlezi iinyanga ezima46 nomntazanakhe weminyaka emine eziko letvep ngemva kokubaleka naye emuntwinakhe loyo.
tgt: o fhedza miṅwedzi ya 46 a tshi khou dzula sentharani na ṅwana wawe wa musidzana a re na miṅwaha miṋa.

src: iziko lethu lamsiza ekubophiseni umuntu akhe ezwana naye wabe wenzisa nencwadi yomlayo wokuvikeleka kwakhe.
tgt: senthara yo mu thusa u vulela mulandu mufunwa wawe wa kale na u ita ḽiṅwalo ḽa ndaela ya tsireledzo.

src: zivulelwe iimbawo zensfas zomnyaka ozako vukuzenzele unnamed uvuliwe umzombe wokufaka iimbawo zokufunda ngesi khwama selizweloke sesizo leemali zokufunda (insfas) womnyaka wee2023.
tgt: minisṱa wa pfunzo dza nṱha, saintsi na vhutumbuli vho dokotela blade nzimande, vho ita nḓivhadzo zwenezwino nga tshifhinga tsha nyambedzano na vhoramafhungo.

src: ungqongqotjhe wezefundo ephakemeko, zesayensi nezamandla wokusungula udorh.
tgt: minisṱa vho nzimande vha ri tshikimu tsho dzia tsheo ya u vulela tshifhinga tsha u ita khumbelo u ṱavhanya, musi hu tshi vhambedzwa na ṅwaha wo fhiraho u itela u ṋea matshudeni vha ṱoḓaho u ita khumbelo tshifhinga tsho eḓanaho tsha uri vha rumele khumbelo dzavho na maṅwalo a ṱoḓeaho.

src: ungqongqotjhe unzimande uthi isikhwamesi sibone ukuthi nonyaka isikhathi sokufakwa kweembawo sivulwe ngapha mbi kwesikhathi ekuvamise ukuvulwa ngaso eminyakeni, kobanyana abafuna ukufaka iimbawo babe nesikhathi esaneleko sokuthumela iimbawo zabo kunye nemitlolo esekelako.
tgt: musi vha tshi khou ṋea muvhigo muswa muswa nga ha ndambedzo ya nsfas wa ṅwaha wa zwa pfunzo wa 2022, minisṱa vho nzimande vha ri mugaganyagwama wa r43 biḽioni wo kovhelwa tshikimu itshi u itela mbadelo dza ngudo dza vhavhuelwa, dzi katelaho masheleni a zwiḽiwa na zwiendedzi, na zwishumiswa zwa ngudo.

src: ungqongqotjhe unzimande uthe nakethula umbiko woku khibelela ngokusekela ngeemali kwensfas emnyakeni wee2022 wathi kwabiwe imali engangamar43 wamabhiliyoni ezakusetjenziselwa ukubhadela iimfundo zabaphumeleleko ukufundiswa sikhwamesi, nokubhadelela ukugoma, neendleko zokukhamba kunye neensetjenziswa zokufunda.
tgt: vha ri khumbelo dza 985 672 dzo ṱanganedzwa he khadzo dza 140 636 dzi sa phase.

src: uthi zima985 672 iimbawo abazitholileko, kodwana ezili140 636 zazo zangaphumelela.
tgt: kha khumbelo dzo ṱanganedzwaho, dza 739 526 dzo dzhiwa sa dzine dza ḓo lambedzwa fhedzi hosala u ṱanganedzwa u bva kha zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo zwe vha ḓiṅwalisa kha zwo.

src: kileziimbawo abazitholileko, ezima739 526 zije zivunyiwe, kodwana kusalindeleke ukuthi abafundi bazo batloliswe emaziko wezefundo lapho bayokufunda khona.
tgt: "vhunzhi ha vhagudi vhe vha ita khumbelo dzi songo ṱanganedzwaho ndi vho kundelwaho u ṋetshedza vhuṱanzi vhufushaho ha u tikedza khumbelo dzavho dza ndambedzo; vha tshi fhira mpimo wo tiwaho wa u lugela u wana ndambedzo ya masheleni; vho no swikelela ndalukano dza vhuimo ha nṱhesa dzine nsfas ya lambedza u guma khadzo khathihi na vha songo tevhe dzaho magondo a ngudo kha sekhithara ya gudedzi ḽa tvet," vha ṱalutshedza ngauralo minisṱa vho nzimande.

src: "ubunengi babafundi iimbawo zabo ezingakhange ziphumelele batlhayele ngobufakazi obufakazela isidingo sokusekelwa ngeemali; beqa isilinganiso semali esibekelwe umfundi ongafundiswa ngilesisikhwama; sebanee ncwadi zefundo ezingaphezulu kwesilinganiso esiphezulu esibekiweko, kunye nokunga khambisani neemfuneko zefundo zekoro yamakholeji wetvet," kuhlathulula ungqongqotjhe unzimande.
tgt: u ya nga mafhungo a re kha webusaithi ya nsfas, u bva nga ṅwaha wa ngudo wa 2021, nsfas a i tsha lambedza khoso dza ngudo nga murahu ha khunyeledzo ya digiri kana dipuloma ya mathomo.

src: ngokwemininingwana yobunzinzolwazi bensfas, ukusukela ngomnyaka wefundo wee2021, insfas ayisabasekeli ngeemali abafundi esele baneziqu zokuthoma zefundo ephakemeko.
tgt: hezwi zwi katela ṱhanziela dzi tevhelaho, postgraduate certificate, postgraduate diplomas, honours degrees, masters na phd degrees .

src: laphake kukhulunywa ngeentifikethi zefundo ezifundelwa ngemva kokuthola iziqu zokuthoma, amadiploma atholakala ngemva kweziqu zokuthoma, iziqu zehonours, iziqu zemasters kunye neziqu zephd.
tgt: hezwi zwi amba uri ndalukano ya nṱhesa ine tshikimu tsha i lambedza ndi bache lor’s degree .

src: lokhuke kutjho ukuthi insfas iphelela eziqwini zebachelor’s degree ukufundisa/ukusekela umfundi ngeemali.
tgt: u khwinisa sisiṱeme ya khumbelokha ndingedzo ya u khwinisa sisiṱeme ya khumbelo na maitele a u i leludza u itela matshudeni ane a khou ṱoḓa u ita khumbelo, minisṱa vho nzimande vha amba izwi, uno ṅwaha musi nsfas yo thoma u ita khwiniso kha sisiṱeme u itela uri i kone shumisea zwavhuḓi.

src: senza ihlelo lokufaka iimbawo libe ngcono emzameni wokwenza ubu ngcono nobulula ehlelweni lokufaka iimbawo zensfas, ungqongqotjhe unzimande uthi nonyaka insfas ifake ubungcono obunzunzwana ehlelweneli ukwenzelela ukuthi umsebenzi wokwenza nokufaka isibawo ube lula khulu, ungabi noburhiyarhiya.
tgt: vha ri puḽatifomo ya u itela khumbelo ya nsfas kha inthanethe yo dzudzanywa nga huswa uri i kone u shumisea nga nḓila yo leluwaho nahone i elane na dziṅwe puḽatifomo dzine matshudeni vha ṱoḓaho u ita khumbelo vho dzi ḓowela u fana na what sapp, twitter, facebook na instagram.

src: uthi isizasithungelelanisi yesibawo sensfas esenziwangethungelelwano lezokuthi ntana sesitlanywe ngobutjha kobanyana sizokusebenziseka lula khudlwana besikhambelane namanye amaplatifomu abafaki beembawo abawajayeleko, njengewhatsapp, itwitter, ifacebook kunye neinstagram.
tgt: "maitele a u ita khumbelo one aṋe o leludzwa na mbu dziso dzo vhudziswaho dzi a leluwa u pfeseswa nga tshi tshavha.

src: ngaphezu kwalokho, muva nje umfakisibawo selangakghona ukuthi selathomile ukusebenza ngesibawo sakhe akhokhe ummoya aje ajamajamile, abuye aragele phambili ngesibawo sakhe muva, ngaphandle kokuthomisa phasi, ukube kanti lokhu bekungenzeki esikhathini esi dlulileko, utjho uyahlathulula.
tgt: nyengedzedzo kha izwi, matshudeni vha ṱoḓaho u ita khumbelo vha nga ima u ḓadza fomo ya khumbelo vha vhuya nga murahu vha isa phanḓa na u ḓadza fomo yavho ya khumbelo vha songo dovholola u bva mathomoni sa zwe zwa vha zwi sa kona dzei kale musi u tshi khou ita khumbelo," vha ralo.

src: "ngaphezu kokwenziwa kobungcono, insfas seyingezelele nezinye iindlela zokwenza isibawo ezizakuqalelela abafakisibawo abakobunye ubujamo obuhlukahlukileko, ngokukhumbulela nokuthi ubunengi babafakisibawo bababantu abatjha esele basebenzisa iindlela zokusebenza budijithali," kungezelela ungqongqotjhe unzimande.
tgt: "nga nṱha ha khwiniso, nsfas yo bveledza dziṅwe tshanele dza u ita khumbelo u itela u katela matshudeni u bva kha siangane dzo fhambanaho vha ṱoḓaho u ita khumbelo, hu tshi khou dzhielwa nzhele uri vhunzhi ha matshudeni vhane vha khou ṱoḓa u ita khumbelo ndi vhaswa vhane vha ṱanganedza maitele a didzhithala a u ita zwithu," minisṱa vho nzimande vha tshi ḓadzisa.

src: iindlela ezitja zifaka hlangana imobile app, iussd kunye newhatsapp la umuntu angenza khona isibawo sokufundiswa yinsfas, bese ukghona nokulandelela ukuthi isibawo sakhe sijamephi (sikiliphi izinga lokusetjenzwa), abe akghone nokwenza isibawo sokukha nsela, hlangana nokhunye – ekuyinto ebeyenziwa kwaphela ngesizasithungelelanisi sobu nzinzolwazi.
tgt: tshanele ntswa dzi kalela mobile app , dzisms na what sapp, hune muthu a nga kona u ita khumbelo ya ndambedzo ya nsfas na u kona vhona vhuimo ha khumbelo iyo na u kona hafhu u phumula dzi khumbelo, zwine nga nḓowelo zwa itwa nga kha puḽatifomo ya kha webusaithi.

src: ukudlula lapho, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akunamfakisibawo osalela ngemva, ungqongqotjhe unzimande uthi insfas izokuphuma ijima lokuvakatjhela abantu, ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abantu abanganazo iinsetjenziswa zethekhnoloji abangenza ngazo iimbawo ngethungelelwano lezokuthintana basizwa ngeensiza ezifaneleko nesekelo lokufaka iimbawo.
tgt: zwiṅwe afhu, u khwaṱhisedza uri a hu na mutshudeni a itaho khumbelo a salelaho murahu, minisṱa vho nzimande vha ri nsfas i ḓo fara fulo ḽa u ya vhathuni, u khwaṱhisedza uri vhathu vhane vha sa vhe na tshomedzo dza thekhinoḽodzhi dzine dza ita uri vha kone u ita khumbelo kha inthanethe vha khou fhiwa zwiko zwo teaho na thikhedzo uri vha ite khumbelo.

src: indlela yokuthola umfundalize we nsfas uvumelekile ukwenza isibawo sokufundiswa yinsfas nayibe usisakhamuzi sesewula afrika esilungiselela ukufunda ngomnyaka wee2023 namkha vele sewuyafunda eyunivesithi yombuso namkha ekholeji yetvet, begodu uzalisa imibandela nasi elandelako: urhola isibonelelo sesassa namkha.
tgt: ni wana hani basari ya nsfasno lugela u wana basari ya nsfas arali ni mudzulapo wa afrika tshipembe ane o ḓiimisela u guda kha yunivesithi kana gudedzi ḽa tvet kha ṅwaha wa 2023 kana no no ḓi thoma u dzhena hone nahone ni tshi swikelela ṱhoḓea dzi tevhelaho: ni tshi hola gavhelo ḽa sassa.

src: amathuba wemisebenzi newokuziphilisa asigidi, nokuya phambili vukuzenzele unnamed esikhathini esinga phasi kweminyaka emibili edlulileko sivule ihlelo leofisi kamenga meli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwemisebenzi, lokuvula imisebenzi nokusekela iindlela zokuziphilisa njengengcenye yokusekela ukuvuselelwa komnotho ngemva kwesifo esikhe sarhagala icovid19.
tgt: zwikhala zwa u ḓitshidza na mishumo ya miḽioni, na u fhira vukuzenzele unnamed tshifhingani tsha vhukati ha miṅwaha mivhili yo fhiraho, ro rwela ṱari mbekanyamushumo ya ofisi ya phresidennde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mi shumo u itela u sika mishumo na u tikedza zwa u ḓitshidza sa tshipiḓa tsha u tikedza mvusuludzo ya ikonomi nga murahu ha u ṱaha ha dwadze ḽa covid19 .

src: ihlelo leofisi kamengameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwe misebenzi lisandufikelela esi gidini sabanesandla kilo solo lisunguliwe.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ya ofisi ya phresidennde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mishumo yo swikelela mvelaphanḓa khulwane ya vhudzheneleli ha vhathu vha linganaho miḽioni nthihi u bva tshe ya thoma.

src: lesisilinganisoliqha esiqaka thekileko simphumela woku hlanganyela umsebenzi ngurhulumende nomphakathi ngokunaba kwawo, sekubalwa nekoro yangeqadi, neenhlangano zomphakathi nabanye abanengi.
tgt: tswikelelo iyi ndi mvelelo ya ndingedzo ya tshumisano u mona na muvhuso na tshitshavha nga vhuphara, hu tshi katelwa na sekhithara ya phuraivethe, madzangano a bvaho tshitshavhani na maṅwe manzhi.

src: ihlelweli solo litjhotjholoza njalo livulela abantu imisebenzi njengoba umnotho uthatha isikhathi ukuvuseleleka bewuvule imisebenzi ngesilinganiso esisifunako.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo iyi i khou shela mulenzhe kha tsiko ya mishumo ngeno ikonomi i khou dzhia tshifhinga tshilapfu u vusuludzea na u sika mishumo nga tshikalo tshine ra khou ṱoḓa tshone.

src: njengoba sisebenzela ukuhlumisa umnotho ozakuletha imisebenzi emihle nebambelelako ngobunengi, sizakusolo sakhelela phezu kwepumelelo yehlelo leofisi kamengameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwemisebenzi, besikhulise nendima yalo.
tgt: musi ri khou sala murahu nyaluwo ya ikonomi u itela u ṋetshedza mishumo yavhuḓi ya tshifhinga tshilapfu nga vhunzhi, ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u fhaṱa kha mvelelo dzavhuḓi dza mbekanyamushumo ya ofisi ya phresidennde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mishumo na u ṱanḓavhudza nyaluwo yayo.

src: lisafuneka khulu ukunge zelela ukuvuseleleka kwema kethe yemisebenzi.
tgt: i dovha hafhu ya tikedza mvusuludzo ya ikonomi nga nḓila dza vhuṱhogwa vhukuma.

src: godu lisekela nokuvuseleleka komnotho ngeendlela eziqakathekileko.
tgt: kha sia ḽine u shaea ha tshenzhemo ya mushumo ha vha tshithivheli tshihulwane vhukuma kha u wana mushu mo, mbekanyamushumo idzi dzi khou ṋetshedza tshenzhe mo dza mushumo dza vhuimo ha nṱha.

src: njengoba ilimuko lomse benzi lisiqabo esikhulu kangaka nje ekutholakaleni komsebenzi, amahlelo la eza nethuba lelimuko lomsebenzi lekhwalithi ephezulu.
tgt: kha mbekanyamushumo khulwanesa yo tikedzwaho nga ṱhuṱhuwedzo, sa tsumbo, vhaswa vha ṱoḓaho u swika 600 000 vho tholiwa sa vhathusedzi vha vhagudisi kha zwikolo zwi fhiraho 22 000 kha khuḓa iṅwe na iṅwe ya shango.

src: ehlelweni esingalinganisa ngalo, elingelikhulu kinawo woke elisekelwa ngilelihlelo lokukhuthazwa kwemisebenzi, pheze bama600 000 abantu abatjha abafakwe eenkolweni njengabasizi beenkolweni ezingaphezulu kwee22 000 kilo loke ilizweli.
tgt: vhulanguli ha zwikolo, vhagudisi na vhaṅwe vha kwameaho vho tendelana nazwo vhoṱhe uri na ngoho vhushelamulenzhe ha vhathusedzi vha vhagudisi ho khwinisa vhupo ha u guda zwikoloni.

src: abaphathi beenkolo, abotitjhere/abafundisi nabanye abahlanganyeli, boke bavumelana ngokuthi isandla esifakwe basizi beenkolweni sibenze baba ngcono khulu ubujamo bokufunda eenko lweni.
tgt: vhathu vhanzhi vhane vha vha vhaḓishumi vho khakhisea kha maitele a u ḓitshidza nga vhanga ḽa dwadze.

src: abantu abanengi abazisebenzako bathole imithombo yabo yokuziphilisa iqinteliswe ngilesisifo ebesirhagele.
tgt: sekithara ya vhusiki ndi yone ye ya kwamea nga nḓila i si yavhuḓi vhukuma nga dwadze.

src: ikoro yokuzithabisa nobugwali nakungiyo ibetheke khudlwa na.
tgt: kha sekhitara iyi, thikhedzo yo ṋetshedzwa vhathu uri vha ḓisikela mishumo na vhaṅwe.

src: kilekoro abantu banikelwe isekelo kobanyana bazivulele imisebenzi bavulele nabanye.
tgt: dzibaisikopo, muzika na matambwa zwe zwa vha zwo bveledzwa musi uḽa zwa zwino zwi vho kona u ita mbuelo u bva kha thengiso dza pfanelo, dzithikhithi na phurofithi.

src: iinthombe ezibukelwako, umvumo kunye nemidlalo yesiteyiji eveziweko kwanje seyikghona ukuzenzela enye imali ngokuthengiswa kwama lungelo, amathikithi kunye nangokuthengiswa kwemisebenzi eveziweko.
tgt: hezwi zwoṱhe zwo shela mulenzhe kha nyaluwo ya sekhithara.

src: koke lokhuke kulisizo ekukhuliseni lekoro.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ya ofisi ya phresidennde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mishumo yo dovha hafhu ya tikedza maitele a u ḓitshidza a tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src: ihlelo leofisi kamengameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwemisebenzi lisekele nemithombo yokuziphilisa ebambelelako.
tgt: vhalimivhafuwi vha ḓitshidzaho nga vhulimivhufuwi vha fhiraho 140 000 vho wana dzivau tshara dza u renga zwiko zwa vhulimivhufuwi zwine zwa ḓo vha thusa u ḓiimisa habe na u ṱanḓavhudza zwibveledzwavhulimini nga murahu ha u khakhisea nga covid19.

src: bangaphezulu kwe140 000 abosomaplasi abalimela/abafuyela ukuzi philisa abathole amavawutjha wokuraga umsebenzabo kobanyana bazokukghona ukubuyela emsebenzini wabo babe bakghone nokuwukhulisa ngemva kokuqinteliswa yicovid19.
tgt: muṅwe wa vha vhuelwa ndi vho phindile ngcoya vha re na miṅwaha ya 69 vha bvaho ngei richmond vunḓuni ḽa kwazulunatal.

src: omunye walabo abathole lelisizo kube nguphindile ngcoya (oneminyaka ema36) werichmond, kwazulunatala.
tgt: ndi muṅwe wa miraḓo ya fumi ya muṱa vhane vha vha na bindu ḽo ṱanganelaho ḽa vhulimivhufuwi vhane vha ri voutshara ye vha i wana yo thusa bindu ḽo ṱanganelaho ḽa vhulimivhafuwi ḽiswa u kona u ponya na u wana phurofiti.

src: ungomunye wetjhumi lamalunga webhizinisi ehlanganyelwe mndeni, kantike uthi ivawutjha ayitholileko le iyihlengile ibhizinisi yabo ehlanganyelweko esese yitja le, yabe yakghona nokwenza nemali.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ya ofisi ya phresidennde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mishumo i khou dovha hafhu ya tikedza matshudeni vho fhedzaho digiri kana pfunzo dza nṱha, nga zwikhala zwo ṋetshedzwaho vhaongi, ma tshudeni vho fhedzaho digiri kana pfunzo dza nṱha kha zwa saintsi, vha re na zwikili kana vho gudelaho zwa vhutsila na vhaṅwe.

src: ihlelo leofisi kamengameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwemisebenzi lisekela nee mfundiswa ezineziqu zefundo, ngokuvulela abahle ngi amathuba, iimfundiswa zesayensi, amaathizeni nezinye iimfundiswa.
tgt: yunivesithi dza fumbili rathi dzi khou thusa u thola matshudeni vho fhedza ho digiri kana pfunzo dza nṱha u ita mishumo i elanaho na ndalukano dzavho.

src: umnyango wezefundo nezamandla wokusungula uvule amahlelo wesayensi amanengi wezakhamuzi ezinekghono lokusungula izinto ezitja, njengeduzi umngeni conservation trust, yona eqatjhe ilutjha lendawo njengabahlahlindlela boku qalelela ibhoduluko kobanya na lizokuhlomisa umphakathi wendawo ukwazi ukuhlwe ngisa nokuvuselela iindawo zamanzi wendawo.
tgt: muhasho wa saintsi na vhutumbuli wo thoma mbekanyamushumo dza saintsi ya vhadzulapo ya vhutumbuli, u fana na duzi umngeni conservation trust, ine yo thola vhaswa vhapo sa envirochamps u itela u maanḓafhadza zwitshavha nga kha u vusuludza vhubvo ha maḓi hapo.

src: elinye ihlelo elize nomnyango lisiza abosomabhizinisi ukutlama iimphakamiso zamabhizinisi emnothweni onganarhasi esilaphazako.
tgt: iṅwe mbekanya mushumo ya muhasho uyu i thusa vhoramabindu maṱuku u bveledzisa madzinginywa a bindu kha ikonomi i sa tshika fhadzi mupo.

src: amahlelo wokuqatjhwa komphakathi anobuhle obubuyisela umphakathi ngoba avula imisebenzi esiza umuntu woke.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo dza mushumo dza tshitshavha dzi dovha dza vha mvelelo dzavhuḓi kha zwitshavha ngauri dzi sika mushumo i vhuedzaho tshitshavha tshoṱhe.

src: malungana nehlelo leofisi kamengameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwemisebenzi, sibala nokuba ngcono kokufunda eenkolwe ni, nokwenza iindawo zabosomtlhatlhana zibe ngcono, nokusekela abantu abakhahlunyezwe yinturhu eqothele bobulili obuthileko, ukulondwa kwemvelo nebhodululo kunye neendlela ezitja zokubuyekeza nokwenza ipahla esebenzileko ngobutjha.
tgt: kha mbekanyamu shumo ya ofisi ya phreside nnde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mishumo, hezwi zwi katela u khwinisa ngudo zwikoloni, u khwinisa miḓi tshayanzudzanywa, u tikedza vhaponyi vha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu, ndo ndolo ya mupo na u tumbula nḓila dza u kunakisa malaṱwa uri a dovhe a shumiswe.

src: ihlelo leofisi kamengameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwemisebenzi lavulelwa ukulwa nomraro wokutlhogeka ko msebenzi okwathuweleliswa yicovid19.
tgt: mbekanyamushumo ya ofisi ya phresidennde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mishumo yo rwela ṱari sa thandululo ya thaidzo ya vhu shayamushumo ye ya ṋaṋiswa nga dwadze ḽa covid19 .

src: nanyana isifesi sesirhobhile nje, kodwana ukutlhogeka komsebenzi khona akukarhobhi.
tgt: naho dwadze ḽo fhungudzea, vhashayamushumo a vhu ngo fhungudzea.

src: ingeniso etholakele ngehlelo leofisi kamengameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwemisebenzi ikhwezelele umnotho kibosomabhizinisi abancani nakibosomabhizinisi abangakahleleki emnothweni weendawo ngeendawo kilo loke ilizweli.
tgt: mbuelo dzo wanwaho kha mbekanyamushumo ya ofisi ya phresidennde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mishumo dzo vha khwiniso khulwane kha ikonomi kha mabindu maṱuku na mabindu a si a fomaḽa kha ikonomi dzapo u mona na shango.

src: kunjaloke nangebeputsonderwater.
tgt: nga u ralo na ngei putsonderwater.

src: kunobanyana ‘isuke phezulu ithontele phasi,’ imali ifakwa ezandleni zomphakathi oyidinge khulu.
tgt: vhudzuloni ha maitele a u thoma nṱha a tshi ya fhasi, tshelede i khou vhewa thwii zwanḓani zwa zwitshavha zwine zwa khou i ṱoḓa vhukuma.

src: imali leyoke izombeleza endaweni yangekhabo bese ‘iphakamela’ emnothweni ngobubanzi bawo.
tgt: tshelede yeneyo i fhedza i tshi khou mona henefho vhuponi ya phaḓalala i tshi ya nṱha kha ikonomi yo ṱanḓavhuwaho.

src: kungakhoke lelihlelo silibiza ngokuthi ‘ngelokukhuthaza’, ngoba umnotho woke uyazuza, ngokunjalo nomphakathi nawo uzuze.
tgt: ndi ngazwo ri tshi i vhidza uri ndi ṱhuṱhuwedzo, ngauri ikonomi yoṱhe i a vhuelwa khathihi na tshitshavha.

src: ngehlelo leofisi kamenga meli lokukhuthaza uku vulwa kwemisebenzi, sivule amandla, ukuzibophelela, amandla wokwakha, amandla wokusungula kunye namathuba.
tgt: nga kha mbekanyamushumo ya ofisi ya phresidennde ya ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya tsiko ya mishumo, ro kona u vulela mafulufulu, vhuḓikumedzeli, vhusiki, vhutumbuli na zwikhala.

src: kikho koke lokhu, sakha umphakathi osebe nzako.
tgt: vhathu vha fhiraho miḽioni nthihi vho vhuelwa thwii.

src: banengi abanye abantu, emindenini nemphakathini yabantu abanesandla kilamahlelo abalizwileko igalelo lalesisi khuthazi.
tgt: vhaṅwe vhathu vhanzhi, miṱani na zwitshavhani zwa vhadzhenelili, vho vhona mvelelo dza ṱhuṱhuwedzo.

src: ukuthuthukiswa kwabentwana kwebuncanini (iecd) kusisekelo sekusasa lelizwe vukuzenzele unnamed imbalwa imise benzi eqalene neofisi kamengameli eyanelisa ummoya njengokuthoma ilanga ngokuvakatjhela abe ntwana abancani.
tgt: mveledziso thangeli ya vhana vhaṱuku (ecd) yo fara khoṋo ya vhumatshelo hashu vukuzenzele unnamed hu na mishumo i si gathi ya phresidennde i vhuedzaho u fana na u fhedza tshifhinga tsha nga matsheloni na vhana vhaṱuku.

src: mhlapha ngikhambele umnyanya wokuvulwa kwesentha yokuthuthukisa kwabe ntwana kwebuncanini ilittle flower ecd esebi zana, epumalanga kapa, lapho ngibe nethuba lokuzigedla nabanye babarholi bethu bakusasa, ngibafundela bengilalela abakutjhoko.
tgt: zwenezwino ndo dzhenela vhuṱambo ha u vulwa ha little flower ine ya vha senthara ya mveledziso thangelo ya vhana vhaṱuku (ecd) ngei bizana vunḓuni ḽa kapa vhubvaḓuvha, he nda fhedza tshifhinga ndi na vhaṅwe vhara ngaphanḓa vha matshelo vha shango ḽashu, ndi tshi khou vha vhalela na u vha thetshelesa.

src: isentha le yakhiwe mhlapha yihlangano ethuthukisa umphakathi impande south africa ngokusekelwa yinelson mandela foundation.
tgt: senthara iyi yo fhaṱwa zwenezwino nga vha impande south africa ḽine ḽa vha dzangano ḽa mvele dziso nga kha thikhedzo ya nelson mandela foundation.

src: okungithinte khulu emmoyenami kukuzinikela kwabasebenzi besentha abazikhandla ekusekeleni umphakathi nabentwana.
tgt: ndo kwamea vhukuma nga vhuḓikumedzeli ha vhashumi vha senthara kha u tikedza vhadzulapo na vhana vhavho.

src: bangitjele ukuthi nakusungulwa isentha le bekubu disi ukubhadela abasebenzi kodwana babekezela seze kunjalo.
tgt: vho mmbudza uri maḓuvhani a kale vhashumi vha senthara vho vha vha tshi konḓelwa hani u wana miholo yavho fhedzi vha tshi ḓi ḓa mushumoni.

src: ngatjelwa godu nokuthi nalokha umndeni ubhalelwa kubhadelela umntwana amar20, abe ntwana gade bangabu yiselwa emakhaya.
tgt: vho dovha hafhu vha mmbudza zwauri naho miṱa ya vha i tshi khou balelwa u badela mbadelo ya ṅwana ine ndi r20, vhana a vha humiswi.

src: ukuzinikela kwabasebenzi besentha ilittle flower ecd kuqakatheke khulu ngombana amasentha athuthukisa abentwana bamabanga aphasi godu anendima ebonakalako etuthukweni yesitjhaba.
tgt: vhuḓikumedzeli ha vhashumi sentharani ya ecd ndi ha ndeme vhukuma ngauri senthara dza mveledziso thangeli ya vhana vhaṱuku dzi na vhuḓifhinduleli vhuhulu kha mveledziso ya lushaka lwashu.

src: amasentha la ayafumaneka kizo zoke iingodi, emalokitjhini, emadrojaneni nemadrobheni amakhulu ngelizweni.
tgt: senthara hedzi dzi a wanala kha kusi, ḓorobo na kha ḓorobo khulwane iṅwe na iṅwe kha shango.

src: inengi lawo athonywa bomma namaziko woku tjheja abentwana.
tgt: vhunzhi hadzo dzo thomiwa nga vhafumakadzi zwitshavhani hu u itela u tikedza vhabebi vha ṱoḓaho vhana vhavho vha tshi ṱhogomelwa musi vhe mishumoni.

src: lokhu kunqophe ukulungelelanisa ukuthu thukiswa kwabentwana bamabanga aphasi nekharikhyulamu ehlelekileko yesikolweni ngokunikela ngebandulo, ifundo noku thuthukiswa kwabasebenzi bemasentha weecd ngelizweni zombelele.
tgt: sa muvhuso, ro dzhia mushumo wa u khwinisa tshiimo tsha ndondolo khathihi na u ita uri zwiko zwi vhe hone ri tshi itela uri senthara dza ecd dzi tshimbidze mishumo yo teaho kha vhana vhaṱuku u itela u vha lugisela pfunzo dza zwikoloni.

src: ngombana ukufunda lokhu okusisekelo kuqakathekile epumelelweni yomntwana yeminyaka ezako, isikhibelelo somthe thomlingwa somthetho wezefundo njenganje owethulwe epalamende sitjhukumisa kobana kukateleleke ukuthi boke abentwana bafumane ifundo yamabanga aphasi iminyaka emibili yeecd ngaphambi kokungena kugreyidi yokuthoma.
tgt: nga ṅwedzi wa lambamai 2022, ro khunyeledza matshimbidzele a mashumele a ecd u bva kha muhasho wa mveledziso ya zwa matshilisano zwa ya fhasi ha ndangulo ya muhasho wa pfunzo ya mutheo.

src: kusezingeneli lapho kufuze abantwana bafundiswe, bafunde nalokha badlalako banikelwe nokugoma okungasenani kanye ngelanga.
tgt: izwi ndi u itela u ṱumanya mvele dziso thangeli ya vhana vhaṱuku na kharikhuḽamu ya zwikoloni na u ṋetshedza pfumbudzo, pfunzo na mveledziso kha vhashumi vha senthara dza ecd u mona na shango.

src: amasentha wokuthuthukisa abentwana bamabanga aphasi awalungiseleli izakhamuzi zethu ezisa khulako ukuphumelela eemfundweni zabo kwa phela, kodwana amthombo oqakathekileko wokwenza abantwana babe bosomabhizinisi ngahlanye avulela izakhamuzi imisebenzi.
tgt: ngauri vhugudisi uvhu ha zwa mutheo vhu ha ndeme kha u bvelela ha ṅwana miṅwaha i tshi ya phanḓa, mulayotibe wa khwiniso ya milayo ya pfunzo ya mutheo une zwa zwino u phalamenndeni malugana na u dzinginya zwauri zwi vhe khombekhombe uri vhana vhoṱhe vha vhe kha ecd lwa miṅwaha mivhili musi vha sa athu dzhena gireidi 1. ndi kha tshiimo hetshi hune vhana vha tea u funzwa, u guda nga kha u tamba nahone vha ṋewe zwiḽiwa luthihi kha ḓuvha.

src: amasentha la ayingcenye eqakathekileko yezomnotho.
tgt: senthara idzi ndi tshipiḓa tsha ndeme kha ikonomi ya ndondolo.

src: aletha uku nzinza kwepilo, khulu khulu kibomma, ekungibo abafaka isandla khudlwana ekuvulweni kwemisebenzi emiphakathini eminengi.
tgt: dzi bveledza matshilo, nga maanḓa kha vhafumakadzi, dzi shela mulenzhe kha u sika mishumo zwi tshavhani zwinzhi.

src: lokha umabhubhisa oyingongwana icovid19 nakasahlelako, amasentha weecd abetheka khulu.
tgt: musi dwadze ḽa covid19 ḽo ṱaha, senthara dza ecd dzo kwamea vhukuma.

src: amaziko agade athembele eemalini zesikolo ukuze asebenze bekabhalelwa kubhadela abasebenzi ngombana inengi lababelethi lalahlekelwa misebenzi godu khange bakghone ukutlolisa abe ntababo kumasentha la.
tgt: zwiimiswa zwe zwa vha zwo ḓitika nga mbadelo dza tshikolo uri tshumelo yazwo i tshimbile zwo vha zwi tshi khou ku ndelwa u badela vhashumi vhazwo, nahone vhabebi vhanzhi vhe vha fhelelwa nga mishumo vho vha vha tshi khou kundelwa u isa vhana vhavho.

src: ukusiza izakhamuzi zelizwe lekhethu ezisakhulako ngamathulusi eziwatlhogako ukobana ziphumelele epilweni, lokhu kumsebenzethu sisoke.
tgt: u fhindula izwi, muvhuso wo thoma tshikwama tsha ndiliso tsha ṱhuṱhuwedza mushumo tsha ecd u itela u thusa senthara dza ecd dze dza xelelwa nga mbuelo nga ṅwambo wa dwadze hu tshi itelwa uri dzi vusulusee.

src: kufuze sirage nokwenza koke okusemandleni singurhulumende, amakhampani wangeqadi neenhlangano eziqalelela ituthuko yomphakathi, ukusekela amahlelo weecd.
tgt: u lugisela vhadzulapo vhashu vha murole muṱuku nga zwishumiswa zwine vha ṱoḓa uri vha bvelele kha vhutshilo ndi vhuḓifhinduleli hune ri tea u vhu hwala roṱhe.

src: ngesizo elimikhakhaminengi elinikelwa yikoro yeecd, ukufundisa abentabethu, ukunikela ngetjhejo labentwana kubabelethi abasebenzako namkha ukuvula amathuba wabosomabhizinisi, iecd ilisizo elikhulu ekufikeleleni iminqopho yetuthuko.
tgt: ri tea u isa phanḓa u ita zwoṱhe zwine ra kona, sa muvhuso, sekithara dza phuraivete na madzangano a mveledziso, u itela u tikedza mveledziso thangeli ya vhana vhaṱuku.

src: njengombana umnotho walekoro udoswa phambili bomma, itjhejo elinjengaleli lisiza abomma khulu, khulukhulu emiphakathini eyayidinywe amathuba, kobana itjhaphuluke emakhamandeleni woku tlhayelelwa ziimali ba kghone ukuzijamela.
tgt: nga kha tshumelo dza ndeme nnzhi dzine ya ṋetshedza, hu nga vha u funza vhana vhashu, u ṋetshedza ndondolo ya vhana kha vha vhabebi vha shumaho kana u sikela zwikhala vhabindudzi, ecd i shela mulenzhe nga huhulu kha tswikelo ya vhunzhi ha zwipikwa zwashu zwa mveledziso.

src: abentwana abancani kilamasentha basizukulwani esilandelako samasewu la afrika esifanele siphu melele ngokwamakghonwaso sibe zizakhamuzi ezithe tjha.
tgt: saizwi ikonomi ya ndondolo i tshi tshimbidzeswa nga vhafumakadzi, thikhe dzo iyo i ya kule kha zwa u thusa vhafumakadzi, nga maanḓa kha zwitshavha zwi shayaho, uri zwi kone u ḓiimisa nga zwoṱhe na u tsireledzea kha sia ḽa masheleni.

src: indlela yokonga amanzi more matshediso ukusatjalaliswa ngefanelo kwamanzi bomasipala emakha ya elizweni loke lesewula afrika kujame ema68%, ije kunamagadango athethwe mnyango wezamanzi nokukhanjiswa kwekhucu khucu wokuphelisa ukusa lela emva kokusatjalaliswa kwamanzi esele kumraro weminyaka.
tgt: ri nga vhulunga hani maḓi vho more matshedisozwa u fulufhedzea ha nḓisedzo ya maḓi nga mimasipala a tshi ya miḓini kha shango ḽoṱhe ḽa afrika tshipembe, zwi tou vha henefha kha 68% fhedzi naho ho vha na ndingedzo dzo fhambanaho dze dza itwa nga vha muhasho wa zwa maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili dza u lingedza u fhelisa zwa u salela murahu kha nḓisedzo ya maḓi zwe zwa dzulela u vha hone u bva miṅwahani yo fhelaho.

src: isekela likangqongqotjhe womnyango wezamanzi nokukhanjiswa kwekhucukhucu, udavid mahlobo uthi lokhu kubangelwa mthangalasisekelo osele umdala, ukungasetjenziswa kuhle nokutjhejwa kwemithombo yamanzi nehlelo elibogabogako lokuhlanganiswa kwamahlelo wokwakhiwa kweenkumba namaphrojekthi wanje woku thuthukiswa komthangala sisekelo.
tgt: mufarisaminisṱa wa muhasho wa zwa maḓi na vhuthatha zwitzhili vho david mahlobo, vha ri hezwi zwi khou vhangwa nga mulandu wa themamve ledziso ine yo no vha ya kale, u shayea ha maitele a kushumele kwavhuḓi na ndondolo ya zwi kimu zwa maḓi khathihi na u sa vha hone ha ṱhanganelano yavhuḓi vhukati ha mbeka nyamushomo dza zwa dzinnḓu na thandela dza mveledziso ya themamveledziso dzine dza vha hone zwazwino.

src: "kumnako omkhulu ukuthi izinga lokusatjalaliswa kwamanzi ngefanelo litjengisa ukwehla," kulathise isekela likangqongqotjhe.
tgt: "zwi a vhilaedza vhukuma u vhona uri nḓisedzo ya maḓi i fulufhedzeaho i khou vhonala i tshi khou tsela fhasi," vha ralo.

src: njengelizwe elitlhayelelwa mamanzi, isewula afrika ihlangana namazwe ama30 anesomiso esikhulu ephasini.
tgt: sa izwi ḽi shango ḽi re na ṱhahelelo ya maḓi, afrika tshipembe ḽi kha mutevhe wa mashango a 30 ane a shaya mvula ḽifhasini.

src: ilizwe lisizakala ngokukhongozela amanzi amanengi wezulu, kanti iimbalobalo zokuna kwezulu zinga phasi kwama40% ekusibalo esingaphasi kwesilinganiso sephasiloke ngomnyaka elizweni elihlala liqalene nesomiso.
tgt: vhunzhi ha maḓi a ḽino shango a bva kha mvula, fhedzi nga mulandu wa mbalotshikati ya mvula yo rekhodiwaho ine ya vha fhasi ha 40% musi i tshi vhambedzwa na ya mbalotshikati ya ḽifhasi nga ṅwaha, shango iḽi kanzhi ḽi dzu lela u kwamea nga gomelelo.

src: ukonga amanzi ekhaya lakho namkha ebhizinisini vala ipompo nawu sahlamba ubuso bakho, nawusabhratjha amazinyo namkha nawusatjhefako.
tgt: fhedziha, muhasho u na nge letshedzo dza u vha thusa u vhulunga maḓi.

src: ukutjhawara imizuzu emihlanu ngelanga kunokududa ngebhadeni, kusebenzisa ingcenye yinye keentathu zamanzi angebhadeni, okukukonga amalitha angafikela kama400 ngeveke.
tgt: u vhulunga maḓi hayani havho kana binduni kha vha vale bommbi ya maḓi musi vhe kati na u ṱamba khofheni, u ṱamba maṋo kana u ḓivheula.

src: ukutjhwara kungathatha amalitha ama20 wamanzi ngomzuzu, kanti nawududako ibhada ingathatha amalitha wamanzi ama80 ukuya kali150 qobe lihlandla lokuhlamba ngebhadeni.
tgt: u ṱamba nga shawara zwi nga shumisa maḓi a li nganaho ḽithara dza 20 nga minete muthihi, ngeno u ṱambela bavuni zwi tshi nga shumisa ḽithara dza vhukati ha 80 na 150 dza maḓi nga luthihi.

src: nayibe wenyula ukuhlambela ngebhadeni, ungayizalisi ibhada.
tgt: arali vha tshi takalela u ṱambela bavuni, vha songo vulela maḓi a ḓadza bavu ḽoṱhe.

src: lahla amathitjhu, iinu nwana nenye nenye isila emgqonyini weenzibi kunokuziphosela nge ndlwaneni.
tgt: kha vha laṱele thishu, zwikhokhonono na maṅwe mathukhwi fhethu ha u laṱela hone mathu khwi, hu si ngomu thoiḽethe.

src: njalo nawu vulela amanzi wendlwana kusebenza amalitha wamanzi ali12.
tgt: tshifhinga tshoṱhe musi vha tshi gwedzha thoiḽethe hu shuma maḓi a linganaho ḽithara dza 12. kha vha lugise thoiḽethe ine ya khou bvuḓa ngauri i nga fhedza nga u fhaladza maḓi a linganaho ḽithara dza 100 000 nga ṅwaha muthihi.

src: lungisa indlwana evuza amanzi, nakungasinjalo kungamotjheka amalitha wamanzi alinganiselwa eenkulungwaneni ezili khulu ngomnyaka.
tgt: kha vha shumise "maḓi a mashika" – maḓi o no shumaho u bva kha mabavu, mitshini ya u kuvha na zwiṅwe zwiko zwo tsirele dzeaho u gwedzha thoiḽethe yavho.

src: sebenzisa "amanzi asetje nzisiweko" — eku mamanzi ohlambe ngawo, ekuhlanzwe ngawo iwatjhini neweminye imithombo kobana ukhambise ilindle ngemva kokusebenzisa indlwana.
tgt: vha songo ḓadzesa kana u dzulela u shandukisa maḓi a bambelo ḽavho.

src: ungalizalisi khulu namkha ulipule ngokweqileko idamu lakwakho lokududa.
tgt: geḓela dza u vhilisa maḓi dzi songo tou ḓadzwa lwo kalulaho, dzi tea fhedzi u tou shelwa maḓi o linganaho zwenezwo zwine vha khou ṱoḓa u a shumisela zwone.

src: sebenzisa ithunga kunephayiphu lokha nawuhlanza ikoloyakho.
tgt: hezwi zwi ḓo fhungudza hafhu na mbadelo dzavho dza muḓagisi.

src: nakufuze usebenzise iphayiphu, sebenzisa elikghona ukufafaza nelingavalwa nanyana kunini nawuhlanza ikoloyi.
tgt: kha vha shumise bakethe, hu si phaiphi musi vha tshi tanzwa moḓoro wavho.

src: ukusebenzisa iphayiphu kungamotjha amanzi apheze abe malitha ama30 ngomzuzu.
tgt: arali vha tshi khou tou kombetshedzea u shumisa phaiphi, kha vha i shumise vho ambadza tshifafadzeli tshine vha nga kona u tshi vala zwenezwo musi vhe kati na u fafadzela moḓoro wavho.

src: kufuze abalimi baqinisekise ukuthi iimbulalinunwana bazibeka kude nemithombo yamanzi nemilambo.
tgt: zwa u shumisa phaiphi ya ngadeni zwi nga fhedza nga u fhaladza maḓi manzhi a linganaho ḽithara dza 30 nga minete muthihi.

src: isikhwama sokuqalelela amagadango athathelwa inturhu eqothele bobulili obuthileko nokubulawa kwabantu abasikazi (igbvf) silwela ukuqinisekisa ukuthi esewula afrika akunagbvf ekukhahlunyezwa ngayo abantu abasikazi; abantwana; abantu abezwana nabantu bobulili bunye nabo, nabantu bobulili obungakhethiko, nebobulili obuncambili, nabantu abatjhugulule ubulili ababelethwe nabo, nebobulili obuduna nobusikazi ngasi khathi sinye muntu munye, nebobulili obungakajayeleki ngokurarako, nebobulili obuthiyeleleko, nobunye (belgbtqia+).
tgt: u shumiswa ha mishonga ya prep zwi nga thusa u thivhela u kavhiwa nga dwadze ḽa hiv vho allison cooper musi shango ḽa afrika tshipembe ḽi tshi khou elelwa ḓuvha ḽa aids ḽa ḽifhasi nga ḽa 1 nyendavhusiku khathihi na maḓuvha a 16 a nndwa ya u lwa na zwiito zwa khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu (gbv) u bva nga ḽa 25 lara u swika ḽa 10 nyendavhusiku, vuk’uzenzele i khou lavhelesa kha vhushaka vhu re hone vhukati ha gbv na hiv/aids.

src: isikhwamesi savulwa ngu mengameli ucyril ramaphosa ngomhlolanja wee2021, ngomnqopho wokusekela ukuphunyeleliswa kwehlelo lamaqhinga wokulwa negbvf elizweniloke.
tgt: tshikwama tsha maga a u lwa na zwiito zwa khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu na mabulayo a vhafumakadzi (gbvf) tshi khou lingedza u ita uri afrika tshipembe hu vhe fhethu hune ha si tsha ḓo vha na zwiito zwa gbvf zwi itelwaho vhafumakadzi; vhana khathihi na vhathu vha vhafumakadzi vhane vha funana nga tshavho, vhanna vhane vha funana nga tshavho, tshibeuvhili, musha ndulambeu, munnamusadzi/musadzimunna, mushaya mbeu, mushayadzangalelo ḽa zwa vhudzekani khathihi na vhaṅwe vhanzhi vha re kha zwitshavha zwa (lgbtqia+).

src: ngo kutjho kobunzinzolwazi besikhwamesi, senza umsebenzi oqakathekileko ekwenzeni ukuthi kwenzeke amatjhuguluko, ngokusekelwa lirhubhululo, ukuphandluluka kwabantu nesekelo lokwenza eenhlanganweni ezinento eziyenzako ekulwiseni igbvf.
tgt: tshikwama tsho rwelwa ṱari nga phresidennde vho cyril ramaphosa nga ṅwedzi wa luhuhi 2021 u itela u tikedza zwa u thoma u shumiswa ha maano a vhupulani ha lu shaka kha zwa gbvf.

src: enye yeenhlangano ezise kelwa sikhwamesi yigugu dlamini foundation ya kwazulunatala, esele ithole amar250 000 ukusuka esi khwameni segbvf.
tgt: u ya nga webusaithi ya tshikwama itshi, tshi na mushumo muhulwane wa u ita uri hu vhe na tsha nduko, zwo ḓitika kha ṱhoḓisiso, ngeletshedzo na thikhedzo i vhonalaho kha madzangano ane a ḓidzhenisa tshoṱhe kha zwa nndwa ya u lwa na zwiito zwa gbvf.

src: umnqophisi ophetheko wegugu dlamini foundation, umandisa mabaso, wasungula ihlangano le ngomnyaka wee2010 ngemva kobana unina – ihloko leya ugugu dlamini – abulawa ngokukghadlhwa ngamatje ngomnyaka we1998 edurban, abangiswa ukuthi waveza ukuthi unengogwana ebanga intumbantonga, ihiv .
tgt: ḽiṅwe ḽa madzangano ane a tikedzwa nga tshikwama itshi ndi ḽa gugu dlamini foun dation , ḽine ḽa wanala fhaḽa vunḓuni ḽa kwazulunatala ḽe ḽa wana masheleni a linganaho r250 000 u bva kha tshikwama tsha thikhedzo ya zwa gbvf nga ṅwaha wa 2022. mulangi muhulu wa tshii miswa itshi tshi ḓivhiwaho sa gugu dlamini foundation , mufumakadzi vho mandisa mabaso, vho thoma tshiimiswa itshi nga ṅwaha wa 2010 nga murahu ha musi mme avho, mufumakadziwavhaṋe vho gugu dlamini vho kanḓekanywa nga matombo vha lovha nga ṅwaha wa 1998 ngei durban nga mulandu wa uri vha bvisela khagala tshiimo tshavho tsha u vha muthu o kavhiwaho nga tshitzhili tsha hiv.

src: "ihlangano le inqophe ukuqinisa ilawulo likarhulu mende wendawo kobanyana kuzokwenziwa ngcono ama gadango wokulwa negbvf, ekuyinto eqakathekileko ekuphumeleliseni amandla wokulawula isifo esibangwa yihiv esewula afrika," kutjho umabaso.
tgt: "foundation iyi i khou lavhelela u khwaṱhisa zwa mavhusele apo hu tshi itelwa u khwinifhadza maga a u lwa na zwiito zwa gbvf, zwine zwa vha zwa ndeme kha u swikela ndango ya dwadze ḽa hiv fhano afrika tshipembe," hu amba vho mabaso.

src: "godu inqophe nokwehlisa izinga lokutheleleka kwabantu ngehiv/aids, nokwan disa amathuba wokutjhejwa nokwenza ngcono umphumela wepilo ebantwini abasikazi nabaduna abaphethwe naba catjhazelwe yihiv/aids," uyangezelela.
tgt: "i dovha hafhu ya lavhelela u fhungudza zwiwo zwa u kavhiwa nga hiv/aids, u engedza tswikelo kha zwa ndondolo khathihi na u khwinifhadza mvelelo dza zwa mutakalo kha vhathu vha vhanna na vha vhafumakadzi vhe vha kavhiwa na u kwamea nga hiv/aids," vho amba ngauralo.

src: imali etholwa yihlangano le isiza abantu abasikazi abama522 255 nabantu abaduna abama900 ababuya emakhaya acatjhazelwe yigbv nenturhu yomkhaya; abantu abakhahlun yeziweko abanokukhubazeka; kunye nomphakathi welgbtqia+," kungezelela umabaso.
tgt: masheleni ane foundation ya a wana a thusa vhafumakadzi na vhasidzana vha swikaho 522 255 hu tshi katelwa na vhanna na vhatukana vha swikaho 900 u bva kha miṱa i kwameaho nga zwiito zwa gbv khathihi na khakhathi dza mahayani; vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali vhane vha khou tambudzwa; khathihi na zwitshavha zwa lgbtqia+, hu amba vho mabaso.

src: ngokutjho kweunaids, eendaweni lapho ihiv idlhabhe khona, abantu abasikazi ababongazimbi begbv basengozini yamathuba angafika ema50% wokungenwa yihiv .
tgt: u ya nga vha unaids, kha vhupo vhune ha vha na thaidzo khulwane ya u andesa ha zwiwo zwa hiv, vhafumakadzi vhane vha vha zwipondwa zwa gbv vha wanala vhe na khonadzeo khulwane ya u swika henefha kha 50% ya u nga kavhiwa nga dwadze ḽa hiv.

src: abanye babonobangela balokhu kukata, kunye nokwala kwamadoda ukuse benzisa amakhondomu.
tgt: zwiṅwe zwa zwiitisi zwa zwithu izwi ndi u tshipiwa ha vhafumakadzi khathihi na u hana ha vhathu vha vhanna u ambara khondomu.

src: wathi amaziko weze pilo womphakathi wesewula afrika ama70% namkha azii2 419 selahlanganise iprep eselwako eempakaneni aphele azinikele abantu abakhamba kilamaziko wezepilo.
tgt: iṅwe ya nḓila dza u thivhela u kavhiwa nga dwadze ḽa hivndi u nwa mishonga ya preexposure prophylaxis (prep), ine ya vha mishonga i nwiwaho ḓuvha na ḓuvha nga vhathu vhane vha si vhe na dwadze ḽa hiv nahone vhane vha vha khomboni khulwane ya u nga kavhiwa nga dwadze ḽeneḽo ḽahiv nga kha vhukwamani hazwa vhudzekani kana nga ushumisa dzidzhekiseni dza uḓiṱhavhela zwidzidzivhadzi.

src: "umuntu osebenzisa iprep akunasidingo sokuthi ayise benzise/ayisele ipilwakhe yoke; umuntu angakhetha ukuyisebenzisa qobe nakazi bona asengozini yokutheleleka ngehiv .
tgt: nga ṅwedzi wa ṱhangule, minisṱa vho joe phaahla vho amba uri shango ḽa afrika tshipembe ndi ḽone ḽine ḽa vha na tshivhalo tshi re nṱhesa tsha u shumiswa ha philisi dza prep kha mashango oṱhe a tshipembe ha soga ḽa sahara u mona na dzhango ḽoṱhe ḽa afrika.

src: nokhoke, ukuthi iprep isebenze kuhle, kufa nele isetjenziswe wokemalanga [ngalesisikhathi asengozini ekulu yokungatheleleka]," kufakaza umabaso.
tgt: vho amba uri 70% kana zwiimiswa zwa mutakalo zwa muvhuso zwi linganaho 2 419 zwi vho katela na u ṋetshedzwa ha philisi dza prep sa tshipiḓa tsha tshumelo dza zwiimiswa zwenezwi dza ḓuvha na ḓuvha.

src: nayoke iprep kufuze isetjenziswe nezinye iindlela zokuzivikela, ezinje ngamakhondomu wabasikazi namakhondomu wabaduna, ngoba phela iprep umuntu ayimvikeli kamanye amagulo athathelanwa emsemeni, begodu ayisiso isikhandelambeleko.
tgt: "muthu ane a khou shumisa philisi idzi dza prep, ha tei u tou dzi shumisa vhutshilo hawe hoṱhe, a nga tou dzi nwa fhedzi tshifhinga tshine a pfa uri a nga vha e khomboni ya u nga kavhiwa nga hiv.

src: umabaso uthi la abantu bezwana ngokuthi bafuna umntwana, iprep ingasiza ngokuvikela ukungenwa yihiv kilo umlingani omunye onganayo ihiv kunye nesa neni elingakabelethwa.
tgt: fhedziha, u itela uri philisi idzi dza prep dzi kone u shuma zwavhuḓi, dzi tea u nwiwa ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe [nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi hu na khombo khulwane]," vho mabaso vha a khwaṱhisedza.

src: kusenjalo, phambilini no nyaka isigungu esilawula zepilo esewula afrika (isah pra) siphasise ukusetjenziswa kwerenghana efakwa esithweni sobufazi kobana isebenze njengeprep .
tgt: philisi idzi dzi tea u dovha hafhu dza shumiswa khathihi na maṅwe maitele a tsire ledzo, u fana na u shumisa khondomu dza vhafumakadzi na dza vhanna nga mulandu wa uri philisi hedzi dza prep a dzi tsireledzi muthu na kha maṅwe malwadze a fhirelaho nga zwa vhudzekani nahone a si tshithivhelambebo.

src: irenghana le inomuthi orhobhisa amandla wentumbantonga obizwa ngo kuthi yidapivirine, kantike kufuze itjintjwe qobenyanga.
tgt: vho mabaso vha ri musi munna na musadzi vha tshi khou ṱoḓa u vha na ṅwana, philisi hedzi dza prep dzi nga thusa kha u thivhela u kavhiwa nga dwadze ḽa hiv kha uyo muṅwe wavho ane a si vhe naḽo khathihi na kha uyo ṅwana ane ha athu bebwa.

src: ngaphezu kwalokho, iprep etja – injektjheni ehlala iinyanga ezimbili – isalindelwe ukuphasiswa.
tgt: musi zwo ralo, mathomoni a uno ṅwaha, vha maanḓalanga a zwa ndangulo ya zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga vha afrika tshipembe vho ṱanganedza zwa u shumiswa ha rinngi ine ya vhewa kha vhudzimu ha muthu wa mufumakadzi sa iṅwe ya nḓila dza mushonga wa prep.

src: ingaphasiswa, angeze kusaba nesidingo sokuthi umuntu akhumbule ukuginya ipilisi ilanga nelanga.
tgt: u ḓadzisa kha zwenezwo, iṅwe prep ntswa, ine ya vha dzhekiseni ine ya fhedza miṅwedzi mivhili i tshi kha ḓi shuma ngomu muvhilini wa muthu, i kha ḓi vha yo lindela u wana thendelo ya u tea u shumiswa.

src: umseme ophephileko ihlangano le iqothele uku phungula izinga lokutheleleka ngehiv ngokukhuthaza ukusetjenziswa kwama khondomu nokuya emsemeni ngeendlela eziphephileko.
tgt: musi i tshi tou fhedza u wana the ndelo ya u tea u shumiswa, a hu tsha ḓo vha na ṱhoḓea ya uri vhathu vha dzule vha tshi humbula nga ha u nwa philisi dzavho ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.

src: "siyelelisa abantwana nelutjha ukuthi bakuriyadise ukuya emsemeni – banga rhabi –bekube sikhathi lapho bazabe sebalungele khona ukuthatha iinqunto ezinesi sekelo esiqinileko namandla wokukhetha nokuhlukanisa ngelwazi lezepilo elingcono," kuyelelisa umabaso.
tgt: vhudzekani ho tsireledzeahovhudzekani ho tsireledzeahofoundation i khou lavhelela u fhungudza zwiwo zwa u kavhiwa nga hiv nga u tou ṱuṱuwedza zwa u shumisa khondomu na u ita zwa vhudzekani ho tsireledzeaho.

src: "sikhuthazela nokuya emsemeni ngeendlela ezi phephileko ngokuqinelela ngesiyeleliso esithi abantu abasebenzise amakhondomu, begodu omunye nomunye abe nomlingani munye aqa lene naye ngasikhathi sinye.
